40001001	The book of the genealogy of יהושע Messiah , Son of Dawiḏ , Son of Aḇraham :
40001002	Aḇraham brought forth Yitsḥaq , and Yitsḥaq brought forth Ya‛aqoḇ , and Ya‛aqoḇ brought forth Yehuḏah and his brothers .
40001003	And Yehuḏah brought forth Perets and Zeraḥ by Tamar , and Perets brought forth Ḥetsron , and Ḥetsron brought forth Ram .
40001004	And Ram brought forth Amminaḏaḇ , and Amminaḏaḇ brought forth Naḥshon , and Naḥshon brought forth Salmon .
40001005	And Salmon brought forth Bo‛az by Raḥaḇ , and Bo‛az brought forth Oḇĕḏ by Ruth , and Oḇĕḏ brought forth Yishai .
40001006	And Yishai brought forth Dawiḏ the sovereign , and Dawiḏ the sovereign brought forth Shelomoh by Uriyah’s wife .
40001007	And Shelomoh brought forth Reḥaḇ‛am , and Reḥaḇ‛am brought forth Aḇiyah , and Aḇiyah brought forth Asa .
40001008	And Asa brought forth Yehoshaphat , and Yehoshaphat brought forth Yoram , and Yoram brought forth Uzziyah .
40001009	And Uzziyah brought forth Yotham , and Yotham brought forth Aḥaz , and Aḥaz brought forth Ḥizqiyahu .
40001010	And Ḥizqiyahu brought forth Menashsheh , and Menashsheh brought forth Amon , and Amon brought forth Yoshiyahu .
40001011	And Yoshiyahu brought forth Yeḵonyah and his brothers at the time of the exile to Baḇel .
40001012	And after the exile to Baḇel , Yeḵonyah brought forth She’alti’ĕl , and She’alti’ĕl brought forth Zerubbaḇel .
40001013	And Zerubbaḇel brought forth Aḇihuḏ , and Aḇihuḏ brought forth Elyaqim , and Elyaqim brought forth Azor .
40001014	And Azor brought forth Tsaḏoq , and Tsaḏoq brought forth Aqim , and Aqim brought forth Elihuḏ .
40001015	And Elihuḏ brought forth El‛azar , and El‛azar brought forth Mattan , and Mattan brought forth Ya‛aqoḇ .
40001016	And Ya‛aqoḇ brought forth Yosĕph the husband of Miryam , of whom was born יהושע who is called Messiah .
40001017	So all the generations from Aḇraham to Dawiḏ were fourteen generations , and from Dawiḏ until the exile to Baḇel were fourteen generations , and from the exile to Baḇel until the Messiah were fourteen generations .
40001018	But the birth of יהושע Messiah was as follows : After His mother Miryam was engaged to Yosĕph , before they came together , she was found to be pregnant from the Set-apart Spirit .
40001019	And Yosĕph her husband , being righteous , and not wishing to make a show of her , had in mind to put her away secretly .
40001020	But while he thought about this , see , a messenger of יהוה appeared to him in a dream , saying , “ Yosĕph , son of Dawiḏ , do not be afraid to take Miryam as your wife , for that which is in her was brought forth from the Set-apart Spirit .
40001021	“ And she shall give birth to a Son , and you shall call His Name יהושע for He shall save His people from their sins . ”
40001022	And all this came to be in order to fill what was spoken by יהוה through the prophet , saying ,
40001023	“ See , a maiden shall conceive , and she shall give birth to a Son , and they shall call His Name Immanu’ĕl , ” which translated , means , “ Ěl with us . ”
40001024	And Yosĕph , awaking from his sleep , did as the messenger of יהוה commanded him and took his wife ,
40001025	but knew her not until she gave birth to her Son , the first-born . And he called His Name יהושע .
40002001	And יהושע having been born in Bĕyth Leḥem of Yehuḏah in the days of Herodes the sovereign , see , Magi from the East came to Yerushalayim ,
40002002	saying , “ Where is He who has been born Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ? For we saw His star in the East and have come to do reverence to Him . ”
40002003	And Herodes the sovereign , having heard , was troubled , and all Yerushalayim with him .
40002004	And having gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he asked them where the Messiah was to be born .
40002005	And they said to him , “ In Bĕyth Leḥem of Yehuḏah , for thus it has been written by the prophet ,
40002006	‘ But you , Bĕyth Leḥem , in the land of Yehuḏah , you are by no means least among the rulers of Yehuḏah , for out of you shall come a Ruler who shall shepherd My people Yisra’ĕl . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herodes , having called the Magi secretly , learned exactly from them what time the star appeared .
40002008	And having sent them to Bĕyth Leḥem , he said , “ Go and search diligently for the Child , and when you have found Him , bring back word to me , so that I too might go and do reverence to Him . ”
40002009	And having heard the sovereign , they went . And see , the star which they had seen in the East went before them , until it came and stood over where the Child was .
40002010	And seeing the star , they rejoiced with exceedingly great joy .
40002011	And coming into the house , they saw the Child with Miryam His mother , and fell down and did reverence to Him , and opening their treasures , they presented to Him gifts of gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	And having been warned in a dream that they should not return to Herodes , they departed for their own country by another way .
40002013	And when they had left , see , a messenger of יהוה appeared to Yosĕph in a dream , saying , “ Arise , take the Child and His mother , and flee to Mitsrayim , and remain there until I bring you word , for Herodes is about to seek the Child to destroy Him . ”
40002014	And rising up , he took the Child and His mother by night and departed for Mitsrayim ,
40002015	and remained there until the death of Herodes , to fill what was spoken by יהוה through the prophet , saying , “ Out of Mitsrayim I have called My Son . ”
40002016	Then Herodes , having seen that he was fooled by the Magi , was greatly enraged , and he sent forth and slew all the male children in Bĕyth Leḥem and in all its borders , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had exactly learnt from the Magi .
40002017	Then was filled what was spoken by Yirmeyahu the prophet , saying ,
40002018	“ A voice was heard in Ramah , wailing and weeping , and great mourning – Raḥĕl weeping for her children , refusing to be comforted , because they were no more . ”
40002019	And Herodes having died , see , a messenger of יהוה appeared in a dream to Yosĕph in Mitsrayim ,
40002020	saying , “ Arise , and take the Child and His mother , and go into the land of Yisra’ĕl , for those seeking the life of the Child are dead . ”
40002021	And rising up , he took the Child and His mother , and came into the land of Yisra’ĕl .
40002022	But hearing that Archelaos was reigning over Yehuḏah instead of his father Herodes , he was afraid to go there . And having been warned in a dream , he departed to the parts of Galil ,
40002023	and came and dwelt in a city called Natsareth – thus to fill what was spoken by the prophets , “ He shall be called a Natsarene . ”
40003001	And in those days Yoḥanan the Immerser came proclaiming in the wilderness of Yehuḏah ,
40003002	and saying , “ Repent , for the reign of the heavens has come near ! ”
40003003	For this is he who was spoken of by the prophet Yeshayahu , saying , “ A voice of one crying in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way of יהוה , make His paths straight . ’ ”
40003004	And Yoḥanan had a garment of camel’s hair , and a leather girdle around his waist . And his food was locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Then Yerushalayim , and all Yehuḏah , and all the country around the Yardĕn went out to him ,
40003006	and they were immersed by him in the Yardĕn , confessing their sins .
40003007	And seeing many of the Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his immersion , he said to them , “ Brood of adders ! Who has warned you to flee from the coming wrath ?
40003008	“ Bear , therefore , fruits worthy of repentance ,
40003009	and do not think to say to yourselves , ‘ We have Aḇraham as father . ’ For I say to you that Elohim is able to raise up children to Aḇraham from these stones .
40003010	“ And the axe is already laid to the root of the trees . Every tree , then , which does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire .
40003011	“ I indeed immerse you in water unto repentance , but He who is coming after me is mightier than I , whose sandals I am not worthy to bear . He shall immerse you in the Set-apart Spirit and fire .
40003012	“ His winnowing fork is in His hand , and He shall thoroughly cleanse His threshing-floor , and gather His wheat into the storehouse , but the chaff He shall burn with unquenchable fire . ”
40003013	Then יהושע came from Galil to Yoḥanan at the Yardĕn to be immersed by him .
40003014	But Yoḥanan was hindering Him , saying , “ I need to be immersed by You , and You come to me ? ”
40003015	But יהושע answering , said to him , “ Permit it now , for thus it is fitting for us to fill all righteousness . ” Then he permitted Him .
40003016	And having been immersed , יהושע went up immediately from the water , and see , the heavens were opened , and He saw the Spirit of Elohim descending like a dove and coming upon Him ,
40003017	and see , a voice out of the heavens , saying , “ This is My Son , the Beloved , in whom I did delight . ”
40004001	Then יהושע was led up by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tried by the devil .
40004002	And after having fasted forty days and forty nights , He was hungry .
40004003	And the trier came and said to Him , “ If You are the Son of Elohim , command that these stones become bread . ”
40004004	But He answering , said , “ It has been written , ‘ Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that comes from the mouth of יהוה . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took Him up into the set-apart city , set Him on the edge of the Set-apart Place ,
40004006	and said to Him , “ If You are the Son of Elohim , throw Yourself down . For it has been written , ‘ He shall command His messengers concerning you , ’ and , ‘ In their hands they shall bear you up , so that you do not dash your foot against a stone . ’ ”
40004007	יהושע said to him , “ It has also been written , ‘ You shall not try יהוה your Elohim . ’ ”
40004008	Again , the devil took Him up on a very high mountain , and showed Him all the reigns of the world , and their esteem ,
40004009	and said to Him , “ All these I shall give You if You fall down and worship me . ”
40004010	Then יהושע said to him , “ Go , Satan ! For it has been written , ‘ You shall worship יהוה your Elohim , and Him alone you shall serve . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil left Him , and see , messengers came and attended Him .
40004012	And יהושע , having heard that Yoḥanan had been put in prison , withdrew into Galil .
40004013	And leaving Natsareth , He came and dwelt in Kephar Naḥum , which is by the sea , in the borders of Zeḇulun and Naphtali ,
40004014	to fill what was spoken by Yeshayahu the prophet , saying ,
40004015	“ Land of Zeḇulun and land of Naphtali , the way of the sea , beyond the Yardĕn , Galil of the gentiles –
40004016	the people who sat in darkness saw a great light , and upon those who sat in the land and shadow of death , light arose to them . ”
40004017	From that time יהושע began to proclaim and to say , “ Repent , for the reign of the heavens has drawn near . ”
40004018	And יהושע , walking by the Sea of Galil , saw two brothers , Shim‛on called Kĕpha , and Andri his brother , casting a net into the sea , for they were fishermen .
40004019	And He said to them , “ Follow Me , and I shall make you fishers of men . ”
40004020	And immediately they left their nets and followed Him .
40004021	And going on from there , He saw two other brothers , Ya‛aqoḇ the son of Zaḇdai , and Yoḥanan his brother , in the boat with Zaḇdai their father , mending their nets . And He called them ,
40004022	and immediately they left the boat and their father , and followed Him .
40004023	And יהושע went about all Galil , teaching in their congregations , and proclaiming the Good News of the reign , and healing every disease and every bodily weakness among the people .
40004024	And news about Him went out into all Syria . And they brought to Him all who were sick , afflicted with various diseases and pains , and those who were demon-possessed , and epileptics , and paralytics . And He healed them .
40004025	And large crowds – from Galil , and Dekapolis , and Yerushalayim , and Yehuḏah , and beyond the Yardĕn – followed Him .
40005001	But when He saw the crowds , He went up on a mountain . And when He was seated His taught ones came to Him .
40005002	And having opened His mouth , He was teaching them , saying ,
40005003	“ Blessed are the poor in spirit , because theirs is the reign of the heavens .
40005004	“ Blessed are those who mourn , because they shall be comforted .
40005005	“ Blessed are the meek , because they shall inherit the earth .
40005006	“ Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness , because they shall be filled .
40005007	“ Blessed are the compassionate , because they shall obtain compassion .
40005008	“ Blessed are the clean in heart , because they shall see Elohim .
40005009	“ Blessed are the peacemakers , because they shall be called sons of Elohim .
40005010	“ Blessed are those persecuted for righteousness’ sake , because theirs is the reign of the heavens .
40005011	“ Blessed are you when they reproach and persecute you , and falsely say every wicked word against you , for My sake .
40005012	“ Rejoice and be glad , because your reward in the heavens is great . For in this way they persecuted the prophets who were before you .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth , but if the salt becomes tasteless , how shall it be seasoned ? For it is no longer of any use but to be thrown out and to be trodden down by men .
40005014	“ You are the light of the world . It is impossible for a city to be hidden on a mountain .
40005015	“ Nor do they light a lamp and put it under a basket , but on a lampstand , and it shines to all those in the house .
40005016	“ Let your light so shine before men , so that they see your good works and praise your Father who is in the heavens .
40005017	“ Do not think that I came to destroy the Torah or the Prophets . I did not come to destroy but to complete .
40005018	“ For truly , I say to you , till the heaven and the earth pass away , one jot or one tittle shall by no means pass from the Torah till all be done .
40005019	“ Whoever , then , breaks one of the least of these commands , and teaches men so , shall be called least in the reign of the heavens ; but whoever does and teaches them , he shall be called great in the reign of the heavens .
40005020	“ For I say to you , that unless your righteousness exceeds that of the scribes and Pharisees , you shall by no means enter into the reign of the heavens .
40005021	“ You heard that it was said to those of old , ‘ You shall not murder , ’ and whoever murders shall be liable to judgment .
40005022	“ But I say to you that whoever is wroth with his brother without a cause shall be liable to judgment . And whoever says to his brother , ‘ Raka ! ’ shall be liable to the Sanhedrin . But whoever says , ‘ You fool ! ’ shall be liable to fire of Gehenna .
40005023	“ If , then , you bring your gift to the altar , and there remember that your brother holds whatever against you ,
40005024	leave your gift there before the altar , and go , first make peace with your brother , and then come and offer your gift .
40005025	“ Be well-minded with your opponent , promptly , while you are on the way with him , lest your opponent deliver you to the judge , and the judge to the officer , and you be thrown into prison .
40005026	“ Truly , I say to you , you shall by no means get out of there till you have paid the last penny .
40005027	“ You heard that it was said to those of old , ‘ You shall not commit adultery . ’
40005028	“ But I say to you that everyone looking at a woman to lust for her has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	“ And if your right eye causes you to stumble , pluck it out and throw it away from you . For it is better for you that one of your members perish , than for your entire body to be thrown into Gehenna .
40005030	“ And if your right hand causes you to stumble , cut it off and throw it away from you . For it is better for you that one of your members perish , than for your entire body to be thrown into Gehenna .
40005031	“ And it has been said , ‘ Whoever puts away his wife , let him give her a certificate of divorce . ’
40005032	“ But I say to you that whoever puts away his wife , except for the matter of whoring , makes her commit adultery . And whoever marries a woman who has been put away commits adultery .
40005033	“ Again , you heard that it was said to those of old , ‘ You shall not swear falsely , but shall perform your oaths to יהוה . ’
40005034	“ But I say to you , do not swear at all , neither by the heaven , because it is Elohim’s throne ;
40005035	nor by the earth , for it is His footstool ; nor by Yerushalayim , for it is the city of the great Sovereign ;
40005036	nor swear by your head , because you are not able to make one hair white or black .
40005037	“ But let your word ‘ Yea’ be ‘ Yea , ’ and your ‘ No’ be ‘ No . ’ And what goes beyond these is from the wicked one .
40005038	“ You heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth , ’
40005039	but I say to you , do not resist the wicked . But whoever slaps you on your right cheek , turn the other to him also .
40005040	“ And he who wishes to sue you and take away your inner garment , let him have your outer garment as well .
40005041	“ And whoever compels you to go one mile , go with him two .
40005042	“ Give to him who asks of you , and from him who wishes to borrow from you , do not turn away .
40005043	“ You heard that it was said , ‘ You shall love your neighbour and hate your enemy . ’
40005044	“ But I say to you , love your enemies , bless those cursing you , do good to those hating you , and pray for those insulting you and persecuting you ,
40005045	so that you become sons of your Father in the heavens . Because He makes His sun rise on the wicked and on the good , and sends rain on the righteous and on the unrighteous .
40005046	“ For if you love those loving you , what reward have you ? Are the tax collectors not doing the same too ?
40005047	“ And if you greet your brothers only , what do you do more than others ? Are the tax collectors not doing so too ?
40005048	“ Therefore , be perfect , as your Father in the heavens is perfect .
40006001	“ Beware of doing your kind deeds before men , in order to be seen by them . Otherwise you have no reward from your Father in the heavens .
40006002	“ Thus , when you do a kind deed , do not sound a trumpet before you as the hypocrites do , in the congregations and in the streets , to be praised by men . Truly , I say to you , they have their reward .
40006003	“ But when you do a kind deed , do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing ,
40006004	so that your kind deed shall be in secret . And your Father who sees in secret shall Himself reward you openly .
40006005	“ And when you pray , you shall not be like the hypocrites . For they love to pray standing in the congregations and on the corners of the streets , to be seen by men . Truly , I say to you , they have their reward .
40006006	“ But you , when you pray , go into your room , and having shut your door , pray to your Father who is in the secret place . And your Father who sees in secret shall reward you openly .
40006007	“ And when praying , do not keep on babbling like the gentiles . For they think that they shall be heard for their many words .
40006008	“ Therefore do not be like them , for your Father knows what you need before you ask Him .
40006009	“ This , then , is the way you should pray : ‘ Our Father who is in the heavens , let Your Name be set-apart ,
40006010	let Your reign come , let Your desire be done on earth as it is in heaven .
40006011	‘ Give us today our daily bread .
40006012	‘ And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
40006013	‘ And do not lead us into trial , but deliver us from the wicked one – because Yours is the reign and the power and the esteem , forever . Amĕn . ’
40006014	“ For if you forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father shall also forgive you .
40006015	“ But if you do not forgive men their trespasses , neither shall your Father forgive your trespasses .
40006016	“ And when you fast , do not be sad-faced like the hypocrites . For they disfigure their faces so that they appear to be fasting to men . Truly , I say to you , they have their reward .
40006017	“ But you , when you fast , anoint your head and wash your face ,
40006018	so that you do not appear to men to be fasting , but to your Father who is in the secret place . And your Father who sees in secret shall reward you openly .
40006019	“ Do not lay up for yourselves treasures on earth , where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal ,
40006020	but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in and steal .
40006021	“ For where your treasure is , there your heart shall be also .
40006022	“ The lamp of the body is the eye . If therefore your eye is good , all your body shall be enlightened .
40006023	“ But if your eye is evil , all your body shall be darkened . If , then , the light that is within you is darkness , how great is that darkness !
40006024	“ No one is able to serve two masters , for either he shall hate the one and love the other , or else he shall cleave to the one and despise the other . You are not able to serve Elohim and mammon .
40006025	“ Because of this I say to you , do not worry about your life , what you shall eat or drink , or about your body , what you shall put on . Is not life more than the food and the body more than the clothing ?
40006026	“ Look at the birds of the heaven , for they neither sow nor reap nor gather into storehouses , yet your heavenly Father does feed them . Are you not worth more than they ?
40006027	“ And which of you by worrying is able to add one cubit to his life’s span ?
40006028	“ So why do you worry about clothing ? Note well the lilies of the field , how they grow . They neither toil nor spin ,
40006029	and I say to you that even Shelomoh in all his esteem was not dressed like one of these .
40006030	“ But if Elohim so clothes the grass of the field , which exists today , and tomorrow is thrown into the furnace , how much more you , O you of little belief ?
40006031	“ Do not worry then , saying , ‘ What shall we eat ? ’ or ‘ What shall we drink ? ’ or ‘ What shall we wear ? ’
40006032	“ For all these the gentiles seek for . And your heavenly Father knows that you need all these .
40006033	“ But seek first the reign of Elohim , and His righteousness , and all these matters shall be added to you .
40006034	“ Do not , then , worry about tomorrow , for tomorrow shall have its own worries . Each day has enough evil of itself .
40007001	“ Do not judge , lest you be judged .
40007002	“ For with what judgment you judge , you shall be judged . And with the same measure you use , it shall be measured to you .
40007003	“ And why do you look at the splinter in your brother’s eye , but do not notice the plank in your own eye ?
40007004	“ Or how is it that you say to your brother , ‘ Let me remove the splinter out of your eye , ’ and see , a plank is in your own eye ?
40007005	“ Hypocrite ! First remove the plank from your own eye , and then you shall see clearly to remove the splinter out of your brother’s eye .
40007006	“ Do not give what is set-apart to the dogs , nor throw your pearls before the pigs , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn and tear you in pieces .
40007007	“ Ask and it shall be given to you , seek and you shall find , knock and it shall be opened to you .
40007008	“ For everyone who asks receives , and he who seeks finds , and to him who knocks it shall be opened .
40007009	“ Or is there a man among you who , if his son asks for bread , shall give him a stone ?
40007010	“ Or if he asks for a fish , shall he give him a snake ?
40007011	“ If you then , being wicked , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more shall your Father who is in the heavens give what is good to those who ask Him !
40007012	“ Therefore , whatever you wish men to do to you , do also to them , for this is the Torah and the Prophets .
40007013	“ Enter in through the narrow gate ! Because the gate is wide – and the way is broad – that leads to destruction , and there are many who enter in through it .
40007014	“ Because the gate is narrow and the way is hard pressed which leads to life , and there are few who find it .
40007015	“ But beware of the false prophets , who come to you in sheep’s clothing , but inwardly they are savage wolves .
40007016	“ By their fruits you shall know them . Are grapes gathered from thornbushes or figs from thistles ?
40007017	“ So every good tree yields good fruit , but a rotten tree yields wicked fruit .
40007018	“ A good tree is unable to yield wicked fruit , and a rotten tree to yield good fruit .
40007019	“ Every tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	“ So then , by their fruits you shall know them –
40007021	“ Not everyone who says to Me , ‘ Master , Master , ’ shall enter into the reign of the heavens , but he who is doing the desire of My Father in the heavens .
40007022	“ Many shall say to Me in that day , ‘ Master , Master , have we not prophesied in Your Name , and cast out demons in Your Name , and done many mighty works in Your Name ? ’
40007023	“ And then I shall declare to them , ‘ I never knew you , depart from Me , you who work lawlessness ! ’
40007024	“ Therefore everyone who hears these words of Mine , and does them , shall be like a wise man who built his house on the rock ,
40007025	and the rain came down , and the floods came , and the winds blew and beat on that house , and it did not fall , for it was founded on the rock .
40007026	“ And everyone who hears these words of Mine , and does not do them , shall be like a foolish man who built his house on the sand ,
40007027	and the rain came down , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and they beat on that house , and it fell , and great was its fall . ”
40007028	And it came to be , when יהושע had ended these words , that the people were astonished at His teaching ,
40007029	for He was teaching them as one possessing authority , and not as the scribes .
40008001	And when He came down from the mountain , large crowds followed Him .
40008002	And see , a leper came , and bowed before Him , saying , “ Master , if You desire , You are able to make me clean . ”
40008003	And stretching out His hand יהושע touched him , saying , “ I desire it . Be cleansed ! ” And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
40008004	And יהושע said to him , “ See , mention it to no one . But go your way , show yourself to the priest , and offer the gift that Mosheh commanded , as a witness to them . ”
40008005	And when יהושע had entered Kephar Naḥum , a captain came to Him , appealing to Him ,
40008006	saying , “ Master , my servant is lying in the house paralysed , grievously tortured . ”
40008007	And יהושע said to him , “ I shall come and heal him . ”
40008008	And the captain answering , said , “ Master , I am not worthy that You should come under my roof . But only say a word , and my servant shall be healed .
40008009	“ For I too am a man under authority , having soldiers under me . And I say to this one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes , and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes , and to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	And when יהושע heard , He marvelled , and said to those who followed , “ Truly , I say to you , not even in Yisra’ĕl have I found such great belief !
40008011	“ And I say to you that many shall come from east and west , and sit down with Aḇraham , and Yitsḥaq , and Ya‛aqoḇ in the reign of the heavens ,
40008012	but the sons of the reign shall be cast out into outer darkness – there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ”
40008013	And יהושע said to the captain , “ Go , and as you have believed , so let it be done for you . ” And his servant was healed that hour .
40008014	And when יהושע had come into the house of Kĕpha , He saw his wife’s mother lying sick with inflammation .
40008015	And He touched her hand , and the inflammation left her . And she arose and served them .

40008017	that it might be filled what was spoken by Yeshayahu the prophet , saying , “ He Himself took our weaknesses and bore our sicknesses . ”

40008020	And יהושע said to him , “ The foxes have holes and the birds of the heaven nests , but the Son of Aḏam has nowhere to lay His head . ”
40008021	And another of His taught ones said to Him , “ Master , first let me go and bury my father . ”
40008022	But יהושע said to him , “ Follow Me , and leave the dead to bury their own dead . ”
40008023	And when He entered into a boat , His taught ones followed Him .
40008024	And see , a great gale arose on the sea , so that the boat was covered by the waves . But He was sleeping .
40008025	And His taught ones came to Him and woke Him up , saying , “ Master , save us ! We are perishing ! ”
40008026	And He said to them , “ Why are you afraid , O you of little belief ? ” Then , having risen , He rebuked the winds and the sea . And there was a great calm .
40008027	And the men marvelled , saying , “ What is this , that even the winds and the sea obey Him ? ”
40008028	And when He came to the other side , to the country of the Girgashites , two demon-possessed ones met Him , coming out of the tombs , very fierce , so that no one was able to pass that way .
40008029	And see , they cried out , saying , “ What have we to do with You , יהושע , Son of Elohim ? Have You come here to torture us , before the appointed time ? ”

40008031	and the demons begged Him , saying , “ If You cast us out , send us into the herd of pigs . ”

40010001	And having called His twelve taught ones near , He gave them authority over unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal every disease and every bodily weakness .
40010002	And these are the names of the twelve emissaries : first , Shim‛on , who is called Kĕpha , and Andri his brother ; Ya‛aqoḇ the son of Zaḇdai , and Yoḥanan his brother ;
40010003	Philip and Bartholomi ; T’oma and Mattithyahu the tax collector ; Ya‛aqoḇ the son of Alphai , and Laḇai whose last name was Taddai ;

40010005	יהושע sent these twelve out , having commanded them , saying , “ Do not go into the way of the gentiles , and do not enter a city of the Shomeronites ,
40010006	but rather go to the lost sheep of the house of Yisra’ĕl .
40010007	“ And as you go , proclaim , saying , ‘ The reign of the heavens has drawn near . ’

40010009	“ Do not acquire gold or silver or copper for your moneybelts ,
40010010	or a bag for the journey , or two undergarments , or sandals , or staffs , for the worker is worthy of his food .
40010011	“ And into whatever city or village you enter , ask who is worthy in it , and stay there until you leave .
40010012	“ And as you enter into a house , greet it .
40010013	“ And if the house is worthy , let your peace come upon it . But if it is not worthy , let your peace return to you .
40010014	“ And whoever does not receive you nor hear your words , when you leave that house or city , shake off the dust from your feet .
40010015	“ Truly , I say to you , it shall be more bearable for the land of Seḏom and Amorah in the day of judgment than for that city !
40010016	“ See , I send you out as sheep in the midst of wolves . Therefore be wise as serpents and innocent as doves .
40010017	“ But beware of men , for they shall deliver you up to sanhedrins and flog you in their congregations .
40010018	“ And you shall be brought before governors and sovereigns for My sake , as a witness to them and to the gentiles .
40010019	“ But when they deliver you up , do not worry about how or what you should speak . For it shall be given to you in that hour what you shall speak ,
40010020	for it is not you who speak , but the Spirit of your Father speaking in you .
40010021	“ And brother shall deliver up brother to death , and a father his child . And children shall rise up against parents and shall put them to death .
40010022	“ And you shall be hated by all for My Name’s sake . But he who shall have endured to the end shall be saved .
40010023	“ And when they persecute you in this city , flee to another . For truly , I say to you , you shall by no means have gone through the cities of Yisra’ĕl before the Son of Aḏam comes .
40010024	“ A taught one is not above his teacher , nor a servant above his master .
40010025	“ It is enough for the taught one to become like his teacher , and a servant like his master . If they have called the master of the house Be‛elzebul , how much more those of his household !
40010026	“ Therefore do not fear them . For whatever is covered shall be revealed , and whatever is hidden shall be made known .
40010027	“ What I say to you in the dark , speak in the light . And what you hear in the ear , proclaim on the house-tops .
40010028	“ And do not fear those who kill the body but are unable to kill the being . But rather fear Him who is able to destroy both being and body in Gehenna .
40010029	“ Are not two sparrows sold for a copper coin ? And not one of them falls to the ground without your Father .
40010030	“ And even the hairs of your head are all numbered .
40010031	“ So do not fear , you are worth more than many sparrows .
40010032	“ Everyone , therefore , who shall confess Me before men , him I shall also confess before My Father who is in the heavens .
40010033	“ But whoever shall deny Me before men , him I shall also deny before My Father who is in the heavens .
40010034	“ Do not think that I have come to bring peace on earth . I did not come to bring peace but a sword ,
40010035	for I have come to bring division , a man against his father , a daughter against her mother , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law –
40010036	and a man’s enemies are those of his own household .
40010037	“ He who loves father or mother more than Me is not worthy of Me , and he who loves son or daughter more than Me is not worthy of Me .
40010038	“ And he who does not take up his stake and follow after Me is not worthy of Me .
40010039	“ He who has found his life shall lose it , and he that has lost his life for My sake shall find it .
40010040	“ He who receives you receives Me , and he who receives Me receives Him who sent Me .
40010041	“ He who receives a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet’s reward . And he who receives a righteous one in the name of a righteous one shall receive a righteous one’s reward .
40010042	“ And whoever gives one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a taught one , truly , I say to you , he shall by no means lose his reward . ”
40011001	And it came to be , when יהושע ended instructing His twelve taught ones , that He set out from there to teach and to proclaim in their cities .

40012001	At that time יהושע went through the grain fields on the Sabbath . And His taught ones were hungry , and began to pluck heads of grain , to eat .
40012002	And when the Pharisees saw it , they said to Him , “ Look , Your taught ones are doing what is not right to do on the Sabbath ! ”
40012003	But He said to them , “ Have you not read what Dawiḏ did when he was hungry , he and those who were with him :
40012004	how he went into the House of Elohim and ate the showbread which was not right for him to eat , nor for those who were with him , but only for the priests ?
40012005	“ Or did you not read in the Torah that on the Sabbath the priests in the Set-apart Place profane the Sabbath , and are blameless ?
40012006	“ But I say to you that in this place there is One greater than the Set-apart Place .
40012007	“ And if you had known what this means , ‘ I desire compassion and not offering , ’ you would not have condemned the blameless .
40012008	“ For the Son of Aḏam is Master of the Sabbath . ”

40012011	And He said to them , “ What man is there among you who has one sheep , and if it falls into a pit on the Sabbath , shall not take hold of it and lift it out ?
40012012	“ How much more worth is a man than a sheep ! So it is right to do good on the Sabbath . ”
40012013	Then He said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” And he stretched it out , and it was restored , as healthy as the other .
40012014	But the Pharisees went out and took counsel against Him , so as to destroy Him .

40012022	Then they brought to Him one who was demon-possessed , blind and dumb . And He healed him , so that the blind and dumb man both spoke and saw .

40012025	And יהושע knew their thoughts , and said to them , “ Every reign divided against itself is laid waste , and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand .

40012027	“ And if I , by Be‛elzebul , do cast out demons , by whom do your sons cast them out ? Because of this they shall be your judges .
40012028	“ But if I cast out demons by the Spirit of Elohim , then the reign of Elohim has come upon you .
40012029	“ Or how is one able to enter a strong man’s house and plunder his goods , unless he first binds the strong man ? And then he shall plunder his house .
40012030	“ He who is not with Me is against Me , and he who does not gather with Me scatters abroad .

40012032	“ And whoever speaks a word against the Son of Aḏam , it shall be forgiven him , but whoever speaks against the Set-apart Spirit , it shall not be forgiven him , either in this age or in the age to come .
40012033	“ Either make the tree good and its fruit good , or else make the tree rotten and its fruit rotten , for a tree is known by its fruit .
40012034	“ Brood of adders ! How are you able to speak what is good – being wicked ? For the mouth speaks from the overflow of the heart .
40012035	“ The good man brings forth what is good from the good treasures of his heart , and the wicked man brings forth what is wicked from the wicked treasure .
40012036	“ And I say to you that for every idle word men speak , they shall give an account of it in the day of judgment .
40012037	“ For by your words you shall be declared righteous , and by your words you shall be declared unrighteous . ”

40012039	But He answering , said to them , “ A wicked and adulterous generation seeks after a sign , and no sign shall be given to it except the sign of the prophet Yonah .

40013001	And on that day יהושע went out of the house and sat by the sea .
40013002	And large crowds were gathered together to Him , so that He went into a boat and sat down . And all the crowd stood on the beach .
40013003	And He spoke to them much in parables , saying , “ See , the sower went out to sow .
40013004	“ And as he sowed , some indeed fell by the wayside , and the birds came and devoured them .
40013005	“ And others fell on rocky places , where they did not have much soil , and immediately they sprang up , because they had no depth of soil .
40013006	“ But when the sun was up they were scorched , and because they had no root they withered .
40013007	“ And others fell among thorns , and the thorns came up and choked them .
40013008	“ And others fell on good soil and yielded a crop , some a hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
40013009	“ He who has ears to hear , let him hear ! ”
40013010	And the taught ones came and said to Him , “ Why do You speak to them in parables ? ”
40013011	And He answering , said to them , “ Because it has been given to you to know the secrets of the reign of the heavens , but to them it has not been given .
40013012	“ For whoever possesses , to him more shall be given , and he shall have overflowingly ; but whoever does not possess , even what he possesses shall be taken away from him .
40013013	“ Because of this I speak to them in parables , because seeing they do not see , and hearing they do not hear , nor do they understand .
40013014	“ And in them the prophecy of Yeshayahu is completely filled , which says , ‘ Hearing you shall hear and by no means understand , and seeing you shall see and by no means perceive ,
40013015	for the heart of this people has become thickened , and their ears are hard of hearing , and their eyes they have closed , lest they should see with their eyes and hear with their ears , lest they should understand with their heart , and turn back , and I heal them . ’
40013016	“ And blessed are your eyes because they see , and your ears because they hear ,
40013017	for truly I say to you , that many prophets and righteous ones longed to see what you see , and did not see it , and to hear what you hear , and did not hear it .
40013018	“ You , then , hear the parable of the sower :
40013019	“ When anyone hears the word of the reign , and does not understand it , then the wicked one comes and snatches away what was sown in his heart . This is that sown by the wayside .
40013020	“ And that sown on rocky places , this is he who hears the word and immediately receives it with joy ,
40013021	yet he has no root in himself , but is short-lived , and when pressure or persecution arises because of the word , immediately he stumbles .
40013022	“ And that sown among the thorns is he who hears the word , and the worry of this age and the deceit of riches choke the word , and it becomes fruitless .
40013023	“ And that sown on the good soil is he who hears the word and understands it , who indeed bears fruit and yields – some a hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty . ”
40013024	Another parable He put before them , saying , “ The reign of the heavens has become like a man who sowed good seed in his field ,
40013025	but while men slept , his enemy came and sowed darnel among the wheat and went away .
40013026	“ And when the blade sprouted and bore fruit , then the darnel also appeared .
40013027	“ And the servants of the master of the house came and said to him , ‘ Master , did you not sow good seed in your field ? From where then does it have the darnel ? ’
40013028	“ And he said to them , ‘ A man , an enemy did this . ’ And the servants said to him , ‘ Do you wish then , that we go and gather them up ? ’
40013029	“ But he said , ‘ No , lest while you gather up the darnel you also uproot the wheat with them .
40013030	‘ Let both grow together until the harvest , and at the time of harvest I shall say to the reapers , “ First gather the darnel and bind them in bundles to burn them , but gather the wheat into my granary . ” ’ ”
40013031	Another parable He put before them , saying , “ The reign of the heavens is like a mustard seed , which a man took and sowed in his field ,
40013032	which indeed is less than all the seeds , but when it is grown it is greater than the plants and becomes a tree , so that the birds of the heaven come and dwell in its branches . ”
40013033	Another parable He spoke to them , “ The reign of the heavens is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal until all was leavened . ”
40013034	יהושע said all this to the crowds in parables , and He did not speak to them without a parable ,
40013035	so that what was spoken by the prophet might be filled , saying , “ I shall open My mouth in parables , I shall pour forth what has been hidden from the foundation of the world . ”
40013036	Then , having sent the crowds away , יהושע went into the house . And His taught ones came to Him , saying , “ Explain to us the parable of the darnel of the field . ”
40013037	And He answering , said to them , “ He who is sowing the good seed is the Son of Aḏam ,
40013038	and the field is the world . And the good seed , these are the sons of the reign , but the darnel are the sons of the wicked one ,
40013039	and the enemy who sowed them is the devil . And the harvest is the end of the age , and the reapers are the messengers .
40013040	“ As the darnel , then , is gathered and burned in the fire , so it shall be at the end of this age .
40013041	“ The Son of Aḏam shall send out His messengers , and they shall gather out of His reign all the stumbling-blocks , and those doing lawlessness ,
40013042	and shall throw them into the furnace of fire – there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
40013043	“ Then the righteous shall shine forth as the sun in the reign of their Father . He who has ears to hear , let him hear !
40013044	“ Again , the reign of the heavens is like treasure hidden in a field , which a man having found it , hid , and for joy over it he goes and sells all that he has and buys that field .
40013045	“ Again , the reign of the heavens is like a man , a merchant , seeking fine pearls ,
40013046	who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had and bought it .
40013047	“ Again , the reign of the heavens is like a dragnet that was thrown into the sea and gathered some of every kind ,
40013048	which , when it was filled , they drew to shore . And they sat down and gathered the good into containers , but threw the rotten away .
40013049	“ Thus shall it be at the end of the age : the messengers shall come forth , and separate the wicked out of the midst of the righteous ,
40013050	and shall throw them into the furnace of fire – there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth . ”
40013051	יהושע said to them , “ Have you understood all this ? ” They said to Him , “ Yea , Master . ”
40013052	And He said to them , “ Therefore every scholar of Scripture taught in the reign of the heavens is like a householder who brings out of his treasure matters , renewed , and old . ”

40014001	At that time Herodes the district ruler heard the report about יהושע ,

40014018	And He said , “ Bring them here to Me . ”
40014019	And commanding the crowds to sit down on the grass , and taking the five loaves and the two fish , and looking up to the heaven , He blessed and broke and gave the loaves to the taught ones . And the taught ones gave to the crowds ,
40014020	and all ate and were satisfied . And they picked up the pieces left over – twelve baskets , filled .
40014021	And those who ate were about five thousand men , besides women and children .
40014022	And immediately יהושע made His taught ones enter into the boat and go before Him to the other side , while He dismissed the crowds .
40014023	And having dismissed the crowds , He went up to the mountain by Himself to pray . And when evening had come , He was alone there .
40014024	But the boat was now in the middle of the sea , agitated by the waves , for the wind was against it .
40014025	And in the fourth watch of the night יהושע went to them , walking on the sea .
40014026	And when the taught ones saw Him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , “ It is a phantom ! ” And from fear they cried .
40014027	But immediately יהושע spoke to them , saying , “ Take courage , it is I , do not be afraid . ”
40014028	And Kĕpha answered Him and said , “ Master , if it is You , command me to come to You on the water . ”
40014029	And He said , “ Come . ” And when Kĕpha had come down out of the boat , he walked on the water to go to יהושע .
40014030	But when he saw that the wind was strong , he was afraid . And beginning to sink , he cried out , saying , “ Master , save me ! ”
40014031	And immediately יהושע stretched out His hand and took hold of him , and said to him , “ O you of little belief , why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	And when they came into the boat , the wind ceased .
40014033	And those in the boat came and did bow to Him , saying , “ Truly You are the Son of Elohim . ”
40014034	And having passed over , they came to the land of Gennĕsar .

40014036	and begged Him to let them only touch the tzitzit of His garment . And as many as touched it were completely healed .
40015001	Then there came to יהושע scribes and Pharisees from Yerushalayim , saying ,
40015002	“ Why do Your taught ones transgress the tradition of the elders ? For they do not wash their hands when they eat bread . ”
40015003	But He answering , said to them , “ Why do you also transgress the command of Elohim because of your tradition ?
40015004	“ For Elohim has commanded , saying , ‘ Respect your father and your mother , ’ and , ‘ He who curses father or mother , let him be put to death . ’
40015005	“ But you say , ‘ Whoever says to his father or mother , “ Whatever profit you might have received from me has been dedicated , ”
40015006	is certainly released from respecting his father or mother . ’ So you have nullified the command of Elohim by your tradition .
40015007	“ Hypocrites ! Yeshayahu rightly prophesied about you , saying ,
40015008	‘ This people draw near to Me with their mouth , and respect Me with their lips , but their heart is far from Me .
40015009	‘ But in vain do they worship Me , teaching as teachings the commands of men . ’ ”
40015010	And calling the crowd near , He said to them , “ Hear and understand :
40015011	“ Not that which goes into the mouth defiles the man , but that which comes out of the mouth , this defiles the man . ”
40015012	Then His taught ones came and said to Him , “ Do You know that the Pharisees stumbled when they heard this word ? ”
40015013	But He answering , said , “ Every plant which My heavenly Father has not planted shall be uprooted .
40015014	“ Leave them alone . They are blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind leads the blind , both shall fall into a ditch . ”
40015015	And Kĕpha answering , said to Him , “ Explain this parable to us . ”
40015016	And יהושע said , “ Are you also still without understanding ?
40015017	“ Do you not understand that whatever enters into the mouth goes into the stomach , and is cast out in the sewer ?
40015018	“ But what comes out of the mouth comes from the heart , and these defile the man .
40015019	“ For out of the heart come forth wicked reasonings , murders , adulteries , whorings , thefts , false witnessings , slanders .
40015020	“ These defile the man , but to eat with unwashed hands does not defile the man . ”
40015021	And יהושע went out from there and withdrew to the parts of Tsor and Tsiḏon .
40015022	And see , a woman of Kena‛an came from those borders and cried out to Him , saying , “ Have compassion on me , O Master , Son of Dawiḏ ! My daughter is badly demon-possessed . ”
40015023	But He did not answer her a word . And His taught ones came and asked Him , saying , “ Send her away , because she cries after us . ”
40015024	And He answering , said , “ I was not sent except to the lost sheep of the house of Yisra’ĕl . ”
40015025	But she came and was bowing to Him , saying , “ Master , help me ! ”

40015028	And יהושע answering , said to her , “ O woman , your belief is great ! Let it be to you as you desire . ” And her daughter was healed from that hour .
40015029	And moving from there , יהושע came toward the Sea of Galil , and going up on the mountain , He was sitting there .
40015030	And large crowds came to Him , having with them those who were lame , blind , dumb , crippled , and many others . And they laid them down at the feet of יהושע , and He healed them ,
40015031	so that the crowd marvelled when they saw the dumb speaking , the crippled well , the lame walking , and the blind seeing . And they praised the Elohim of Yisra’ĕl .
40015032	And יהושע , having called His taught ones near , said , “ I have compassion on the crowd , because they have now continued with Me three days and do not have whatever to eat . And I do not wish to send them away hungry , lest they faint on the way . ”
40015033	And His taught ones said to Him , “ Where are we to get enough bread in the desert to satisfy such a large crowd ? ”

40016001	And the Pharisees and Sadducees came , and trying Him asked that He would show them a sign from heaven .
40016002	And He answering , said to them , “ When it is evening you say , ‘ Fair weather , for the heaven is red , ’
40016003	and in the morning , ‘ Stormy weather today , for the heaven is red and overcast . ’ You know how to discern the face of the heaven , but you are unable to discern the signs of the times !
40016004	“ A wicked and adulterous generation seeks after a sign , and no sign shall be given to it except the sign of the prophet Yonah . ” And He left them and went away .
40016005	And His taught ones came to the other side , and had forgotten to take bread .
40016006	And יהושע said to them , “ Mind ! And beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees . ”
40016007	And they reasoned among themselves , saying , “ Because we brought no bread ! ”
40016008	But יהושע , aware of this , said to them , “ O you of little belief , why do you reason among yourselves because you brought no bread ?
40016009	“ Do you still not understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand and how many baskets you picked up ?
40016010	“ Or the seven loaves of the four thousand and how many large baskets you picked up ?
40016011	“ How is it that you do not understand that I did not speak to you concerning bread , but to beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and Sadducees ? ”
40016012	Then they understood that He did not say to beware of the leaven of bread , but of the teaching of the Pharisees and the Sadducees .
40016013	Now when יהושע came into the parts of Caesarea Philippi , He asked His taught ones , saying , “ Who do men say the Son of Aḏam is ? ”

40016020	Then He warned His taught ones that they should say to no one that He is יהושע the Messiah .

40016026	“ For what is a man profited if he gains all the world , and loses his own life ? Or what shall a man give in exchange for his life ?
40016027	“ For the Son of Aḏam is going to come in the esteem of His Father with His messengers , and then He shall reward each according to his works .
40016028	“ Truly , I say to you , there are some standing here who shall not taste death at all until they see the Son of Aḏam coming in His reign : ”
40017001	And after six days יהושע took Kĕpha , and Ya‛aqoḇ , and Yoḥanan his brother , and brought them up on a high mountain by themselves ,

40017024	And when they came into Kephar Naḥum , those who received the tax came to Kĕpha and said , “ Does your Teacher not pay the tax ? ”

40017027	“ But , lest we cause them to stumble , go to the sea , cast in a hook , and take the fish that comes up first . And when you have opened its mouth , you shall find a piece of money . Take that and give it to them for Me and you . ”
40018001	At that time the taught ones came to יהושע , saying , “ Who , then , is greatest in the reign of the heavens ? ”
40018002	And יהושע called a little child to Him , set him in their midst ,
40018003	and said , “ Truly , I say to you , unless you turn and become as little children , you shall by no means enter into the reign of the heavens .
40018004	“ Whoever then humbles himself as this little child is the greatest in the reign of the heavens .
40018005	“ And whoever receives one little child like this in My Name receives Me .
40018006	“ But whoever causes one of these little ones who believe in Me to stumble , it is better for him that a millstone be hung around his neck , and that he be drowned in the depth of the sea .
40018007	“ Woe to the world because of stumbling-blocks ! For it is necessary that stumbling-blocks come , but woe to that man by whom the stumbling-block comes !
40018008	“ And if your hand or foot causes you to stumble , cut it off and throw it away from you . It is better for you to enter into life lame or crippled , rather than having two hands or two feet , to be thrown into the everlasting fire .
40018009	“ And if your eye causes you to stumble , pluck it out and throw it away from you . It is better for you to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes , to be thrown into the fire of Gehenna .
40018010	“ See that you do not despise one of these little ones , for I say to you that in the heavens their messengers always see the face of My Father who is in the heavens .
40018011	“ For the Son of Aḏam has come to save what was lost .
40018012	“ What do you think ? If a man has a hundred sheep , and one of them goes astray , would he not leave the ninety-nine on the mountains , going to seek the one that is straying ?
40018013	“ And if he should find it , truly , I say to you , he rejoices more over that sheep than over the ninety-nine that did not go astray .
40018014	“ Thus it is not the desire of your Father who is in the heavens that one of these little ones should be lost .
40018015	“ And if your brother sins against you , go and reprove him , between you and him alone . If he hears you , you have gained your brother .
40018016	“ But if he does not hear , take with you one or two more , that ‘ by the mouth of two or three witnesses every word might be established . ’
40018017	“ And if he refuses to hear them , say it to the assembly . And if he refuses even to hear the assembly , let him be to you like a gentile and a tax collector .
40018018	“ Truly , I say to you , whatever you bind on earth shall be having been bound in heaven , and whatever you loosen on earth shall be having been loosened in heaven .
40018019	“ Again I say to you that if two of you agree on earth concerning any matter that they ask , it shall be done for them by My Father in the heavens .
40018020	“ For where two or three are gathered together in My Name , there I am in their midst . ”
40018021	Then Kĕpha came to Him and said , “ Master , how often shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? Up to seven times ? ”
40018022	יהושע said to him , “ I do not say to you , up to seven times , but up to seventy times seven .
40018023	“ Because of this the reign of the heavens is like a certain man , a sovereign who wished to settle accounts with his servants .
40018024	“ And when he had begun to settle , one was brought to him who owed him ten thousand talents ,
40018025	but as he was unable to pay , his master commanded that he be sold , with his wife and children and all that he had , and payment to be made .
40018026	“ Then the servant fell down before him , saying , ‘ Master , have patience with me , and I shall pay you all . ’
40018027	“ And the master of that servant was moved with compassion , released him , and forgave him the debt .
40018028	“ And that servant went out and found one of his fellow servants who owed him a hundred pieces of money . And he laid hands on him and took him by the throat , saying , ‘ Pay me what you owe ! ’
40018029	“ Then his fellow servant fell down at his feet and begged him , saying , ‘ Have patience with me , and I shall pay you all . ’
40018030	“ But he would not , and went and threw him into prison till he should pay the debt .
40018031	“ And when his fellow servants saw what had been done , they were deeply grieved , and came and reported to their master all that had taken place .
40018032	“ Then his master called him and said to him , ‘ Wicked servant ! I forgave you all that debt seeing you begged me .
40018033	‘ Should you not also have had compassion on your fellow servant , as I also had compassion on you ? ’
40018034	“ And his master was wroth , and delivered him to the torturers until he should pay all that was due to him .
40018035	“ So also My heavenly Father shall do to you if each of you , from his heart , does not forgive his brother his trespasses . ”
40019001	And it came to be , when יהושע had ended these words , that He left Galil and came to the borders of Yehuḏah beyond the Yardĕn .
40019002	And large crowds followed Him , and He healed them there .
40019003	And the Pharisees came to Him , trying Him , and saying to Him , “ Is it right for a man to put away his wife for every reason ? ”

40019006	“ So that they are no longer two , but one flesh . Therefore , what Elohim has joined together , let man not separate . ”

40019030	“ But many who are first shall be last , and the last first .
40020001	“ For the reign of the heavens is like a man , a householder who went out early in the morning to hire workers for his vineyard .
40020002	“ And when he had agreed with the workers for a silver piece a day , he sent them into his vineyard .

40020007	“ They said to him , ‘ Because no one hired us . ’ He said to them , ‘ You too go into the vineyard , and whatever is right you shall receive . ’

40021001	And when they came near to Yerushalayim , and came to Bĕyth Phag̅i , at the Mount of Olives , then יהושע sent two taught ones ,

41002024	and the Pharisees said to Him , “ Look , why do they do what is not right on the Sabbath ? ”

41002026	“ How he went into the House of Elohim , while Eḇyathar was high priest , and ate the showbread , which is not right to eat , except for the priests , and he gave it also to those who were with him ? ”
41002027	And He said to them , “ The Sabbath was made for man , and not man for the Sabbath .
41002028	“ So the Son of Aḏam is also Master of the Sabbath . ”
41003001	And He went into the congregation again , and a man who had a withered hand was there .
41003002	And they were watching Him , whether He would heal him on the Sabbath , so as to accuse Him .
41003003	And He said to the man who had the withered hand , “ Get up to the middle . ”
41003004	And He said to them , “ Is it right to do good on the Sabbath , or to do evil , to save life or to kill ? ” But they remained silent .
41003005	And having looked around on them with displeasure , being grieved at the hardness of their hearts , He said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” And he stretched it out , and his hand was restored as healthy as the other .
41003006	And the Pharisees went out and immediately plotted with the Herodians against Him , how to destroy Him .
41003007	But יהושע withdrew with His taught ones to the sea . And a great crowd from Galil followed Him , and from Yehuḏah .
41003008	Even from Yerushalayim , and from Eḏom and beyond the Yardĕn , and those around Tsor and Tsiḏon , a large crowd came to Him when they heard how much He was doing .
41003009	And He spoke to His taught ones , that a small boat should be kept ready for Him because of the crowd , lest they should press upon Him .
41003010	For He healed many , so that as many as had afflictions fell upon Him to touch Him .
41003011	And the unclean spirits , whenever they saw Him , fell down before Him and cried out , saying , “ You are the Son of Elohim . ”
41003012	But He warned them many times that they should not make Him known .
41003013	And He went up on the mountain and called to Him whom He wished , and they came to Him .
41003014	And He appointed twelve to be with Him , and to be sent out to proclaim ,
41003015	and to possess authority to heal sicknesses and to cast out demons .
41003016	And He appointed the twelve : Shim‛on , to whom He added the name Kĕpha ;
41003017	and Ya‛aqoḇ the son of Zaḇdai , and Yoḥanan the brother of Ya‛aqoḇ , to whom He added the name Beni-Reg̅es , that is , “ Sons of Thunder , ”
41003018	and Andri , and Philip , and Bartholomi , and Mattithyahu , and T’oma , and Ya‛aqoḇ son of Alphai , and Taddai , and Shim‛on the Kena‛anite ;
41003019	and Yehuḏah from Qerioth , who did also deliver Him up . And they went into a house ,
41003020	and again the crowd came together , so that they were unable even to eat bread .
41003021	And when His relatives heard about this , they went out to seize Him , for they said , “ He is out of His mind . ”
41003022	And the scribes who came down from Yerushalayim said , “ He has Be‛elzebul , ” and , “ He casts out demons by the ruler of the demons . ”
41003023	And calling them near He said to them in parables , “ How is Satan able to cast out Satan ?
41003024	“ And if a reign is divided against itself , that reign is unable to stand .
41003025	“ And if a house is divided against itself , that house is unable to stand .
41003026	“ And if Satan has risen up against himself , and is divided , he is unable to stand , but has an end .
41003027	“ No one is able to enter a strong man’s house and plunder his goods , unless he first binds the strong man , and then he shall plunder his house .
41003028	“ Truly , I say to you , all the sins shall be forgiven the sons of men , and whatever blasphemies they speak ,
41003029	but he who blasphemes against the Set-apart Spirit has no forgiveness forever , but is subject to everlasting judgment , ”
41003030	because they said , “ He has an unclean spirit . ”
41003031	And His brothers and His mother came , and standing outside they sent to Him , calling Him .
41003032	And a crowd was sitting around Him . And they said to Him , “ See , Your mother and Your brothers are outside seeking You . ”
41003033	But He answered them , saying , “ Who is My mother , or My brothers ? ”
41003034	And looking about on those sitting round Him , He said , “ See My mother and My brothers !
41003035	“ For whoever does the desire of Elohim is My brother and My sister and mother . ”
41004001	And He began to teach again by the sea , and a large crowd was gathered to Him , so that He entered into a boat , to sit in the sea . And all the crowd was on the land facing the sea .
41004002	And He taught them much in parables , and said to them in His teaching :
41004003	“ Listen ! See , a sower went out to sow .
41004004	“ And it came to be , as he sowed , some fell by the wayside , and the birds of the heaven came and devoured it .
41004005	“ And other fell on rocky places , where it had not much soil . And immediately it sprang up because it had no depth of soil .
41004006	“ But when the sun was up it was scorched , and because it had no root it withered away .
41004007	“ And other fell among thorns . And the thorns grew up and choked it , and it yielded no crop .
41004008	“ And other fell on good soil and yielded a crop that came up , grew and yielded a crop , some thirtyfold , and some sixty , and some a hundred . ”
41004009	And He said to them , “ He who has ears to hear , let him hear ! ”
41004010	And when He was alone , those about Him , with the twelve , asked Him about the parable .
41004011	And He said to them , “ To you it has been given to know the secret of the reign of Elohim , but to those who are outside , all are done in parables ,
41004012	so that ‘ seeing they see but do not perceive , and hearing they hear but do not understand , lest they should turn and their sins be forgiven them . ’ ”
41004013	And He said to them , “ Do you not understand this parable ? How then shall you understand all the parables ?
41004014	“ The sower sows the word .
41004015	“ These , then , are the ones by the wayside where the word is sown . And when they hear , Satan comes immediately and takes away the word that was sown in their hearts .
41004016	“ And likewise these are the ones sown on rocky places , who , when they hear the word , immediately receive it with joy ,
41004017	and they have no root in themselves , but are short-lived . Then when pressure or persecution arises because of the word , immediately they stumble .
41004018	“ And others are those sown among thorns , these are they who hear the word ,
41004019	and the worries of this age , and the deceit of riches , and the desires for other matters , entering in , choke the word , and it becomes fruitless .
41004020	“ And those sown on good soil , are those who hear the word , and accept it , and bear fruit , some thirtyfold , and some sixty , and some a hundred . ”
41004021	And He said to them , “ Would a lamp be brought to be put under a basket or under a bed ? Is it not to be put on a lampstand ?
41004022	“ For whatever is hidden shall be revealed , and whatever has been kept secret , shall come to light .
41004023	“ If anyone has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
41004024	And He said to them , “ Take heed what you hear . With the same measure you use , it shall be measured to you , and more shall be added to you who hear .
41004025	“ For whoever possesses , to him more shall be given ; but whoever does not possess , even what he possesses shall be taken away from him . ”
41004026	And He said , “ The reign of Elohim is as when a man scatters seed on the ground ,
41004027	then sleeps by night and rises by day , while the seed sprouts and grows , he himself does not know how .
41004028	“ For the soil yields crops by itself : first the blade , then the head , after that the completed grain in the head .
41004029	“ And when the crop is ready , immediately he puts in the sickle , because the harvest has come . ”
41004030	And He said , “ To what shall we compare the reign of Elohim ? Or with what parable shall we present it ?
41004031	“ Like a mustard seed , which , when it is sown on the ground , is smaller than all the seeds on earth ,
41004032	and when it is sown , it grows up and becomes greater than all plants , and forms large branches , so that the birds of the heaven are able to nest under its shade . ”
41004033	And with many such parables He was speaking to them the word as they were able to hear ,
41004034	and He was not speaking to them without parables . And when they were alone , He explained all to His taught ones .
41004035	And on the same day , when evening had come , He said to them , “ Let us pass over to the other side . ”
41004036	And having left the crowd , they took Him along in the boat , as He was . And other little boats were also with Him .
41004037	And there came a great windstorm , and the waves beat into the boat , so that it was already being filled .
41004038	And He was in the stern , asleep on a cushion . And they woke Him up and said to Him , “ Teacher , is it no concern to You that we perish ? ”
41004039	And having been awakened He rebuked the wind , and said to the sea , “ Peace , be still ! ” And the wind ceased and there was a great calm .
41004040	And He said to them , “ Why are you so afraid ? Have you not yet belief ? ”
41004041	And they feared exceedingly , and asked each other , “ Who then is this , that even the wind and the sea obey Him ! ”
41005001	And they came to the other side of the sea , to the country of the Gaḏarenes .
41005002	And when He came out of the boat , immediately there met Him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
41005003	who had his dwelling among the tombs . And no one was able to bind him , not even with chains ,
41005004	because he had often been bound with shackles and chains but the chains had been pulled apart by him , and the shackles broken in pieces , and no one was able to tame him .
41005005	And continually , night and day , he was in the mountains and in the tombs , crying out and cutting himself with stones .

41005007	and having called out with a loud voice , said , “ What have I to do with You , יהושע , Son of the Most High Ěl ? Swear to Elohim not to torture me . ”

41005010	And he begged Him very much that He would not send them out of the country .
41005011	Now a great herd of pigs was there , feeding near the mountains .

41005017	And they began to plead with Him to leave their borders .

41005020	And he left and began to proclaim in Dekapolis all that יהושע had done for him , and all marvelled .
41005021	And when יהושע had passed over again by boat to the other side , a large crowd assembled to Him , and He was by the sea .
41005022	And see , one of the rulers of the congregation came , Ya’ir by name . And when he saw Him , he fell at His feet ,
41005023	and begged Him strongly , saying , “ My little daughter lies at the point of death . Come , lay Your hands on her to heal her , and she shall live . ”
41005024	And He went with him . And a large crowd was following Him , and they were thronging Him .
41005025	And a certain woman had a flow of blood for twelve years ,
41005026	and had suffered much from many physicians , and spent all that she had and was no better , but rather became worse .

41005028	for she said , “ If I only touch His garments , I shall be made well . ”
41005029	And immediately the fountain of her blood was dried up , and she felt in her body that she was healed of the affliction .
41005030	And immediately יהושע , knowing in Himself that power had gone out of Him , turned around in the crowd and said , “ Who touched My garments ? ”
41005031	And His taught ones said to Him , “ You see the crowd is thronging You , and You say , ‘ Who touched Me ? ’ ”
41005032	And He was looking around to see her who did this .
41005033	And the woman , fearing and trembling , knowing what was done to her , came and fell down before Him and spoke to Him all the truth .
41005034	And He said to her , “ Daughter , your belief has healed you . Go in peace , and be relieved from your affliction . ”
41005035	As He was speaking , they came from the ruler of the congregation’s house , saying to him , “ Your daughter is dead . Why trouble the Teacher any further ? ”

41005037	And He allowed no one to follow Him except Kĕpha , and Ya‛aqoḇ , and Yoḥanan the brother of Ya‛aqoḇ .

41005040	And they were laughing at Him . And when He had put them all out , He took the father and the mother of the child , and those who were with Him , and went in where the child was lying .
41005041	And taking the child by the hand He said to her , “ Talitha , qumi , ” which is translated , “ Little girl , I say to you , arise . ”

41006001	And He went away from there and came to His own country , and His taught ones followed Him .
41006002	And Sabbath having come , He began to teach in the congregation . And many who heard Him were astonished , saying , “ Where did He get all this ? And what wisdom is this which is given to Him , that such miracles are done through His hands ?
41006003	“ Is this not the carpenter , the Son of Miryam , and brother of Ya‛aqoḇ , and Yosĕph , and Yehuḏah , and Shim‛on ? And are not His sisters here with us ? ” And they stumbled in Him .
41006004	And יהושע said to them , “ A prophet is not unappreciated except in his own country , and among his own relatives , and in his own house . ”
41006005	And He was unable to do any miracle there , except that He laid His hands on a few sick ones and healed them .

41006018	for Yoḥanan had said to Herodes , “ It is not right for you to have your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias held a grudge against him and wished to kill him , but was unable ,
41006020	for Herodes feared Yoḥanan , knowing that he was a righteous and set-apart man , and he protected him . And when he heard him , he was much perplexed , yet heard him gladly .
41006021	And a suitable day came when Herodes on his birthday gave a feast for his great men , and the high officers , and the chief men of Galil .
41006022	And when the daughter of Herodias herself came in and danced , and pleased Herodes and those who sat with him , the sovereign said to the girl , “ Ask me whatever you wish , and I shall give it to you . ”
41006023	And he swore to her , “ Whatever you ask me , I shall give you , up to half of my reign . ”
41006024	And she went out and said to her mother , “ What shall I ask ? ” And she said , “ The head of Yoḥanan the Immerser ! ”
41006025	And coming in immediately with haste to the sovereign she asked , saying , “ I wish that you give me at once the head of Yoḥanan the Immerser on a dish . ”
41006026	And the sovereign , becoming deeply grieved , because of the oaths , and because of those who sat with him , did not wish to refuse her .
41006027	And the sovereign straightaway sent an executioner and commanded his head to be brought . And he went and beheaded him in prison ,
41006028	and brought his head on a dish , and gave it to the girl . And the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	And when his taught ones heard of it , they came and took away his dead body and laid it in a tomb .
41006030	And the emissaries gathered to יהושע and reported to Him all , both what they had done and what they had taught .
41006031	And He said to them , “ Come aside by yourselves to a lonely place and rest a little ” – for there were many coming and going , and they did not even have time to eat .
41006032	And they went away to a lonely place in the boat by themselves .
41006033	But they saw them going , and many recognised Him and ran there on foot from all the cities , and came before them and came together to Him .
41006034	And having gone out , יהושע saw a large crowd and was moved with compassion for them because they were like sheep not having a shepherd . And He began to teach them many matters .
41006035	And as the hour grew late , His taught ones came to Him and said , “ This is a lonely place , and now the hour is late .
41006036	“ Send them away , so that they go into the surrounding country and villages and buy themselves bread , since they have no food to eat . ”
41006037	But He answering , said to them , “ You give them to eat . ” And they said to Him , “ Should we go and buy two hundred silver pieces worth of bread and give them to eat ? ”
41006038	Then He said to them , “ How many loaves do you have ? Go and see . ” And when they found out they said , “ Five , and two fishes . ”

41006040	And they sat down in groups , in hundreds and in fifties .
41006041	And taking the five loaves and the two fishes , looking up to the heaven , He blessed and broke the loaves , and gave them to His taught ones to set before them . And the two fishes He divided among them all .
41006042	And all ate and were satisfied .
41006043	And they picked up twelve baskets , filled with pieces , also from the fishes .

41006049	And when they saw Him walking on the sea , they thought it was a phantom , and cried out ,
41006050	for they all saw Him and were troubled . And immediately He spoke to them and said to them , “ Take courage , it is I . Do not be afraid . ”
41006051	And He went up to them , into the boat , and the wind ceased . And they were exceedingly amazed in themselves , and marvelled .
