41006056	And wherever He went , into villages , or cities , or the country , they were laying the sick in the market-places , and begged Him to let them touch if only the tzitzit of His garment . And as many as touched Him were healed .
41007001	And the Pharisees and some of the scribes assembled to Him , having come from Yerushalayim .
41007002	And seeing some of His taught ones eat bread with defiled , that is , with unwashed hands , they found fault .
41007003	For the Pharisees , and all the Yehuḏim , do not eat unless they wash their hands thoroughly , holding fast the tradition of the elders ,
41007004	and coming from the market-place , they do not eat unless they wash . And there are many other traditions which they have received and hold fast – the washing of cups and utensils and copper vessels and couches .
41007005	Then the Pharisees and scribes asked Him , “ Why do Your taught ones not walk according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashed hands ? ”
41007006	And He answering , said to them , “ Well did Yeshayahu prophesy concerning you hypocrites , as it has been written , ‘ This people respect Me with their lips , but their heart is far from Me .
41007007	And in vain do they worship Me , teaching as teachings the commands of men . ’
41007008	“ Forsaking the command of Elohim , you hold fast the tradition of men . ”
41007009	And He said to them , “ Well do you set aside the command of Elohim , in order to guard your tradition .
41007010	“ For Mosheh said , ‘ Respect your father and your mother , ’ and , ‘ He who curses father or mother , let him be put to death . ’
41007011	“ But you say , ‘ If a man says to his father or mother , “ Whatever profit you might have received from me , is Qorban ( that is , a gift ) , ” ’
41007012	you no longer let him do any matter at all for his father or his mother ,
41007013	nullifying the Word of Elohim through your tradition which you have handed down . And many such traditions you do . ”
41007014	And calling the crowd to Him , He said to them , “ Hear Me , everyone , and understand :
41007015	“ There is no matter that enters a man from outside which is able to defile him , but it is what comes out of him that defiles the man .
41007016	“ If anyone has ears to hear , let him hear ! ”
41007017	And when He went from the crowd into a house , His taught ones asked Him concerning the parable .
41007018	And He said to them , “ Are you also without understanding ? Do you not perceive that whatever enters a man from outside is unable to defile him ,
41007019	because it does not enter his heart but his stomach , and is eliminated , thus purging all the foods ? ”
41007020	And He said , “ What comes out of a man , that defiles a man .
41007021	“ For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil reasonings , adulteries , whorings , murders ,
41007022	thefts , greedy desires , wickednesses , deceit , indecency , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness .
41007023	“ All these wicked matters come from within and defile a man . ”
41007024	And rising up from there He went to the borders of Tsor and Tsiḏon . And entering into a house He wished no one to know it , but it was impossible to be hidden .
41007025	For a woman whose young daughter had an unclean spirit heard about Him , and she came and fell at His feet .
41007026	Now the woman was a Greek , a Syro-Phoenician by birth , and she kept asking Him to cast the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	And יהושע said to her , “ Let the children be satisfied first , for it is not good to take the children’s bread and throw it to the little dogs . ”
41007028	But she answering , said to Him , “ Yea , Master , for even the little dogs under the table eat from the children’s crumbs . ”
41007029	And He said to her , “ Because of this word go , the demon has gone out of your daughter . ”

41007032	And they brought to Him one who was deaf and spoke with difficulty , and they begged Him to lay His hand upon him .
41007033	And taking him away from the crowd , He put His fingers in his ears , and having spit , He touched his tongue .
41007034	And looking up to the heaven , He sighed , and said to him , “ Ephphatha , ” that is , “ Be opened . ”
41007035	And immediately his ears were opened , and the binding of his tongue was loosed , and he was speaking plainly .
41007036	And He ordered them , that they should say it to no one , but the more He ordered them , the more they published it .
41007037	And they were immeasurably astonished , saying , “ He has done all well . He makes even the deaf to hear and the dumb to speak . ”
41008001	In those days , the crowd being very great and not having any to eat , יהושע called His taught ones near and said to them ,
41008002	“ I have compassion on the crowd , for they have now been with Me three days and do not have food to eat .
41008003	“ And if I dismiss them unfed to their home , they shall faint on the way , for some of them have come from far . ”
41008004	And His taught ones answered Him , “ How shall anyone be able to feed these people with bread here in the desert ? ”
41008005	And He asked them , “ How many loaves do you have ? ” And they said , “ Seven . ”
41008006	And He commanded the crowd to sit down on the ground . And taking the seven loaves , giving thanks , He broke them and gave them to His taught ones to set before them . And they set them before the crowd .
41008007	And they had a few small fishes . And having blessed , He said to set them also before them .
41008008	And they ate and were satisfied , and they picked up seven large baskets of broken pieces .

41008010	And immediately entering into the boat with His taught ones , He came to the parts of Dalmanutha .

41008013	And leaving them , again entering into the boat , He went away to the other side .
41008014	And they had forgotten to take bread , and they did not have more than one loaf with them in the boat .
41008015	And He was warning them , saying , “ Mind ! Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the leaven of Herodes . ”
41008016	And they were reasoning with one another , saying , “ Because we have no bread . ”
41008017	And יהושע , being aware of it , said to them , “ Why do you reason because you have no bread ? Do you not yet perceive nor understand ? Is your heart still hardened ?
41008018	“ Having eyes , do you not see ? And having ears , do you not hear ? And do you not remember ?
41008019	“ When I broke the five loaves for the five thousand , how many baskets filled with broken pieces did you pick up ? ” They said to Him , “ Twelve . ”
41008020	“ And when I broke the seven for the four thousand , how many large baskets filled with broken pieces did you pick up ? ” And they said , “ Seven . ”
41008021	And He said to them , “ How do you not understand ? ”
41008022	And He came to Bĕyth Tsaiḏa , and they brought a blind man to Him , and begged Him to touch him .
41008023	And taking the blind man by the hand He led him out of the village . And having spit on his eyes , laying hands on him , He asked him , “ Do you see at all ? ”
41008024	And he looked up and said , “ I see men like trees , walking . ”
41008025	Then He placed His hands on his eyes again and made him look up . And he was restored , and saw all clearly .
41008026	And He sent him away to his home , saying , “ Do not go into the village . ”
41008027	And יהושע and His taught ones went out to the villages of Caesarea Philippi . And on the way He asked His taught ones , saying to them , “ Who do men say I am ? ”
41008028	And they said to Him , “ Yoḥanan the Immerser , and others , Ěliyahu , but others , one of the prophets . ”
41008029	And He asked them , “ And you , who do you say I am ? ” And Kĕpha answering , said to Him , “ You are the Messiah . ”
41008030	And He warned them that they should speak to no one about Him .
41008031	And He began to teach them that the Son of Aḏam has to suffer much , and be rejected by the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and after three days to rise again .
41008032	And He was speaking about this openly . Then Kĕpha , taking Him aside , began to rebuke Him .
41008033	And turning around and seeing His taught ones , He rebuked Kĕpha , saying , “ Get behind Me , Satan ! For your thoughts are not those of Elohim , but those of men . ”
41008034	And calling near the crowd with His taught ones , He said to them , “ Whoever desires to come after Me , let him deny himself , and take up his stake , and follow Me .
41008035	“ For whoever desires to save his life shall lose it , but whoever loses his life for the sake of Me and the Good News , he shall save it .
41008036	“ For what shall it profit a man if he gains all the world , and loses his own life ?
41008037	“ Or what shall a man give in exchange for his life ?
41008038	“ For whoever is ashamed of Me and My words in this adulterous and sinning generation , of him the Son of Aḏam also shall be ashamed when He comes in the esteem of His Father with the set-apart messengers . ”
41010001	And rising up from there He came into the borders of Yehuḏah by the other side of the Yardĕn . And crowds gathered to Him again , and as He usually did , He was teaching them again .
41010002	And Pharisees came and asked Him , “ Is it right for a man to put away his wife ? ” – trying Him .
41010003	And He answering , said to them , “ What did Mosheh command you ? ”
41010004	And they said , “ Mosheh allowed a man to write a certificate of divorce , and to put her away . ”
41010005	And יהושע said to them , “ Because of the hardness of your heart he wrote you this command .

41010007	‘ For this cause a man shall leave his father and mother and cleave to his wife ,
41010008	and the two shall become one flesh , ’ so that they are no longer two , but one flesh .

41010010	And in the house His taught ones asked Him about this again .

41010012	“ And if a woman puts away her husband and marries another , she commits adultery . ”
41010013	And they were bringing little children for Him to touch them , but the taught ones were rebuking those who were bringing them .
41010014	And when יהושע saw it , He was much displeased and said to them , “ Let the little children come to Me , and do not forbid them , for of such is the reign of Elohim .
41010015	“ Truly , I say to you , whoever does not receive the reign of Elohim as a little child , shall certainly not enter into it . ”
41010016	And taking them up in His arms , laying His hands on them , He blessed them .
41010017	And as He was setting out on the way , one came running , and knelt before Him , and asked Him , “ Good Teacher , what shall I do to inherit everlasting life ? ”
41010018	And יהושע said to him , “ Why do you call Me good ? No one is good except One – Elohim .
41010019	“ You know the commands , ‘ Do not commit adultery , ’ ‘ Do not murder , ’ ‘ Do not steal , ’ ‘ Do not bear false witness , ’ ‘ Do not rob , ’ ‘ Respect your father and your mother . ’ ”
41010020	And he answering , said to Him , “ Teacher , all these I have watched over from my youth . ”
41010021	And יהושע , looking at him , loved him , and said to him , “ One matter you lack : Go , sell all you possess and give to the poor , and you shall have treasure in heaven . And come , follow Me , taking up the stake . ”
41010022	But he , being sad at this word , went away grieved , for he had many possessions .
41010023	And יהושע , looking around , said to His taught ones , “ How hard it is for those who have riches to enter into the reign of Elohim ! ”

41010025	“ It is easier for a camel to enter through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter into the reign of Elohim . ”
41010026	And they were immeasurably astonished , saying among themselves , “ Who then is able to be saved ? ”

41010028	And Kĕpha began to say to Him , “ See , we have left all and we have followed You . ”
41010029	יהושע said , “ Truly , I say to you , there is no one who has left house or brothers or sisters or father or mother or wife or children or lands , for the sake of Me and the Good News ,
41010030	who shall not receive a hundredfold now in this time , houses and brothers and sisters and mothers and children and lands , with persecutions , and in the age to come , everlasting life .

41010032	And they were on the way , going up to Yerushalayim , and יהושע was going before them . And they were astonished , and those who followed were afraid . And again He took the twelve aside and began to say to them what was about to befall Him :

41010035	And Ya‛aqoḇ and Yoḥanan , the sons of Zaḇdai , came up to Him , saying , “ Teacher , we wish that You would do for us whatever we ask . ”

41011001	And when they came near Yerushalayim , to Bĕyth Phag̅i and Bĕyth Anyah , at the Mount of Olives , He sent out two of His taught ones ,

41011015	And they came to Yerushalayim . יהושע , entering into the Set-apart Place , began to drive out those who bought and sold in the Set-apart Place , and overturned the tables of the money-changers and the seats of those selling doves .

41011018	And the scribes and the chief priests heard it and they were seeking how to destroy Him , for they feared Him , because all the crowd was astonished at His teaching .
41011019	And when evening came , He went out of the city .
41011020	And in the morning , passing by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
41011021	Then Kĕpha , remembering , said to Him , “ Rabbi , look ! The fig tree which You cursed has withered . ”
41011022	And יהושע answering , said to them , “ Have belief in Elohim .

41011026	“ But if you do not forgive , neither shall your Father in the heavens forgive your trespasses . ”
41011027	And they came again to Yerushalayim . And as He was walking in the Set-apart Place , the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders came to Him ,

41011032	“ But if we say , ‘ From men’ ” – they feared the people , for all held that Yoḥanan was a prophet indeed .
41011033	And answering they said to יהושע , “ We do not know . ” And יהושע answering , said to them , “ Neither do I say to you by what authority I do these . ”
41012001	And He began to speak to them in parables , “ A man planted a vineyard and put a hedge around it , and dug a vat for the winepress and built a watchtower , and let it out to farmers and went away .
41012002	“ And at harvest time he sent a servant to the farmers , to receive some of the fruit of the vineyard from the farmers .

41012005	“ And again he sent another , and they killed him ; and many others , beating some and killing some .
41012006	“ He had one more son , his beloved . He sent him last of all , saying , ‘ They shall respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But those farmers said among themselves , ‘ This is the heir . Come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours . ’
41012008	“ So they took him and killed him and threw him out of the vineyard .

41012018	And Sadducees , who say there is no resurrection , came to Him . And they asked Him , saying ,
41012019	“ Teacher , Mosheh wrote to us that if a brother of anyone dies , and leaves his wife behind , and leaves no children , his brother should take his wife and raise up offspring for his brother .
41012020	“ There were seven brothers , and the first took a wife , and died , leaving no offspring .
41012021	“ And the second took her , and he died , leaving behind no offspring . And the third likewise .
41012022	“ And the seven left no offspring . Last of all the woman died too .
41012023	“ In the resurrection then , when they rise , whose wife shall she be ? For seven had her as wife . ”

41012028	And one of the scribes coming near , hearing them reasoning together , knowing that He had answered them well , asked Him , “ Which is the first command of all ? ”

41012031	“ And the second , like it , is this , ‘ You shall love your neighbour as yourself . ’ There is no other command greater than these . ”
41012032	And the scribe said to Him , “ Well said , Teacher . You have spoken the truth , for there is one Elohim , and there is no other besides Him .
41012033	“ And to love Him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the being , and with all the strength , and to love one’s neighbour as oneself , is more than all the burnt offerings and offerings . ”
41012034	And when יהושע saw that he answered wisely , He said to him , “ You are not far from the reign of Elohim . ” And after that no one was bold enough to question Him .
41012035	And יהושע responding , said , while teaching in the Set-apart Place , “ How is it that the scribes say that the Messiah is the Son of Dawiḏ ?

41012037	“ Dawiḏ himself calls Him ‘ Master . ’ In what way then is He his Son ? ” And the large crowd heard Him gladly .

41014001	Now the Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread was after two days . And the chief priests and the scribes were seeking how to take Him through treachery and put Him to death .

41014063	And tearing his garments , the high priest said , “ What further need do we have of witnesses ?
41014064	“ You have heard the blasphemy ! What do you think ? ” And they all condemned Him to be liable to death .
41014065	And some began to spit on Him , and to blindfold Him , and to beat Him , and to say to Him , “ Prophesy ! ” And the officers struck Him with the palms of their hands .
41014066	And as Kĕpha was below in the courtyard , one of the servant girls of the high priest came ,
41014067	and seeing Kĕpha warming himself , she looked at him and said , “ And you were with יהושע of Natsareth . ”
41014068	But he denied it , saying , “ I do not know nor understand what you are saying . ” And he went out onto the porch , and a cock crowed .
41014069	And the servant girl saw him again , and began to say to those who stood by , “ This is one of them . ”
41014070	And again he was denying it . And after a little while those who stood by again said to Kĕpha , “ Truly you are one of them , for you are a Galilean too , and your speech is alike . ”
41014071	And he began to curse and swear , “ I do not know this Man of whom you speak ! ”
41014072	And a second time the cock crowed . And Kĕpha remembered the word that יהושע had said to him , “ Before the cock crows twice , you shall deny Me three times . ” And thinking on it , he wept .
41015001	And immediately , in the morning , the chief priests had a council meeting with the elders and scribes and all the council . Having bound יהושע , they led Him away , and delivered Him to Pilate .
41015002	And Pilate asked Him , “ Are You the Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ? ” And He answering , said to him , “ You say it . ”
41015003	And the chief priests accused Him of much , but He made no answer .
41015004	And Pilate again asked Him , saying , “ Have You no answer ? See how much they witness against You ! ”
41015005	But יהושע still gave no answer , so that Pilate marvelled .
41015006	And at a festival he released to them one prisoner , whomever they were asking .
41015007	And there was one called Barabba , chained with his fellow rebels , who had committed murder in the uprising .
41015008	And the crowd , crying aloud , began to ask , as he had always done for them .
41015009	But Pilate answered them , saying , “ Do you wish me to release for you the Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ? ”
41015010	For he knew that the chief priests had handed Him over because of envy .
41015011	And the chief priests stirred up the crowd , that he should rather release Barabba to them .
41015012	And Pilate answered and again said to them , “ What then do you wish me to do to Him whom you call the Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ? ”
41015013	And again they cried out , “ Impale Him ! ”
41015014	And Pilate said to them , “ Why , what evil has He done ? ” And they vehemently cried out , “ Impale Him ! ”
41015015	And Pilate , wishing to satisfy the crowd , released Barabba to them , and having whipped Him , he delivered יהושע over to be impaled .
41015016	And the soldiers led Him away into the court , which is the palace , and they called together the entire company of soldiers ,
41015017	and decked Him with purple . And they plaited a crown of thorns , put it on Him ,
41015018	and they began to call out to Him , “ Greetings , Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ! ”
41015019	And they kept beating Him on the head with a reed and were spitting on Him . And bending the knee , they were bowing down to Him .
41015020	And when they had mocked Him , they took the purple off Him , and put His own garments on Him , and led Him out to impale Him .
41015021	And they compelled a passer-by , Shim‛on , a Cyrenian , coming from a field , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear His stake .
41015022	And they brought Him to the place Golgotha , which is translated , Place of a Skull .
41015023	And they were giving Him wine mixed with myrrh to drink , but He did not take it .
41015024	And when they impaled Him , they divided His garments , casting lots for them , what each one should take .
41015025	And it was the third hour , and they impaled Him .
41015026	And the inscription of His accusation was written above : THE SOVEREIGN OF THE YEHUḎIM .
41015027	And with Him they impaled two robbers , one on His right and the other on His left .
41015028	And the Scripture was filled which says , “ And He was reckoned with the lawless . ”

41015030	save Yourself , and come down from the stake ! ”

41015032	“ The Messiah ? The Sovereign of Yisra’ĕl ? Come down now from the stake , so that we see and believe . ” And those who were impaled with Him were reproaching Him .
41015033	And when the sixth hour came , darkness came over all the land until the ninth hour .
41015034	And at the ninth hour יהושע cried out with a loud voice , saying , “ Ěli , Ěli , lamah sheḇaqtani ? ” which is translated , “ My Ěl , My Ěl , why have You forsaken Me ? ”
41015035	And some of those standing by , when they heard it , said , “ See , He is calling for Ěliyahu ! ”
41015036	And someone ran and filled a sponge with sour wine , and put it on a reed , and offered it to Him to drink , saying , “ Leave Him , let us see if Ěliyahu does come to take Him down . ”
41015037	And יהושע cried out with a loud voice , and breathed His last .
41015038	And the veil of the Dwelling Place was torn in two from top to bottom .
41015039	And when the captain , who was standing opposite Him , saw that He cried out like this and breathed His last , he said , “ Truly this Man was the Son of Elohim ! ”

41015041	who also followed Him and attended Him when He was in Galil , and many other women who came up with Him to Yerushalayim .
41015042	And when evening had come , because it was the Preparation Day , that is , the day before the Sabbath ,
41015043	Yosĕph of Ramathayim , a prominent council member , who was himself waiting for the reign of Elohim , came , boldly went in to Pilate and asked for the body of יהושע .
41015044	But Pilate wondered whether He was already dead , so summoning the captain , he asked him if He was already dead .
41015045	And when he learned this from the captain , he gave the body to Yosĕph .
41015046	And he , having bought fine linen , took Him down , and wrapped Him in the linen . And he laid Him in a tomb which had been hewn out of the rock , and rolled a stone against the entrance of the tomb .
41015047	And Miryam from Mag̅dala , and Miryam the mother of Yosĕph , saw where He was laid .
41016001	And when the Sabbath was past , Miryam from Mag̅dala , and Miryam the mother of Ya‛aqoḇ , and Shelomah bought spices , to go and anoint Him .
41016002	And very early on the first day of the week , they came to the tomb when the sun had risen .
41016003	And they said among themselves , “ Who shall roll away the stone from the entrance of the tomb for us ? ”
41016004	And looking up , they saw that the stone had been rolled away , for it was extremely large .
41016005	And having entered into the tomb , they saw a young man sitting on the right , wearing a white robe , and they were greatly astonished .
41016006	And he said to them , “ Do not be much astonished . You seek יהושע of Natsareth , who was impaled . He was raised – He is not here ! See the place where they laid Him .
41016007	“ And go , say to His taught ones , and Kĕpha , that He is going before you into Galil . You shall see Him there as He said to you . ”
41016008	And they went out and fled from the tomb , and were trembling and bewildered . And they spoke to no one , for they were afraid .
41016009	And having risen early on the first day of the week , He appeared first to Miryam from Mag̅dala , from whom He had cast out seven demons .
41016010	She went and reported to those who had been with Him , mourning and weeping .

41016012	And after this He appeared in another form to two of them as they walked and went into a field .
41016013	And they went and reported it to the rest , but they did not believe them either .

41016015	And He said to them , “ Go into all the world and proclaim the Good News to every creature .
41016016	“ He who has believed and has been immersed , shall be saved , but he who has not believed shall be condemned .

41016018	they shall take up snakes , and if they drink any deadly drink it shall by no means hurt them , they shall lay hands on the sick and they shall get well . ”
41016019	Then indeed , after the Master had spoken to them , He was received up into the heaven , and sat down at the right hand of Elohim .
41016020	And they went out and proclaimed it everywhere , while the Master worked with them , and confirmed the word through the accompanying signs . Amĕn .
42001001	Since many have indeed taken in hand to set in order an account of the matters completely confirmed among us ,
42001002	as those who from the beginning were eyewitnesses and servants of the word delivered them to us ,
42001003	it seemed good to me as well , having followed up all these matters exactly from the beginning , to write to you an orderly account , most excellent Theophilos ,
42001004	that you might know the certainty of the words which you were taught .
42001005	There was in the days of Herodes , the sovereign of Yehuḏah , a certain priest named Zeḵaryah , of the division of Aḇiyah . And his wife was of the daughters of Aharon , and her name was Elisheḇa .

42001014	“ And you shall have joy and gladness , and many shall rejoice at his birth .

42003001	And in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , when Pontius Pilate was governor of Yehuḏah , and Herodes district ruler of Galil , and his brother Philip district ruler of Yetur and the country of Trachonitis , and Lusanias district ruler of Aḇilene ,
42003002	Ḥanan and Qayapha being high priests , the word of Elohim came to Yoḥanan the son of Zeḵaryah in the wilderness .
42003003	And he went into all the neighbourhood of the Yardĕn , proclaiming an immersion of repentance for the forgiveness of sins ,
42003004	as it has been written in the book of the words of Yeshayahu the prophet , saying , “ A voice of one crying in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way of יהוה , make His paths straight .
42003005	‘ Every valley shall be filled and every mountain and hill shall be made low , and the crooked shall become straight , and the rough become smooth ways ,

42003007	He said therefore to the crowds that came out to be immersed by him , “ Brood of adders , who warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?

42003013	And he said to them , “ Collect no more than what is appointed for you . ”

42004001	And יהושע , being filled with the Set-apart Spirit , returned from the Yardĕn and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
42004002	being tried for forty days by the devil . And in those days He did not eat at all , and afterward , when they had ended , He was hungry .

42006020	And He , lifting up His eyes toward His taught ones , said , “ Blessed are the poor , because yours is the reign of Elohim .
42006021	“ Blessed are you who hunger now , because you shall be satisfied . Blessed are you who weep now , because you shall laugh .
42006022	“ Blessed are you when men shall hate you , and when they shall cut you off , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as wicked , for the sake of the Son of Aḏam .
42006023	“ Rejoice in that day and leap for joy , for look , your reward is great in the heaven , for that is how their fathers treated the prophets .
42006024	“ But woe to you who are rich , because you are receiving your comfort .
42006025	“ Woe to you who have been filled , because you shall hunger . Woe to you who are laughing now , because you shall mourn and weep .
42006026	“ Woe to you when all men speak well of you , for thus their fathers did to the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I say to you who are hearing : Love your enemies , do good to those hating you .
42006028	“ Bless those cursing you , and pray for those insulting you .
42006029	“ And to him who hits you on the one cheek , offer the other also . And from him who takes away your outer garment , do not withhold the inner garment either .
42006030	“ And give to everyone who asks of you . And from him who takes away what is yours do not ask it back .
42006031	“ And as you wish men should do to you , you also do to them in the same way .
42006032	“ And if you love those loving you , what favour have you ? For sinners , too , love those loving them .
42006033	“ And if you do good to those doing good to you , what favour have you ? For even sinners do the same .
42006034	“ And if you lend to those from whom you expect to receive back , what favour have you ? For even sinners lend to sinners to receive as much back .
42006035	“ Rather , love your enemies , and do good , and lend , expecting none in return . And your reward shall be great , and you shall be sons of the Most High . Because He is kind to the thankless and wicked ones .
42006036	“ Therefore be compassionate , as your Father also is compassionate .
42006037	“ And do not judge , and you shall not be judged at all . Condemn not , and you shall not be condemned at all . Forgive , and you shall be forgiven .
42006038	“ Give , and it shall be given to you . A good measure , pressed down and shaken together and running over shall be put into your lap . For with the same measure with which you measure , it shall be measured back to you . ”
42006039	And He spoke a parable to them , “ Is a blind able to lead a blind ? Shall they not both fall into a pit ?
42006040	“ A taught one is not above his teacher , but everyone perfected shall be like his teacher .
42006041	“ And why do you see the splinter in your brother’s eye , but are not aware of the plank in your own eye ?
42006042	“ Or how are you able to say to your brother , ‘ Brother , let me take out the splinter that is in your eye , ’ not seeing the plank in your own eye ? Hypocrite , first take the plank out of your own eye , and then you shall see clearly to take out the splinter that is in your brother’s eye .
42006043	“ For a good tree does not yield rotten fruit , nor does a rotten tree yield good fruit .
42006044	“ For each tree is known by its own fruit . For they do not gather figs from thorns , nor do they gather grapes from a bramble bush .
42006045	“ The good man brings forth what is good out of the good treasure of his heart , and the wicked man brings forth what is wicked out of the wicked treasure of his heart . For out of the overflow of the heart his mouth speaks .
42006046	“ But why do you call Me ‘ Master , Master , ’ and do not do what I say ?
42006047	“ Everyone who is coming to Me , and is hearing My words and is doing them , I shall show you whom he is like :
42006048	“ He is like a man building a house , who dug deep and laid a foundation on the rock . And when a flood came , the stream burst against that house , but was unable to shake it , for it was founded on the rock .
42006049	“ But the one hearing and not doing , is like a man who built a house on the earth without a foundation , against which the stream burst , and immediately it fell . And the ruin of that house was great . ”

42008001	And it came to be , afterward , that He went through every city and village , proclaiming and bringing the Good News of the reign of Elohim , and the twelve were with Him ,

42008005	“ A sower went out to sow his seed . And as he sowed , some indeed fell by the wayside . And it was trodden down , and the birds of the heaven devoured it .
42008006	“ And other fell on rock , and when it grew up , it withered because it had no moisture .
42008007	“ And other fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up with it and choked it .
42008008	“ And other fell on the good soil , and grew up , and yielded a crop a hundredfold . ” Having said this He cried , “ He who has ears to hear , let him hear ! ”
42008009	And His taught ones were asking Him , saying , “ What does this parable mean ? ”
42008010	And He said , “ To you it has been given to know the secrets of the reign of Elohim , but to the rest in parables , that ‘ Seeing they do not see , and hearing they do not understand . ’
42008011	“ And this is the parable : The seed is the word of Elohim .
42008012	“ And those by the wayside are the ones who hear , then the devil comes and takes away the word from their hearts , lest having believed , they should be saved .
42008013	“ And those on the rock are those who , when they hear , receive the word with joy . And these have no root , who believe for a while and in time of trial fall away .
42008014	“ And that which fell among thorns are those who , when they have heard , go out and are choked with worries , and riches , and pleasures of life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
42008015	“ And that on the good soil are those who , having heard the word with a noble and good heart , retain it , and bear fruit with endurance .
42008016	“ And no one having lit a lamp , covers it with a vessel or puts it under a bed , but he puts it on a lampstand , so that those coming in see the light .
42008017	“ For whatever is hidden shall be revealed , and whatever is secret shall be known and come to light .
42008018	“ Therefore take heed how you hear . For whoever possesses , to him more shall be given ; and whoever does not possess , even what he thinks he possesses shall be taken from him . ”
42008019	And His mother and brothers came to Him , and were unable to get to Him because of the crowd .
42008020	And it was reported to Him , saying , “ Your mother and Your brothers are standing outside , wishing to see You . ”
42008021	And He answering , said to them , “ My mother and My brothers are those who are hearing the Word of Elohim and doing it . ”
42008022	And on a certain day it came to be , that He entered into a boat with His taught ones , and He said to them , “ Let us go over to the other side of the lake . ” And they set out .
42008023	And as they were sailing He fell asleep . And a windstorm came down on the lake , and they were filling up , and were in danger .
42008024	And they came to Him and woke Him up , saying , “ Master , Master , we are perishing ! ” And He awoke and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water . And they ceased , and there came a calm .
42008025	And He said to them , “ Where is your belief ? ” And they were afraid , and marvelled , saying to one another , “ Who then is this , that He even commands the winds and water , and they obey Him ? ”
42008026	And they sailed to the country of the Gaḏarenes , which is opposite Galil .
42008027	And as He went out onto the land , He was met by a certain man , from the city , who had demons for a long time . And he wore no garments , and he was not living in a house but in the tombs .
42008028	And when he saw יהושע , he cried out , fell down before Him , and with a loud voice said , “ What have I to do with You , יהושע , Son of the Most High Elohim ? I beg You , do not torture me ! ”
42008029	For He had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For it had seized him many times , and he was bound with chains and shackles , being guarded . And breaking the bonds , he was driven by the demon into the lonely places .
42008030	And יהושע asked him , saying , “ What is your name ? ” And he said , “ Legion , ” because many demons had entered into him .
42008031	And they were begging Him that He would not command them to go out into the bottomless pit .
42008032	And a herd of many pigs was feeding there on the mountain . And they begged Him to allow them to go into them . And He allowed them .
42008033	And the demons , having gone out of the man , entered into the pigs , and the herd rushed down the steep place into the lake and drowned .
42008034	And when those feeding them saw what had taken place , they fled and reported it in the city and in the country .
42008035	So they came out to see what had taken place , and came to יהושע , and found the man from whom the demons had gone out , sitting at the feet of יהושע , dressed , and in his right mind . And they were afraid .
42008036	And those who had seen it reported to them how he who had been possessed by demons was healed .
42008037	And all the crowd of the neighbourhood of the Gaḏarenes asked Him to leave them , for they were seized with great fear . And He entered into the boat and returned .
42008038	And the man from whom the demons had gone out was begging Him to be with Him . But יהושע sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Go back to your house , and relate what Elohim has done for you . ” And he went away proclaiming through all the city what יהושע did for him .
42008040	And it came to be , when יהושע returned , that the crowd gladly received Him , for they were all looking for Him .
42008041	And see , there came a man whose name was Ya’ir , and he was a ruler of the congregation . And falling down at the feet of יהושע he was calling upon Him to come to his house ,
42008042	because he had an only daughter about twelve years of age , and she was dying . And as He went , the crowds thronged upon Him .
42008043	And a woman , having a flow of blood for twelve years , who , having spent all her livelihood on physicians , was unable to be healed by any ,
42008044	came from behind and touched the tzitzit of His garment . And immediately her flow of blood stopped .
42008045	And יהושע said , “ Who touched Me ? ” And when all denied it , Kĕpha and those with him said , “ Master , the crowds throng You and press upon You , and You say , ‘ Who touched Me ? ’ ”
42008046	But יהושע said , “ Somebody did touch Me , for I knew power went out from Me . ”
42008047	And the woman , seeing that she was not hidden , came trembling , and falling down before Him she declared to Him in the presence of all the people why she had touched Him and how she was healed immediately .
42008048	And He said to her , “ Take courage , daughter , your belief has healed you . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While He was still speaking , someone came from the ruler of the congregation’s house , saying to him , “ Your daughter is dead . Do not trouble the Teacher any further . ”
42008050	And יהושע , having heard , answered him , saying , “ Do not be afraid , only believe , and she shall be healed . ”
42008051	And coming into the house , He allowed no one to go in except Kĕpha , and Ya‛aqoḇ , and Yoḥanan , and the girl’s father and mother .
42008052	And they were all weeping and mourning for her , and He said , “ Do not weep , she is not dead , but sleeps . ”
42008053	And they were laughing at Him , knowing that she was dead .
42008054	But taking her by the hand He called , saying , “ Child , arise . ”
42008055	And her spirit returned , and she rose up immediately . And He directed that she be given food to eat .
42008056	And her parents were astonished , but He ordered them to say to no one what had taken place .
42009001	And having called His twelve taught ones together , He gave them power and authority over all demons , and to heal diseases .
42009002	And He sent them to proclaim the reign of Elohim and to heal the sick .
42009003	And He said to them , “ Take no matter at all for the journey , neither staffs nor bag nor bread nor money – neither have two undergarments .
42009004	“ And whatever house you enter , stay there , and go out from there .
42009005	“ And as for those who do not receive you , when you go out of that city , shake off the dust from your feet as a witness against them . ”
42009006	And going out they went through the villages , bringing the Good News and healing everywhere .
42009007	And Herodes the district ruler heard of all that was done by Him , and was perplexed , because it was said by some that Yoḥanan had been raised from the dead ,
42009008	and by some that Ěliyahu had appeared , and by others that one of the old prophets has risen up .
42009009	And Herodes said , “ Yoḥanan I have beheaded , but who is this of whom I hear such reports ? ” And he was seeking to see Him .
42009010	And the emissaries , when they had returned , related to Him all that they had done . And He took them and they withdrew by themselves to a city called Bĕyth Tsaiḏa .
42009011	And when the crowds knew it , they followed Him . And having received them , He was speaking to them about the reign of Elohim , and healed those who had need of healing .
42009012	And as the day began to decline , the twelve came and said to Him , “ Send the crowd away , that going into the surrounding villages and country , they might lodge and get food , because here we are in a lonely place . ”
42009013	But He said to them , “ You give them to eat . ” And they said , “ We have no more than five loaves and two fishes , unless we go and buy food for all these people . ”
42009014	For there were about five thousand men . And He said to His taught ones , “ Make them sit down in groups of fifty . ”
42009015	And they did so , and made them all sit down .
42009016	And taking the five loaves and the two fishes , having looked up to the heaven , He blessed and broke them , and gave them to the taught ones to set before the crowd .
42009017	So they all ate and were satisfied , and twelve baskets of the broken pieces were picked up by them .
42009018	And it came to be , as He was alone praying , the taught ones were with Him , and He asked them , saying , “ Who do the crowds say that I am ? ”
42009019	And they answering , said , “ Yoḥanan the Immerser , but others Ěliyahu , and others say that one of the old prophets has risen up . ”
42009020	And He said to them , “ And you , who do you say I am ? ” And Kĕpha answering , said , “ The Messiah of Elohim . ”
42009021	And strictly warning them , He commanded them to say this to no one ,
42009022	saying , “ The Son of Aḏam has to suffer much , and to be rejected by the elders and chief priests and scribes , and to be killed , and to be raised the third day . ”
42009023	And He said to them all , “ If anyone wishes to come after Me , let him deny himself , and take up his stake daily , and follow Me .
42009024	“ For whoever wishes to save his life shall lose it , but whoever loses his life for My sake shall save it .
42009025	“ For what is a man profited if he gains all the world , and is himself destroyed or lost ?
42009026	“ For whoever is ashamed of Me and My words , of him the Son of Aḏam shall be ashamed when He comes in His esteem , and in His Father’s , and of the set-apart messengers .
42009027	“ But truly I say to you , there are some standing here who shall not taste death at all till they see the reign of Elohim : ”
42009028	And it came to be , about eight days after these words , taking with Him Kĕpha and Yoḥanan and Ya‛aqoḇ , He went up to the mountain to pray .
42009029	And it came to be , as He prayed , the appearance of His face changed , and His garment dazzling white .
42009030	And see , two men were talking with Him , who were Mosheh and Ěliyahu ,
42009031	who having appeared in esteem , spoke of His death which He was about to complete at Yerushalayim .
42009032	But Kĕpha and those with him were heavy with sleep . And having awakened , they saw His esteem and the two men standing with Him .
42009033	And it came to be , as they were parting from Him , Kĕpha said to יהושע , “ Master , it is good for us to be here . And let us make three booths : one for You , and one for Mosheh , and one for Ěliyahu , ” not knowing what he said .
42009034	And as he was saying this , a cloud came and overshadowed them . And they were afraid as they entered the cloud .
42009035	And a voice came out of the cloud , saying , “ This is My Son , the Beloved . Hear Him ! ”
42009036	And when the voice had spoken , יהושע was found alone . And they were silent , and reported to no one in those days any of what they had seen .
42009037	And it came to be on the next day , when they came down from the mountain , that a large crowd met Him .
42009038	And see , a man from the crowd cried out , saying , “ Teacher , I beg You , look at my son , for he is my only child .
42009039	“ And see , a spirit seizes him , and he suddenly cries out , and it convulses him , with foaming , and scarcely leaves him , bruising him .
42009040	“ And I begged Your taught ones to cast it out , but they were unable . ”
42009041	And יהושע answering , said , “ O generation , unbelieving and perverse , how long shall I be with you and put up with you ? Bring your son here . ”
42009042	And as he was still coming , the demon threw him down in convulsions . And יהושע rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	And they were all amazed at the greatness of Elohim . And while all were marvelling at all that יהושע did , He said to His taught ones ,
42009044	“ Lay up in your ears these words , for the Son of Aḏam is about to be delivered into the hands of men . ”
42009045	But they did not understand this saying , and it was veiled from them so that they did not perceive it . And they were afraid to ask Him about this saying .
42009046	And a reasoning arose among them , who might be the greater of them .
42009047	And יהושע , having seen the reasoning of their heart , took a little child and placed him by His side ,
42009048	and said to them , “ Whoever receives this little child in My Name receives Me . And whoever receives Me receives Him who sent Me . For he who is least among you all , he shall be great . ”
42009049	And Yoḥanan answering , said , “ Master , we saw someone casting out demons in Your Name , and we forbade him because he does not follow with us . ”
42009050	But יהושע said to him , “ Do not forbid him , for he who is not against us is for us . ”
42009051	And it came to be , when the days of His taking up were being completed , even He set His face to go to Yerushalayim ,
42009052	and He sent messengers ahead of Him . And they went and entered into a village of the Shomeronites , to prepare for Him .
42009053	And they did not receive Him , because His face was set for the journey to Yerushalayim .
42009054	And His taught ones , Ya‛aqoḇ and Yoḥanan , seeing it said , “ Master , do You wish us to command fire to come down from the heaven and destroy them , as also Ěliyahu did ? ”
42009055	But having turned , He rebuked them and said , “ You do not know of what spirit you are ,
42009056	for the Son of Aḏam did not come to destroy men’s lives but to save them . ” And they went on to another village .
42009057	And it came to be , as they journeyed on the way , that someone said to Him , “ Master , I shall follow You wherever You go . ”
42009058	And יהושע said to him , “ The foxes have holes and the birds of the heaven nests , but the Son of Aḏam has nowhere to lay His head . ”
42009059	And He said to another , “ Follow Me , ” but he said , “ Master , let me first go and bury my father . ”
42009060	And יהושע said to him , “ Let the dead bury their own dead , but you go and announce the reign of Elohim . ”
42009061	And another also said , “ Master , I shall follow You , but let me first say good-bye to those in my house . ”
42009062	But יהושע said to him , “ No one , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the reign of Elohim . ”
42010001	And after this the Master appointed seventy others , and sent them two by two ahead of Him into every city and place where He Himself was about to go .
42010002	Then He said to them , “ The harvest indeed is great , but the workers are few , therefore pray the Master of the harvest to send out workers into His harvest .
42010003	“ Go ! See , I send you out as lambs into the midst of wolves .
42010004	“ Do not take a purse , nor a bag , nor sandals . And greet no one along the way .
42010005	“ And whatever house you enter , first say , ‘ Peace to this house . ’
42010006	“ And if indeed a son of peace is there , your peace shall rest on it ; and if not , it shall return to you .
42010007	“ And stay in the same house , eating and drinking whatever with them , for the labourer is worthy of his wages . Do not move from house to house .
42010008	“ And into whatever city you enter , and they receive you , eat whatever is placed before you ,
42010009	and heal the sick there , and say to them , ‘ The reign of Elohim has come near to you . ’
42010010	“ And into whatever city you enter , and they do not receive you , go out into its streets and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dust of your city which clings to us , we wipe off against you , but know this , that the reign of Elohim has come near to you . ’
42010012	“ And I say to you that it shall be more bearable for Seḏom in that Day , than for that city .

42010014	“ But it shall be more bearable for Tsor and Tsiḏon at the judgment than for you .
42010015	“ And you , Kephar Naḥum , who are exalted to the heaven , shall be brought down to the grave .

42010018	And He said to them , “ I saw Satan falling out of the heaven as lightning .

42010020	“ But do not rejoice in this , that the spirits are subject to you , but rather rejoice because your names have been written in the heavens . ”
42010021	In that hour יהושע exulted in the Spirit and said , “ I praise You , Father , Master of the heaven and of the earth , that You have hidden these matters from clever and learned ones , and did reveal them to babes . Yea , Father , because thus it was well-pleasing in Your sight .
42010022	“ All has been delivered to Me by My Father , and no one knows who the Son is , except the Father , and who the Father is , except the Son , and he to whom the Son wishes to reveal Him . ”
42010023	And turning to His taught ones He said , separately , “ Blessed are the eyes that see what you see ,
42010024	for I say to you that many prophets and sovereigns have wished to see what you see , and have not seen it , and to hear what you hear , and have not heard it . ”
42010025	And see , a certain one learned in the Torah stood up , trying Him , and saying , “ Teacher , what shall I do to inherit everlasting life ? ”
42010026	And He said to him , “ What has been written in the Torah ? How do you read it ? ”
42010027	And he answering , said , “ ‘ You shall love יהוה your Elohim with all your heart , and with all your being , and with all your strength , and with all your mind , ’ and ‘ your neighbour as yourself . ’ ”
42010028	And He said to him , “ You have answered rightly . Do this and you shall live . ”
42010029	But he , wishing to declare himself righteous , said to יהושע , “ And who is my neighbour ? ”
42010030	And replying , יהושע said , “ A certain man was going down from Yerushalayim to Yeriḥo , and fell among robbers , who , both stripping and beating him , went away , leaving him half dead .
42010031	“ And by a coincidence a certain priest was going down that way . And when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
42010032	“ And likewise a Lĕwite also , when he came to the place , and seeing , passed by on the other side .
42010033	“ But a certain Shomeronite , journeying , came upon him . And when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
42010034	and he went to him and bandaged his wounds , pouring on oil and wine . And having placed him on his own beast , he brought him to an inn , and looked after him .
42010035	“ And going out on the next day , he took out two pieces of silver , gave them to the innkeeper , and said to him , ‘ Look after him , and whatever more you spend I shall repay you when I return . ’
42010036	“ Who , then , of these three , do you think , was neighbour to him who fell among the robbers ? ”
42010037	And he said , “ He who showed compassion on him . ” Then יהושע said to him , “ Go and do likewise . ”
42010038	And it came to be as they went that He entered into a certain village . And a certain woman named Martha received Him into her house .
42010039	And she had a sister called Miryam , who also sat at the feet of יהושע and heard His word .

42010041	And יהושע answering , said to her , “ Martha , Martha , you are worried and troubled about many matters ,
42010042	but one only is necessary , and Miryam has chosen the good portion , which shall not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	And it came to be while He was praying in a certain place , as He ceased , one of His taught ones said to Him , “ Master , teach us to pray , as Yoḥanan also taught his taught ones . ”
42011002	And He said to them , “ When you pray , say : Our Father in the heavens , let Your Name be set-apart , let Your reign come , let Your desire be done on earth as it is in heaven .
42011003	“ Give us day by day our daily bread .
42011004	“ And forgive us our sins , for we also forgive everyone who is indebted to us . And do not lead us into trial , but rescue us from the wicked one . ”
42011005	And He said to them , “ Which of you shall have a friend , and go to him at midnight and say to him , ‘ Friend , lend me three loaves ,
42011006	since a friend of mine has come to me on his journey , and I do not have food to set before him , ’
42011007	then the one inside answering , says , ‘ Do not trouble me , the door is already locked , and my children with me are in bed . I am unable to get up and give to you’ ?
42011008	“ I say to you , if he does not get up and give to him because he is his friend , he shall get up and give him as many as he needs because of his persistence .
42011009	“ And I say to you : ask and it shall be given to you , seek and you shall find , knock and it shall be opened to you .
42011010	“ For everyone asking receives , and he who is seeking finds , and to him who is knocking it shall be opened .
42011011	“ And what father among you whose son asks for bread shall give him a stone , or if he asks for a fish shall give him a snake instead of a fish ,
42011012	or if he asks for an egg shall give him a scorpion ?

42011014	And He was casting out a demon , and it was dumb . And it came to be , when the demon had gone out , that the dumb spoke . And the crowds marvelled .
42011015	But some of them said , “ He casts out demons by Be‛elzebul , the ruler of the demons , ”

42011019	“ Now if I cast out demons by Be‛elzebul , by whom do your sons cast them out ? Because of this they shall be your judges .
42011020	“ But if I cast out demons by the finger of Elohim , then the reign of Elohim has come upon you .
42011021	“ When a strong man , having been well armed , watches over his own court , his possessions are in peace .
42011022	“ But when a stronger than he comes upon him and overcomes him , he takes from him all his armour in which he trusted , and divides his booty .

42011025	“ And when he comes , he finds it swept and decorated ,

42011029	And while the crowds were thronging , He began to say , “ This generation is wicked . It seeks a sign , and no sign shall be given to it except the sign of Yonah the prophet .
42011030	“ For as Yonah became a sign to the Ninewites , so also the Son of Aḏam shall be to this generation .

42011032	“ The men of Ninewĕh shall rise up in the judgment with this generation and condemn it , for they repented at the preaching of Yonah , and look , a greater than Yonah is here .
42011033	“ And no one , when he has lit a lamp , puts it in a hidden place or under a basket , but on a lampstand , that those who come in shall see the light .
42011034	“ The lamp of the body is the eye . Therefore , when your eye is good , all your body also is enlightened . But when your eye is evil , your body also is darkened .
42011035	“ See to it therefore that the light which is in you is not darkness .
42011036	“ If then all your body is enlightened , having no part dark , all shall be enlightened , as when the bright shining of a lamp gives you light . ”
42011037	And as He spoke , a certain Pharisee asked Him to dine with him , so He went in and sat down to eat .
42011038	And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that He did not first wash before dinner .
42011039	And the Master said to him , “ Now you Pharisees make the outside of the cup and dish clean , but your inward part is filled with greed and wickedness .
42011040	“ Mindless ones ! Did not He who made the outside make the inside also ?
42011041	“ But give in kindness of that which is within , and see , all are clean to you .

42011045	And one of those learned in the Torah , answering , said to Him , “ Teacher , when You say this You insult us too . ”
