42011047	“ Woe to you , because you build the tombs of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
42011048	“ So you bear witness that you approve of the works of your fathers , because they indeed killed them , and you build their tombs .
42011049	“ And because of this the wisdom of Elohim said , ‘ I shall send them prophets and emissaries , and some of them they shall kill and persecute , ’
42011050	so that the blood of all the prophets which was shed from the foundation of the world shall be required of this generation ,
42011051	from the blood of Heḇel to the blood of Zeḵaryah who perished between the altar and the Dwelling Place . Yea , I say to you , it shall be required of this generation .
42011052	“ Woe to you learned in the Torah , because you took away the key of knowledge . You did not enter in yourselves , and those who were entering in you hindered . ”
42011053	And as He was saying this to them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to oppose Him fiercely , and to draw Him out on many subjects ,
42011054	watching Him , and seeking to catch Him in whatever He says , so as to accuse Him .
42012001	Meanwhile , when an innumerable crowd of people had gathered together , so that they trampled one another , He began to say to His taught ones , first , “ Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	“ And whatever is concealed shall be revealed , and whatever is hidden shall be known .
42012003	“ So , whatever you have said in the dark shall be heard in the light , and what you have spoken in the ear in inner rooms shall be proclaimed on the house-tops .
42012004	“ But I say to you , My friends , do not be afraid of those who kill the body , and after that are unable to do any more .
42012005	“ But I shall show you whom you should fear : Fear the One who , after killing , possesses authority to cast into Gehenna . Yea , I say to you , fear Him !
42012006	“ Are not five sparrows sold for two copper coins ? And not one of them is forgotten before Elohim .
42012007	“ But even the hairs of your head have all been numbered . Do not fear , you are worth more than many sparrows .
42012008	“ And I say to you , everyone who confesses Me before men , the Son of Aḏam shall also confess him before the messengers of Elohim .
42012009	“ But he that has denied Me before men shall be denied before the messengers of Elohim .
42012010	“ And everyone who shall speak a word against the Son of Aḏam , it shall be forgiven him , but to him who has blasphemed against the Set-apart Spirit , it shall not be forgiven .
42012011	“ And when they bring you to the congregations and rulers and authorities , do not worry about how or what you should answer , or what you should say ,
42012012	for the Set-apart Spirit shall teach you in that very hour what you should say . ”
42012013	And someone from the crowd said to Him , “ Teacher , speak to my brother , to divide the inheritance with me . ”
42012014	But He said to him , “ Man , who made Me a judge or divider over you ? ”
42012015	And He said to them , “ Mind , and beware of greed , because one’s life does not consist in the excess of his possessions . ”
42012016	He then spoke a parable to them , saying , “ The land of a certain rich man yielded well .
42012017	“ And he was reasoning within himself , saying , ‘ What shall I do , because I have no room to store my crops ? ’
42012018	“ And he said , ‘ I am going to do this : pull down my storehouses and build greater , and store all my crops and my goods there ,
42012019	then say to myself , “ Life , you have many goods laid up for many years , take your ease , eat , drink , rejoice . ” ’
42012020	“ But Elohim said to him , ‘ You mindless one ! This night your life shall be demanded from you . And who shall own what you have prepared ? ’
42012021	“ So is he who is storing up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward Elohim . ”
42012022	And He said to His taught ones , “ For this reason I say to you , do not worry about your life , what you shall eat ; nor about the body , what you shall put on .
42012023	“ The life is more than the food , and the body is more than the clothing .
42012024	“ Look at the ravens , for they neither sow nor reap , which have neither storehouse nor granary , and Elohim feeds them . How much more valuable are you than the birds ?
42012025	“ And which of you by worrying is able to add one cubit to his life’s span ?
42012026	“ If then you are unable to do the least , why do you worry about the rest ?
42012027	“ Look at the lilies , how they grow . They neither toil nor spin , and I say to you , even Shelomoh in all his esteem was not dressed like one of these .
42012028	“ And if Elohim so clothes the grass , which today exists in the field and tomorrow is thrown into the furnace , how much more you , O you of little belief ?
42012029	“ And do not seek what you shall eat or what you shall drink , and do not keep worrying .
42012030	“ For the gentiles of the world seek all these , and your Father knows that you need these .
42012031	“ But seek the reign of Elohim , and all these shall be added to you .
42012032	“ Do not fear , little flock , because your Father did delight to give you the reign .
42012033	“ Sell your possessions and give in kindness . Make yourselves purses which do not grow old , a treasure in the heavens that does not fail , where no thief does come near nor moth destroys .
42012034	“ For where your treasure is , there your heart shall be also .
42012035	“ Let your loins be girded and your lamps burning ,
42012036	and be like men waiting for their master , when he shall return from the wedding , that when he comes and knocks they open to him immediately .
42012037	“ Blessed are those servants whom the master , when he comes , shall find watching . Truly , I say to you that he shall gird himself and make them sit down to eat , and shall come and serve them .
42012038	“ And if he comes in the second watch , or in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
42012039	“ And know this , that if the master of the house had known what hour the thief comes , he would have watched and not allowed his house to be broken into .
42012040	“ And you , then , be ready , for the Son of Aḏam is coming at an hour you do not expect . ”
42012041	And Kĕpha said to Him , “ Master , do You speak this parable to us , or also to all ? ”
42012042	And the Master said , “ Who then is the trustworthy and wise manager , whom his master shall appoint over his household , to give the portion of food in due season ?
42012043	“ Blessed is that servant whom his master shall find so doing when he comes .
42012044	“ Truly , I say to you that he shall appoint him over all his possessions .
42012045	“ But if that servant says in his heart , ‘ My master is delaying his coming , ’ and begins to beat the male servants and female servants , and to eat and drink and be drunk ,
42012046	the master of that servant shall come on a day when he does not expect him , and at an hour that he does not know , and shall cut him in two and appoint his portion with the unbelievers .
42012047	“ And that servant who knew his master’s desire , and did not prepare , nor did according to his desire , shall be beaten with many stripes .
42012048	“ But he who did not know , yet did what deserved flogging , shall be beaten with few . And everyone to whom much is given , from him much shall be demanded . And to whom much has been entrusted , from him much more shall be asked .
42012049	“ I came to send fire on the earth , and how I wish it were already kindled !
42012050	“ But I have an immersion to be immersed with , and how distressed I am until it is accomplished !
42012051	“ Do you think that I came to give peace on earth ? I say to you , no , but rather division .
42012052	“ For from now on five in one house shall be divided , three against two , and two against three –
42012053	father shall be divided against son , and son against father , mother against daughter , and daughter against mother , mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law , and daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law . ”
42012054	And He also said to the crowds , “ When you see a cloud rising out of the west , immediately you say , ‘ A storm is coming , ’ and so it is .
42012055	“ And when you see the south wind blow , you say , ‘ There shall be hot weather , ’ and it is .
42012056	“ Hypocrites ! You know to discern the face of the heaven and of the earth , but how is it you do not discern this time ?
42012057	“ And why , also , do you not judge for yourselves what is right ?
42012058	“ For , as you go with your opponent to a ruler , try hard along the way to settle with him , lest he drag you to the judge , and the judge deliver you to the officer , and the officer throw you into prison .
42012059	“ I say to you , you shall certainly not leave there until you have paid even the last mite . ”
42013001	And some were present at that time , reporting to Him about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their offerings .
42013002	And יהושע answering , said to them , “ Do you think that these Galileans were worse sinners than all other Galileans , because they have suffered like this ?
42013003	“ I say to you , no ! But unless you repent you shall all perish in the same way .
42013004	“ Or those eighteen on whom the tower in Shiloaḥ fell and killed them , do you think that they were greater offenders than all other men who dwelt in Yerushalayim ?
42013005	“ I say to you , no ! But unless you repent you shall all perish in the same way . ”
42013006	And He spoke this parable , “ A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard , and he came seeking fruit on it and found none .
42013007	“ And he said to the gardener , ‘ Look , for three years I have come seeking fruit on this fig tree and find none . Cut it down , why does it even make the ground useless ? ’
42013008	“ And he answering , said to him , ‘ Master , leave it this year too , until I dig around it and throw manure .
42013009	‘ And if indeed it bears fruit , good . But if not so , you shall cut it down . ’ ”
42013010	And He was teaching in one of the congregations on the Sabbath ,
42013011	and see , there was a woman having a weakening spirit for eighteen years , and was bent over and was unable to straighten up at all .
42013012	And יהושע , seeing her , called her near and said to her , “ Woman , you are loosened from your weakness . ”
42013013	And He laid His hands on her , and immediately she was straightened up , and praised Elohim .
42013014	But the ruler of the congregation , responding , much displeased that יהושע had healed on the Sabbath , said to the crowd , “ There are six days on which men should work , so come and be healed on them , and not on the Sabbath day . ”
42013015	Then the Master answered him and said , “ Hypocrite ! Does not each one of you on the Sabbath loosen his ox or his donkey from the stall , and lead it away to water it ?
42013016	“ And this one , being a daughter of Aḇraham , whom Satan has bound , look , for eighteen years , should she not be loosened from this bond on the Sabbath ? ”
42013017	And when He said this , all His opponents were put to shame . And all the crowd rejoiced for all the splendid works being done by Him .
42013018	Therefore He said , “ What is the reign of Elohim like ? And to what shall I compare it ?
42013019	“ It is like a mustard seed , which a man took and threw into his garden . And it grew and became a large tree , and the birds of the heavens nested in its branches . ”
42013020	And again He said , “ To what shall I compare the reign of Elohim ?
42013021	“ It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of flour until it was all leavened . ”
42013022	And He was going through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Yerushalayim ,
42013023	and someone said to Him , “ Master , are there few who are being saved ? ” And He said to them ,
42013024	“ Strive to enter through the narrow gate , because many , I say to you , shall seek to enter in and shall not be able .
42013025	“ When once the Master of the house has risen up and shut the door , and you begin to stand outside and knock at the door , saying , ‘ Master , Master , open for us , ’ and He shall answer and say to you , ‘ I do not know you , where you are from , ’
42013026	then you shall begin to say , ‘ We ate and drank in Your presence , and You taught in our streets . ’
42013027	“ But He shall say , ‘ I say to you I do not know you , where you are from . Depart from Me , all you workers of unrighteousness . ’
42013028	“ There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when you see Aḇraham and Yitsḥaq and Ya‛aqoḇ and all the prophets in the reign of Elohim , and yourselves thrown outside .
42013029	“ And they shall come from the east and the west , and from the north and the south , and sit down in the reign of Elohim .
42013030	“ And see , there are last who shall be first , and there are first who shall be last . ”
42013031	On the same day there came certain Pharisees , saying to Him , “ Get out and go from here , for Herodes wishes to kill You . ”
42013032	And He said to them , “ Go , say to that fox , ‘ See , I cast out demons and perform healings today and tomorrow , and the third day I shall be perfected . ’
42013033	“ But I have to journey today , and tomorrow , and the day following , because it is not fitting for a prophet to perish outside of Yerushalayim .
42013034	“ Yerushalayim , Yerushalayim , killing the prophets and stoning those who are sent to her ! How often I wished to gather your children together , the way a hen gathers her chickens under her wings , but you would not !
42013035	“ See , your House is left to you laid waste . And truly I say to you , you shall by no means see Me until the time comes when you say , ‘ Blessed is He who is coming in the Name of יהוה ! ’ ”
42014001	And it came to be , as He went into the house of one of the rulers of the Pharisees to eat bread on the Sabbath , that they were watching Him closely .
42014002	And see , there was a certain man before Him suffering from dropsy .
42014003	And יהושע responding , spoke to those learned in the Torah and the Pharisees , saying , “ Is it right to heal on the Sabbath ? ”
42014004	But they were silent . So taking hold of him He healed him , and let him go .
42014005	And to them He said , “ Which of you , having a donkey or an ox that has fallen into a pit , shall not immediately pull him out on the Sabbath day ? ”
42014006	And they were unable to answer Him regarding these matters .
42014007	And He spoke a parable to those who were invited , when He noted how they chose the best places , saying to them :
42014008	“ When you are invited by anyone to a wedding feast , do not sit down in the best place , lest one more distinguished than you be invited by him ,
42014009	and he who invited you and him come and say to you , ‘ Give this one place , ’ and then you begin with shame to take the last place .
42014010	“ Rather , when you are invited , go and sit down in the last place , so that when he who invited you comes he shall say to you , ‘ Friend , come up higher . ’ Then you shall have esteem in the presence of those who sit at the table with you .
42014011	“ For everyone who is exalting himself shall be humbled , and he who is humbling himself shall be exalted . ”
42014012	And He also said to him who invited Him , “ When you give a dinner or a supper , do not ask your friends , nor your brothers , nor your relatives , nor your rich neighbours , lest they also invite you back , and you be repaid .
42014013	“ But when you give a feast , invite poor ones , crippled ones , lame ones , blind ones ,
42014014	and you shall be blessed , because they do not have to repay you . For you shall be repaid at the resurrection of the righteous . ”
42014015	And when one of those who sat at the table with Him heard this , he said to Him , “ Blessed is he who eats bread in the reign of Elohim ! ”
42014016	But He said to him , “ A certain man gave a great supper and invited many ,
42014017	and he sent his servant at supper time to say to those who were invited , ‘ Come , for all is now ready . ’
42014018	“ But one by one they all began making excuses . The first said to him , ‘ I have bought a field , and I need to go and see it . I ask you to have me excused . ’
42014019	“ And another said , ‘ I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I am going to try them out . I ask you to have me excused . ’
42014020	“ And another said , ‘ I have married a wife , and because of this I am unable to come . ’
42014021	“ And that servant came and reported this to his master . Then the master of the house , being wroth , said to his servant , ‘ Hurry out into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in here the poor , and crippled , and lame , and blind . ’
42014022	“ And the servant said , ‘ Master , it is done as you commanded , and still there is room . ’
42014023	“ And the master said to the servant , ‘ Go out into the street corners and hedges , and compel them to come in , so that my house is filled .
42014024	‘ For I say to you that none of those men who were invited shall taste my supper . ’ ”
42014025	And large crowds were going with Him , and turning , He said to them ,
42014026	“ If anyone comes to Me and does not hate his father and mother , and wife , and children , and brothers , and sisters , and his own life too , he is unable to be My taught one .
42014027	“ And whoever does not bear his stake and come after Me is unable to be My taught one .
42014028	“ For who of you , wishing to build a tower , does not sit down first and count the cost , whether he has enough to complete it ?
42014029	“ Otherwise , when he has laid the foundation , and is unable to finish it , all who see it begin to mock him ,
42014030	saying , ‘ This man began to build and was unable to finish . ’
42014031	“ Or what sovereign , going to fight against another sovereign , does not sit down first and take counsel whether he is able with ten thousand to meet him who comes against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	“ And if not , while the other is still far away , he sends a delegation and asks conditions of peace .
42014033	“ So , then , everyone of you who does not give up all that he has , is unable to be My taught one .
42014034	“ The salt is good , but if the salt becomes tasteless , with what shall it be seasoned ?
42014035	“ It is not fit for land , nor for manure , they throw it out . He who has ears to hear , let him hear ! ”
42015001	Now all the tax collectors and the sinners were coming to Him to hear Him .
42015002	And the Pharisees and scribes grumbled , saying , “ This One receives sinners and eats with them . ”
42015003	And He spoke this parable to them , saying ,
42015004	“ What man among you , having a hundred sheep , and having lost one of them , does not leave the ninety-nine in the wilderness and go after the one which is lost until he finds it ?
42015005	“ And having found it , he lays it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
42015006	“ And having come home , he calls together his friends and neighbours , saying to them , ‘ Rejoice with me , for I have found my sheep which was lost ! ’
42015007	“ I say to you that in the same way there shall be more joy in the heaven over one sinner repenting , than over ninety-nine righteous ones who need no repentance .
42015008	“ Or what woman , having ten silver coins , if she loses one coin , does not light a lamp and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she finds it ?
42015009	“ And having found it , she calls friends and neighbours together , saying , ‘ Rejoice with me , for I have found the coin which I lost ! ’
42015010	“ I say to you , in the same way there is joy in the presence of the messengers of Elohim over one sinner repenting . ”
42015011	And He said , “ A certain man had two sons ,
42015012	and the younger of them said to his father , ‘ Father , give me the portion of goods falling to me . ’ And he divided his livelihood between them .
42015013	“ And not many days after , the younger son , having gathered all together , went away to a distant country , and there wasted his goods with loose living .
42015014	“ And when he had spent all , there arose a severe scarcity of food throughout that land , and he began to be in need .
42015015	“ And he went and joined himself to one of the citizens of that country , and he sent him to his fields to feed pigs .
42015016	“ And he was longing to fill his stomach with the pods which the pigs were eating , and no one gave to him .
42015017	“ But having come to himself , he said , ‘ How many of my father’s hired servants have bread enough and to spare , and I am perishing with hunger !
42015018	‘ Having risen , I shall go to my father and say to him , “ Father , I have sinned against the heaven , and before you ,
42015019	and I am no longer worthy to be called your son . Make me like one of your hired servants . ” ’
42015020	“ And having risen , he went to his father . And while he was still a long way off , his father saw him and was moved with compassion , and ran and fell on his neck and kissed him .
42015021	“ And the son said to him , ‘ Father , I have sinned against the heaven , and before you , and I am no longer worthy to be called your son . ’
42015022	“ But the father said to his servants , ‘ Bring out the best robe and put it on him , and put a ring on his hand and sandals on his feet .
42015023	‘ And bring the fattened calf here and slaughter it , and let us eat and rejoice ,
42015024	because this son of mine was dead and is alive again , and he was lost and is found . ’ And they began to rejoice .
42015025	“ And his older son was in the field , and when he came and approached the house , he heard music and dancing .
42015026	“ And having called one of the servants he asked what this meant .
42015027	“ And he said to him , ‘ Your brother has come , and your father has slaughtered the fattened calf because he received him back in health . ’
42015028	“ And he was wroth and would not go in . So his father came out and pleaded with him .
42015029	“ And answering , he said to his father , ‘ See , these many years I have been serving you , and I have never transgressed a command of yours , but to me you have never given a young goat , so I could rejoice with my friends .
42015030	‘ But when this son of yours came , who has devoured your livelihood with whores , you slaughtered the fattened calf for him . ’
42015031	“ Then he said to him , ‘ Son , you are always with me , and all I have is yours .
42015032	‘ And we had to rejoice and be glad , for your brother was dead and is alive , and was lost and is found . ’ ”
42016001	And He also said to His taught ones , “ There was a certain rich man who had a manager and he was accused to him as wasting his possessions .
42016002	“ So having called him he said to him , ‘ What is this I hear about you ? Give an account of your management , for you are no longer able to be manager . ’
42016003	“ And the manager said within himself , ‘ What shall I do ? For my master is taking the managership away from me . I am unable to dig , I am ashamed to beg .
42016004	‘ I know what I shall do , that , when I am removed from the managership , they might receive me into their houses . ’
42016005	“ And calling every one of his master’s debtors to him , he said to the first , ‘ How much do you owe my master ? ’
42016006	“ And he said , ‘ A hundred measures of oil . ’ And he said to him , ‘ Take your bill , and sit down quickly and write fifty . ’
42016007	“ Then to another he said , ‘ And how much do you owe ? ’ And he said , ‘ A hundred measures of wheat . ’ And he said to him , ‘ Take your bill , and write eighty . ’

42016014	And the Pharisees , who loved silver , also heard all this , and were sneering at Him ,

42016019	“ But there was a certain rich man who used to dress in purple and fine linen and lived luxuriously every day .
42016020	“ And there was a certain beggar named El‛azar , being covered with sores , who was placed at his gate ,

42016022	“ And it came to be that the beggar died , and was carried by the messengers to the bosom of Aḇraham . And the rich man also died and was buried .

42016025	“ But Aḇraham said , ‘ Son , remember that in your life you received your good , and likewise El‛azar the evil , but now he is comforted and you are suffering .
42016026	‘ And besides all this , between us and you a great chasm has been set , so that those who wish to pass from here to you are unable , nor do those from there pass to us . ’

42017001	And He said to the taught ones , “ It is inevitable that stumbling-blocks should come , but woe to him through whom they come !
42017002	“ It would be better for him if a millstone is put around his neck , and he were thrown into the sea , than that he should cause one of these little ones to stumble .

42017005	And the emissaries said to the Master , “ Give us more belief . ”

42017007	“ But who of you , having a servant ploughing or shepherding , would say to him when he has come in from the field , ‘ Come immediately and sit down to eat’ ?

42017009	“ Would he thank that servant because he did what he was commanded ? I think not .
42017010	“ So also you , when you have done all that you were commanded , say , ‘ We are unworthy servants , we have done what was our duty to do . ’ ”
42017011	And it came to be , as He went to Yerushalayim , that He passed through the midst of Shomeron and Galil .

42017020	And having been asked by the Pharisees when the reign of Elohim would come , He answered them and said , “ The reign of Elohim does not come with intent watching ,
42017021	nor shall they say , ‘ Look here ! ’ or ‘ Look there ! ’ For look , the reign of Elohim is in your midst ! ”

42017023	“ And they shall say to you , ‘ Look here ! ’ or ‘ Look there ! ’ Do not go after them , nor follow .
42017024	“ For as the lightning that flashes out of one part under heaven shines to the other part under heaven , so also the Son of Aḏam shall be in His day .
42017025	“ But first He has to suffer much and be rejected by this generation .
42017026	“ And as it came to be in the days of Noaḥ , so also shall it be in the days of the Son of Aḏam :
42017027	“ They were eating , they were drinking , they were marrying , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noaḥ went into the ark , and the flood came and destroyed them all .
42017028	“ And likewise , as it came to be in the days of Lot : They were eating , they were drinking , they were buying , they were selling , they were planting , they were building ,
42017029	but on the day Lot went out of Seḏom it rained fire and sulphur from heaven and destroyed all .
42017030	“ It shall be the same in the day the Son of Aḏam is revealed .
42017031	“ In that day , he who shall be on the house-top , and his goods in the house , let him not come down to take them away . And likewise the one who is in the field , let him not turn back .
42017032	“ Remember the wife of Lot .
42017033	“ Whoever seeks to save his life shall lose it , and whoever loses his life shall preserve it .
42017034	“ I say to you , in that night there shall be two in one bed , the one shall be taken and the other shall be left .
42017035	“ Two shall be grinding together , the one shall be taken and the other shall be left .
42017036	“ Two shall be in the field , the one shall be taken and the other shall be left . ”
42017037	And they answering , said to Him , “ Where , Master ? ” And He said to them , “ Where the body is , there also the eagles shall be gathered together . ”
42018001	And He spoke a parable to them , that they should always pray and not lose heart ,
42018002	saying , “ In a certain city there was a certain judge , not fearing Elohim nor regarding man .
42018003	“ And a widow was in that city , and she came to him , saying , ‘ Do right to me on my adversary . ’
42018004	“ And he would not for a while , but afterward he said within himself , ‘ Even if I do not fear Elohim nor regard man ,
42018005	yet because this widow troubles me I shall do right to her , lest by her continual coming she wears me out . ’ ”
42018006	And the Master said , “ Hear what the unrighteous judge said .
42018007	“ And shall Elohim not do right by all means to His own chosen ones who are crying out day and night to Him , and being patient over them ?
42018008	“ I say to you that He shall do right to them speedily . But when the Son of Aḏam comes , shall He find the belief on the earth ? ”
42018009	And He also spoke this parable to some who relied on themselves that they were righteous , and looking down on others :
42018010	“ Two men went up to the Set-apart Place to pray – the one a Pharisee and the other a tax collector .
42018011	“ The Pharisee stood and began to pray with himself this way , ‘ Elohim , I thank You that I am not like the rest of men , swindlers , unrighteous , adulterers , or even as this tax collector .

42018013	“ But the tax collector standing at a distance would not even raise his eyes to the heaven , but was beating his breast , saying , ‘ Elohim , show favour unto me , a sinner ! ’
42018014	“ I say to you , this man went down to his house declared right , rather than the other . For everyone who is exalting himself shall be humbled , and he who is humbling himself shall be exalted . ”
42018015	And they also brought infants to Him to touch them , but His taught ones seeing it , rebuked them .

42018018	And a certain ruler asked Him , saying , “ Good Teacher , what shall I do to inherit everlasting life ? ”

42018020	“ You know the commands , ‘ Do not commit adultery , ’ ‘ Do not murder , ’ ‘ Do not steal , ’ ‘ Do not bear false witness , ’ ‘ Respect your father and your mother . ’ ”
42018021	And he said , “ All these I have watched over from my youth . ”
42018022	And hearing this , יהושע said to him , “ Yet one you lack : Sell all that you have and distribute to the poor , and you shall have treasure in heaven . And come , follow Me . ”
42018023	But when he heard this , he became intensely sad , for he was extremely rich .

42018025	“ For it is easier for a camel to enter through a needle’s eye than for a rich man to enter into the reign of Elohim . ”
42018026	And those who heard it said , “ And who is able to be saved ? ”

42019012	He therefore said , “ A certain nobleman went to a distant country to receive for himself a reign and to return .

42019016	“ And the first came , saying , ‘ Master , your mina has earned ten minas . ’
42019017	“ And he said to him , ‘ Well done , good servant . Because you were trustworthy in a small matter , have authority over ten cities . ’
42019018	“ And the second came , saying , ‘ Master , your mina has earned five minas . ’
42019019	“ And he said to him also , ‘ And you – be over five cities . ’
42019020	“ And another came , saying , ‘ Master , here is your mina , which I kept laid up in a handkerchief .

42020001	And it came to be , on one of those days , as He was teaching the people in the Set-apart Place and bringing the Good News , that the chief priests and the scribes , together with the elders , came up
42020002	and spoke to Him , saying , “ Say to us , by what authority are You doing these ? Or who is he who gave You this authority ? ”

42020006	“ But if we say , ‘ From men , ’ all the people shall stone us , for they are persuaded that Yoḥanan was a prophet . ”

42020012	“ And again he sent a third . And they wounded him too and cast him out .

42021001	And looking up He saw the rich putting their gifts into the treasury ,

43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with Elohim , and the Word was Elohim .

43001003	All came to be through Him , and without Him not even one came to be that came to be .

43001005	And the light shines in the darkness , and the darkness has not overcome it .

43001007	This one came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all might believe through him .

43001009	He was the true Light , which enlightens every man , coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world came to be through Him , and the world did not know Him .
