43003030	“ It is right for Him to increase , but me to decrease .
43003031	“ He who comes from above is over all , he who is from the earth is of the earth and speaks of the earth . He who comes from the heaven is over all .
43003032	“ And what He has seen and heard , that He witnesses . And no one receives His witness .
43003033	“ He who receives His witness has set his seal that Elohim is true .
43003034	“ For He whom Elohim has sent speaks the Words of Elohim , for Elohim does not give the Spirit by measure .
43003035	“ The Father loves the Son , and has given all into His hand .
43003036	“ He who believes in the Son possesses everlasting life , but he who does not obey the Son shall not see life , but the wrath of Elohim remains on him . ”
43004001	So when the Master knew that the Pharisees had heard that יהושע made and immersed more taught ones than Yoḥanan –
43004002	although יהושע Himself did not immerse , but His taught ones –
43004003	He left Yehuḏah and went away again to Galil .
43004004	And He had to pass through Shomeron .
43004005	So He came to a city of Shomeron , called Sheḵem , near the piece of land Ya‛aqoḇ gave to his son Yosĕph .
43004006	And Ya‛aqoḇ’s fountain was there . So יהושע , being wearied from the journey , was sitting thus at the fountain . It was about the sixth hour .
43004007	A woman of Shomeron came to draw water . יהושע said to her , “ Give Me to drink . ”
43004008	For His taught ones had gone off into the city to buy food .
43004009	The woman of Shomeron therefore said to Him , “ How is it that You , being a Yehuḏite , ask a drink from me , a woman of Shomeron ? ” For Yehuḏim do not associate with Shomeronites .
43004010	יהושע answered and said to her , “ If you knew the gift of Elohim , and who it is who says to you , ‘ Give Me to drink , ’ you would have asked Him , and He would have given you living water . ”
43004011	The woman said to Him , “ Master , You have no vessel , and the well is deep . From where , then , do You have living water ?
43004012	“ Are You greater than our father Ya‛aqoḇ , who gave us the well , and drank from it himself , and his sons , and his cattle ? ”
43004013	יהושע answered and said to her , “ Everyone drinking of this water shall thirst again ,
43004014	but whoever drinks of the water I give him shall certainly never thirst . And the water that I give him shall become in him a fountain of water springing up into everlasting life . ”
43004015	The woman said to Him , “ Master , give me this water , so that I do not thirst , nor come here to draw . ”
43004016	יהושע said to her , “ Go , call your husband , and come here . ”
43004017	The woman answered and said , “ I have no husband . ” יהושע said to her , “ You have well said , ‘ I have no husband , ’
43004018	for you have had five husbands , and the one whom you now have is not your husband . What you have said is true . ”
43004019	The woman said to Him , “ Master , I see that You are a prophet .
43004020	“ Our fathers worshipped on this mountain , but you people say that in Yerushalayim is the place where one needs to worship . ”
43004021	יהושע said to her , “ Woman , believe Me , the hour is coming when you shall neither on this mountain , nor in Yerushalayim , worship the Father .
43004022	“ You worship what you do not know . We worship what we know , because the deliverance is of the Yehuḏim .
43004023	“ But the hour is coming , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and truth , for the Father also does seek such to worship Him .
43004024	“ Elohim is Spirit , and those who worship Him need to worship in spirit and truth . ”
43004025	The woman said to Him , “ I know that Messiah is coming , the One who is called Anointed . When that One comes , He shall announce to us all . ”
43004026	יהושע said to her , “ I who am speaking to you am He . ”
43004027	And upon this His taught ones came , and they were marvelling that He was speaking with a woman , however , no one said , “ What do You seek ? ” or , “ Why do You speak with her ? ”
43004028	The woman then left her water-jug , and went away to the city , and said to the men ,
43004029	“ Come , see a Man who told me all that I have done . Is this not the Messiah ? ”
43004030	They went out of the city and were coming to Him .
43004031	But in the meantime His taught ones were asking Him , saying , “ Rabbi , eat . ”
43004032	And He said to them , “ I have food to eat of which you do not know . ”
43004033	Then the taught ones said to each other , “ Did anyone bring Him food to eat ? ”
43004034	יהושע said to them , “ My food is to do the desire of Him who sent Me , and to accomplish His work .
43004035	“ Do you not say , ‘ There are still four months , and the harvest comes’ ? See , I say to you , lift up your eyes and see the fields , for they are white for harvest – already !
43004036	“ He who is reaping receives a reward , and gathers fruit for everlasting life , so that both he who is sowing and he who is reaping rejoice together .
43004037	“ For in this the word is true , ‘ One sows and another reaps . ’
43004038	“ I sent you to reap that for which you have not laboured . Others have laboured , and you have entered into their labours . ”
43004039	And many of the Shomeronites of that city believed in Him because of the word of the woman who witnessed , “ He told me all that I have done . ”
43004040	Therefore when the Shomeronites came to Him , they were asking Him to stay with them , and He stayed there two days .
43004041	And many more believed because of His word .
43004042	And they said to the woman , “ We no longer believe because of what you said , for we ourselves have heard , and we know that this is truly the Messiah , the Saviour of the world . ”
43004043	And after the two days He left there and went to Galil .
43004044	For יהושע Himself witnessed that a prophet is without appreciation in his own country .
43004045	Therefore when He came to Galil , the Galileans received Him , having seen all that He had done in Yerushalayim at the festival , for they also went to the festival .
43004046	Then יהושע came again to Qanah of Galil where He had made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman whose son was sick at Kephar Naḥum .
43004047	When he heard that יהושע had come from Yehuḏah into Galil , he went to Him and was asking Him to come down and heal his son , for he was about to die .
43004048	יהושע then said to him , “ If you people do not see signs and wonders , you do not believe at all . ”
43004049	The nobleman said to Him , “ Master , come down before my child dies ! ”
43004050	יהושע said to him , “ Go , your son lives . ” And the man believed the word that יהושע spoke to him , and went .
43004051	And while he was going down , his servants met him and reported , saying , “ Your son lives ! ”
43004052	He then asked from them the hour in which he became better , and they said to him , “ Yesterday at the seventh hour the inflammation left him . ”
43004053	Then the father knew that it was at the same hour in which יהושע said to him , “ Your son lives . ” And he himself believed , and all his household .
43004054	Again this was the second sign יהושע did , when He had come from Yehuḏah into Galil .
43005001	After this there was a festival of the Yehuḏim , and יהושע went up to Yerushalayim .
43005002	And in Yerushalayim at the Sheep Gate there is a pool , which is called in Heḇrew , Bĕyth Zatha , having five porches .
43005003	In these were lying a great number of those who were sick , blind , crippled , paralysed , waiting for the stirring of the water .
43005004	For a messenger was going down at a certain time into the pool and was stirring the water . Whoever stepped in first , then , after the stirring of the water , became well of whatever disease he had .
43005005	And a certain man was there who had a sickness thirty-eight years .
43005006	When יהושע saw him lying there , and knowing that he already had been a long time , He said to him , “ Do you wish to become well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered Him , “ Master , I have no man to put me into the pool when the water is stirred , but while I am coming , another steps down before me . ”
43005008	יהושע said to him , “ Rise , take up your bed and walk . ”
43005009	And immediately the man became well , and he took up his bed and was walking . Now it was Sabbath on that day .
43005010	The Yehuḏim therefore said to him who had been healed , “ It is the Sabbath , it is not right for you to take up the bed . ”
43005011	He answered them , “ He who made me well said to me , ‘ Take up your bed and walk . ’ ”
43005012	Therefore they asked him , “ Who is the Man who said to you , ‘ Take up your bed and walk’ ? ”
43005013	But the one who was healed did not know who it was , for יהושע had moved away , a crowd being in that place .
43005014	Afterward יהושע found him in the Set-apart Place , and said to him , “ See , you have been made well . Sin no more , so that no worse matter befalls you . ”
43005015	The man went away , and told the Yehuḏim that it was יהושע who made him well .
43005016	And because of this the Yehuḏim persecuted יהושע , and were seeking to kill Him , because He was doing these healings on the Sabbath .
43005017	But יהושע answered them , “ My Father works until now , and I work . ”
43005018	Because of this , then , the Yehuḏim were seeking all the more to kill Him , ‘ because not only was He breaking the Sabbath , but He also called Elohim His own Father , making Himself equal with Elohim . ’
43005019	Therefore יהושע responded and said to them , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , the Son is able to do none at all by Himself , but only that which He sees the Father doing , because whatever He does , the Son also likewise does .
43005020	“ For the Father loves the Son , and shows Him all that He Himself does . And greater works than these He is going to show Him , in order that you marvel .
43005021	“ For as the Father raises the dead and makes alive , even so the Son makes alive whom He wishes .
43005022	“ For the Father judges no one , but has given all the judgment to the Son ,
43005023	that all should value the Son even as they value the Father . He who does not value the Son does not value the Father who sent Him .
43005024	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , he who hears My word and believes in Him who sent Me possesses everlasting life , and does not come into judgment , but has passed from death into life .
43005025	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , the hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of Elohim . And those having heard shall live .
43005026	“ For as the Father possesses life in Himself , so He gave also to the Son to possess life in Himself ,
43005027	and He has given Him authority also to do judgment , because He is the Son of Aḏam .
43005028	“ Do not marvel at this , because the hour is coming in which all those in the tombs shall hear His voice ,
43005029	and shall come forth – those who have done good , to the resurrection of life , and those who have practised evil matters , to a resurrection of judgment .
43005030	“ Of Myself I am unable to do any matter . As I hear , I judge , and My judgment is righteous , because I do not seek My own desire , but the desire of the Father who sent Me .
43005031	“ If I bear witness of Myself , My witness is not true .
43005032	“ There is another who bears witness of Me , and I know that the witness which He witnesses of Me is true .
43005033	“ You have sent to Yoḥanan , and he bore witness to the truth .
43005034	“ But I do not receive witness from man , but I say this in order that you might be saved .
43005035	“ He was the burning and shining lamp , and for a while you wished to rejoice in his light .
43005036	“ But I have a greater witness than that of Yoḥanan , for the works that the Father gave Me to accomplish , the works that I do , bear witness of Me , that the Father has sent Me .
43005037	“ And the Father who sent Me , He bore witness of Me . You have neither heard His voice at any time , nor seen His form .
43005038	“ And you do not have His Word staying in you , because you do not believe Him whom He sent .
43005039	“ You search the Scriptures , because you think you possess everlasting life in them . And these are the ones that bear witness of Me .
43005040	“ But you do not desire to come to Me in order to possess life .
43005041	“ I do not receive esteem from men ,
43005042	but I know you , that you do not have the love of Elohim in you .
43005043	“ I have come in My Father’s Name and you do not receive Me , if another comes in his own name , him you would receive .
43005044	“ How are you able to believe , when you are receiving esteem from one another , and the esteem that is from the only Elohim you do not seek ?
43005045	“ Do not think that I shall accuse you to the Father . There is one who accuses you : Mosheh , in whom you have set your expectation .
43005046	“ For if you believed Mosheh , you would have believed Me , since he wrote about Me .
43005047	“ But if you do not believe his writings , how shall you believe My words ? ”
43006001	After this יהושע went away to the other side of the Sea of Galil , that is Lake Kinnereth .
43006002	And a large crowd was following Him , because they saw His signs which He did on those who were sick .
43006003	And יהושע went up on a mountain , and there He sat down with His taught ones .
43006004	And the Passover was near , the festival of the Yehuḏim .
43006005	Then יהושע , lifting up His eyes and seeing a large crowd coming toward Him , said to Philip , “ Where shall we buy bread for them to eat ? ”
43006006	And this He said , trying him , for He Himself knew what He would do .
43006007	Philip answered Him , “ Two hundred pieces of silver worth of bread is not sufficient for them , for every one of them to receive a little . ”
43006008	One of His taught ones , Andri , the brother of Shim‛on Kĕpha , said to Him ,
43006009	“ Here is a boy who has five barley loaves and two fishes , but what are these for so many ? ”
43006010	And יהושע said , “ Make the people sit down . ” Now there was much grass in the place , and the men , numbering about five thousand , sat down .
43006011	And יהושע took the loaves , and having given thanks He distributed them to the taught ones , and the taught ones to those sitting down . And the same with the fish , as much as they wished .
43006012	And when they were filled , He said to His taught ones , “ Gather the broken pieces that are left over , so that none gets wasted . ”
43006013	So they gathered them and filled twelve baskets with broken pieces of the five barley loaves which were left over by those who had eaten .
43006014	Then the men , having seen the sign that יהושע did , said , “ This is truly the Prophet who is coming to the world . ”
43006015	Then יהושע , knowing that they were about to come and seize Him , that they might make Him sovereign , withdrew again to the mountain , alone by Himself .
43006016	And when evening came , His taught ones went down to the sea ,
43006017	and entering into the boat , they were going over the sea toward Kephar Naḥum . And it had already become dark , and יהושע had not yet come to them .
43006018	And the sea was rising because a great wind was blowing .
43006019	When they had rowed about five or six kilometres , they saw יהושע walking on the sea and coming near the boat , and they were afraid .
43006020	And He said to them , “ It is I , do not be afraid . ”
43006021	They wished therefore to take Him into the boat , and at once the boat was at the land where they were going .
43006022	On the next day , the crowd that was standing on the other side of the sea saw that there was no other boat there except that one into which His taught ones had entered , and that יהושע had not entered the boat with His taught ones , but His taught ones went away alone –
43006023	but other boats came from Kinnereth , near the place where they ate bread after the Master had given thanks –
43006024	therefore when the crowd saw that יהושע was not there , nor His taught ones , they themselves also entered into the boats and came to Kephar Naḥum , seeking יהושע .
43006025	And having found Him on the other side of the sea , they asked Him , “ Rabbi , when did You come here ? ”
43006026	יהושע answered them and said , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , you seek Me , not because you saw signs , but because you ate of the loaves and were satisfied .
43006027	“ Do not labour for the food that is perishing , but for the food that is remaining to everlasting life , which the Son of Aḏam shall give you , for the Father , Elohim , has set His seal on Him . ”
43006028	So they said to Him , “ What should we do to work the works of Elohim ? ”
43006029	יהושע answered and said to them , “ This is the work of Elohim , that you believe in Him whom He sent . ”
43006030	So they said to Him , “ What sign then would You do , so that we see and believe You ? What would You do ?
43006031	“ Our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness , as it has been written , ‘ He gave them bread out of the heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Therefore יהושע said to them , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , Mosheh did not give you the bread out of the heaven , but My Father gives you the true bread out of the heaven .
43006033	“ For the bread of Elohim is He who comes down out of the heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	So they said to Him , “ Master , give us this bread always . ”
43006035	And יהושע said to them , “ I am the bread of life . He who comes to Me shall not get hungry at all , and he who believes in Me shall not get thirsty at all .
43006036	“ But I said to you that you have seen Me , and still do not believe .
43006037	“ All that the Father gives Me shall come to Me , and the one who comes to Me I shall by no means cast out .
43006038	“ Because I have come down out of the heaven , not to do My own desire , but the desire of Him who sent Me .
43006039	“ This is the desire of the Father who sent Me , that all He has given Me I should not lose of it , but should raise it in the last day .
43006040	“ And this is the desire of Him who sent Me , that everyone who sees the Son and believes in Him should possess everlasting life . And I shall raise him up in the last day . ”
43006041	Therefore the Yehuḏim were grumbling against Him , because He said , “ I am the bread which came down out of the heaven . ”
43006042	And they said , “ Is not this יהושע , the son of Yosĕph , whose father and mother we know ? How is it then that He says , ‘ I have come down out of the heaven’ ? ”
43006043	Then יהושע answered and said to them , “ Do not grumble with one another .
43006044	“ No one is able to come to Me unless the Father who sent Me draws him . And I shall raise him up in the last day .
43006045	“ It has been written in the prophets , ‘ And they shall all be taught by יהוה . ’ Everyone , then , who has heard from the Father , and learned , comes to Me .
43006046	“ Not that anyone has seen the Father , except He who is from Elohim – He has seen the Father .
43006047	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , he who believes in Me possesses everlasting life .
43006048	“ I am the bread of life .
43006049	“ Your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness and they died .
43006050	“ This is the bread which comes down out of the heaven , so that anyone might eat of it , and not die .
43006051	“ I am the living bread which came down out of the heaven . If anyone eats of this bread , he shall live forever . And indeed , the bread that I shall give is My flesh , which I shall give for the life of the world . ”
43006052	The Yehuḏim , therefore , were striving with one another , saying , “ How is this One able to give us His flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	יהושע therefore said to them , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Aḏam and drink His blood , you possess no life in yourselves .
43006054	“ He who eats My flesh and drinks My blood possesses everlasting life , and I shall raise him up in the last day .
43006055	“ For My flesh is truly food , and My blood is truly drink .
43006056	“ He who eats My flesh and drinks My blood stays in Me , and I in him .
43006057	“ As the living Father sent Me , and I live because of the Father , so he who feeds on Me shall live because of Me .
43006058	“ This is the bread which came down out of the heaven , not as your fathers ate the manna and died . He who eats this bread shall live forever . ”
43006059	He said this in a congregation , teaching in Kephar Naḥum .
43006060	Therefore many of His taught ones having heard , said , “ This word is hard , who is able to hear it ? ”
43006061	But יהושע knowing within Himself that His taught ones were grumbling about this , said to them , “ Does this make you stumble ?
43006062	“ What if you see the Son of Aḏam going up where He was before ?
43006063	“ It is the Spirit that gives life , the flesh does not profit at all . The words that I speak to you are Spirit and are life .
43006064	“ But there are some of you who do not believe . ” For יהושע knew from the beginning who they were who did not believe , and who would deliver Him up .
43006065	And He said , “ Because of this I have said to you that no one is able to come to Me unless it has been given to him by My Father . ”
43006066	From then on many of His taught ones withdrew and were not walking with Him any more .
43006067	יהושע therefore said to the twelve , “ Do you also wish to go away ? ”
43006068	Then Shim‛on Kĕpha answered Him , “ Master , to whom shall we go ? You possess words of everlasting life .
43006069	“ And we have believed , and we know that You are the Messiah , the Son of the living Elohim . ”
43006070	יהושע answered them , “ Have I not chosen you , the twelve , and one of you is a devil ? ”
43006071	He was now speaking of Yehuḏah from Qerioth , the son of Shim‛on , for he , one of the twelve , was about to deliver Him up .
43007001	And after this יהושע was walking in Galil , for He did not wish to walk in Yehuḏah , because the Yehuḏim were seeking to kill Him .
43007002	And the festival of the Yehuḏim was near , the Festival of Booths .
43007003	So His brothers said to Him , ‘ Get away from here and go into Yehuḏah , so that Your taught ones also see the works that You are doing .
43007004	“ For no one acts in secret while he himself seeks to be known openly . If You do these works , show Yourself to the world . ”
43007005	For even His brothers did not believe in Him .
43007006	יהושע therefore said to them , “ My time has not yet come , but your time is always ready .
43007007	“ It is impossible for the world to hate you , but it hates Me because I bear witness of it , that its works are wicked .
43007008	“ You go up to this festival . I am not yet going up to this festival , for My time has not yet been filled . ”
43007009	And having said this to them , He stayed in Galil .
43007010	But when His brothers had gone up to the festival , then He also went up , not openly , but as it were in secret .
43007011	The Yehuḏim , therefore , were seeking Him at the festival , and said , “ Where is He ? ”
43007012	And there was much grumbling about Him among the crowd . Some were saying , “ He is good , ” but others were saying , “ No , but He is leading the crowd astray . ”
43007013	However , no one spoke openly of Him for fear of the Yehuḏim .
43007014	And about the middle of the festival יהושע went up into the Set-apart Place , and He was teaching .
43007015	And the Yehuḏim were marvelling , saying , “ How does this Man know letters , not having learned ? ”
43007016	יהושע answered them and said , “ My teaching is not Mine , but His who sent Me .
43007017	“ If anyone desires to do His desire , he shall know concerning the teaching , whether it is from Elohim , or whether I speak from Myself .
43007018	“ He who speaks from himself is seeking his own esteem , but He who seeks the esteem of the One who sent Him is true , and no unrighteousness is in Him .
43007019	“ Did not Mosheh give you the Torah ? Yet not one of you does the Torah ! Why do you seek to kill Me ? ”
43007020	The crowd answered and said , “ You have a demon , who seeks to kill You ? ”
43007021	יהושע answered and said to them , “ I did one work , and you all marvel .
43007022	“ Because of this Mosheh has given you the circumcision – though it is not from Mosheh , but from the fathers – and you circumcise a man on the Sabbath .
43007023	“ If a man receives circumcision on the Sabbath , so that the Torah of Mosheh should not be broken , are you wroth with Me because I made a man entirely well on the Sabbath ?
43007024	“ Do not judge according to appearance , but judge with righteous judgment . ”
43007025	Therefore some of them from Yerushalayim said , “ Is this not He whom they are seeking to kill ?
43007026	“ And see ! He speaks boldly , and they say none at all to Him . Could it be that the rulers truly know that this is truly the Messiah ?
43007027	“ But we know where this One is from . And when the Messiah comes , no one knows where He is from . ”
43007028	יהושע therefore cried out in the Set-apart Place , teaching and saying , “ You both know Me , and you know where I am from . And I have not come of Myself , but He who sent Me is true , whom you do not know .
43007029	“ But I know Him , because I am from Him , and He sent Me . ”
43007030	So they were seeking to seize Him , but no one laid a hand on Him , because His hour had not yet come .
43007031	And many of the crowd believed in Him , and said , “ When the Messiah comes , shall He do more signs than these which this One did ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd muttering these matters concerning Him , and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to seize Him .
43007033	Therefore יהושע said to them , “ Yet a little while I am with you , then I go to Him who sent Me .
43007034	“ You shall seek Me and you shall not find Me , and where I am you are unable to come . ”
43007035	The Yehuḏim , therefore , said to themselves , “ Where is He about to go that we shall not find Him ? Is He about to go to the Dispersion among the Greeks , and to teach the Greeks ?
43007036	“ What is this word which He said , ‘ You shall seek Me and you shall not find Me , and where I am you are unable to come’ ? ”
43007037	And on the last day , the great day of the festival , יהושע stood and cried out , saying , “ If anyone thirsts , let him come to Me , and let him who believes in Me drink .
43007038	“ As the Scripture said , out of His innermost shall flow rivers of living water . ”
43007039	And this He said concerning the Spirit , which those believing in Him were about to receive , for the Set-apart Spirit was not yet given , because יהושע was not yet esteemed .
43007040	Many from the crowd , when they heard the word , then said , “ This truly is the Prophet . ”
43007041	Others said , “ This is the Messiah , ” but others said , “ Does the Messiah then come out of Galil ?
43007042	“ Did not the Scripture say that the Messiah comes from the seed of Dawiḏ and from the village of Bĕyth Leḥem , where Dawiḏ was ? ”
43007043	So a division came about among the people because of Him .
43007044	And some of them wished to take Him , but no one laid hands on Him .
43007045	The officers therefore came to the chief priests and Pharisees . And they said to them , “ Why did you not bring Him ? ”
43007046	The officers answered , “ Never has any man spoken like this Man ! ”
43007047	The Pharisees , therefore , answered them , “ Have you also been led astray ?
43007048	“ Has anyone of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed in Him ?
43007049	“ But this crowd that does not know the Torah is accursed . ”
43007050	Naḵdimon – he who came to יהושע by night , being one of them – said to them ,
43007051	“ Does our Torah judge the man unless it hears first from him and knows what he is doing ? ”
43007052	They answered and said to him , “ Are you also from Galil ? Search and see that no prophet has arisen out of Galil . ”
43007053	And each one went to his own house .
43008001	And יהושע went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	And at dawn He came again into the Set-apart Place , and all the people were coming to Him . And having sat down , He was teaching them .
43008003	And the scribes and Pharisees brought to Him a woman caught in adultery . And having set her in the midst ,
43008004	they said to Him , “ Teacher , this woman was caught in the act of adultery .
43008005	“ And in the Torah Mosheh commanded us that such should be stoned . What then do You say ? ”
43008006	And this they said , trying Him , so that they might accuse Him . But יהושע , bending down , wrote on the ground with the finger , as though He did not hear .
43008007	But as they kept on questioning Him , He straightened up and said to them , “ He who is without sin among you , let him be the first to throw a stone at her . ”
43008008	And bending down again , He wrote on the ground .
43008009	And when they heard it , being reproved by their conscience , went out one by one , beginning from the older ones until the last . And יהושע was left alone , and the woman standing in the middle .
43008010	And יהושע , straightening up and seeing no one but the woman , said to her , “ Woman , where are those accusers of yours ? Did no one condemn you ? ”
43008011	And she said , “ No one , Master . ” And יהושע said to her , “ Neither do I condemn you . Go and sin no more . ”
43008012	Therefore יהושע spoke to them again , saying , “ I am the light of the world . He who follows Me shall by no means walk in darkness , but possess the light of life . ”
43008013	The Pharisees , therefore , said to Him , “ You bear witness about Yourself , Your witness is not true . ”
43008014	יהושע answered and said to them , “ Even if I witness concerning Myself , My witness is true , for I know where I came from and where I am going . But you do not know from where I come , or where I go .
43008015	“ You judge according to the flesh , I judge no one .
43008016	“ But even if I do judge , My judgment is true , because I am not alone in it , but I and the Father who sent Me .
43008017	“ And in your Torah also , it has been written that the witness of two men is true .
43008018	“ I am One who witnesses concerning Myself , and the Father who sent Me witnesses concerning Me . ”
43008019	Therefore they said to Him , “ Where is Your Father ? ” יהושע answered , “ You know neither Me nor My Father . If you knew Me , you would have known My Father also . ”
43008020	These words יהושע spoke in the treasury , teaching in the Set-apart Place . And no one laid hands on Him , because His hour had not yet come .
43008021	Therefore יהושע said to them again , “ I am going away , and you shall seek Me , and you shall die in your sin . Where I go you are unable to come . ”
43008022	Then the Yehuḏim said , “ Shall He kill Himself , because He says , ‘ Where I go you are unable to come’ ? ”
43008023	And He said to them , “ You are from below , I am from above . You are of this world , I am not of this world .
43008024	“ Therefore I said to you that you shall die in your sins . For if you do not believe that I am He , you shall die in your sins . ”
43008025	Then they said to Him , “ Who are You ? ” And יהושע said to them , “ Altogether that which I even say to you !
43008026	“ I have much to say and to judge concerning you . But He who sent Me is true , and what I heard from Him , these Words I speak to the world . ”
43008027	They did not know that He spoke to them of the Father .
43008028	So יהושע said to them , “ When you lift up the Son of Aḏam , then you shall know that I am He , and that I do none at all of Myself , but as My Father taught Me , these words I speak .
43008029	“ And He who sent Me is with Me . The Father has not left Me alone , for I always do what pleases Him . ”
43008030	As He was speaking these words , many believed in Him .
43008031	So יהושע said to those Yehuḏim who believed Him , “ If you stay in My Word , you are truly My taught ones ,
43008032	and you shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free . ”
43008033	They answered Him , “ We are the seed of Aḇraham , and have been servants to no one at any time . How do you say , ‘ You shall become free’ ? ”
43008034	יהושע answered them , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , everyone doing sin is a servant of sin .
43008035	“ And the servant does not stay in the house forever – a son stays forever .
43008036	“ If , then , the Son makes you free , you shall be free indeed .
43008037	“ I know that you are the seed of Aḇraham , but you seek to kill Me , because My word has no place in you .
43008038	“ I speak what I have seen with My Father , and you do what you have heard from your father . ”
43008039	They answered and said to Him , “ Aḇraham is our father . ” יהושע said to them , “ If you were Aḇraham’s children , you would do the works of Aḇraham .
43008040	“ But now you seek to kill Me , a Man who has spoken to you the truth which I heard from Elohim . Aḇraham did not do this .
43008041	“ You do the works of your father . ” Then they said to Him , “ We were not born of whoring , we have one Father : Elohim . ”
43008042	יהושע said to them , “ If Elohim were your Father , you would love Me , for I came forth from Elohim , and am here . For I have not come of Myself , but He sent Me .
43008043	“ Why do you not know what I say ? Because you are unable to hear My Word .
43008044	“ You are of your father the devil , and the desires of your father you wish to do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and has not stood in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaks the lie , he speaks of his own , for he is a liar and the father of it .
43008045	“ And because I speak the truth , you do not believe Me .
43008046	“ Who of you proves Me wrong concerning sin ? And if I speak the truth , why do you not believe Me ?
43008047	“ He who is of Elohim hears the Words of Elohim , therefore you do not hear because you are not of Elohim . ”
43008048	The Yehuḏim answered and said to Him , “ Do we not say well that You are a Shomeronite and have a demon ? ”
43008049	יהושע answered , “ I do not have a demon , but I value My Father , and you do not value Me .
43008050	“ And I do not seek My own esteem , there is One who is seeking and is judging .
43008051	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , if anyone guards My Word he shall never see death at all . ”
43008052	The Yehuḏim said to Him , “ Now we know that You have a demon ! Aḇraham died , and the prophets . And You say , ‘ If anyone guards My Word he shall never taste death at all . ’
43008053	“ Are You greater than our father Aḇraham , who died ? And the prophets died . Whom do You make Yourself ? ”
43008054	יהושע answered , “ If I esteem Myself , My esteem is none at all . It is My Father who esteems Me , of whom you say that He is your Elohim .
43008055	“ And you have not known Him , but I know Him . And if I say , ‘ I do not know Him , ’ I shall be like you , a liar . But I do know Him and I guard His Word .
43008056	“ Your father Aḇraham was glad that he should see My day , and he saw it and did rejoice . ”
43008057	The Yehuḏim , therefore , said to Him , “ You are not yet fifty years old , and have You seen Aḇraham ? ”
43008058	יהושע said to them , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , before Aḇraham came to be , I am . ”
43008059	Therefore they picked up stones to throw at Him , but יהושע was hidden and went out of the Set-apart Place , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
43009001	And passing by , He saw a man , blind from birth .
43009002	And His taught ones asked Him , saying , “ Rabbi , who sinned , this man or his parents , that he should be born blind ? ”
43009003	יהושע answered , “ Neither this man nor his parents sinned , but that the works of Elohim might be made manifest in him .
43009004	“ It is necessary for Me to work the works of Him who sent Me while it is day – night is coming , when no one is able to work .
43009005	“ While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	Having said this , He spat on the ground and made clay with the saliva , and applied the clay to the eyes of the blind man .
43009007	And He said to him , “ Go , wash in the pool of Shiloaḥ ” ( which means Sent ) . So he went and washed , and came seeing .
43009008	Therefore the neighbours and those who saw him before , that he was blind , said , “ Is not this he who was sitting and begging ? ”
43009009	Others said , “ This is he . ” Others said , “ He is like him . ” He said , “ I am . ”
43009010	So they said to him , “ How were your eyes opened ? ”
43009011	He answered and said , “ A Man called יהושע made clay and applied it to my eyes and said to me , ‘ Go to the pool of Shiloaḥ and wash . ’ And I went and washed , and I received sight . ”
43009012	And they said to him , “ Where is He ? ” He said , “ I do not know . ”
43009013	They brought to the Pharisees the one who was once blind .
43009014	Now it was a Sabbath when יהושע made the clay and opened his eyes .
43009015	Therefore the Pharisees also asked him again how he had received his sight . He said to them , “ He put clay on my eyes , and I washed , and I see . ”
43009016	Therefore some of the Pharisees said , “ This Man is not from Elohim , because He does not guard the Sabbath . ” Others said , “ How is a man who is a sinner able to do such miracles ? ” And there was a division among them .
43009017	So they said to the blind one again , “ What do you say about Him because He opened your eyes ? ” And he said , “ He is a prophet . ”
43009018	However , the Yehuḏim did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind and received his sight , till they called the parents of him who had received his sight .
43009019	And they asked them , saying , “ Is this your son , who you say was born blind ? How then does he now see ? ”
43009020	His parents answered them and said , “ We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind ,
43009021	but how he now sees we do not know , or who opened his eyes we do not know . He is of age , ask him , he shall speak concerning himself . ”
43009022	His parents said this because they were afraid of the Yehuḏim , for the Yehuḏim had already agreed that if anyone confessed that He was Messiah , he should be put out of the congregation .
43009023	Because of this his parents said , “ He is of age , ask him . ”
43009024	So for the second time they called the man who was blind , and said to him , “ Give esteem to Elohim , we know that this Man is a sinner . ”
43009025	Then he answered and said , “ Whether He is a sinner , I do not know . I only know that I was blind , now I see . ”
43009026	And they asked him once more , “ What did He do to you ? How did He open your eyes ? ”
43009027	He answered them , “ I have told you already , and you did not hear . Why do you wish to hear it again ? Do you wish to become His taught ones too ? ”
43009028	Then they abused him and said , “ You are His taught one , but we are taught ones of Mosheh .
43009029	“ We know that Elohim has spoken to Mosheh , but this One , we do not know where He is from . ”
43009030	The man answered and said to them , “ Why , this is a wonder ! You do not know where He is from , yet He opened my eyes !
43009031	“ And we know that Elohim does not hear sinners . But if anyone fears Elohim and does His desire , He hears him .
43009032	“ From of old it has never been heard that anyone opened the eyes of one who was born blind .
43009033	“ If this One were not from Elohim , He could have done none at all . ”
43009034	They answered and said to him , “ You were completely born in sins – and are you teaching us ? ” And they cast him out .
43009035	יהושע heard that they had cast him out , and when He had found him , He said to him , “ Do you believe in the Son of Elohim ? ”
43009036	He answered and said , “ Who is He , Master , that I might believe in Him ? ”
43009037	And יהושע said to him , “ You have both seen Him and He who speaks with you is He . ”
43009038	And he said , “ Master , I believe , ” and bowed before Him .
43009039	And יהושע said , “ For judgment I have come into this world , that those not seeing might see , and those seeing might become blind . ”
43009040	And those of the Pharisees who were with Him heard these words , and said to Him , “ Are we blind , too ? ”
43009041	יהושע said to them , “ If you were blind , you would have no sin , but now you say , ‘ We see , ’ therefore your sin remains .
43010001	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , he who does not enter through the door into the sheepfold , but climbs up by another way , that one is a thief and a robber .
43010002	“ But he who enters through the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	“ The doorkeeper opens for him , and the sheep hear his voice . And he calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	“ And when he has brought out his own sheep , he goes before them . And the sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	“ And they shall by no means follow a stranger , but shall flee from him , because they do not know the voice of strangers . ”
43010006	יהושע used this figure of speech , but they did not know what He had been saying to them .
43010007	יהושע therefore said to them again , “ Truly , truly , I say to you , I am the door of the sheep .
43010008	“ All who came before Me are thieves and robbers , but the sheep did not hear them .
43010009	“ I am the door . Whoever enters through Me , he shall be saved , and shall go in and shall go out and find pasture .
43010010	“ The thief does not come except to steal , and to slaughter , and to destroy . I have come that they might possess life , and that they might possess it beyond measure .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd lays down His life for the sheep .
43010012	“ But the hireling , and not being a shepherd , one who does not own the sheep , sees the wolf coming and leaves the sheep and flees . And the wolf snatches the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	“ Now the hireling flees because he is a hireling and is not concerned about the sheep .
43010014	“ I am the good shepherd . And I know Mine , and Mine know Me ,
43010015	even as the Father knows Me , and I know the Father . And I lay down My life for the sheep .
43010016	“ And other sheep I have which are not of this fold – I have to bring them as well , and they shall hear My voice , and there shall be one flock , one shepherd .
43010017	“ Because of this the Father loves Me , because I lay down My life , in order to receive it again .
43010018	“ No one takes it from Me , but I lay it down of Myself . I have authority to lay it down , and I have authority to receive it again . This command I have received from My Father . ”
43010019	Again there came a division among the Yehuḏim because of these words ,
43010020	and many of them said , “ He has a demon and is mad , why do you listen to Him ? ”
43010021	Others said , “ These are not the words of one possessed by a demon . Is a demon able to open the eyes of the blind ? ”
43010022	At that time the Ḥanukkah came to be in Yerushalayim , and it was winter .
43010023	And יהושע was walking in the Set-apart Place , in the porch of Shelomoh .
43010024	So the Yehuḏim surrounded Him and said to Him , “ How long do You keep us in suspense ? If You are the Messiah , say to us plainly . ”
43010025	יהושע answered them , “ I have told you , and you do not believe . The works that I do in My Father’s Name , they bear witness concerning Me .
43010026	“ But you do not believe , because you are not of My sheep , as I said to you .
43010027	“ My sheep hear My voice , and I know them , and they follow Me .
43010028	“ And I give them everlasting life , and they shall by no means ever perish , and no one shall snatch them out of My hand .
43010029	“ My Father , who has given them to Me , is greater than all . And no one is able to snatch them out of My Father’s hand .
43010030	“ I and My Father are one . ”
43010031	Again the Yehuḏim picked up stones to stone Him .
43010032	יהושע answered them , “ Many good works I have shown you from My Father . Because of which of these works do you stone Me ? ”
43010033	The Yehuḏim answered Him , saying , “ We do not stone You for a good work , but for blasphemy , and because You , being a Man , make Yourself Elohim . ”
43010034	יהושע answered them , “ Is it not written in your own Torah , ‘ I said , “ You are elohim ” ’ ?
43010035	“ If He called them elohim , to whom the word of Elohim came – and it is impossible for the Scripture to be broken –
43010036	do you say of Him whom the Father set apart and sent into the world , ‘ You are blaspheming , ’ because I said , ‘ I am the Son of Elohim’ ?
43010037	“ If I do not do the works of My Father , do not believe Me ;
43010038	but if I do , though you do not believe Me , believe the works , so that you know and believe that the Father is in Me , and I in Him . ”
43010039	Therefore they were seeking again to seize Him , but He went forth out of their hand ,
43010040	and went once more to the other side of the Yardĕn to the place where Yoḥanan was immersing at first , and there He stayed .
43010041	And many came to Him and said , “ Yoḥanan indeed did no sign , yet all that Yoḥanan said about this Man was true . ”
43010042	And many believed in Him there .
43011001	And a certain one was sick , El‛azar from Bĕyth Anyah , the village of Miryam and her sister Martha .
43011002	( Now it was Miryam who anointed the Master with perfume and wiped His feet with her hair , whose brother El‛azar was sick ) .
43011003	Therefore the sisters sent to Him , saying , “ Master , see , he whom You love is sick . ”
43011004	But when יהושע heard , He said , “ This sickness is not unto death , but for the esteem of Elohim , so that the Son of Elohim might be esteemed by it . ”
43011005	Now יהושע loved Martha and her sister and El‛azar .
43011006	Therefore , when He heard that he was sick , then indeed He stayed at the place where He was , two more days .
43011007	Then after this He said to the taught ones , “ Let us go back to Yehuḏah . ”
43011008	The taught ones said to Him , “ Rabbi , the Yehuḏim were but now seeking to stone You , and are You going back there ? ”
43011009	יהושע answered , “ Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If anyone walks in the day , he does not stumble , because he sees the light of this world .
43011010	“ But if anyone walks in the night , he stumbles , because the light is not in him . ”
43011011	He said this , and after that He said to them , “ Our friend El‛azar has fallen asleep , but I am going there , to wake him up . ”
43011012	Therefore the taught ones said to Him , “ Master , if he has fallen asleep he shall recover . ”
43011013	But יהושע had spoken about his death , whereas they thought that He spoke of taking rest in sleep .
43011014	So then יהושע said to them plainly , “ El‛azar has died .
43011015	“ And for your sake I am glad I was not there , in order for you to believe . But let us go to him . ”
43011016	T’oma , who is called the Twin , then said to his fellow taught ones , “ Let us also go , so that we die with Him . ”
43011017	Therefore , when יהושע arrived , He found that he had already been four days in the tomb .
43011018	Now Bĕyth Anyah was near Yerushalayim , about three kilometres away .
43011019	And many of the Yehuḏim had come to Martha and Miryam , to comfort them concerning their brother .
43011020	Martha , then , when she heard that יהושע was coming , met Him , but Miryam was sitting in the house .
43011021	Martha , then , said to יהושע , “ Master , if You had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	“ But even now I know that whatever You might ask of Elohim , Elohim shall give You . ”
43011023	יהושע said to her , “ Your brother shall rise again . ”
43011024	Martha said to Him , “ I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day . ”
43011025	יהושע said to her , “ I am the resurrection and the life . He who believes in Me , though he dies , he shall live .
43011026	“ And everyone that is living and believing in Me shall never die at all . Do you believe this ? ”
43011027	She said to Him , “ Yea , Master , I believe that You are the Messiah , the Son of Elohim , who is coming into the world . ”
43011028	And having said this she went away and called her sister Miryam secretly , saying , “ The Teacher is here and calls you . ”
43011029	When she heard , she rose up quickly and came to Him .
43011030	And יהושע had not yet come into the village , but was in the place where Martha met Him .
43011031	Therefore the Yehuḏim who were with her in the house , and were comforting her , when they saw that Miryam rose up quickly and went out , followed her , saying , “ She is going to the tomb to weep there . ”
43011032	Miryam , therefore , when she came where יהושע was , and saw Him , she fell down at His feet , saying to Him , “ Master , if You had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	יהושע , therefore , when He saw her weeping , and the Yehuḏim who came with her weeping , He groaned in the spirit and was troubled ,
43011034	and said , “ Where have you laid him ? ” They said to Him , “ Master , come and see . ”
43011035	יהושע wept .
43011036	The Yehuḏim therefore said , “ See how He loved him ! ”
43011037	And some of them said , “ Was this One , who opened the eyes of the blind , not also able to prevent this one from dying ? ”
43011038	יהושע , therefore , again groaning in Himself , came to the tomb . Now it was a cave , and a stone lay against it .
43011039	יהושע said , “ Take away the stone . ” Martha , the sister of him who had died , said to Him , “ Master , already he smells , for it is four days . ”
43011040	יהושע said to her , “ Did I not say to you that if you believe , you shall see the esteem of Elohim ? ”
43011041	So they took away the stone where the dead man was laid . And יהושע lifted up His eyes and said , “ Father , I thank You that You have heard Me .
43011042	“ And I know that You always hear Me , but because of the crowd standing by I said this , in order that they believe that You sent Me . ”
43011043	And when He had said this , He cried with a loud voice , “ El‛azar , come out ! ”
43011044	And he who died came out bound feet and hands with wrappings , and his face was wrapped with a cloth . יהושע said to them , “ Loosen him , and let him go . ”
43011045	Therefore many of the Yehuḏim who had come to Miryam , and had seen what יהושע did , believed in Him .
43011046	But some of them went away to the Pharisees and told them what יהושע did .
43011047	So the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered a council and said , “ What shall we do ? Because this Man does many signs .
43011048	“ If we let Him alone like this , they all shall believe in Him , and the Romans shall come and take away from us both our place and nation . ”
43011049	And one of them , Qayapha , being high priest that year , said to them , “ You know naught ,
43011050	neither do you consider that it is better for us that one man die for the people than that the entire nation should perish . ”
43011051	But he did not say this from himself , but being high priest that year he prophesied that יהושע was about to die for the nation ,
43011052	and not for the nation only , but to gather together into one the children of Elohim who were scattered abroad .
43011053	So from that day on they plotted to kill Him .
43011054	יהושע therefore no longer went openly among the Yehuḏim , but went from there into the country near the wilderness , to a city called Ephrayim , and remained there with His taught ones .
43011055	Now the Passover of the Yehuḏim was near , and many went from the country up to Yerushalayim before the Passover , to set themselves apart .
43011056	And so they were seeking יהושע , and spoke among one another , standing in the Set-apart Place , “ What do you think ? Is He not coming to the festival at all ? ”
43011057	And both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a command , that if anyone knew where He was , he should disclose it , in order for them to seize Him .
43012001	Accordingly יהושע , six days before the Passover , came to Bĕyth Anyah , where El‛azar was , who had died , whom He raised from the dead .
43012002	So they made Him a supper there , and Martha served , while El‛azar was one of those who sat at the table with Him .
43012003	Then Miryam took a pound of costly perfume of nard , anointed the feet of יהושע , and wiped His feet with her hair . And the house was filled with the fragrance of the perfume .
43012004	Then one of His taught ones , Yehuḏah from Qerioth , son of Shim‛on , who was about to deliver Him up , said ,
43012005	“ Why was this perfume not sold for three hundred pieces of silver and given to the poor ? ”
43012006	And he said this , not because he was concerned about the poor , but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and he used to take what was put in it .
43012007	יהושע then said , “ Let her alone , she has kept this for the day of My burial .
43012008	“ For the poor you have with you always , but Me you do not have always . ”
43012009	Then a great crowd of the Yehuḏim learned that He was there . And they came , not on account of יהושע only , but also to see El‛azar , whom He had raised from the dead .
43012010	And the chief priests resolved to kill El‛azar as well ,
43012011	because on account of him many of the Yehuḏim went away and believed in יהושע .
43012012	On the next day a great crowd who had come to the festival , when they heard that יהושע was coming to Yerushalayim ,
43012013	took the branches of palm trees and went out to meet Him , and were crying out , “ Hoshia-na ! Blessed is He who is coming in the Name of יהוה , the Sovereign of Yisra’ĕl ! ”
43012014	And יהושע , having found a young donkey , sat on it , as it has been written :
43012015	“ Do not fear , daughter of Tsiyon , see , your Sovereign is coming , sitting on the colt of a donkey . ”
43012016	At first His taught ones did not understand this . But when יהושע was esteemed , then they remembered that this was written about Him and that they had done this to Him .
43012017	Therefore the crowd , who were with Him when He called El‛azar out of his tomb and raised him from the dead , were bearing witness .
43012018	On account of this the crowd also met Him , because they heard that He had done this sign .
43012019	The Pharisees then said among themselves , “ You see how you are getting nowhere at all . Look , the world has gone after Him ! ”
43012020	And there were certain Greeks among those coming up to worship at the festival .
43012021	These then came to Philip , who was from Bĕyth Tsaiḏa of Galil , and were asking him , saying , “ Master , we wish to see יהושע . ”
43012022	Philip came and told Andri , and in turn Andri and Philip told יהושע .
43012023	And יהושע answered them , saying , “ The hour has come for the Son of Aḏam to be esteemed .
43012024	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , unless a grain of wheat falls into the ground and dies , it remains alone . But if it dies , it bears much fruit .
43012025	“ He who loves his life shall lose it , and he who hates his life in this world shall preserve it for everlasting life .
43012026	“ If anyone serves Me , let him follow Me . And where I am , there My servant also shall be . If anyone serves Me , the Father shall value him .
43012027	“ Now I Myself am troubled , and what shall I say ? ‘ Father , save Me from this hour’ ? But for this reason I came to this hour .
