43018035	Pilate answered , “ Am I a Yehuḏite ? Your own nation and the chief priests have delivered You to me . What did You do ? ”
43018036	יהושע answered , “ My reign is not of this world . If My reign were of this world , My servants would fight , so that I should not be delivered to the Yehuḏim . But now My reign is not from here . ”
43018037	Then Pilate said to Him , “ You are a sovereign , then ? ” יהושע answered , “ You say it , because I am a sovereign . For this I was born , and for this I have come into the world , that I should bear witness to the truth . Everyone who is of the truth hears My voice . ”
43018038	Pilate said to Him , “ What is truth ? ” And when he had said this , he went out again to the Yehuḏim , and said to them , “ I find no guilt in Him .
43018039	“ But you have a habit that I shall release someone to you at the Passover . Do you wish , then , that I release to you the Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ? ”
43018040	Then they all shouted again , saying , “ Not this One , but Barabba ! ” And Barabba was a robber .
43019001	Then , therefore , Pilate took יהושע and flogged Him .
43019002	And the soldiers plaited a crown of thorns and placed it on His head , and they put a purple robe on Him ,
43019003	and came to Him and said , “ Greetings , Sovereign of the Yehuḏim ! ” And they slapped Him in the face .
43019004	And Pilate went outside again , and said to them , “ See , I am bringing Him out to you , to let you know that I find no guilt in Him . ”
43019005	Then יהושע came outside , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . And Pilate said to them , “ See the Man ! ”
43019006	So when the chief priests and officers saw Him , they shouted , saying , “ Impale ! Impale ! ” Pilate said to them , “ You take Him and impale Him , for I find no guilt in Him . ”
43019007	The Yehuḏim answered him , “ We have a law , and according to our law He ought to die , for He has made Himself the Son of Elohim . ”
43019008	So when Pilate heard this word , he was more afraid ,
43019009	and went back into the palace , and asked יהושע , “ Where are You from ? ” But יהושע gave him no answer .
43019010	Then Pilate said to Him , “ Do You not speak to me ? Do You not know that I possess authority to impale You , and I possess authority to release You ? ”
43019011	יהושע answered , “ You would possess no authority against Me if it were not given you from above . Because of this , he who delivered Me to you has greater sin . ”
43019012	From then on Pilate was seeking to release Him , but the Yehuḏim shouted , saying , “ If you release this One , you are not Caesar’s friend . Everyone who makes himself a sovereign , does speak against Caesar . ”
43019013	Therefore , when Pilate heard these words , he brought יהושע out and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called Pavement , but in Heḇrew , Gabbatha .
43019014	And it was the Preparation Day of the Passover week , and about the sixth hour . And he said to the Yehuḏim , “ See your Sovereign ! ”
43019015	But they shouted , “ Away , away , impale Him ! ” Pilate said to them , “ Shall I impale your Sovereign ? ” The chief priests answered , “ We have no sovereign except Caesar ! ”
43019016	At that time , then , he delivered Him to them to be impaled . And they took יהושע and led Him away .
43019017	And bearing His stake , He went out to the so-called Place of a Skull , which is called in Heḇrew , Golgotha ,
43019018	where they impaled Him , and two others with Him , one on this side and one on that side , and יהושע in the middle .
43019019	And Pilate wrote a title too , and put it on the stake , and it was written : יהושע OF NATSARETH , THE SOVEREIGN OF THE YEHUḎIM .
43019020	Many of the Yehuḏim therefore read this title , for the place where יהושע was impaled was near the city , and it was written in Heḇrew , in Greek , in Roman .
43019021	So the chief priests of the Yehuḏim said to Pilate , “ Do not write , ‘ The Sovereign of the Yehuḏim , ’ but , ‘ He said , “ I am the Sovereign of the Yehuḏim . ” ’ ”
43019022	Pilate answered , “ What I have written , I have written . ”
43019023	Then the soldiers , when they had impaled יהושע , took His outer garments and made four parts , to each soldier a part , and the inner garment . But the inner garment was without seam , woven from the top in one piece .
43019024	So they said to each other , “ Let us not tear it , but cast lots for it – whose it shall be , ” in order that the Scripture might be filled which says , “ They divided My garments among them , and for My clothing they cast lots . ” The soldiers therefore indeed did this .
43019025	And by the stake of יהושע stood His mother , and His mother’s sister , Miryam the wife of Qlophah , and Miryam from Mag̅dala .
43019026	Then יהושע , seeing His mother and the taught one whom He loved standing by , He said to His mother , “ Woman , see your son ! ”
43019027	Then to the taught one He said , “ See , your mother ! ” And from that hour that taught one took her to his own home .
43019028	After this , יהושע , knowing that all had been accomplished , in order that the Scripture might be accomplished , said , “ I thirst ! ”
43019029	A bowl of sour wine stood there , and they filled a sponge with sour wine , put it on hyssop , and held it to His mouth .
43019030	So when יהושע took the sour wine He said , “ It has been accomplished ! ” And bowing His head , He gave up His spirit .
43019031	Therefore , since it was the Preparation Day , that the bodies should not remain on the stake on the Sabbath – for that Sabbath was a high one – the Yehuḏim asked Pilate to have their legs broken , and that they be taken away .
43019032	Therefore the soldiers came and broke the legs of the first , and of the other who was impaled with Him ,
43019033	but when they came to יהושע and saw that He was already dead , they did not break His legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers pierced His side with a spear , and instantly blood and water came out .
43019035	And he who has seen has witnessed , and his witness is true . And he knows that he is speaking the truth , in order that you might believe .
43019036	For this took place in order for the Scripture to be filled : “ Not one of His bones shall be broken . ”
43019037	And again another Scripture says , “ They shall look on Him whom they pierced . ”
43019038	And after this , Yosĕph of Ramathayim , being a taught one of יהושע , but secretly , for fear of the Yehuḏim , asked Pilate that he might take the body of יהושע , and Pilate gave permission . Therefore he came and took the body of יהושע .
43019039	And Naḵdimon , who at first came to יהושע by night , also came , bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about a hundred pounds .
43019040	Then they took the body of יהושע , and bound it in linen wrappings with the spices , as was the habit of the Yehuḏim for burial .
43019041	And at the place where He was impaled there was a garden , and in the garden a fresh tomb in which no one had yet been laid .
43019042	There , then , because of the Preparation Day of the Yehuḏim , they laid יהושע , because the tomb was near .
43020001	And on the first day of the week Miryam from Mag̅dala came early to the tomb , while it was still dark , and saw that the stone had been removed from the tomb .
43020002	So she ran and came to Shim‛on Kĕpha , and to the other taught one whom יהושע loved , and said to them , “ They have taken the Master out of the tomb , and we do not know where they laid Him . ”
43020003	Then Kĕpha and the other taught one went out , and they were going to the tomb ,
43020004	and the two were running together , but the other taught one outran Kĕpha and came to the tomb first .
43020005	And stooping down he saw the linen wrappings lying , but he did not go in .
43020006	Then Shim‛on Kĕpha came , following him , and went into the tomb . And he saw the linen wrappings lying ,
43020007	and the cloth which had been on His head , not lying with the linen wrappings , but folded up in a place by itself .
43020008	So , then , the other taught one , who came to the tomb first , also went in . And he saw and believed .
43020009	For they did not yet know the Scripture , that He has to rise again from the dead .
43020010	Therefore the taught ones went away again , by themselves .
43020011	But Miryam was standing outside by the tomb weeping . Then as she wept , she stooped down to the tomb ,
43020012	and saw two messengers in white sitting , one at the head and the other at the feet , where the body of יהושע had been laid .
43020013	And they said to her , “ Woman , why do you weep ? ” She said to them , “ Because they took away my Master , and I do not know where they laid Him . ”
43020014	And having said this , she turned around and saw יהושע standing , but she did not know that it was יהושע .
43020015	יהושע said to her , “ Woman , why do you weep ? Whom do you seek ? ” Thinking He was the gardener , she said to Him , “ Master , if You have carried Him away , say to me where You put Him , and I shall take Him away . ”
43020016	יהושע said to her , “ Miryam ! ” She turned and said to Him , “ Rabboni ! ” ( which means Teacher ) .
43020017	יהושע said to her , “ Do not hold on to Me , for I have not yet ascended to My Father . But go to My brothers and say to them , ‘ I am ascending to My Father and your Father , and to My Elohim and your Elohim . ’ ”
43020018	Miryam from Mag̅dala came announcing to the taught ones that she had seen the Master , and that He had told her this .
43020019	When therefore it was evening on that day , the first day of the week , and when the doors were shut where the taught ones met , for fear of the Yehuḏim , יהושע came and stood in the midst , and said to them , “ Peace to you . ”
43020020	And having said this , He showed them His hands and His side . The taught ones therefore rejoiced when they saw the Master .
43020021	Then יהושע said to them again , “ Peace to you ! As the Father has sent Me , I also send you . ”
43020022	And having said this , He breathed on them , and said to them , “ Receive the Set-apart Spirit .
43020023	“ If you forgive the sins of any , they are forgiven them ; if you retain the sins of any , they have been retained . ”
43020024	But T’oma , called the Twin , one of the twelve , was not with them when יהושע came ,
43020025	so the other taught ones said to him , “ We have seen the Master . ” But he said to them , “ Unless I see in His hands the mark of the nails , and put my finger into the imprint of the nails , and put my hand into His side , I shall by no means believe . ”
43020026	And after eight days His taught ones were again inside , and T’oma with them . יהושע came , the doors having been shut , and He stood in the midst , and said , “ Peace to you ! ”
43020027	Then He said to T’oma , “ Bring your finger here , and see My hands . And bring your hand and put it into My side – and do not be unbelieving , but believing . ”
43020028	And T’oma answered and said to Him , “ My Master and my Elohim ! ”
43020029	יהושע said to him , “ T’oma , because you have seen Me , you have believed . Blessed are those who have not seen and have believed . ”
43020030	There were indeed many other signs that יהושע did in the presence of His taught ones , which are not written in this book ,
43020031	but these have been written so that you believe that יהושע is the Messiah , the Son of Elohim , and that , believing , you might possess life in His Name .
43021001	After this יהושע manifested Himself again to the taught ones at the Sea of Kinnereth , and He manifested this way :
43021002	Shim‛on Kĕpha , and T’oma called the Twin , and Nethanĕ’l of Qanah in Galil , the sons of Zaḇdai , and two others of His taught ones were together .
43021003	Shim‛on Kĕpha said to them , “ I am going to fish . ” They said to him , “ We are also coming with you . ” They went out and immediately entered into the boat . And that night they caught none at all .
43021004	But when it became early morning , יהושע stood on the beach . However , the taught ones did not know that it was יהושע .
43021005	Then יהושע said to them , “ Children , have you any food ? ” They answered Him , “ No . ”
43021006	And He said to them , “ Throw the net on the right side of the boat , and you shall find . ” So they threw , and they were no longer able to draw it in because of the large number of fish .
43021007	That taught one whom יהושע loved then said to Kĕpha , “ It is the Master ! ” Then Shim‛on Kĕpha , hearing that it was the Master , put on his outer garment – for he was stripped – and plunged into the sea .
43021008	And the other taught ones came in the little boat – for they were not far from land , but about two hundred cubits – dragging the net with fish .
43021009	So when they had come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid on it , and bread .
43021010	יהושע said to them , “ Bring some of the fish which you have now caught . ”
43021011	Shim‛on Kĕpha went up and dragged the net to land , filled with one hundred and fifty-three big fishes . And though there were so many , the net was not broken .
43021012	יהושע said to them , “ Come , have breakfast . ” And not one of the taught ones had the courage to ask Him , “ Who are You ? , ” knowing that it was the Master .
43021013	יהושע came and took the bread and gave it to them , and the same with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time יהושע was manifested to His taught ones after He was raised from the dead .
43021015	When , therefore , they had eaten breakfast , יהושע said to Shim‛on Kĕpha , “ Shim‛on , son of Yonah , do you love Me more than these ? ” He said to Him , “ Yea , Master , You know that I love You . ” He said to him , “ Feed My lambs . ”
43021016	He said to him again , the second time , “ Shim‛on , son of Yonah , do you love Me ? ” He said to Him , “ Yea , Master , You know that I love You . ” He said to him , “ Shepherd My sheep . ”
43021017	He said to him the third time , “ Shim‛on , son of Yonah , do you love Me ? ” Kĕpha was sad because He said to him the third time , “ Do you love Me ? ” And he said to Him , “ Master , You know all , You know that I love You . ” יהושע said to him , “ Feed My sheep .
43021018	“ Truly , truly , I say to you , when you were younger you girded yourself and walked where you wished , but when you are old you shall stretch out your hands , and another shall gird you and bring you where you do not wish . ”
43021019	Now this He said , signifying by what death he would esteem Elohim . And having said this , He said to him , “ Follow Me . ”
43021020	And Kĕpha , turning around , saw the taught one whom יהושע loved following , who also had leaned on His breast at the supper , and said , “ Master , who is the one who is delivering You up ? ”
43021021	Seeing him , Kĕpha said to יהושע , “ But Master , what about this one ? ”
43021022	יהושע said to him , “ If I wish him to remain till I come , what is that to you ? You follow Me . ”
43021023	Therefore this word went out among the brothers that this taught one would not die . However , יהושע did not say to him that he would not die , but , “ If I desire him to remain until I come , what is it to you ? ”
43021024	This is the taught one who bears witness about these matters , and wrote these matters . And we know that his witness is true .
43021025	Now there is much else that יהושע did . If every one of them were written down , I think that the world itself would not contain the written books . Amĕn .
44001001	The first account I made , O Theophilos , of all that יהושע began both to do and to teach ,
44001002	until the day when He was taken up , after giving instructions through the Set-apart Spirit to the emissaries whom He had chosen ,
44001003	to whom He also presented Himself alive after His suffering by many infallible proofs , being seen by them for forty days , speaking concerning the reign of Elohim .
44001004	And meeting with them , He commanded them not to leave Yerushalayim , but to wait for the Promise of the Father , “ which you have heard from Me –
44001005	because Yoḥanan truly immersed in water , but you shall be immersed in the Set-apart Spirit not many days from now . ”
44001006	So when they had come together , they asked Him , saying , “ Master , would You at this time restore the reign to Yisra’ĕl ? ”
44001007	And He said to them , “ It is not for you to know times or seasons which the Father has put in His own authority .
44001008	“ But you shall receive power when the Set-apart Spirit has come upon you , and you shall be My witnesses in Yerushalayim , and in all Yehuḏah and Shomeron , and to the end of the earth . ”
44001009	And having said this , while they were looking on , He was taken up , and a cloud hid Him from their sight .
44001010	And as they were gazing into the heaven as He went up , see , two men stood by them dressed in white ,
44001011	who also said , “ Men of Galil , why do you stand looking up into the heaven ? This same יהושע , who was taken up from you into the heaven , shall come in the same way as you saw Him go into the heaven . ”
44001012	Then they went back to Yerushalayim from the Mount of Olives , which is near Yerushalayim , a Sabbath day’s journey .
44001013	And when they came in , they went up into the upper room where they were staying : both Kĕpha and Ya‛aqoḇ and Yoḥanan and Andri , Philip and T’oma , Bartholomi and Mattithyahu , Ya‛aqoḇ the son of Alphai and Shim‛on the Zealot , and Yehuḏah the son of Ya‛aqoḇ .
44001014	All these were continuing with one mind in prayer and supplication , with the women and Miryam the mother of יהושע , and with His brothers .
44001015	And in those days Kĕpha , standing up in the midst of the taught ones – and there was a gathering of about a hundred and twenty – said ,
44001016	“ Men and brothers , this Scripture had to be filled which the Set-apart Spirit spoke before by the mouth of Dawiḏ concerning Yehuḏah , who became a guide to those who seized יהושע ,
44001017	because he was numbered with us and did receive his share in this service . ”
44001018	( This one , therefore , purchased a field with the wages of unrighteousness , and falling forward , he burst open in the middle and all his intestines gushed out .
44001019	And it became known to all those dwelling in Yerushalayim , so that in their own language that field was called , Ḥaqal Dema , that is , Field of Blood ) .
44001020	“ For it has been written in the Book of Psalms , ‘ Let his dwelling lie waste , and let no one live in it , ’ and , ‘ Let another take his office . ’
44001021	“ It is therefore necessary that of the men who have been with us all the time that the Master יהושע went in and out among us ,
44001022	beginning from the immersion of Yoḥanan to that day when He was taken up from us , that one of these should become a witness with us of His resurrection . ”
44001023	And they put forward two : Yosĕph called Barsabba , who was also called Justus , and Mattithyahu .
44001024	And praying they said , “ You , יהוה , who know the hearts of all , show which one of these two You have chosen
44001025	to receive the share in this service and office of the emissary from which Yehuḏah by transgression fell , to go to his own place . ”
44001026	And they cast their lots , and the lot fell on Mattithyahu . And he was numbered with the eleven emissaries .
44002001	And when the Day of the Festival of Weeks had come , they were all with one mind in one place .
44002002	And suddenly there came a sound from the heaven , as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
44002003	And there appeared to them divided tongues , as of fire , and settled on each one of them .
44002004	And they were all filled with the Set-apart Spirit and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them to speak .
44002005	Now in Yerushalayim there were dwelling Yehuḏim , dedicated men from every nation under the heaven .
44002006	And when this sound came to be , the crowd came together , and were confused , because everyone heard them speak in his own language .
44002007	And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying to each other , “ Look , are not all these who speak Galileans ?
44002008	“ And how do we hear , each one in our own language in which we were born ?
44002009	“ Parthians and Medes and Ěylamites , and those dwelling in Aram Naharayim , both Yehuḏah and Kappadokia , Pontos and Asia ,
44002010	both Phrygia and Pamphulia , Mitsrayim and the parts of Libya around Cyrene , visitors from Rome , both Yehuḏim and converts ,
44002011	“ Cretans and Araḇs , we hear them speaking in our own tongues the great deeds of Elohim . ”
44002012	And they were all amazed , and were puzzled , saying to each other , “ What does this mean ? ”
44002013	And others mocking said , “ They have been filled with sweet wine . ”
44002014	But Kĕpha , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice and said to them , “ Men of Yehuḏah and all those dwelling in Yerushalayim , let this be known to you , and listen closely to my words .
44002015	“ For these men are not drunk , as you imagine , since it is only the third hour of the day .
44002016	“ But this is what was spoken by the prophet Yo’ĕl :
44002017	‘ And it shall be in the last days , says Elohim , that I shall pour out of My Spirit on all flesh . And your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams ,
44002018	and also on My male servants and on My female servants I shall pour out My Spirit in those days , and they shall prophesy .
44002019	‘ And I shall show wonders in the heaven above and signs in the earth beneath : blood and fire and vapour of smoke .
44002020	‘ The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before the coming of the great and splendid day of יהוה .
44002021	‘ And it shall be that everyone who calls on the Name of יהוה shall be saved . ’
44002022	“ Men of Yisra’ĕl , hear these words : יהושע of Natsareth , a Man from Elohim , having been pointed out to you by mighty works , and wonders , and signs which Elohim did through Him in your midst , as you yourselves also know ,
44002023	this One , given up by the set purpose and foreknowledge of Elohim , you have impaled and put to death through the hands of lawless men –
44002024	“ Him Elohim raised up , having loosed the pangs of death , because it was impossible that He could be held in its grip .
44002025	“ For Dawiḏ says concerning Him , ‘ I saw יהוה before me continually , because He is at my right hand , in order that I should not be shaken .
44002026	‘ For this reason my heart rejoiced , and my tongue was glad , and now my flesh shall also rest in expectation ,
44002027	because You shall not leave my being in the grave , nor shall You give Your Kind One to see corruption .
44002028	‘ You have made known to me the ways of life , You shall fill me with joy in Your presence . ’
44002029	“ Men and brothers , let me speak boldly to you of the ancestor Dawiḏ , that he died and was buried , and his tomb is with us to this day .
44002030	“ Being a prophet , then , and knowing that Elohim had sworn with an oath to him : of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , to raise up the Messiah to sit on his throne ,
44002031	foreseeing this he spoke concerning the resurrection of the Messiah , that His being was neither left in the grave , nor did His flesh see corruption .
44002032	“ Elohim has raised up this יהושע , of which we are all witnesses .
44002033	“ Therefore , having been exalted to the right hand of Elohim , and having received from the Father the promise of the Set-apart Spirit , He poured out this which you now see and hear .
44002034	“ For Dawiḏ did not ascend into the heavens , but he himself said , ‘ יהוה said to my Master , “ Sit at My right hand ,
44002035	until I make Your enemies a footstool for Your feet . ” ’
44002036	“ Therefore let all the house of Yisra’ĕl know for certain that Elohim has made this יהושע , whom you impaled , both Master and Messiah . ”
44002037	And having heard this , they were pierced to the heart , and said to Kĕpha and the rest of the emissaries , “ Men , brothers , what shall we do ? ”
44002038	And Kĕpha said to them , “ Repent , and let each one of you be immersed in the Name of יהושע Messiah for the forgiveness of sins . And you shall receive the gift of the Set-apart Spirit .
44002039	“ For the promise is to you and to your children , and to all who are far off , as many as יהוה our Elohim shall call . ”
44002040	And with many other words he earnestly witnessed and urged them , saying , “ Be saved from this crooked generation . ”
44002041	Then those , indeed , who gladly received his word , were immersed . And on that day about three thousand beings were added to them .
44002042	And they were continuing steadfastly in the teaching of the emissaries , and in the fellowship , and in the breaking of bread , and in the prayers .
44002043	And fear came upon every being , and many wonders and signs were being done through the emissaries .
44002044	And all those who believed were together , and had all in common ,
44002045	and sold their possessions and property , and divided them among all , as anyone might have need .
44002046	And day by day , continuing with one mind in the Set-apart Place , and breaking bread from house to house , they ate their food with gladness and simplicity of heart ,
44002047	praising Elohim and having favour with all the people . And the Master added to the assembly those who were being saved , day by day .
44003001	And Kĕpha and Yoḥanan were going up to the Set-apart Place at the hour of prayer , the ninth hour .
44003002	And a certain man , lame from his birth , was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the Set-apart Place which is called Yaphah , to ask alms from those entering into the Set-apart Place ,
44003003	who , seeing Kĕpha and Yoḥanan about to go into the Set-apart Place , asked for alms .
44003004	And Kĕpha , with Yoḥanan , looking steadfastly at him , said , “ Look at us . ”
44003005	And he gave heed to them , expecting to receive whatever from them .
44003006	But Kĕpha said , “ I do not have silver and gold , but what I do possess , this I give you : In the Name of יהושע Messiah of Natsareth , rise up and walk . ”
44003007	And taking him by the right hand he lifted him up , and immediately his feet and ankle bones were made firm .
44003008	And leaping up , he stood and walked , and went in with them into the Set-apart Place , walking and leaping and praising Elohim .
44003009	And all the people saw him walking and praising Elohim .
44003010	And they recognised him , that it was he who sat begging alms at the Lovely Gate of the Set-apart Place . And they were filled with wonder and amazement at what befell him .
44003011	And as the lame man who was healed was clinging to Kĕpha and Yoḥanan , all the people ran together to them in the porch which is called Shelomoh’s , greatly amazed .
44003012	And seeing it , Kĕpha responded to the people , “ Men of Yisra’ĕl , why do you marvel at this ? Or why look so intently at us , as though by our own power or reverence we have made him walk ?
44003013	“ The Elohim of Aḇraham , and of Yitsḥaq , and of Ya‛aqoḇ , the Elohim of our fathers , esteemed His Servant יהושע , whom you delivered up and denied in the presence of Pilate , when he had decided to release Him .
44003014	“ But you denied the Set-apart and Righteous One , and asked that a man , a murderer , be granted you .
44003015	“ But you killed the Leader of life , whom Elohim raised from the dead , of which we are witnesses .
44003016	“ And by the belief in His Name , this one whom you see and know , His Name made strong , and the belief which comes through Him has given him this perfect healing before all of you .
44003017	“ And now , brothers , I know that you did it in ignorance , as your rulers did too .
44003018	“ But this is how Elohim has filled what He had announced beforehand through the mouth of all the prophets , that His Messiah was to suffer .
44003019	“ Repent therefore and turn back , for the blotting out of your sins , in order that times of refreshing might come from the presence of the Master ,
44003020	and that He sends יהושע Messiah , pre-appointed for you ,
44003021	whom heaven needs to receive until the times of restoration of all matters , of which Elohim spoke through the mouth of all His set-apart prophets since of old .
44003022	“ For Mosheh truly said to the fathers , ‘ יהוה your Elohim shall raise up for you a Prophet like me from your brothers . Him you shall hear according to all matters , whatever He says to you .
44003023	‘ And it shall be that every being who does not hear that Prophet shall be utterly destroyed from among the people . ’
44003024	“ And likewise , all the prophets who have spoken , from Shemu’ĕl and those following , have also announced these days .
44003025	“ You are sons of the prophets , and of the covenant which Elohim made with our fathers , saying to Aḇraham , ‘ And in your seed all the nations of the earth shall be blessed . ’
44003026	“ To you first , Elohim , having raised up His Servant יהושע , sent Him to bless you , in turning away each one of you from your wicked ways . ”
44004001	And as they were speaking to the people , the priests and the captain of the Set-apart Place , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
44004002	being annoyed because they taught the people and announced the resurrection from the dead in יהושע .
44004003	And they arrested them , and put them in jail until the next day , for it was already evening .
44004004	But many of those who had heard the word believed , and the number of the men became about five thousand .
44004005	And it came to be , on the next day , that their rulers and elders and scribes assembled in Yerushalayim ,
44004006	as well as Ḥanan the high priest , and Qayapha , and Yoḥanan , and Alexander , and as many as were of high priestly descent .
44004007	And having placed them in the middle , they asked , “ By what power or in what Name did you do this ? ”
44004008	Then Kĕpha , filled with the Set-apart Spirit , said to them , “ Rulers of the people and elders of Yisra’ĕl :
44004009	“ If today we are called to account for a good deed towards a sick man , by whom he has been healed ,
44004010	let it be known to all of you , and to all the people of Yisra’ĕl , that in the Name of יהושע Messiah of Natsareth , whom you impaled , whom Elohim raised from the dead , by Him this one stands before you , healthy .
44004011	“ This is ‘ the stone which was rejected by you builders , which has become the chief cornerstone . ’
44004012	“ And there is no deliverance in anyone else , for there is no other Name under the heaven given among men by which we need to be saved . ”
44004013	And seeing the boldness of Kĕpha and Yoḥanan , and perceiving that they were unlearned and ordinary men , they marvelled . And they recognised that they had been with יהושע .
44004014	And seeing the man who had been healed standing with them , they could not contradict it .
44004015	But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they consulted with one another ,
44004016	saying , “ What shall we do to these men ? For , indeed , that an outstanding miracle has been done through them is apparent to all those dwelling in Yerushalayim , and we are unable to deny it .
44004017	“ But in order that it spreads no further among the people , let us strongly threaten them , to speak no more to anyone in this Name . ”
44004018	And they called them and commanded them not to speak at all nor to teach in the Name of יהושע .
44004019	But Kĕpha and Yoḥanan answering them , said , “ Whether it is right in the sight of Elohim to listen to you more than to Elohim , you judge .
44004020	“ For it is impossible for us not to speak of what we saw and heard . ”
44004021	And having threatened them further , they released them , finding no way of punishing them , because of the people , because they were all praising Elohim for what had been done .
44004022	For the man was over forty years old on whom this miracle of healing had been done .
44004023	And having been released , they went to their own people and reported all that the chief priests and elders said to them .
44004024	And having heard that , they lifted up their voice to Elohim with one mind and said , “ יהוה , You are Elohim , who made the heaven and the earth and the sea , and all that is in them ,
44004025	who by the mouth of Your servant Dawiḏ have said , ‘ Why did the gentiles rage , and the people plot in vain ?
44004026	‘ The sovereigns of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against יהוה and against His Messiah . ’
44004027	“ For truly , in this city there were gathered together against Your set-apart Servant יהושע , whom You anointed , both Herodes and Pontius Pilate , with the gentiles and the people of Yisra’ĕl
44004028	to do whatever Your hand and Your purpose decided before to be done .
44004029	“ And now , יהוה , look on their threats , and give to Your servants all boldness to speak Your word ,
44004030	by stretching out Your hand for healing , and signs , and wonders to take place through the Name of Your set-apart Servant יהושע . ”
44004031	And when they had prayed , the place where they came together was shaken . And they were all filled with the Set-apart Spirit , and they spoke the word of Elohim with boldness .
44004032	And the group of those who believed were of one heart and one being . And no one claimed that any of his possessions was his own , but they had all in common .
44004033	And with great power the emissaries gave witness to the resurrection of the Master יהושע , and great favour was upon them all .
44004034	For there was not anyone needy among them , for all who were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of what was sold ,
44004035	and laid them at the feet of the emissaries , and they distributed to each as anyone had need .
44004036	And Yosĕph , who was also called Barnaḇah by the emissaries ( which means Son of Encouragement ) , a Lĕwite , a native of Cyprus ,
44004037	having land , sold it , and brought the proceeds and laid it at the feet of the emissaries .
44005001	But a certain man named Ḥananyah , with Shappirah his wife , sold a possession .
44005002	And he kept back from the price , his wife also being aware of it , and brought a certain part and laid it at the feet of the emissaries .
44005003	But Kĕpha said , “ Ḥananyah , why has Satan filled your heart to lie to the Set-apart Spirit and keep back from the price of the land for yourself ?
44005004	“ While it remained , did it not remain your own ? And after it was sold , was it not in your authority ? Why have you conceived this deed in your heart ? You have not lied to men but to Elohim . ”
44005005	Then Ḥananyah , hearing these words , fell down and breathed his last . And great fear came upon all those who heard of this .
44005006	But the young men arose and wrapped him up , carried him out and buried him .
44005007	And it came to be , about three hours later , that his wife came in , not knowing what had taken place .
44005008	And Kĕpha responded to her , “ Say to me whether you sold the land for so much ? ” And she said , “ Yes , for so much . ”
44005009	So Kĕpha said to her , “ Why have you agreed to try the Spirit of יהוה ? Look , the feet of those who have buried your husband are at the door , and they shall carry you out . ”
44005010	And immediately she fell down at his feet and breathed her last . And the young men came in and found her dead , and carrying her out , they buried her beside her husband .
44005011	And great fear came upon all the assembly and upon all who heard of this .
44005012	And through the hands of the emissaries many signs and wonders were done among the people . And they were all with one mind in Shelomoh’s Porch .
44005013	But of the rest no one had the courage to join them , however , the people made much of them .
44005014	And more believers were added to the Master , large numbers of both men and women ,
44005015	so that they brought the sick out into the streets and laid them on beds and couches , that at least the shadow of Kĕpha , passing by , might fall on some of them .
44005016	A large number also gathered from the surrounding cities to Yerushalayim , bringing sick ones and those who were troubled by unclean spirits , and they were all healed .
44005017	But the high priest rose up , and all those with him , which is the sect of the Sadducees , and they were filled with jealousy ,
44005018	and seized the emissaries and put them in the public jail .
44005019	But a messenger of יהוה opened the prison doors at night and brought them out , and said ,
44005020	“ Go and stand in the Set-apart Place and speak to the people all the words of this life . ”
44005021	Now when they heard , they went into the Set-apart Place early in the morning , and were teaching . But the high priest and those with him came and called the council together , with all the elders of the children of Yisra’ĕl , and sent to the prison for them to be brought .
44005022	But having come , the officers did not find them in the prison , and they went back and reported it ,
44005023	saying , “ We found the prison shut in all safety , and the watches standing outside before the doors . But having opened them , we found no one inside ! ”
44005024	And as the high priest and the captain of the Set-apart Place and the chief priests heard these words , they were puzzled and wondered what this might be .
44005025	But one came and reported to them , saying , “ Look , the men whom you put in prison are standing in the Set-apart Place and teaching the people ! ”
44005026	Then the captain went with the officers and brought them , not with force , for they feared the people , lest they should be stoned .
44005027	And having brought them , they set them before the council and the high priest asked them ,
44005028	saying , “ Did we not strictly command you not to teach in this Name ? And look , you have filled Yerushalayim with your teaching , and intend to bring the blood of this Man upon us ! ”
44005029	And Kĕpha and the other emissaries answering , said , “ We have to obey Elohim rather than men .
44005030	“ The Elohim of our fathers raised up יהושע whom you laid hands on , hanging Him on a timber .
44005031	“ Him , a Prince and a Saviour , Elohim has exalted to His right hand , to give repentance to Yisra’ĕl and forgiveness of sins .
44005032	“ And we are His witnesses to these matters , and so also is the Set-apart Spirit whom Elohim has given to those who obey Him . ”
44005033	And those hearing were cut to the heart , and took counsel to kill them .
44005034	But a certain one in the council stood up , a Pharisee named Gamli’ĕl , a teacher of the Torah , respected by all the people , and ordered them to put the emissaries outside for a little while ,
44005035	and said to them , “ Men of Yisra’ĕl , take heed to yourselves what you intend to do to these men .
44005036	“ For before these days Toḏah rose up , claiming to be somebody . A number of men , about four hundred , did join him . He was slain , and all who obeyed him were dispersed , and came to naught .
44005037	“ After him , Yehuḏah of Galil rose up in the days of the census , and drew away many people after him . He also perished , and all who obeyed him were scattered .
44005038	“ And now I say to you , stay away from these men and leave them alone , because if this plan or this work is of men , it shall be overthrown ,
44005039	but if it is of Elohim , you are unable to overthrow it , lest you even be found to fight against Elohim . ”
44005040	And they heeded his advice , and having called for the emissaries , beating them , they commanded that they should not speak in the Name of יהושע , and let them go .
44005041	Then indeed they went rejoicing from the presence of the council , because they were counted worthy to suffer shame for His Name .
44005042	And daily in the Set-apart Place , and in every house , they did not cease teaching and bringing the Good News : יהושע the Messiah !
44006001	And in those days , when the taught ones were increasing , there arose a grumbling against the Heḇrews by the Hellenists , because their widows were overlooked in the daily serving .
44006002	So the twelve summoned the group of the taught ones and said , “ It is not pleasing for us to leave the Word of Elohim and serve tables .
44006003	“ Therefore , brothers , seek out from among you seven men who are known to be filled with the Set-apart Spirit and wisdom , whom we shall appoint for this duty ,
44006004	but we shall give ourselves continually to prayer and to serving the Word . ”
44006005	And the word pleased the entire group . And they chose Stephanos , a man filled with belief and the Set-apart Spirit , and Philip , and Prochoros , and Nikanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nikolaos , a convert from Antioch ,
44006006	whom they set before the emissaries . And when they had prayed , they laid hands on them .
44006007	And the Word of Elohim spread , and the number of the taught ones increased greatly in Yerushalayim , and a great many of the priests were obedient to the belief .
44006008	And Stephanos , filled with belief and power , did great wonders and signs among the people .
44006009	But some of those of the so-called Congregation of the Freedmen ( Cyrenians , Alexandrians , and those from Kilikia and Asia ) , rose up , disputing with Stephanos ,
44006010	but they were unable to resist the wisdom and the Spirit by which he spoke .
44006011	Then they instigated men to say , “ We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Mosheh and Elohim . ”
44006012	And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , so they came upon him , seized him , and brought him to the council .
44006013	And they set up false witnesses who said , “ This man does not cease to speak blasphemous words against this set-apart place and the Torah ,
44006014	for we have heard him saying that this יהושע of Natsareth shall overthrow this place and change the institutes which Mosheh delivered unto us . ”
44006015	And all who sat in the council , looking steadily at him , saw his face was like the face of a heavenly messenger .
44007001	And the high priest said , “ Is this so ? ”
44007002	And he replied , “ Men , brothers and fathers , listen : The Elohim of esteem appeared to our father Aḇraham when he was in Aram Naharayim , before he dwelt in Ḥaran ,
44007003	and said to him , ‘ Come out of your land and from your relatives , and come here , into a land that I shall show you . ’
44007004	“ Then he came out of the land of the Chaldeans and dwelt in Ḥaran . And from there , after the death of his father , He removed him to this land in which you now dwell .
44007005	“ And He gave him no inheritance in it , not a foot of it . But He promised to give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
44007006	“ And Elohim spoke in this way : that his seed would be sojourning in a foreign land , and that they would be enslaved and mistreated four hundred years .
44007007	‘ And the nation to whom they shall be enslaved , I shall judge , ’ said Elohim , ‘ and after that they shall come out and serve Me in this place . ’
44007008	“ And He gave him the covenant of circumcision . And so he brought forth Yitsḥaq and circumcised him on the eighth day . And Yitsḥaq brought forth Ya‛aqoḇ , and Ya‛aqoḇ brought forth the twelve ancestors .
44007009	“ And the ancestors , becoming jealous , sold Yosĕph into Mitsrayim . But Elohim was with him ,
44007010	and delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom before Pharaoh , sovereign of Mitsrayim . And he appointed him governor over Mitsrayim and all his house .
44007011	“ Then a scarcity of food and great distress came over all the land of Mitsrayim and Kena ‘ an , and our fathers found no food .
44007012	“ But Ya‛aqoḇ heard that there was grain in Mitsrayim , and he sent out our fathers the first time ,
44007013	and at the second time Yosĕph was made known to his brothers , and Yosĕph’s race became known to the Pharaoh .
44007014	“ And Yosĕph sent and called his father Ya‛aqoḇ and all his relatives to him , seventy-five people .
44007015	“ And Ya‛aqoḇ went down to Mitsrayim , and died , he and our fathers ,
44007016	and they were brought over to Sheḵem and laid in the tomb that Aḇraham bought for a price of silver from the sons of Ḥamor , the father of Sheḵem .
44007017	“ But as the time of the promise drew near which Elohim had sworn to Aḇraham , the people increased and multiplied in Mitsrayim
44007018	until another sovereign arose who did not know Yosĕph .
44007019	“ Having dealt treacherously with our race , this one mistreated our fathers , making them expose their babies , so that they should not live .
44007020	“ At that time Mosheh was born , and he was well-pleasing to Elohim . And he was reared three months in the house of his father .
44007021	“ But when he was exposed , the daughter of Pharaoh took him up and reared him as her own son .
44007022	“ And Mosheh was instructed in all the wisdom of the Mitsrites , and was mighty in words and works .
44007023	“ And when he was forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brothers , the children of Yisra’ĕl .
44007024	“ And seeing one of them being wronged , he defended and revenged him who was oppressed , smiting the Mitsrite .
44007025	“ And he thought that his brothers would have understood that Elohim would give deliverance to them by his hand , but they did not understand .
44007026	“ And the next day he appeared to two of them as they were fighting , and urged them to peace , saying , ‘ Men , you are brothers , why do you wrong one another ? ’
44007027	“ But he who was wronging his neighbour pushed him away , saying , ‘ Who made you a ruler and a judge over us ?
44007028	‘ Do you wish to kill me as you killed the Mitsrite yesterday ? ’
44007029	“ And at this saying , Mosheh fled and became a sojourner in the land of Miḏyan , where he fathered two sons .
44007030	“ And after forty years were completed , a Messenger of יהוה appeared to him in a flame of fire in a bush , in the wilderness of Mount Sinai .
44007031	“ And Mosheh , seeing it , marvelled at the sight , and coming near to look , the voice of יהוה came to him ,
44007032	saying , ‘ I am the Elohim of your fathers , the Elohim of Aḇraham and the Elohim of Yitsḥaq and the Elohim of Ya‛aqoḇ . ’ And Mosheh trembled and did not have the courage to look .
44007033	‘ But יהוה said to him , “ Take your sandals off your feet , for the place where you stand is set-apart ground .
44007034	“ I have certainly seen the evil treatment of my people who are in Mitsrayim , and I have heard their groaning and have come down to deliver them . And now come , let Me send you to Mitsrayim . ” ’
44007035	“ This Mosheh whom they had refused , saying , ‘ Who made you a ruler and a judge ? ’ – this one Elohim sent to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the Messenger who appeared to him in the bush .
44007036	“ This one led them out , after he had done wonders and signs in the land of Mitsrayim , and in the Red Sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
44007037	“ This is the Mosheh who said to the children of Yisra’ĕl , ‘ יהוה your Elohim shall raise up for you a Prophet like me from your brothers . Him you shall hear . ’
44007038	“ This is he who was in the assembly in the wilderness with the Messenger who spoke to him on Mount Sinai , and with our fathers , who received the living Words to give to us ,
44007039	unto whom our fathers would not become obedient , but thrust away , and in their hearts they turned back to Mits-rayim ,
44007040	saying to Aharon , ‘ Make us mighty ones to go before us , for this Mosheh who led us out of the land of Mitsrayim , we do not know what has become of him . ’
44007041	“ And they made a calf in those days , and brought an offering to the idol , and were rejoicing in the works of their own hands .
44007042	“ So Elohim turned and gave them up to worship the host of the heaven , as it has been written in the book of the Prophets , ‘ Did you bring slaughtered beasts and offerings unto Me during forty years in the wilderness , O house of Yisra’ĕl ?
44007043	‘ And you took up the tent of Moleḵ , and the star of your mighty one Kiyyun , images which you made to bow before them . Therefore I shall remove you beyond Baḇel . ’
44007044	“ The Tent of Witness was with our fathers in the wilderness , as He appointed , instructing Mosheh to make it according to the pattern that he had seen ,
44007045	which our fathers , having received it in turn , also brought with Yehoshua into the land possessed by the gentiles , whom Elohim drove out before the face of our fathers until the days of Dawiḏ ,
44007046	who found favour before Elohim and asked to find a dwelling for the Elohim of Ya‛aqoḇ ,
44007047	but Shelomoh built Him a house .
44007048	“ However , the Most High does not dwell in dwellings made with hands , as the prophet says :
44007049	‘ The heaven is My throne , and earth is My footstool . What house shall you build for Me ? says יהוה , or what is the place of My rest ?
44007050	‘ Has My hand not made all these ? ’
44007051	“ You stiff-necked and uncircumcised in heart and ears ! You always resist the Set-apart Spirit , as your fathers did , you also do .
44007052	“ Which of the prophets did your fathers not persecute ? And they killed those who before announced the coming of the Righteous One , of whom you now have become the betrayers and murderers ,
44007053	who received the Torah as it was ordained by messengers , but did not watch over it . ”
44007054	And hearing this they were cut to the hearts and gnashed the teeth at him .

44007060	And kneeling down he cried out with a loud voice , “ Master , do not hold this sin against them . ” And having said this , he fell asleep .
44008001	And Sha’ul was giving approval to his death . And on that day there was a great persecution against the assembly which was at Yerushalayim , and they were all scattered throughout the countries of Yehuḏah and Shomeron , except the emissaries .

44008007	For unclean spirits came out of many who were possessed , crying with a loud voice , and many who were paralysed and lame were healed .
44008008	And there came to be great joy in that city .
44008009	Now there was a certain man called Shim‛on , who formerly was practising magic in the city and astonishing the people of Shomeron , claiming to be someone great ,
44008010	to whom they all were giving heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , “ This one is the power of Elohim , which is great . ”

44008020	But Kĕpha said to him , “ Let your silver perish with you , because you thought to buy the gift of Elohim through money !
44008021	“ You have neither part nor lot in this matter , for your heart is not right before Elohim .

44008026	But a messenger of יהוה spoke to Philip , saying , “ Arise and go toward the south along the way which goes down from Yerushalayim to Azzah . ” This is desert .
44008027	And he arose and went , and saw , a man of Kush , a eunuch of great authority under Kandake the sovereigness of the Kushites , who was in charge of all her treasury , and had come to Yerushalayim to worship ,

44008030	And running up , Philip heard him reading the prophet Yeshayahu , and said , “ Do you know what you are reading ? ”
44008031	And he said , “ How am I able , unless someone guides me ? ” And he called Philip near , to come up and sit with him .

44008033	“ In His humiliation He was deprived of right-ruling . And who shall declare His generation ? Because His life was taken from the earth . ”

44008036	And as they were going on the way , they came to some water . And the eunuch said , “ Look , water ! What hinders me from being immersed ? ”
44008037	And Philip said , “ If you believe with all your heart , it is permitted . ” And he answering , said , “ I believe that יהושע Messiah is the Son of Elohim . ”
44008038	And he commanded the chariot to stand still . And both Philip and the eunuch went down into the water , and he immersed him .
44008039	And when they came up out of the water , the Spirit of יהוה caught Philip away , and the eunuch saw him no more , for he went his way , rejoicing .
44008040	Philip , however , was found at Ashdoḏ . And passing through , he brought the Good News in all the cities until he came to Caesarea .
44009001	But Sha’ul , still breathing threats and murder against the taught ones of the Master , having come to the high priest ,
44009002	asked from him letters to the congregations of Damascus , so that if he found any who were of the Way , whether men or women , to bring them bound to Yerushalayim .
44009003	And it came to be , that as he journeyed , he came near Damascus , and suddenly a light flashed around him from the heaven .
44009004	And he fell to the ground , and heard a voice saying to him , “ Sha’ul , Sha’ul , why do you persecute Me ? ”
44009005	And he said , “ Who are You , Master ? ” And the Master said , “ I am יהושע , whom you persecute . It is hard for you to kick against the prods . ”
44009006	Both trembling , and being astonished , he said , “ Master , what do You wish me to do ? ” And the Master said to him , “ Arise and go into the city , and you shall be told what you have to do . ”
44009007	And the men journeying with him stood speechless , hearing indeed the voice but seeing no one .
44009008	And Sha’ul arose from the ground , but when his eyes were opened he saw no one . And leading him by the hand they brought him into Damascus .
44009009	And he was three days without sight , and did not eat nor drink .
44009010	And there was at Damascus a certain taught one , by name Ḥananyah . And the Master said unto him in a vision , “ Ḥananyah ! ” And he said , “ Here I am , Master . ”
44009011	And the Master said to him , “ Arise and go to the street called Straight , and seek in the house of Yehuḏah for one called Sha’ul of Tarsos , for look , he is praying ,
44009012	and has seen in a vision a man named Ḥananyah coming in and laying his hand on him , so as to see again . ”
44009013	And Ḥananyah answered , “ Master , I have heard from many about this man , how many evils he did to Your set-apart ones in Yerushalayim ,
44009014	and here he has authority from the chief priests to bind all those calling on Your Name . ”
44009015	But the Master said to him , “ Go , for he is a chosen vessel of Mine to bear My Name before nations , sovereigns , and the children of Yisra’ĕl .
44009016	“ For I shall show him how much he has to suffer for My Name . ”
44009017	And Ḥananyah went away and went into the house . And laying his hands on him he said , “ Brother Sha’ul , the Master יהושע , who appeared to you on the way as you came , has sent me , so that you might see again and be filled with the Set-apart Spirit . ”
44009018	And immediately there fell from his eyes , as it were scales , and he received his sight . And rising up , he was immersed .
44009019	And having received food , he was strengthened . And Sha’ul was with the taught ones at Damascus some days .
44009020	And immediately he proclaimed the Messiah in the congregations , that He is the Son of Elohim .
44009021	And all who heard were amazed , and said , “ Is this not he who destroyed those calling on this Name in Yerushalayim , and has come here for this , to take them bound to the chief priests ? ”
44009022	But Sha’ul kept increasing in strength , and was confounding the Yehuḏim who dwelt in Damascus , proving that this is the Messiah .
44009023	And after many days had elapsed , the Yehuḏim plotted to kill him .
44009024	But their plot became known to Sha’ul . And they were watching the gates day and night , to kill him .
44009025	But taking him by night , the taught ones let him down through the wall , lowering him in a basket .
44009026	And having arrived at Yerushalayim , Sha’ul tried to join the taught ones , but they were all afraid of him , not believing that he was a taught one .
44009027	But Barnaḇah took him and brought him to the emissaries , and told them how he had seen the Master on the way , and that He had spoken to him , and how he was speaking boldly at Damascus in the Name of יהושע .
44009028	And he was with them at Yerushalayim , coming in and going out ,
44009029	and speaking boldly in the Name of the Master יהושע and disputed with the Hellenists , but they undertook to kill him .
44009030	And when the brothers learned of this , they brought him down to Caesarea and sent him out to Tarsos .
44009031	Then indeed the assemblies throughout all Yehuḏah , and Galil , and Shomeron had peace and were built up , and walking in the fear of יהוה and in the encouragement of the Set-apart Spirit , they were being increased .
44009032	And it came to be , as Kĕpha was passing through all places , that he also came down to the set-apart ones who were dwelling at Lod .
44009033	And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , who had been bedridden for eight years , being paralytic .
44009034	And Kĕpha said to him , “ Aeneas , יהושע the Messiah heals you ! Rise up and make your bed . ” And immediately he rose up .
44009035	And all those dwelling at Lod and Sharon saw him and did turn to the Master .
44009036	And in Yapho there was a certain taught one named Taḇitha , which means Dorkas . This woman was filled with good works and kind deeds which she did .
44009037	And it came to be in those days that she became sick and died . And having washed her , they laid her in an upper room .
44009038	And Lod being near to Yapho , and the taught ones having heard that Kĕpha was there , they sent two men to him , urging him not to delay in coming to them .
44009039	And having risen up , Kĕpha went with them . And when he arrived , they brought him to the upper room . And all the widows stood beside him weeping , showing the inner garments and outer garments which Dorkas had made while she was with them .
44009040	But Kĕpha sent them all out , and knelt down and prayed . And turning to the body he said , “ Taḇitha , arise . ” And she opened her eyes , and seeing Kĕpha , she sat up .
44009041	And giving her his hand , he lifted her up . And calling the set-apart ones and widows , he presented her alive .
44009042	And it became known throughout all Yapho , and many believed on the Master .
44009043	And it came to be that he stayed for many days in Yapho with Shim‛on , a leather-tanner .
44010001	Now there was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a captain of what was called the Italian Regiment ,
44010002	dedicated , and fearing Elohim with all his household , doing many kind deeds to the people , and praying to Elohim always .
44010003	He clearly saw in a vision , about the ninth hour of the day , a messenger of Elohim coming to him , and saying to him , “ Cornelius ! ”
44010004	And looking intently at him , and becoming afraid , he said , “ What is it , master ? ” And he said to him , “ Your prayers and your kind deeds have come up for a remembrance before Elohim .
44010005	“ And now send men to Yapho , and send for Shim‛on who is also called Kĕpha .
44010006	“ He is staying with Shim‛on , a leather-tanner , whose house is by the sea . ”
44010007	And when the messenger who spoke to him went away , Cornelius called two of his household servants , and a dedicated soldier from among those who waited on him continually .
44010008	And having explained to them all , he sent them to Yapho .
44010009	And on the next day , as they were on their way and approaching the city , Kĕpha went up on the house-top to pray , about the sixth hour .
44010010	And he became hungry and wished to eat . But while they were preparing , he fell into a trance ,
44010011	and he saw the heaven opened and a certain vessel like a great sheet bound at the four corners , descending to him and let down to the earth ,
44010012	in which were all kinds of four-footed beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping creatures , and the birds of the heaven .
44010013	And a voice came to him , “ Rise up , Kĕpha , slay and eat . ”
44010014	But Kĕpha said , “ Not at all , Master ! Because I have never eaten whatever is common or unclean . ”
44010015	And a voice came to him again the second time , “ What Elohim has cleansed you do not consider common . ”
44010016	And this took place three times , and the vessel was taken back to the heaven .
44010017	And while Kĕpha was doubting within himself about what the vision might mean , look , the men who had been sent from Cornelius , having asked for the house of Shim‛on , stood at the gate ,
44010018	and calling out , they enquired whether Shim‛on , also known as Kĕpha , was staying there .
44010019	And as Kĕpha was thinking about the vision , the Spirit said to him , “ See , three men seek you .
44010020	“ But rise up , go down and go with them , not doubting at all , for I have sent them . ”
44010021	So Kĕpha went down to the men who had been sent to him from Cornelius , and said , “ Look , I am the one you seek . Why have you come ? ”
44010022	And they said , “ Cornelius the captain , a righteous man and one who fears Elohim and well spoken of by the entire nation of the Yehuḏim , was instructed by a set-apart messenger to send for you to his house , and to hear words from you . ”
44010023	So inviting them in , he housed them . And on the next day Kĕpha went away with them , and some brothers from Yapho went with him .
44010024	And the following day they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius was waiting for them , having called together his relatives and close friends .
44010025	And it came to be , that when Kĕpha entered , Cornelius met him and fell down at his feet and bowed before him .
44010026	But Kĕpha raised him up , saying , “ Stand up , I myself am also a man . ”
44010027	And talking with him , he went in and found many who had come together .
44010028	And he said to them , “ You know that a Yehuḏite man is not allowed to associate with , or go to one of another race . But Elohim has shown me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
44010029	“ That is why I came without hesitation when I was sent for . So I ask , why have you sent for me ? ”
44010030	And Cornelius said , “ Four days ago I was fasting until this hour . And at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and see , a man stood before me in shining garments ,
44010031	and said , ‘ Cornelius , your prayer has been heard , and your kind deeds were remembered before Elohim .
44010032	‘ Now send to Yapho and call Shim‛on here , who is also called Kĕpha . He is staying in the house of Shim‛on , a leather-tanner , by the sea . When he comes , he shall speak to you . ’
44010033	“ So I sent to you immediately , and you have done well to come . And now , we are all present before Elohim , to hear all that you have been commanded by Elohim . ”
44010034	And opening his mouth , Kĕpha said , “ Truly I see that Elohim shows no partiality ,
44010035	but in every nation , he who fears Him and works righteousness is accepted by Him .
44010036	“ He sent the word to the children of Yisra’ĕl , bringing the Good News : peace through יהושע Messiah ! He is Master of all .
44010037	“ You know what word came to be throughout all Yehuḏah , beginning from Galil after the immersion which Yoḥanan proclaimed :
44010038	how Elohim did anoint יהושע of Natsareth with the Set-apart Spirit and with power , who went about doing good and healing all who were oppressed by the devil , for Elohim was with Him .
44010039	“ And we are witnesses of all He did , both in the country of the Yehuḏim and in Yerushalayim , whom they even killed by hanging on a timber .
44010040	“ Elohim raised up this One on the third day , and let Him be seen ,
44010041	not to all the people , but to witnesses , those having been chosen before by Elohim – to us who ate and drank with Him after He arose from the dead .
44010042	“ And He commanded us to proclaim to the people , and to witness that it is He who was appointed by Elohim to be Judge of the living and the dead .
44010043	“ To this One all the prophets bear witness , that through His Name , everyone believing in Him does receive forgiveness of sins . ”
44010044	While Kĕpha was still speaking these words , the Set-apart Spirit fell upon all those hearing the word .
44010045	And those of the circumcision who believed were astonished , as many as came with Kĕpha , because the gift of the Set-apart Spirit had been poured out on the gentiles also ,
44010046	for they were hearing them speaking with tongues and extolling Elohim . Then Kĕpha answered ,
44010047	“ Is anyone able to forbid water , that these should not be immersed who have received the Set-apart Spirit – even as also we ? ”
44010048	And he commanded them to be immersed in the Name of יהושע Messiah . Then they asked him to remain a few days .
44011001	And the emissaries and brothers who were in Yehuḏah heard that the gentiles also received the word of Elohim .
44011002	And when Kĕpha went up to Yerushalayim , those of the circumcision were contending with him ,
44011003	saying , “ You went in to uncircumcised men and ate with them ! ”
44011004	But Kĕpha began and set it forth in order , saying :
44011005	“ I was in the city of Yapho praying . And in a trance I saw a vision , a certain vessel descending like a great sheet , let down from the heaven by four corners , and it came to me .
44011006	“ Having looked into it , I perceived and I saw four-footed beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping creatures , and the birds of heaven .
44011007	“ And I heard a voice saying to me , ‘ Rise up , Kĕpha , slay and eat . ’
44011008	“ But I said , ‘ Not at all , Master ! Because whatever is common or unclean has never entered into my mouth . ’
44011009	“ And the voice answered me again from the heaven , ‘ What Elohim has cleansed you do not consider common . ’
44011010	“ And this took place three times , and all were drawn up again into the heaven .
44011011	“ And see , immediately three men stood before the house where I was , having been sent to me from Caesarea .
44011012	“ And the Spirit said to me to go with them , not doubting at all . And these six brothers also went with me , and we went into the man’s house .
44011013	“ And he told us how he had seen a messenger standing in his house , who said to him , ‘ Send men to Yapho , and call for Shim‛on who is also called Kĕpha ,
44011014	who shall speak to you words , by which you shall be saved , you and all your house . ’
44011015	“ And as I began to speak , the Set-apart Spirit fell upon them , as upon us at the beginning .
44011016	“ And I remembered the word of the Master , how He said , ‘ Yoḥanan indeed immersed in water , but you shall be immersed in the Set-apart Spirit . ’
44011017	“ So if Elohim gave them the same gift as He gave us when we believed on the Master יהושע Messiah , how was I able to withstand Elohim ? ”
44011018	And having heard this , they were silent , and praised Elohim , saying , “ Then Elohim has indeed also given to the gentiles repentance to life . ”
44011019	Then , indeed , they who were scattered because of the pressure that arose over Stephanos passed through to Phoenicia , and Cyprus , and Antioch , speaking the word to no one except the Yehuḏim only .
44011020	But some of them were men from Cyprus and Cyrene , who , when they had come to Antioch , spoke to the Hellenists , bringing the Good News : the Master יהושע !
44011021	And the hand of the Master was with them , and a great number having believed turned to the Master .
44011022	And word of it came to the ears of the assembly in Yerushalayim , and they sent out Barnaḇah to go as far as Antioch ,
44011023	who , having come , and seeing the favour of Elohim , was glad , and encouraged them all with purpose of heart to cleave to the Master .
44011024	Because he was a good man , and filled with the Set-apart Spirit and with belief . And large numbers were added to the Master .
44011025	Then Barnaḇah went to Tarsos to seek Sha’ul ,
44011026	and having found him , he brought him to Antioch . And it came to be that for an entire year they came together in the assembly and taught large numbers . And the taught ones were called ‘ Messianites’ first in Antioch .
44011027	And in those days prophets came from Yerushalayim to Antioch .
44011028	And one of them , named Ḥag̅aḇ , stood up and indicated by the Spirit that there was going to be a great scarcity of food over all the world – which also took place under Claudius Caesar .
44011029	So the taught ones , each according to his ability , decided to send relief to the brothers dwelling in Yehuḏah .
44011030	This they also did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnaḇah and Sha’ul .
44012001	And about that time Herodes the sovereign put forth his hands to do evil to some from the assembly .
44012002	And he killed Ya‛aqoḇ the brother of Yoḥanan with the sword .
44012003	And seeing that it was pleasing to the Yehuḏim , he proceeded further to arrest Kĕpha as well – and they were the Days of Unleavened Bread .
44012004	So when he had seized him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four squads of soldiers to watch over him , intending to bring him before the people after Passover .
44012005	So Kĕpha was indeed kept in prison , but prayer was earnestly made to Elohim on his behalf by the assembly .
44012006	And when Herodes was about to bring him out , that night Kĕpha was sleeping , bound with two chains between two soldiers . And the guards before the door were keeping the prison .
44012007	And see , a messenger of יהוה stood by , and a light shone in the building . And smiting the side of Kĕpha he raised him up , saying , “ Get up quickly ! ” And his chains fell off his hands .
44012008	And the messenger said to him , “ Gird yourself and bind on your sandals , ” and he did so . And he said to him , “ Put on your garment and follow me . ”
44012009	And coming out he followed him , and knew not that what was done by the messenger was true , but thought he was seeing a vision .
44012010	And when they had passed the first and the second guard posts , they came to the iron gate that leads to the city , which opened to them by itself . And they went out and went down one street , and the messenger instantly withdrew from him .
44012011	And when Kĕpha had come to himself , he said , “ Now I truly know that יהוה has sent His messenger , and delivered me from the hand of Herodes and from all the Yehuḏite people were anticipating . ”
44012012	And having realised this , he went to the house of Miryam , the mother of Yoḥanan who was also called Mark , where many had gathered to pray .
44012013	And when Kĕpha knocked at the door of the gate , a girl named Rhode came to answer .
44012014	And when she recognised Kĕpha’s voice , she did not open the gate because of her joy , but ran in and reported that Kĕpha stood before the gate .
44012015	And they said to her , “ You are mad ! ” But she kept insisting that it was so , and they said , “ It is his messenger . ”
44012016	And Kĕpha continued knocking , and having opened they saw him and were amazed .
44012017	And motioning to them with his hand to be silent , he told them how the Master brought him out of the prison . And he said , “ Report this to Ya‛aqoḇ and to the brothers . ” And he left and went to another place .
44012018	Now when day came , there was no small stir among the soldiers about what had become of Kĕpha .
44012019	And when Herodes had searched for him and did not find him , he examined the guards and ordered them to be led away . And he went down from Yehuḏah to Caesarea , and stayed there .
44012020	Now Herodes had been highly displeased with the people of Tsor and Tsiḏon , but with one mind they came to him , and having made Blastos the sovereign’s eunuch their friend , they were asking for peace , because their country was supplied with food by the sovereign’s country .
44012021	And on an appointed day Herodes , having put on his royal clothes , sat on his throne and gave an address to them .
44012022	And the people kept shouting , “ The voice of a mighty one and not of a man ! ”
44012023	And instantly a messenger of יהוה smote him , because he did not give the esteem to Elohim . And becoming worm-eaten , he died .
44012024	And the word of Elohim went on growing and spreading .
44012025	And Barnaḇah and Sha’ul returned from Yerushalayim , having completed the service , and having taken with them Yoḥanan who was also called Mark .
44013001	And in the assembly that was at Antioch there were certain prophets and teachers : both Barnaḇah and Shim‛on who was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaḥĕm who had been brought up with Herodes the district ruler , and Sha’ul .
44013002	And as they were doing service to the Master and fasted , the Set-apart Spirit said , “ Separate unto Me Barnaḇah and Sha’ul for the work to which I have called them . ”
44013003	Then having fasted and prayed , and having laid hands on them , they sent them away .
44013004	So they , having been sent out by the Set-apart Spirit , went down to Seleukeia , and from there they sailed to Cyprus .
44013005	And having come into Salamis , they proclaimed the word of Elohim in the congregations of the Yehuḏim . And they also had Yoḥanan as an attendant .
44013006	And having passed through all the island to Paphos , they found a certain magician , a false prophet , a Yehuḏite whose name was Bar-Yehoshua ,
44013007	who was with the proconsul , Sergius Paulus , a man of understanding . This man , having called for Barnaḇah and Sha’ul , earnestly sought to hear the word of Elohim .
44013008	But Elumas the magician – for so his name is translated – withstood them , seeking to turn the proconsul away from the belief .
44013009	Then Sha’ul , filled with the Set-apart Spirit , looked intently at him ,
44013010	and said , “ O son of the devil , filled with all deceit and all recklessness , you enemy of all righteousness , shall you not cease perverting the straight ways of יהוה ?
44013011	“ And now , see , the hand of יהוה is upon you , and you shall be blind , not seeing the sun for a time . ” And instantly a dark mist fell on him , and he went around seeking someone to lead him by the hand .
44013012	And having seen what took place , the proconsul believed , being astonished at the teaching of the Master .
44013013	And having put out from Paphos , Sha’ul and those with him came to Perge in Pamphulia . And Yoḥanan , having left them , returned to Yerushalayim .
44013014	But passing through from Perge , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the congregation on the Sabbath day and sat down .
44013015	And after the reading of the Torah and the Prophets , the rulers of the congregation sent to them , saying , “ Men , brothers , if you have any word of encouragement for the people , speak . ”
44013016	And Sha’ul , standing up and motioning with his hand said , “ Men , Yisra’ĕlites , and those fearing Elohim , listen :
44013017	“ The Elohim of this people Yisra’ĕl did choose our fathers , and exalted the people in their sojourning in the land of Mitsrayim , and with a high arm He brought them out of it .
44013018	“ Now for a time of about forty years He sustained them in the wilderness .
44013019	“ And having destroyed seven nations in the land of Kena ‘ an , He gave their land to them as an inheritance .
44013020	“ And after that He gave judges for about four hundred and fifty years , until Shemu’ĕl the prophet .
44013021	“ But then they asked for a sovereign , and Elohim gave them Sha’ul the son of Qish , a man of the tribe of Binyamin , for forty years .
44013022	“ And having removed him , He raised up for them Dawiḏ as sovereign , to whom also He gave witness and said , ‘ I have found Dawiḏ the son of Yishai , a man after My own heart , who shall do all My desires . ’
44013023	“ From this one’s seed , according to the promise , Elohim raised up for Yisra’ĕl a Saviour , יהושע ,
44013024	after Yoḥanan had first proclaimed the immersion of repentance to all the people of Yisra’ĕl , before His coming .
44013025	“ And as Yoḥanan was completing his mission , he said , ‘ Who do you suppose I am ? I am not He . But see , there comes One after me , the sandals of whose feet I am not worthy to loose . ’
44013026	“ Men , brothers , sons of the race of Aḇraham , and those among you fearing Elohim , to you the word of this deliverance has been sent ,
44013027	for those dwelling in Yerushalayim , and their rulers , because they did not know Him , nor even the voices of the Prophets which are read every Sabbath , have filled them in having judged Him .
44013028	“ And having found not one cause for death , they asked Pilate that He should be put to death .
44013029	“ And when they had accomplished all that was written concerning Him , taking Him down from the timber , they laid Him in a tomb .
44013030	“ But Elohim raised Him from the dead ,
44013031	and He was seen for many days by those who came up with Him from Galil to Yerushalayim , who are His witnesses to the people .
44013032	“ And we bring you the Good News , the promise made to the fathers ,
44013033	that Elohim has filled this for us , their children , having raised up יהושע , as it has also been written in the second Psalm , ‘ You are My Son , today I have brought You forth . ’
44013034	“ And that He raised Him out of the dead , no more to return to corruption , He has said thus , ‘ I shall give you the trustworthy kindnesses of Dawiḏ . ’
44013035	“ For this reason He also says in another Psalm , ‘ You shall not give Your Kind One to see corruption . ’
44013036	“ For Dawiḏ , indeed , having served his own generation by the counsel of Elohim , fell asleep , was buried with his fathers , and saw corruption ,
44013037	but He whom Elohim raised up saw no corruption .
44013038	“ Let it therefore be known to you , brothers , that through this One forgiveness of sins is proclaimed to you ,
44013039	and by Him everyone who believes is declared right from all sins from which you were not able to be declared right by the Torah of Mosheh .
44013040	“ Watch then that what was said in the prophets does not come upon you :
44013041	“ See , you despisers , marvel and perish , for I work a work in your days , a work which you would in no way believe if someone were to declare it to you . ’ ”
44013042	And when the Yehuḏim went out of the congregation , the gentiles begged to have these words spoken to them the next Sabbath .
44013043	And when the meeting of the congregation had broken up , many of the Yehuḏim and of the worshipping converts followed Sha’ul and Barnaḇah , who , speaking to them , were urging them to continue in the favour of Elohim .
44013044	And on the next Sabbath almost all the city came together to hear the Word of Elohim .
44013045	But when the Yehuḏim saw the crowds , they were filled with jealousy . And contradicting and speaking evil , they opposed what Sha’ul was saying .
44013046	But speaking boldly , Sha’ul and Barnaḇah said , “ It was necessary that the word of Elohim should be spoken to you first , but since you thrust it away , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , see , we turn to the gentiles .
44013047	“ For so the Master has commanded us , ‘ I have set you to be a light to the gentiles , that you should be for deliverance to the ends of the earth . ’ ”
44013048	And when the gentiles heard this , they were glad and praised the Word of יהוה . And as many as had been appointed to everlasting life believed .
