45002005	But according to your hardness and your unrepentant heart you are treasuring up for yourself wrath in the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of Elohim ,
45002006	who “ shall render to each one according to his works ” :
45002007	everlasting life to those who by persistence in good work seek for esteem , and respect , and incorruptibility ;
45002008	but wrath and displeasure to those who are self-seeking and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness ;
45002009	affliction and distress on every human being working what is evil , of the Yehuḏite first , and also of the Greek ;
45002010	but esteem , respect , and peace to everyone working what is good , to the Yehuḏite first and also to the Greek .
45002011	For there is no partiality with Elohim .
45002012	For as many as sinned without Torah shall also perish without Torah , and as many as sinned in the Torah shall be judged by the Torah .
45002013	For not the hearers of the Torah are righteous in the sight of Elohim , but the doers of the law shall be declared right .
45002014	For when gentiles , who do not have the Torah , by nature do what is in the Torah , although not having the Torah , they are a Torah to themselves ,
45002015	who show the work of the Torah written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and between themselves their thoughts accusing or even excusing ,
45002016	in the day when Elohim shall judge the secrets of men through יהושע Messiah , according to my Good News .
45002017	See , you are called a Yehuḏite , and rest on the Torah , and make your boast in Elohim ,
45002018	and know the desire of Elohim , and approve what is superior , being instructed out of the Torah ,
45002019	and are trusting that you yourself are a guide to the blind , a light to those who are in darkness ,
45002020	an instructor of foolish ones , a teacher of babes , having the form of knowledge and of the truth in the Torah .
45002021	You , then , who teach another , do you not teach yourself ? You who proclaim that a man should not steal , do you steal ?
45002022	You who say , “ Do not commit adultery , ” do you commit adultery ? You who abominate idols , do you rob temples ?
45002023	You who make your boast in the Torah , through the transgression of the Torah do you disrespect Elohim ?
45002024	For “ The Name of Elohim is blasphemed among the gentiles because of you , ” as it has been written .
45002025	For circumcision indeed profits if you practise the Torah , but if you are a transgressor of the Torah , your circumcision has become uncircumcision .
45002026	So , if an uncircumcised one watches over the righteousnesses of the Torah , shall not his uncircumcision be reckoned as circumcision ?
45002027	And the uncircumcised by nature , who perfects the Torah , shall judge you who notwithstanding letter and circumcision are a transgressor of the Torah !
45002028	For he is not a Yehuḏite who is so outwardly , neither is circumcision that which is outward in the flesh .
45002029	But a Yehuḏite is he who is so inwardly , and circumcision is that of the heart , in Spirit , not literally , whose praise is not from men but from Elohim .
45003001	What then is the advantage of the Yehuḏite , or what is the value of the circumcision ?
45003002	Much in every way ! Because firstly indeed , that they were entrusted with the Words of Elohim .
45003003	For what if some did not believe ? Shall their unbelief nullify the trustworthiness of Elohim ?
45003004	Let it not be ! But let Elohim be true , and every man a liar , as it has been written , “ That You should be declared right in Your words , and prevail in Your judging . ”
45003005	But if our unrighteousness establishes the righteousness of Elohim , what shall we say ? Is Elohim unrighteous who is inflicting wrath ? I speak as a man .
45003006	Let it not be ! Otherwise how shall Elohim judge the world ?
45003007	For if the truth of Elohim has increased through my lie , to His esteem , why am I also still judged as a sinner ?
45003008	And why not say , “ Let us do evil so that the good might come ” ? – as we are wrongly accused and as some claim that we say . Their judgment is in the right .
45003009	What then ? Are we better than they ? Not at all , for we have previously accused both Yehuḏim and Greeks that they are all under sin .
45003010	As it has been written , “ There is none righteous , no , not one !
45003011	“ There is no one who is understanding , there is none who is seeking Elohim .
45003012	“ They all have turned aside , they have together become worthless . There is none who does good , no , not one . ”
45003013	“ Their throat is an open tomb , with their tongues they have deceived , ” “ The poison of adders is under their lips , ”
45003014	“ Whose mouth is filled with cursing and bitterness . ”
45003015	“ Their feet are swift to shed blood ,
45003016	ruin and wretchedness are in their ways ,
45003017	and the way of peace they have not known . ”
45003018	“ There is no fear of Elohim before their eyes . ”
45003019	And we know that whatever the Torah says , it says to those who are in the Torah , so that every mouth might be stopped , and all the world come under judgment before Elohim .
45003020	Therefore by works of Torah no flesh shall be declared right before Him , for by the Torah is the knowledge of sin .
45003021	But now , apart from the Torah , a righteousness of Elohim has been revealed , being witnessed by the Torah and the Prophets ,
45003022	and the righteousness of Elohim is through belief in יהושע Messiah to all and on all who believe . For there is no difference ,
45003023	for all have sinned and fall short of the esteem of Elohim ,
45003024	being declared right , without paying , by His favour through the redemption which is in Messiah יהושע ,
45003025	whom Elohim set forth as an atonement , through belief in His blood , to demonstrate His righteousness , because in His tolerance Elohim had passed over the sins that had taken place before ,
45003026	to demonstrate at the present time His righteousness , that He is righteous and declares righteous the one who has belief in יהושע .
45003027	Where , then , is the boasting ? It is shut out . By what Torah ? Of works ? No , but by the Torah of belief .
45003028	For we reckon that a man is declared right by belief without works of Torah .
45003029	Or is He the Elohim of the Yehuḏim only , and not also of the gentiles ? Yea , of the gentiles also ,
45003030	since it is one Elohim who shall declare right the circumcised by belief and the uncircumcised through belief .
45003031	Do we then nullify the Torah through the belief ? Let it not be ! On the contrary , we establish the Torah .
45004001	What , then , shall we say Aḇraham our father , to have found , according to the flesh ?
45004002	For if Aḇraham was declared right by works , he has ground for boasting , but not before Elohim .
45004003	For what does the Scripture say ? “ Aḇraham believed Elohim , and it was reckoned to him for righteousness . ”
45004004	And to him who is working , the reward is not reckoned as a favour but as a debt .
45004005	And to him who is not working but believes on Him who is declaring right the wicked , his belief is reckoned for righteousness ,
45004006	even as Dawiḏ also says of the blessedness of the man to whom Elohim reckons righteousness without works :
45004007	“ Blessed are those whose lawlessnesses are forgiven , and whose sins are covered ,
45004008	blessed is the man to whom יהוה shall by no means reckon sin . ”
45004009	Is this blessing then upon the circumcised only , or also upon the uncircumcised ? For we affirm : Belief was reckoned unto Aḇraham for righteousness .
45004010	How then was it reckoned ? Being in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
45004011	And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the belief while in uncircumcision , for him to be a father of all those believing through uncircumcision , for righteousness to be reckoned to them also ,
45004012	and the father of circumcision to those who not only are of the circumcision , but who also walk in the steps of the belief which our father Aḇraham had in uncircumcision .
45004013	For the promise that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Aḇraham or to his seed through the Torah , but through a righteousness of belief .
45004014	For if those who are of the Torah are heirs , belief has been made useless , and the promise has been nullified ,
45004015	for the Torah works out wrath , for where there is no Torah there is no transgression .
45004016	On account of this it is of belief , that it be according to favour , for the promise to be made certain to all the seed , not only to those who are of the Torah , but also to those who are of the belief of Aḇraham , who is father of us all –
45004017	as it has been written , “ I have made you a father of many nations ” – in the presence of Him whom he believed , even Elohim , who gives life to the dead and calls that which does not exist as existing ,
45004018	who against all expectation did believe , in expectation , so that he should become father of many nations , according to what was said , “ So shall your seed be . ”
45004019	And not having grown weak in belief , he did not consider his own body , already dead , being about a hundred years old , and the deadness of Sarah’s womb ,
45004020	he did not hesitate about the promise of Elohim through unbelief , but was strengthened in belief , giving esteem to Elohim ,
45004021	and being completely persuaded that what He had promised He was also able to do .
45004022	Therefore also “ it was reckoned to him for righteousness . ”
45004023	And not because of him alone was it written that it was reckoned to him ,
45004024	but also because of us , to whom it shall be reckoned , to us who believe in Him who raised up יהושע our Master from the dead ,
45004025	who was delivered up because of our trespasses , and was raised for us to be declared right .
45005001	Therefore , having been declared right by belief , we have peace with Elohim through our Master יהושע Messiah ,
45005002	through whom also we have access by belief into this favour in which we stand , and we exult in the expectation of the esteem of Elohim .
45005003	And not only this , but we also exult in pressures , knowing that pressure works endurance ;
45005004	and endurance , approvedness ; and approvedness , expectation .
45005005	And expectation does not disappoint , because the love of Elohim has been poured out in our hearts by the Set-apart Spirit which was given to us .
45005006	For when we were still weak , Messiah in due time died for the wicked .
45005007	For one shall hardly die for a righteous one , though possibly for a good one someone would even have the courage to die .
45005008	But Elohim proves His own love for us , in that while we were still sinners , Messiah died for us .
45005009	Much more then , having now been declared right by His blood , we shall be saved from wrath through Him .
45005010	For if , being enemies , we were restored to favour with Elohim through the death of His Son , much more , having been restored to favour , we shall be saved by His life .
45005011	And not only this , but we also exult in Elohim through our Master יהושע Messiah , through whom we have now received the restoration to favour .
45005012	For this reason , even as through one man sin did enter into the world , and death through sin , and thus death spread to all men , because all sinned –
45005013	for until the Torah , sin was in the world , but sin is not reckoned when there is no Torah .
45005014	But death reigned from Aḏam until Mosheh , even over those who had not sinned according to the likeness of the transgression of Aḏam , who is a type of Him who was to come .
45005015	But the favourable gift is not like the trespass . For if by the one man’s trespass many died , much more the favour of Elohim , and the gift in favour of the one Man , יהושע Messiah , overflowed to many .
45005016	And the favourable gift is not as by one having sinned . For indeed the judgment was of one to condemnation , but the favourable gift is of many trespasses unto righteousness .
45005017	For if by the trespass of the one , death did reign through the one , much more those who receive the overflowing favour and the gift of righteousness shall reign in life through the One , יהושע Messiah .
45005018	So then , as through one trespass there resulted condemnation to all men , so also through one righteous act there resulted righteous-declaring of life to all men .
45005019	For as through the disobedience of one man many were made sinners , so also through the obedience of the One many shall be made righteous .
45005020	And the Torah came in beside , so that the trespass would increase . But where sin increased , favour increased still more ,
45005021	so that as sin did reign in death , even so favour might reign through righteousness to everlasting life through יהושע Messiah our Master .
45006001	What , then , shall we say ? Shall we continue in sin , to let favour increase ?
45006002	Let it not be ! How shall we who died to sin still live in it ?
45006003	Or do you not know that as many of us as were immersed into Messiah יהושע were immersed into His death ?
45006004	We were therefore buried with Him through immersion into death , that as Messiah was raised from the dead by the esteem of the Father , so also we should walk in newness of life .
45006005	For if we have come to be grown together in the likeness of His death , we shall be also of the resurrection ,
45006006	knowing this , that our old man was impaled with Him , so that the body of sin might be rendered powerless , to serve sin no longer .
45006007	For he who has died has been made right from sin .
45006008	And if we died with Messiah , we believe that we shall also live with Him ,
45006009	knowing that Messiah , having been raised from the dead , dies no more – death no longer rules over Him .
45006010	For in that He died , He died to sin once for all ; but in that He lives , He lives to Elohim .
45006011	So you also , reckon yourselves to be dead indeed to sin , but alive to Elohim in Messiah יהושע our Master .
45006012	Therefore do not let sin reign in your mortal body , to obey it in its desires ,
45006013	neither present your members as instruments of unrighteousness to sin , but present yourselves to Elohim as being alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness to Elohim .
45006014	For sin shall not rule over you , for you are not under the law but under favour .
45006015	What then ? Shall we sin because we are not under Torah but under favour ? Let it not be !
45006016	Do you not know that to whom you present yourselves servants for obedience , you are servants of the one whom you obey , whether of sin to death , or of obedience to righteousness ?
45006017	But thanks to Elohim that you were servants of sin , yet you obeyed from the heart that form of teaching to which you were entrusted .
45006018	And having been set free from sin , you became servants of righteousness .
45006019	I speak as a man , because of the weakness of your flesh . For even as you did present your members as servants of uncleanness , and of lawlessness resulting in lawlessness , so now present your members as servants of righteousness resulting in set-apartness .
45006020	For when you were servants of sin , you were free from righteousness .
45006021	What fruit , therefore , were you having then , over which you are now ashamed ? For the end thereof is death .
45006022	But now , having been set free from sin , and having become servants of Elohim , you have your fruit resulting in set-apartness , and the end , everlasting life .
45006023	For the wages of sin is death , but the favourable gift of Elohim is everlasting life in Messiah יהושע our Master .
45007001	Or do you not know , brothers – for I speak to those knowing the Torah – that the Torah rules over a man as long as he lives ?
45007002	For the married woman has been bound by Torah to the living husband , but if the husband dies , she is released from the Torah concerning her husband .
45007003	So then , while her husband lives , she shall be called an adulteress if she becomes another man’s . But if her husband dies , she is free from that part of the Torah , so that she is not an adulteress , having become another man’s .
45007004	So my brothers , you also were put to death to the Torah through the body of Messiah , for you to become another’s , the One who was raised from the dead , that we should bear fruit to Elohim .
45007005	For when we were in the flesh , the passions of sins , through the Torah , were working in our members to bear fruit to death .
45007006	But now we have been released from the Torah , having died to what we were held by , so that we should serve in newness of Spirit and not in oldness of letter .
45007007	What , then , shall we say ? Is the Torah sin ? Let it not be ! However , I did not know sin except through the Torah . For also the covetousness I knew not if the Torah had not said , “ You shall not covet . ”
45007008	But sin , having taken the occasion through the command , did work in me all sorts of covetousness . For apart from Torah sin is dead .
45007009	And I was alive apart from the Torah once , but when the command came , the sin revived , and I died .
45007010	And the command which was to result in life , this I found to result in death .
45007011	For sin , having taken the occasion through the command , deceived me , and through it killed me .
45007012	So that the Torah truly is set-apart , and the command set-apart , and righteous , and good .
45007013	Therefore , has that which is good become death to me ? Let it not be ! But the sin , that sin might be manifest , was working death in me through what is good , so that sin through the command might become an exceedingly great Sinner .
45007014	For we know that the Torah is Spiritual , but I am fleshly , sold under sin .
45007015	For what I work , I know not . For what I wish , that I do not practise , but what I hate , that I do .
45007016	But if I do what I do not wish , I agree with the Torah that it is good .
45007017	And now , it is no longer I that work it , but the sin dwelling in me .
45007018	For I know that in me , that is in my flesh , dwells no good . For to wish is present with me , but to work the good I do not find .
45007019	For the good that I wish to do , I do not do ; but the evil I do not wish to do , this I practise .
45007020	And if I do that which I do not wish , it is no longer I who work it , but the sin dwelling in me .
45007021	I find therefore this law , that when I wish to do the good , that the evil is present with me .
45007022	For I delight in the Torah of Elohim according to the inward man ,
45007023	but I see another law in my members , battling against the Torah of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
45007024	Wretched man that I am ! Who shall deliver me from this body of death ?
45007025	Thanks to Elohim , through יהושע Messiah our Master ! So then , with the mind I myself truly serve the Torah of Elohim , but with the flesh the law of sin .
45008001	There is , then , now no condemnation to those who are in Messiah יהושע , who do not walk according to the flesh , but according to the Spirit .
45008002	For the Torah of the Spirit of the life in Messiah יהושע has set me free from the law of sin and of death .
45008003	For the Torah being powerless , in that it was weak through the flesh , Elohim , having His own Son in the likeness of flesh of sin , and concerning sin , condemned sin in the flesh ,
45008004	so that the righteousness of the Torah should be completed in us who do not walk according to the flesh but according to the Spirit .
45008005	For those who live according to the flesh set their minds on the matters of the flesh , but those who live according to the Spirit , the matters of the Spirit .
45008006	For the mind of the flesh is death , but the mind of the Spirit is life and peace .
45008007	Because the mind of the flesh is enmity towards Elohim , for it does not subject itself to the Torah of Elohim , neither indeed is it able ,
45008008	and those who are in the flesh are unable to please Elohim .
45008009	But you are not in the flesh but in the Spirit , if indeed the Spirit of Elohim dwells in you . And if anyone does not have the Spirit of Messiah , this one is not His .
45008010	And if Messiah is in you , the body is truly dead on account of sin , but the Spirit is life on account of righteousness .
45008011	And if the Spirit of Him who raised יהושע from the dead dwells in you , He who raised Messiah from the dead shall also give life to your mortal bodies through His Spirit dwelling in you .
45008012	So then , brothers , we are not debtors to the flesh , to live according to the flesh .
45008013	For if you live according to the flesh , you are going to die ; but if by the Spirit you put to death the deeds of the body , you shall live .
45008014	For as many as are led by the Spirit of Elohim , these are sons of Elohim .
45008015	For you did not receive the spirit of bondage again to fear , but you received the Spirit of adoption by whom we cry out , “ Abba , Father . ”
45008016	The Spirit Himself bears witness with our spirit that we are children of Elohim ,
45008017	and if children , also heirs – truly heirs of Elohim , and co-heirs with Messiah , if indeed we suffer with Him , in order that we also be exalted together .
45008018	For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worth comparing with the esteem that is to be revealed in us .
45008019	For the intense longing of the creation eagerly waits for the revealing of the sons of Elohim .
45008020	For the creation was subjected to futility , not from choice , but because of Him who subjected it , in anticipation ,
45008021	that the creation itself also shall be delivered from the bondage to corruption into the esteemed freedom of the children of Elohim .
45008022	For we know that all the creation groans together , and suffers the pains of childbirth together until now .
45008023	And not only so , but even we ourselves who have the first-fruits of the Spirit , we ourselves also groan within ourselves , eagerly waiting for the adoption , the redemption of our body .
45008024	For in this expectation we were saved , but expectation that is seen is not expectation , for when anyone sees , does he expect it ?
45008025	And if we expect what we do not see , we eagerly wait for it with endurance .
45008026	And in the same way the Spirit does help in our weaknesses . For we do not know what we should pray , but the Spirit Himself pleads our case for us with groanings unutterable .
45008027	And He who searches the hearts knows what the mind of the Spirit is , because He makes intercession for the set-apart ones according to Elohim .
45008028	And we know that all matters work together for good to those who love Elohim , to those who are called according to His purpose .
45008029	Because those whom He knew beforehand , He also ordained beforehand to be conformed to the likeness of His Son , for Him to be the first-born among many brothers .
45008030	And whom He ordained beforehand , these He also called , and whom He called , these He also declared right . And whom He declared right , these He also esteemed .
45008031	What then shall we say to this ? If Elohim is for us , who is against us ?
45008032	Truly , He who did not spare His own Son , but delivered Him up on behalf of us all – how shall He not , along with Him , freely give us all else ?
45008033	Who shall bring any charge against Elohim’s chosen ones ? It is Elohim who is declaring right .
45008034	Who is he who is condemning ? It is Messiah who died , and furthermore is also raised up , who is also at the right hand of Elohim , who also makes intercession for us .
45008035	Who shall separate us from the love of the Messiah ? Shall pressure , or distress , or persecution , or scarcity of food , or nakedness , or danger , or sword ?
45008036	As it has been written , “ For Your sake we are killed all day long , we are reckoned as sheep of slaughter . ”
45008037	But in all this we are more than overcomers through Him who loved us .
45008038	For I am persuaded that neither death nor life , nor messengers nor principalities nor powers , neither the present nor the future ,
45008039	nor height nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of Elohim which is in Messiah יהושע our Master .
45009001	I speak the truth in Messiah , I do not lie , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Set-apart Spirit ,
45009002	that I have great sadness and continual grief in my heart .
45009003	For I myself could have wished to be banished from Messiah for the sake of my brothers , my relatives according to the flesh ,
45009004	who are Yisra’ĕlites , whose is the adoption , and the esteem , and the covenants , and the giving of the Torah , and the worship , and the promises ,
45009005	whose are the fathers , and from whom is the Messiah according to the flesh , who is over all , Elohim-blessed forever . Amĕn .
45009006	However , it is not as though the word of Elohim has failed . For they are not all Yisra’ĕl who are of Yisra’ĕl ,
45009007	neither are they all children because they are the seed of Aḇraham , but , “ In Yitsḥaq your seed shall be called . ”
45009008	That is , those who are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of Elohim , but the children of the promise are reckoned as the seed .
45009009	For this is the word of promise , “ At this time I shall come and Sarah shall have a son . ”
45009010	And not only so , but Riḇqah having conceived by one , our father Yitsḥaq .
45009011	Yet , before they were born or had done any good or evil – in order that the purpose of Elohim , according to choice , might stand , not of works but of Him who calls –
45009012	it was said to her , “ The greater shall serve the lesser , ”
45009013	as it has been written , “ Ya‛aqoḇ I have loved , but Ěsaw I have hated . ”
45009014	What , then , shall we say ? Is there unrighteousness with Elohim ? Let it not be !
45009015	For He says to Mosheh , “ I shall favour whomever I favour , and I shall have compassion on whomever I have compassion . ”
45009016	So , then , it is not of him who is wishing , nor of him who is running , but of Elohim who shows favour .
45009017	For the Scripture says to Pharaoh , “ For this same purpose I have raised you up , to show My power in you , and that My Name be declared in all the earth . ”
45009018	So , then , He favours whom He wishes , and He hardens whom He wishes .
45009019	Then you shall say to me , “ Why does He still find fault ? For who has resisted His counsel ? ”
45009020	But who are you , O man , to talk back to Elohim ? Shall that which is formed say to him who formed it , “ Why have you made me like this ? ”
45009021	Does not the potter have authority over the clay , from the same lump to make one vessel for value and another not for value ?
45009022	And if Elohim , desiring to show wrath , and to make His power known , with much patience tolerated the vessels of wrath prepared for destruction ,
45009023	and that He might make known the riches of His esteem on vessels of compassion , which He had prepared beforehand for esteem ,
45009024	even whom He called , not only us of the Yehuḏim , but also of the gentiles ?
45009025	As He says in Hoshĕa too , “ I shall call them My people , who were not My people , and her beloved , who was not beloved . ”
45009026	“ And it shall be in the place where it was said to them , ‘ You are not My people , ’ there they shall be called sons of the living Elohim . ”
45009027	And Yeshayahu cries out on behalf of Yisra’ĕl , “ Though the number of the children of Yisra’ĕl be as the sand of the sea , the remnant shall be saved .
45009028	For He is bringing a matter to an end , and is cutting it short in righteousness , because יהוה shall cut short a matter on the earth . ”
45009029	And as Yeshayahu said before , “ If יהוה of hosts had not left us a seed , we would have become like Seḏom , and we would have been made like Amorah . ”
45009030	What shall we say then ? That gentiles not following after righteousness , have obtained righteousness , even the righteousness of belief ,
45009031	but Yisra’ĕl following after the Torah of righteousness , has not arrived at the Torah of righteousness .
45009032	Why ? Because it was not of belief , but as by works of Torah . For they stumbled at the Stone of stumbling .
45009033	As it has been written , “ See , I lay in Tsiyon a Stone of stumbling and a Rock that makes for falling , and everyone who is believing on Him shall not be put to shame . ”
45010001	Truly brothers , my heart’s desire and prayer to Elohim for Yisra’ĕl is for deliverance .
45010002	For I bear them witness that they have an ardour for Elohim , but not according to knowledge .
45010003	For not knowing the righteousness of Elohim , and seeking to establish their own righteousness , they did not subject themselves to the righteousness of Elohim .
45010004	For Messiah is the goal of the ‘ Torah unto righteousness’to everyone who believes .
45010005	For Mosheh writes about the righteousness which is of the Torah , “ The man who does these shall live by them . ”
45010006	But the righteousness of belief speaks in this way , “ Do not say in your heart , ‘ Who shall ascend into the heavens ? ’ ” – that is , to bring Messiah down ; or ,
45010007	“ ‘ Who shall descend into the abyss ? ’ ” – that is , to bring Messiah up from the dead .
45010008	But what does it say ? “ The word is near you , in your mouth and in your heart ” – that is , the word of belief which we are proclaiming :
45010009	That if you confess with your mouth the Master יהושע and believe in your heart that Elohim has raised Him from the dead , you shall be saved .
45010010	For with the heart one believes unto righteousness , and one confesses with the mouth , and so is saved .
45010011	Because the Scripture says , “ Whoever puts his trust in Him shall not be put to shame . ”
45010012	Because there is no distinction between Yehuḏite and Greek , for the same Master of all is rich to all those calling upon Him .
45010013	For “ everyone who calls on the Name of יהוה shall be saved . ”
45010014	How then shall they call on Him in whom they have not believed ? And how shall they believe in Him of whom they have not heard ? And how shall they hear without one proclaiming ?
45010015	And how shall they proclaim if they are not sent ? As it has been written , “ How pleasant are the feet of those who bring the Good News of peace , who bring the Good News of the good ! ”
45010016	However , not all obeyed the Good News . For Yeshayahu says , “ יהוה , who has believed our report ? ”
45010017	So then belief comes by hearing , and hearing by the word of Elohim .
45010018	But I ask , Did they not hear ? Yea indeed , “ Their voice went out to all the earth , and their words to the ends of the world . ”
45010019	But I ask , Did Yisra’ĕl not know ? First Mosheh says , “ I shall provoke you to jealousy by those who are not a nation , I shall enrage you by an unwise nation . ”
45010020	And Yeshayahu boldly says , “ I was found by those not seeking Me , I was made manifest to those not asking for Me . ”
45010021	And to Yisra’ĕl He says , “ All day long I have stretched out My hands to a disobedient and back-talking people . ”
45011001	I say then , has Elohim rejected His people ? Let it not be ! For I also am a Yisra’ĕlite , of the seed of Aḇraham , of the tribe of Binyamin .
45011002	Elohim has not rejected His people whom He knew beforehand . Or do you not know what the Scripture says of Ěliyahu , how he pleads with Elohim against Yisra’ĕl , saying ,
45011003	“ יהוה , they have killed Your prophets and overthrown Your altars , and I alone am left , and they seek my life ” ?
45011004	But what does the answer of Elohim say to him ? “ I have left for Myself seven thousand men who have not bowed the knee to Ba‛al . ”
45011005	So therefore also , at this present time a remnant according to the choice of favour has come to be .
45011006	And if by favour , it is no longer of works , otherwise favour is no longer favour . And if it is of works , it is no longer favour , otherwise work is no longer work .
45011007	What then ? Yisra’ĕl has not obtained what it seeks , but the chosen did obtain it , and the rest were hardened .
45011008	As it has been written , “ יהוה has given them a spirit of deep sleep , eyes not to see and ears not to hear , unto this day . ”
45011009	Dawiḏ also says , “ Let their table become for a snare , and for a trap , and for a stumbling-block and a recompense to them ,
45011010	let their eyes be darkened , not to see , and bow down their back always . ”
45011011	I say then , have they stumbled that they should fall ? Let it not be ! But by their fall deliverance has come to the gentiles , to provoke them to jealousy .
45011012	And if their fall is riches for the world , and their failure riches for the gentiles , how much more their completeness !
45011013	For I speak to you , the gentiles , inasmuch as I am an emissary to the gentiles , I esteem my service ,
45011014	if somehow I might provoke to jealousy those who are my flesh and save some of them .
45011015	For if their casting away is the restoration to favour of the world , what is their acceptance but life from the dead ?
45011016	Now if the first-fruit is set-apart , the lump is also . And if the root is set-apart , so are the branches .
45011017	And if some of the branches were broken off , and you , being a wild olive tree , have been grafted in among them , and came to share the root and fatness of the olive tree ,
45011018	do not boast against the branches . And if you boast , remember : you do not bear the root , but the root bears you !
45011019	You shall say then , “ The branches were broken off that I might be grafted in . ”
45011020	Good ! By unbelief they were broken off , and you stand by belief . Do not be arrogant , but fear .
45011021	For if Elohim did not spare the natural branches , He might not spare you either .
45011022	See then the kindness and sharpness of Elohim : on those who fell sharpness , but toward you kindness , if you continue in His kindness , otherwise you also shall be cut off .
45011023	And they also , if they do not continue in unbelief , shall be grafted in , for Elohim is able to graft them in again .
45011024	For if you were cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and were grafted contrary to nature into a good olive tree , how much more shall these who are the natural branches , be grafted into their own olive tree ?
45011025	For I do not wish you to be ignorant of this secret , brothers , lest you should be wise in your own estimation , that hardening in part has come over Yisra’ĕl , until the completeness of the gentiles has come in .
45011026	And so all Yisra’ĕl shall be saved , as it has been written , “ The Deliverer shall come out of Tsiyon , and He shall turn away wickedness from Ya‛aqoḇ ,
45011027	and this is My covenant with them , when I take away their sins . ”
45011028	Truly , as regards the Good News they are enemies for your sake , but concerning the choice they are beloved for the sake of the fathers .
45011029	For the gifts and the calling of Elohim are not to be repented of .
45011030	For as you also at one time disobeyed Elohim , but now have obtained compassion through their disobedience ,
45011031	so also these have now disobeyed , that through the compassion shown you they also might obtain compassion .
45011032	For Elohim has shut them all up to disobedience , in order to have compassion on all .
45011033	Oh , the depth of riches , and wisdom and knowledge of Elohim ! How unsearchable His judgments and untraceable His ways !
45011034	“ For who has known the mind of יהוה ? Or who has become His counsellor ? ”
45011035	“ Or who first gave to Him , and it shall be given back to him ? ”
45011036	Because of Him , and through Him , and to Him , are all , to whom be esteem forever . Amĕn .
45012001	I call upon you , therefore , brothers , through the compassion of Elohim , to present your bodies a living offering – set-apart , well-pleasing to Elohim – your reasonable worship .
45012002	And do not be conformed to this world , but be transformed by the renewing of your mind , so that you prove what is that good and well-pleasing and perfect desire of Elohim .
45012003	For I say , through the favour which has been given to me , to everyone who is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he should think , but to think soberly , as Elohim has given to each a measure of belief .
45012004	For as we have many members in one body , but all members do not have the same function ,
45012005	so we , the many , are one body in Messiah , and members each one of one another .
45012006	Now having different gifts , according to the favour which was given to us , let us use them accordingly : if prophecy , according to the proportion of belief ;
45012007	if serving , in the serving ; or he who is teaching , in the teaching ;
45012008	or he who encourages , in the encouragement ; or he who is sharing , in sincerity ; he who is leading , in diligence ; he who shows compassion , joyously .
45012009	Let love be without hypocrisy . Shrink from what is wicked , cling to what is good .
45012010	In brotherly love , tenderly loving towards one another , in appreciation , giving preference to each other ;
45012011	not idle in duty , ardent in spirit , serving the Master ;
45012012	rejoicing in the expectancy , enduring under pressure , continuing steadfastly in prayer ;
45012013	imparting to the needs of the set-apart ones , pursuing kindness towards strangers .
45012014	Bless those who persecute you – bless and do not curse .
45012015	Rejoice with those who rejoice , and weep with those who weep .
45012016	Be of the same mind toward one another . Do not be proud in mind , but go along with the lowly . Do not be wise in your own estimation .
45012017	Repay no one evil for evil . Respect what is right in the sight of all men .
45012018	If possible , on your part , be at peace with all men .
45012019	Beloved , do not revenge yourselves , but give place to the wrath , for it has been written , “ Vengeance is Mine , I shall repay , ” says יהוה .
45012020	“ Instead , if your enemy hungers , feed him ; if he thirsts , give him a drink , for in so doing you shall heap coals of fire on his head . ”
45012021	Do not be overcome by evil , but overcome evil with good .
45013001	Let every being be in subjection to the governing authorities . For there is no authority except from Elohim , and the authorities that exist are appointed by Elohim .
45013002	So he who opposes the authority withstands the institution of Elohim , and those who withstand shall bring judgment on themselves .
45013003	For those ruling are an object of fear , not to good works , but to evil . Do you wish to be not afraid of the authority ? Do the good , and you shall have praise from it ,
45013004	for it is a servant of Elohim to you for good . But if you do evil , be afraid , for it does not bear the sword in vain . For it is a servant of Elohim , a revenger to execute wrath on him who practises evil .
45013005	Therefore , it is necessary to be subject , not only because of wrath but also because of the conscience .
45013006	For because of this you also pay taxes , for they are servants of Elohim attending continually to these duties .
45013007	Render therefore to all what is due to them : tax to whom tax is due , toll to whom toll , fear to whom fear , respect to whom respect .
45013008	Owe no one any matter except to love one another , for he who loves another has filled the Torah .
45013009	For this , “ You shall not commit adultery , ” “ You shall not murder , ” “ You shall not steal , ” “ You shall not bear false witness , ” “ You shall not covet , ” and if there is any other command , is summed up in this word , “ You shall love your neighbour as yourself . ”
45013010	Love does no evil to a neighbour . Therefore , love is completion of the Torah .
45013011	And do this , knowing the time , that it is already the hour for us to wake up from sleep , for now our deliverance is nearer than when we did believe .
45013012	The night is far advanced , the day has come near . So let us put off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
45013013	Let us walk becomingly , as in the day , not in wild parties and drunkenness , not in living together and indecencies , not in fighting and envy ,
45013014	but put on the Master יהושע Messiah , and make no provision for the lusts of the flesh .
45014001	And receive him who is weak in the belief , not criticising his thoughts .
45014002	One indeed believes to eat all food , but he who is weak eats only vegetables .
45014003	He that eats , let him not despise him who does not eat , and he that does not eat , let him not judge him who eats , for Elohim received him .
45014004	Who are you that judges another’s servant ? To his own master he stands or falls . But he shall be made to stand , for Elohim is able to make him stand .
45014005	One indeed judges one day above another , another judges every day alike . Let each one be completely persuaded in his own mind .
45014006	He who minds the day , minds it to יהוה . And he who does not mind the day , to יהוה he does not mind it . He who eats , eats to יהוה , for he gives Elohim thanks . And he who does not eat , to יהוה he does not eat , and gives Elohim thanks .
45014007	For not one of us lives to himself , and not one dies to himself .
45014008	For both , if we live , we live unto the Master , and if we die , we die unto the Master . Therefore , whether we live or die , we are the Master’s .
45014009	For unto this Messiah died and rose and lived again , to rule over both the dead and the living .
45014010	But why do you judge your brother ? Or why do you despise your brother ? For we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Messiah .
45014011	For it has been written , “ As I live , says יהוה , every knee shall bow to Me , and every tongue shall confess to Elohim . ”
45014012	Each one of us , therefore , shall give account of himself to Elohim .
45014013	Therefore let us not judge one another any longer , but rather judge this , not to put an obstacle or a stumbling-block in our brother’s way .
45014014	I know and am persuaded in the Master יהושע that none at all is common of itself . But to him who regards whatever to be common , to him it is common .
45014015	And if your brother is grieved because of your food , you are no longer walking in love . Do not by your food ruin the one for whom Messiah died .
45014016	Do not then allow your good to be spoken of as evil .
45014017	For the reign of Elohim is not eating and drinking , but righteousness and peace and joy in the Set-apart Spirit .
45014018	For he who is serving Messiah in these matters is well-pleasing to Elohim and approved by men .
45014019	So , then , let us pursue the matters of peace and the matters for building up one another .
45014020	Do not destroy the work of Elohim for the sake of food . All indeed are clean , but evil to that man who eats so as to cause stumbling .
45014021	It is good not to eat meat or drink wine , nor to do whatever by which your brother stumbles .
45014022	Do you have belief ? Have it to yourself before Elohim . Blessed is he who does not condemn himself in what he approves .
45014023	But he who doubts , if he eats , is condemned , because it is not of belief , and all that is not of belief is sin .
45015001	But we who are strong ought to bear with the failings of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
45015002	Let each one of us please his neighbour for his good , to build him up .
45015003	For even the Messiah did not please Himself , but , as it has been written , “ The reproaches of those who reproached You fell upon Me . ”
45015004	For whatever was written before was written for our instruction , that through endurance and encouragement of the Scriptures we might have the expectation .
45015005	And the Elohim of endurance and encouragement give you to be of the same mind toward one another , according to Messiah יהושע ,
45015006	that with one mind and one mouth , you might praise the Elohim and Father of our Master יהושע Messiah .
45015007	So accept one another , as Messiah also did accept us , to the esteem of Elohim .
45015008	And I say that יהושע Messiah has become a servant of the circumcised for the truth of Elohim , to confirm the promises made to the fathers ,
45015009	and for the gentiles to praise Elohim for His compassion , as it has been written , “ Because of this I shall confess to You among the gentiles , and I shall sing to Your Name . ”
45015010	And again it says , “ Rejoice , O gentiles , with His people ! ”
45015011	And again , “ Praise יהוה , all you gentiles ! Praise Him , all you peoples ! ”
45015012	And again , Yeshayahu says , “ There shall be a root of Yishai , and He who shall rise to reign over the gentiles , on Him the gentiles shall set their expectation . ”
45015013	And the Elohim of expectation fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that you overflow with expectation by the power of the Set-apart Spirit .
45015014	Now I myself am persuaded concerning you , my brothers , that you too are filled with goodness , complete in all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
45015015	But I have written more boldly to you , in part , as reminding you , because of the favour given to me by Elohim ,
45015016	to be a servant of יהושע Messiah to the gentiles , with the priestly duty of bringing the Good News of Elohim , so that the offering of the gentiles becomes acceptable , set apart by the Set-apart Spirit .
45015017	Therefore I have cause for boasting in Messiah יהושע in the matters pertaining to Elohim .
45015018	For I shall not presume to speak of any matter except what Messiah has worked out through me , in word and deed , to make the gentiles obedient ,
45015019	in power of signs and wonders , in power of the Spirit of Elohim , so that from Yerushalayim and round about to Illurikon I have completed the preaching of the Good News of Messiah .
45015020	And so I was ambitious to bring the Good News where Messiah had not been named , lest I should build on another man’s foundation ,
45015021	but as it has been written , “ To whom it was not announced concerning Him , they shall see , and those that have not heard shall understand . ”
45015022	This is why I was often hindered from coming to you .
45015023	But now , no longer having a place in these parts , and having a longing to come to you for many years ,
45015024	I shall come to you when I go to Spain . For I expect to see you on my journey , and to be helped on my way there by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
45015025	But now I am going to Yerushalayim to serve the set-apart ones .
45015026	For it pleased those from Makedonia and Achaia to make some contribution for the poor among the set-apart ones who are in Yerushalayim .
45015027	For they were pleased , and they are their debtors . For if the gentiles have shared in their spiritual matters , their duty is also to serve them in material matters .
45015028	Having completed this , then , and having put my seal on this fruit of theirs , I shall return through you to Spain .
45015029	And I know that when I come to you , I shall come in the completeness of the blessing of the Good News of Messiah .
45015030	But I urge you , brothers , through our Master יהושע Messiah , and through the love of the Spirit , to strive together with me in prayers for me , unto Elohim ,
45015031	that I might be delivered from those in Yehuḏah who do not believe , and that my service for Yerushalayim be well received by the set-apart ones ,
45015032	that I might come to you with joy , through the desire of Elohim , and be refreshed together with you .
45015033	And the Elohim of peace be with you all . Amĕn .
45016001	And I commend to you Phoebe our sister , who is a servant of the assembly in Kenḥrea ,
45016002	that you receive her in יהוה , worthy of the set-apart ones , and assist her in whatever matter she has need of you . For she has been a great help to many , including me .
45016003	Greet Priscilla and Aqulas , my fellow workers in Messiah יהושע ,
45016004	who risked their own necks for my life , to whom not only I give thanks , but also all the assemblies of the gentiles ,
45016005	and the assembly that is in their house . Greet my beloved Epainetos , who is the first-fruits of Achaia to Messiah .
45016006	Greet Miryam , who worked very hard for us .
45016007	Greet Andronikos and Junias , my relatives and my fellow prisoners , who are eminent among the emissaries , who also were in Messiah before me .
45016008	Greet Amplias , my beloved in יהוה .
45016009	Greet Urbanus , our fellow worker in Messiah , and Stachus , my beloved .
45016010	Greet Apelles , the approved in Messiah . Greet those who are of Aristobulos .
45016011	Greet Herodion , my relative . Greet those who are of Narcissus who are in יהוה .
45016012	Greet Truphaina and Truphosa , who work in יהוה . Greet the beloved Persis , who worked very hard in יהוה .
45016013	Greet Rufus , chosen in יהוה and his mother and mine .
45016014	Greet Asugritos , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brothers who are with them .
45016015	Greet Philologos and Julia , Nereus and his sister , and Olumpas , and all the set-apart ones who are with them .
45016016	Greet one another with a set-apart kiss . The assemblies of Messiah greet you .
45016017	Now I call upon you , brothers , watch out for those who cause divisions and stumbling , contrary to the teaching which you learned , and turn away from them .
45016018	For such ones do not serve our Master יהושע Messiah , but their own stomach , and by smooth words and flattering speech they deceive the hearts of the innocent .
45016019	Your obedience , indeed , is reported to all . Therefore I rejoice concerning you , but I wish you to be wise indeed as to the good , and simple toward the evil .
45016020	And the Elohim of peace shall crush Satan under your feet shortly . The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with you . Amĕn .
45016021	Timothy , my fellow worker , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my relatives , greet you .
45016022	I , Tertius , who wrote this letter , greet you in יהוה .
45016023	Gaios , the host of all the assembly and me , greets you . Ěrastos , the treasurer of the city , greets you , and Quartus , a brother .
45016024	The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with you all . Amĕn .
45016025	And to Him who is able to establish you according to my Good News and the preaching of יהושע Messiah , according to the revelation of the secret which was kept silent since times of old ,
45016026	but now has been made manifest , and by the prophetic Scriptures has been made known to all nations , according to the command of the everlasting Elohim , for belief-obedience .
45016027	To Elohim , wise alone , be the esteem , through יהושע Messiah forever . Amĕn .
46001001	Sha’ul , a called emissary of יהושע Messiah by the desire of Elohim , and brother Sosthenes ,
46001002	to the assembly of Elohim which is at Corinth , to those who are set-apart in Messiah יהושע , called set-apart ones , with all those calling on the Name of יהושע Messiah our Master in every place , theirs and ours :
46001003	Favour to you and peace from Elohim our Father and the Master יהושע Messiah .
46001004	I thank my Elohim always concerning you for the favour of Elohim which was given to you by Messiah יהושע ,
46001005	that in Him you were enriched in all – in every word and all knowledge –
46001006	as the witness of Messiah was confirmed in you ,
46001007	so that you are not lacking in any gift , eagerly waiting for the revelation of our Master יהושע Messiah ,
46001008	who shall also confirm you to the end , unreprovable in the day of our Master יהושע Messiah .
46001009	Elohim is trustworthy , by whom you were called into the fellowship of His Son , יהושע Messiah our Master .
46001010	And I appeal to you , brothers , by the Name of our Master יהושע Messiah , that you all agree , and that there be no divisions among you , but that you be knit together in the same mind and in the same opinion .
46001011	For I have been informed concerning you , my brothers , by those of the house of Chloe , that there are strifes among you .
46001012	What I mean is this , that each one of you says , “ I am of Sha’ul , ” or “ I am of Apollos , ” or “ I am of Kĕpha , ” or “ I am of Messiah . ”
46001013	Has the Messiah been divided ? Was Sha’ul impaled for you ? Or were you immersed in the name of Sha’ul ?
46001014	I thank Elohim that I immersed not one of you except Crispus and Gaios ,
46001015	that no one should say that I immersed into my own name .
46001016	Now I did also immerse the household of Stephanas . For the rest , I do not know whether I immersed anyone else .
46001017	For Messiah did not send me to immerse , but to bring the Good News , not with wisdom of words , that the stake of Messiah should not be nullified .
46001018	For the word of the stake is indeed foolishness to those who are perishing , but to us who are being saved it is the power of Elohim .
46001019	For it has been written , “ I shall destroy the wisdom of the wise , and set aside the learning of the learned ones . ”
46001020	Where is the wise ? Where is the scholar ? Where is the debater of this age ? Has not Elohim made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
46001021	For since , in the wisdom of Elohim , the world through wisdom did not know Elohim , it pleased Elohim through the foolishness of preaching to save those who believe .
46001022	And since Yehuḏim ask a sign , and Greeks seek wisdom ,
46001023	yet we proclaim Messiah impaled , to the Yehuḏim a stumbling-block and to the Greeks foolishness ,
46001024	but to those who are called – both Yehuḏim and Greeks – Messiah the power of Elohim and the wisdom of Elohim .
46001025	For the foolishness of Elohim is wiser than men , and the weakness of Elohim is stronger than men .
46001026	For look at your calling , brothers , that there were not many wise according to the flesh , not many mighty , not many noble .
46001027	But Elohim has chosen the foolish matters of the world to put to shame the wise , and Elohim has chosen the weak of the world to put to shame the strong .
46001028	And Elohim has chosen the low-born of the world and the despised , and the ones that are not , that He might bring to naught the ones that are ,
46001029	so that no flesh should boast in His presence .
46001030	And of Him you are in Messiah יהושע , who became for us wisdom from Elohim , righteousness also , and set-apartness and redemption ,
46001031	that , as it has been written , “ He who boasts , let him boast in יהוה . ”
46002001	And , when I came to you , brothers , I did not come with excellence of speech or wisdom , proclaiming to you the witness of Elohim .
46002002	For I resolved not to know any matter among you except יהושע Messiah and Him impaled .
46002003	And I was with you in weakness , and in fear , and in much trembling .
46002004	And my word and my preaching were not with persuasive words of man’s wisdom , but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power ,
46002005	in order that your belief should not be in the wisdom of men but in the power of Elohim .
46002006	Yet we speak wisdom among those who are perfect , and not the wisdom of this age , nor of the rulers of this age that are being brought to naught .
46002007	But we speak the wisdom of Elohim , which was hidden in a secret , and which Elohim ordained before the ages for our esteem ,
46002008	which no one of the rulers of this age knew , for if they had known , they would not have impaled the Master of esteem .
46002009	But as it has been written , “ Eye has not seen , and ear has not heard , nor have entered into the heart of man what Elohim has prepared for those who love Him . ”
46002010	But Elohim has revealed them to us through His Spirit . For the Spirit searches all matters , even the depths of Elohim .
46002011	For who among men knows the thoughts of a man except the spirit of the man that is in him ? So also , the thoughts of Elohim no one has known , except the Spirit of Elohim .
46002012	And we have received , not the spirit of the world , but the Spirit that is from Elohim , in order to know what Elohim has favourably given us ,
46002013	which we also speak , not in words which man’s wisdom teaches but which the Set-apart Spirit teaches , comparing spiritual matters with spiritual matters .
46002014	But the natural man does not receive the matters of the Spirit of Elohim , for they are foolishness to him , and he is unable to know them , because they are spiritually discerned .
46002015	But he who is spiritual discerns indeed all matters , but he himself is discerned by no one .
46002016	For “ Who has known the mind of יהוה ? Who shall instruct Him ? ” But we have the mind of Messiah .
46003001	And I , brothers , was not able to speak to you as to spiritual ones but as to fleshly , as to babes in Messiah .
46003002	I fed you with milk and not with solid food , for until now you were not able to receive it , and even now you are still not able ,
46003003	for you are still fleshly . For since there is envy , and strife , and divisions among you , are you not fleshly and walking according to man ?
46003004	For when one says , “ I am of Sha’ul , ” and another , “ I am of Apollos , ” are you not fleshly ?
46003005	What then is Apollos , and what is Sha’ul , but servants through whom you believed , as the Master assigned to each ?
46003006	I planted , Apollos watered , but Elohim was giving growth .
46003007	So neither he who plants nor he who waters is any at all , but Elohim who gives the increase .
46003008	And he who plants and he who waters are one , and each one shall receive his own reward according to his own labour .
46003009	For we are fellow workers of Elohim , you are the field of Elohim , the building of Elohim .
46003010	According to the favour of Elohim which was given to me , as a wise master builder I have laid the foundation , and another builds on it . But each one should look how he builds on it .
46003011	For no one is able to lay any other foundation except that which is laid , which is יהושע Messiah .
46003012	And if anyone builds on this foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , straw ,
46003013	each one’s work shall be revealed , for the day shall show it up , because it is revealed by fire . And the fire shall prove the work of each one , what sort it is .
46003014	If anyone’s work remains , which he has built on , he shall receive a reward .
46003015	If anyone’s work is burned , he shall suffer loss , but he himself shall be saved , but so as through fire .
46003016	Do you not know that you are a Dwelling Place of Elohim and that the Spirit of Elohim dwells in you ?
46003017	If anyone destroys the Dwelling Place of Elohim , Elohim shall destroy him . For the Dwelling Place of Elohim is set-apart , which you are .
46003018	Let no one deceive himself . If anyone among you seems to be wise in this age , let him become foolish , so that he might become wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with Elohim . For it has been written , “ He catches the wise in their craftiness , ”
46003020	and again , “ יהוה knows the thoughts of the wise , that they are worthless . ”
46003021	So then , let no one boast in men , for all belongs to you ,
46003022	whether Sha’ul or Apollos or Kĕpha , or the world , or life , or death , or the present or the future – all belongs to you .
46003023	And you belong to Messiah , and Messiah belongs to Elohim .
46004001	Let a man regard us as servants of Messiah and trustees of the secrets of Elohim .
46004002	For the rest , it is sought in trustees , that those should be found trustworthy .
46004003	But with me it is a small matter that I should be judged by you or by a man’s court . But not even myself I judge .
46004004	For I am not conscious of any matter against myself , yet I am not declared right by this , but He who judges me is יהוה .
46004005	So do not judge any at all before the time , until the Master comes , who shall bring to light what is hidden in darkness and reveal the thoughts of the hearts . And then each one’s praise shall come from Elohim .
46004006	And these matters , brothers , I have applied in a figure to myself and Apollos for your sakes , so that in us you might learn not to think beyond what is written , so that none of you be puffed up on behalf of one against the other .
46004007	For who makes you to differ ? And what do you have that you did not receive ? And if you did indeed receive it , why do you boast as if you had not received it ?
46004008	You are already satisfied ! You are already enriched ! You have reigned as sovereigns , apart from us ! And I wish , indeed , you did reign , that we also might reign with you !
46004009	For I think that Elohim has exhibited us , the emissaries , last , as appointed to death , because we became a spectacle to the world , both to messengers and to men .
46004010	We are fools for the sake of Messiah , but you are wise in Messiah ! We are weak , but you are strong ! You are in esteem , but we are not appreciated !
46004011	Until the present hour we both hunger and thirst , and we are scantily clad , and beaten , and homeless ,
46004012	and labour , working with our own hands . Being cursed , we bless ; being persecuted , we suffer ;
46004013	being insulted , we help . We have been made as the filth of the world – dirt wiped off by all until now .
46004014	I do not write this to shame you , but to warn you as my beloved children .
46004015	For if you should have ten thousand instructors in Messiah , yet not many fathers , for in Messiah יהושע I have brought you forth through the Good News .
46004016	Therefore I appeal to you , to become imitators of me .
46004017	For this reason I have sent Timothy to you , who is my beloved and trustworthy son in the Master , who shall remind you of my ways in Messiah , as I teach everywhere in every assembly .
46004018	Now some are puffed up , as though I were not coming to you .
46004019	But I shall come to you shortly , if the Master desires , and I shall know , not the word of those who are puffed up , but the power .
46004020	For the reign of Elohim is not in speech , but in power .
46004021	What do you wish ? Shall I come to you with a rod , or in love and a spirit of meekness ?
46005001	It is commonly reported that there is whoring among you , and such whoring as is not even named among the gentiles , so as one to have his father’s wife !
46005002	And you have been puffed up , and did not rather mourn , so that he who has done this deed , be removed from among you !
46005003	For I indeed , as absent in body but present in spirit , have already judged the one who did this , as though I were present .
46005004	In the Name of our Master יהושע Messiah , when you are gathered together , and my spirit , with the power of our Master יהושע Messiah ,
46005005	deliver such a one to Satan for destruction of the flesh , in order that his spirit be saved in the day of the Master יהושע .
46005006	Your boasting is not good . Do you not know that a little leaven leavens the entire lump ?
46005007	Therefore cleanse out the old leaven , so that you are a new lump , as you are unleavened . For also Messiah our Passover was offered for us .
46005008	So then let us observe the festival , not with old leaven , nor with the leaven of evil and wickedness , but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth .
46005009	I wrote to you in my letter not to keep company with those who whore .
46005010	And I certainly did not mean with those of this world who whore , or with the greedy of gain , or swindlers , or idolaters , since then you would need to go out of the world .
46005011	But now I have written to you not to keep company with anyone called ‘ a brother , ’ if he is one who whores , or greedy of gain , or an idolater , or a reviler , or a drunkard , or a swindler – not even to eat with such a one .
46005012	For what have I to do with judging outsiders ? Do you not judge those who are inside ?
46005013	But Elohim judges those who are outside . And put away the wicked one from among you !
46006001	Should any of you , holding a matter against another , go to be judged before the unrighteous , and not before the set-apart ones ?
46006002	Do you not know that the set-apart ones shall judge the world ? And if the world is judged by you , are you unworthy to judge the smallest matters ?
46006003	Do you not know that we shall judge messengers ? How much more , matters of this life ?
46006004	If then you truly have judgments of this life , do you appoint them as judges who are least esteemed by the assembly ?
46006005	I say this to your shame . Is it so , that there is not a wise one among you , not even one , who shall be able to judge between his brothers ?
46006006	But brother against brother goes to be judged and that before unbelievers !
46006007	Already , then , there is a failure with you , that you have lawsuits among you . Why not rather be wronged ? Why not rather be cheated ?
46006008	But you yourselves do wrong and cheat , and that to your brothers !
46006009	Do you not know that the unrighteous shall not inherit the reign of Elohim ? Do not be deceived . Neither those who whore , nor idolaters , nor adulterers , nor effeminate , nor homosexuals ,
46006010	nor thieves , nor greedy of gain , nor drunkards , nor revilers , nor swindlers shall inherit the reign of Elohim .
46006011	And such were some of you . But you were washed , but you were set apart , but you were declared right in the Name of the Master יהושע and by the Spirit of our Elohim .
46006012	All is permitted me , but not all do profit . All is permitted me , but I shall not be under authority of any .
46006013	Foods for the stomach and the stomach for foods – but Elohim shall destroy both it and them . And the body is not for whoring but for the Master , and the Master for the body .
46006014	And Elohim , who raised up the Master , shall also raise us up through His power .
46006015	Do you not know that your bodies are members of Messiah ? Shall I then take the members of Messiah and make them members of a whore ? Let it not be !
46006016	Or do you not know that he who is joined to a whore is one body ? For He says , “ The two shall become one flesh . ”
46006017	And he who is joined to the Master is one spirit .
46006018	Flee whoring . Every sin that a man does is outside the body , but he who commits whoring sins against his own body .
46006019	Or do you not know that your body is the Dwelling Place of the Set-apart Spirit who is in you , which you have from Elohim , and you are not your own ?
46006020	For you were bought with a price , therefore esteem Elohim in your body and in your spirit , which are of Elohim .
46007001	And concerning the matters you wrote to me : It is good for a man not to touch a woman .
46007002	But because of whoring , let each one have his own wife , and let each woman have her own husband .
46007003	Let the husband render to his wife what is her due , and likewise also the wife to her husband .
46007004	The wife does not have authority over her own body , but the husband does . And likewise the husband does not have authority over his own body , but the wife does .
46007005	Do not deprive one another except with agreement for a time , to give yourselves to fasting and prayer . And come together again so that Satan does not try you because of your lack of self-control .
46007006	And I say this as a concession , not as a command .
46007007	For I wish that all men were even as I myself . But each one has his own gift from Elohim , one in this way and another in that .
46007008	And I say to the unmarried and to the widows : It is good for them if they remain even as I am ,
46007009	but if they do not have self-control , let them marry , for it is better to marry than to burn .
46007010	And to the married I command , not I , but the Master : A wife should not separate from a husband .
46007011	But if she is indeed separated , let her remain unmarried or be restored to favour with her husband , and let a husband not send away a wife .
46007012	And to the rest I say , not the Master : If any brother has an unbelieving wife , and she thinks well to live with him , let him not send her away .
46007013	And a woman who has an unbelieving husband , and he thinks well to live with her , let her not send him away .
46007014	For the unbelieving husband has been set-apart in the wife , and the unbelieving wife has been set-apart in the husband . Otherwise your children would be unclean , but now they are set-apart .
46007015	And , if the unbelieving one separates , let him separate himself . A brother or a sister has not been enslaved in such matters . But Elohim has called us to peace .
46007016	For how do you know , O wife , whether you shall save your husband ? Or how do you know , O husband , whether you shall save your wife ?
46007017	Only , as Elohim has distributed to each one , as the Master has called each one , so let him walk . And so I order in all the assemblies .
46007018	Was anyone called while circumcised ? Let him not become uncircumcised . Was anyone called while uncircumcised ? Let him not be circumcised .
46007019	The circumcision is naught , and the uncircumcision is naught , but the guarding of the commands of Elohim does matter !
46007020	Let each one remain in the same calling in which he was called .
46007021	Were you called while a slave ? It matters not to you , but if you are able to become free too , rather use it .
46007022	For he who is called in the Master while a slave is the Master’s freed man . Likewise he who is called while free is a slave of Messiah .
46007023	You were bought with a price , do not become slaves of men .
46007024	Brothers , let each one remain with Elohim in that calling in which he was called .
46007025	And concerning maidens : I have no command from the Master , but I give judgment as one whom the Master in His compassion has made trustworthy .
46007026	I think then that this is good because of the present necessity , that it is good for a man to remain as he is .
46007027	Are you bound to a wife ? Do not seek to be loosed . Are you loosed from a wife ? Do not seek a wife .
46007028	But even if you should marry , you have not sinned . And if a maiden should marry , she has not sinned . But such shall have pressure in the flesh , but I would spare you .
46007029	And this I say , brothers , the time is short , so that from now on even those who have wives should be as though they had none ,
46007030	and those who weep as though they did not weep , and those who rejoice as though they did not rejoice , and those who buy as though they did not possess ,
46007031	and those who use this world as not misusing it . For the scene of this world is passing away .
46007032	And I wish you to be without concern . He who is unmarried is concerned about the matters of the Master – how to please the Master .
46007033	But he who is married is concerned about the matters of the world – how to please his wife .
46007034	There is a difference between a wife and a maiden . The unmarried woman is concerned about the matters of the Master , that she might be set-apart both in body and in spirit . But she who is married is concerned about the matters of the world – how to please her husband .
46007035	And this I say for your own good , not to put a restraint on you , but for what is proper , and to attend to the Master without distraction .
46007036	And if anyone thinks he is behaving improperly toward his maiden , if she is past the flower of her youth , and so it should be , let him do what he desires , he does not sin – let them marry .
46007037	But he who stands steadfast in his heart , having no necessity , and has authority over his own desire , and has so decided in his heart to guard his own maiden , does well .
46007038	So then he who gives her in marriage does well , but he who does not give her in marriage does better .
46007039	A wife is bound by Torah as long as her husband lives , and if her husband dies , she is free to be married to whom she desires , only in the Master .
46007040	But she is better off if she remains as she is , according to my opinion . And I think I also have the Spirit of Elohim .
46008001	And concerning food offered to idols : We know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge puffs up , but love builds up .
46008002	If anyone thinks that he knows somewhat , he does not yet know as he should know .
46008003	But if anyone loves Elohim , this one is known by Him .
46008004	So then , concerning the eating of food offered to idols , we know that an idol is no matter at all in the world , and that there is no other Elohim but one .
46008005	For even if there are so-called mighty ones , whether in heaven or on earth – as there are many mighty ones and many masters –
46008006	for us there is one Elohim , the Father , from whom all came and for whom we live , and one Master יהושע Messiah , through whom all came and through whom we live .
46008007	However , not all have this knowledge . But some , being aware of the idol , until now eat it as having been offered to an idol , so their conscience , being weak , is defiled .
46008008	But food does not commend us to Elohim , for we are none the better if we eat , nor any worse for not eating .
46008009	But look to it , lest somehow this right of yours become a stumbling-block to those who are weak .
46008010	For if anyone sees you who have knowledge eating in an idol’s place , shall not his conscience , if he is weak , be built up to eat food offered to idols ?
46008011	So this weak brother , for whom Messiah died , shall perish through your knowledge !
46008012	Now sinning in this way against the brothers , and wounding their weak conscience , you sin against Messiah .
46008013	Therefore , if food makes my brother stumble , I am never again going to eat meat , lest I make my brother stumble .
46009001	Am I not an emissary ? Am I not free ? Have I not seen יהושע Messiah our Master ? Are you not my work in the Master ?
46009002	If to others I am not an emissary , I certainly am to you . For you are the seal of my office of the emissary in the Master .
46009003	My defence to those who examine me is this :
46009004	Do we not have a right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Do we not have a right to take along a sister – a wife – as do also the other emissaries , and the brothers of the Master , and Kĕpha ?
46009006	Or do only Barnaḇah and I have no right to refrain from working ?
46009007	Who serves as a soldier at his own expense ? Who plants a vineyard and does not eat of its fruit ? Or who shepherds a flock and does not feed on the milk of the flock ?
46009008	Do I say this as a man ? Or does not the Torah say the same too ?
46009009	For it has been written in the Torah of Mosheh , “ You shall not muzzle an ox while it treads out the grain . ” Is it about oxen Elohim is concerned ?
46009010	Or does He say it because of us all ? For this was written because of us , that he who ploughs should plough in expectation , and the thresher in expectation of sharing .
46009011	If we have sown spiritual seed among you , is it too much if we reap material goods from you ?
46009012	If others share authority over you , should not rather we ? But we have not used this authority , but we put up with all , lest we hinder the Good News of Messiah .
46009013	Do you not know that those serving the Set-apart Place eat from the Set-apart Place , and those attending at the altar have their share of the offerings of the altar ?
46009014	So also the Master instituted that those announcing the Good News should live from the Good News .
46009015	But I have used none of these , nor have I written this that it should be done so to me . For it would be better for me to die than that anyone should make my boasting empty .
46009016	For if I bring the Good News , it is no boasting for me , for necessity is laid on me , and it is woe to me if I do not bring the Good News !
46009017	For if I do this voluntarily I have a reward , but if not voluntarily , I am entrusted with a management .
46009018	What then is my reward ? That in bringing the Good News , I should offer the Good News of Messiah without cost , so as not to abuse my authority in the Good News .
46009019	For though I am free from all , I made myself a servant to all , in order to win more ,
46009020	and to the Yehuḏim I became as a Yehuḏite , that I might win Yehuḏim ; to those who are under Torah , as under Torah , so as to win those who are under Torah ;
46009021	to those without Torah , as without Torah – not being without Torah toward Elohim , but under Torah of Messiah – so as to win those who are without Torah .
46009022	To the weak I became as weak , so as to win the weak . To all men I have become all , so as to save some , by all means .
46009023	And I do this because of the Good News , so as to become a fellow-partaker with it .
46009024	Do you not know that those who run in a race indeed all run , but one receives the prize ? Run in such a way as to obtain it .
46009025	And everyone who competes controls himself in every way . Now they do it to receive a corruptible crown , but we for an incorruptible crown .
46009026	Therefore I run accordingly , not with uncertainty . Thus I fight , not as one who beats the air .
46009027	But I treat my body severely and make it my slave , so that when I have proclaimed to others , I myself might be rejected .
46010001	For I do not wish you to be ignorant , brothers , that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ,
46010002	and all were immersed into Mosheh in the cloud and in the sea ,
46010003	and all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink . For they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed , and the Rock was Messiah .
46010005	However , with most of them Elohim was not well pleased , for they were laid low in the wilderness .
46010006	And these became examples for us , so that we should not lust after evil , as those indeed lusted .
46010007	And do not become idolaters as some of them , as it has been written , “ The people sat down to eat and to drink , and stood up to play . ”
46010008	Neither should we commit whoring , as some of them did , and in one day twenty-three thousand fell ,
46010009	neither let us try Messiah , as some of them also tried , and were destroyed by serpents ,
46010010	neither grumble , as some of them also grumbled , and were destroyed by the destroyer .
46010011	And all these came upon them as examples , and they were written as a warning to us , on whom the ends of the ages have come ,
46010012	so that he who thinks he stands , let him take heed lest he fall .
46010013	No trial has overtaken you except such as is common to man , and Elohim is trustworthy , who shall not allow you to be tried beyond what you are able , but with the trial shall also make the way of escape , enabling you to bear it .
