46010014	Therefore , my beloved ones , flee from idolatry .
46010015	I speak as to wise men , judge for yourselves what I say .
46010016	The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not a sharing in the blood of Messiah ? The bread that we break , is it not a sharing in the body of Messiah ?
46010017	Because there is one bread , we , who are many , are one body , for we all partake of the one bread .
46010018	Look at Yisra’ĕl after the flesh : Are not those who eat of the offerings sharers in the altar ?
46010019	What then do I say ? That an idol is of any value ? Or that which is offered to idols is of any value ?
46010020	No , but what the gentiles offer they offer to demons and not to Elohim , and I do not wish you to become sharers with demons .
46010021	You are not able to drink the cup of the Master and the cup of demons , you are not able to partake of the table of the Master and of the table of demons .
46010022	Do we provoke the Master to jealousy ? Are we stronger than He ?
46010023	All is permitted me , but not all do profit . All is permitted me , but not all build up .
46010024	Let no one seek his own , but each one that of the other .
46010025	You eat whatever is sold in the meat market , asking no questions because of conscience ,
46010026	for “ The earth belongs to יהוה , and all that fills it . ”
46010027	And if any of the unbelievers invite you , and you wish to go , you eat whatever is set before you , asking no question on account of the conscience .
46010028	And if anyone says to you , “ This was offered to idols , ” do not eat it because of the one pointing it out to you , and on account of the conscience , for “ The earth belongs to יהוה , and all that fills it . ”
46010029	Now I say conscience , not your own , but that of the other . For why is my freedom judged by another’s conscience ?
46010030	But if I partake with thanks , why am I evil spoken of for what I give thanks ?
46010031	Therefore , whether you eat or drink , or whatever you do , do all to the esteem of Elohim .
46010032	Cause no stumbling , either to the Yehuḏim or to the Greeks or to the assembly of Elohim ,
46010033	as I also please all men in all matters , not seeking my own advantage , but that of the many , that they might be saved .
46011001	Become imitators of me , as I also am of Messiah .
46011002	And I praise you , brothers , that you remember me in every way and keep the traditions as I delivered them to you .
46011003	And I wish you to know that the head of every man is the Messiah , and the head of woman is the man , and the head of Messiah is Elohim .
46011004	Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , brings shame to his Head .
46011005	And every woman praying or prophesying with her head uncovered brings shame to her head , for that is one and the same as if her head were shaved .
46011006	For if a woman is not covered , let her also be shorn . But if it is a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaved , let her be covered .
46011007	For a man indeed should not cover his head , since he is the likeness and esteem of Elohim , but woman is the esteem of man .
46011008	For man is not from woman , but woman from man .
46011009	For man also was not created for the woman , but woman for the man .
46011010	Because of this the woman ought to have a symbol of authority on her head , because of the messengers .
46011011	However , man is not independent of woman , nor woman independent of man , in the Master .
46011012	For as the woman was from the man , even so the man also is through the woman . But all are from Elohim .
46011013	Judge for yourselves : is it proper for a woman to pray to Elohim with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Does not nature itself teach you that if a man indeed has long hair , it is a disrespect to him ?
46011015	And if a woman has long hair , it is an esteem to her , because the long hair has been given to her over against a veil .
46011016	If , however , anyone seems to be contentious , we do not have such a habit , nor do the assemblies of Elohim .
46011017	And in declaring this I do not praise you , since you come together not for the better but for the worse .
46011018	For in the first place , I hear that when you come together as an assembly , there are divisions among you , and to some extent I believe it .
46011019	For there have to be factions even among you , so that the approved ones might be revealed among you .
46011020	So when you come together in one place , it is not to eat the Master’s supper .
46011021	For , when you eat , each one takes his own supper first , and one is hungry and another is drunk .
46011022	Have you not houses to eat and drink in ? Or do you despise the assembly of Elohim and shame those who have not ? What shall I say to you ? Shall I praise you in this ? I do not praise !
46011023	For I received from the Master that which I also delivered to you : that the Master יהושע in the night in which He was delivered up took bread ,
46011024	and having given thanks , He broke it and said , “ Take , eat , this is My body which is broken for you ; do this in remembrance of Me . ”
46011025	In the same way also the cup , after supper , saying , “ This cup is the renewed covenant in My blood . As often as you drink it , do this in remembrance of Me . ”
46011026	For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup , you proclaim the death of the Master until He comes .
46011027	So that whoever should eat this bread or drink this cup of the Master unworthily shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Master .
46011028	But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread and drink of that cup .
46011029	For the one who is eating and drinking unworthily , eats and drinks judgment to himself , not discerning the body of the Master .
46011030	Because of this many are weak and sick among you , and many sleep .
46011031	For if we were to examine ourselves , we would not be judged .
46011032	But when we are judged , we are disciplined by the Master , that we should not be condemned with the world .
46011033	So then , my brothers , when you come together to eat , wait for one another .
46011034	And if anyone is hungry , let him eat at home , lest you come together for judgment . And the rest I shall set in order when I come .
46012001	And concerning spiritual gifts , brothers , I do not wish you to be ignorant .
46012002	You know that you were gentiles , led away to the dumb idols , even as you might be led .
46012003	Therefore I make known to you that no one speaking by the Spirit of Elohim says יהושע is a curse , and no one is able to say that יהושע is Master except by the Set-apart Spirit .
46012004	And there are different kinds of gifts , but the same Spirit .
46012005	There are different kinds of services , but the same Master .
46012006	And there are different kinds of workings , but it is the same Elohim who is working all in all .
46012007	And to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit for profiting ,
46012008	for to one is given a word of wisdom through the Spirit , and to another a word of knowledge according to the same Spirit ,
46012009	and to another belief by the same Spirit , and to another gifts of healing by the same Spirit ,
46012010	and to another operations of powers , and to another prophecy , and to another discerning of spirits , and to another kinds of tongues , and to another interpretation of tongues .
46012011	But one and the same Spirit works all these , distributing to each one individually as He intends .
46012012	For as the body is one and has many members , but all the members of that one body , being many , are one body , so also is the Messiah .
46012013	For indeed by one Spirit we were all immersed into one body , whether Yehuḏim or Greeks , whether slaves or free , and we were all made to drink into one Spirit .
46012014	For indeed the body is not one member but many .
46012015	If the foot says , “ Because I am not a hand , I do not belong to the body , ” does it therefore not belong to the body ?
46012016	And if the ear says , “ Because I am not an eye , I do not belong to the body , ” does it therefore not belong to the body ?
46012017	If all the body was an eye , where would be the hearing ? If all hearing , where would be the smelling ?
46012018	But now Elohim has set the members , each one of them , in the body , even as He pleased .
46012019	And if they all had been one member , where would the body be ?
46012020	And now , there are indeed many members , but one body .
46012021	And an eye is unable to say to the hand , “ I have no need of you , ” or again the head to the feet , “ I have no need of you . ”
46012022	But much rather , those members of the body which are thought to be weaker are necessary .
46012023	And to those of the body which we think to be less respected , these we present greater respect . And our unseemly members have greater seemliness ,
46012024	whereas our seemly members have no need . But Elohim blended together the body , having given greater respect to that member which lacks it ,
46012025	that there should be no division in the body , but that the members should have the same concern one for another .
46012026	And if one member suffers , all the members suffer with it ; or if one member is esteemed , all the members rejoice with it .
46012027	And you are a body of Messiah , and members individually .
46012028	And Elohim has appointed these in the assembly : firstly emissaries , secondly prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , ministrations , kinds of tongues .
46012029	Are all emissaries ? Are all prophets ? Are all teachers ? Are all workers of miracles ?
46012030	Do all have gifts of healings ? Do all speak with tongues ? Do all interpret ?
46012031	But earnestly seek the better gifts . And yet I show you a more excellent way .
46013001	If I speak with the tongues of men and of messengers , but do not have love , I have become as sounding brass or a clanging cymbal .
46013002	And if I have prophecy , and know all secrets and all knowledge , and if I have all belief , so as to remove mountains , but do not have love , I am none at all .
46013003	And if I give out all my possessions to feed the poor , and if I give my body to be burned , but do not have love , I am not profited at all .
46013004	Love is patient , is kind , love does not envy , love does not boast , is not puffed up ,
46013005	does not behave indecently , does not seek its own , is not provoked , reckons not the evil ,
46013006	does not rejoice over the unrighteousness , but rejoices in the truth ,
46013007	it covers all , believes all , expects all , endures all .
46013008	Love never fails . And whether there be prophecies , they shall be inactive ; or tongues , they shall cease ; or knowledge , it shall be inactive .
46013009	For we know in part and we prophesy in part .
46013010	But when that which is perfect has come , then that which is in part shall be inactive .
46013011	When I was a child , I spoke as a child , I thought as a child , I reasoned as a child . But when I became a man , I did away with childish matters .
46013012	For now we see in a mirror , dimly , but then face to face . Now I know in part , but then I shall know , as I also have been known .
46013013	And now belief , expectation , and love remain – these three . But the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love , and earnestly seek the spiritual gifts , but rather that you prophesy .
46014002	For he who is speaking in a tongue does not speak to men but to Elohim , for no one understands , but in the Spirit he speaks secrets .
46014003	But he who is prophesying speaks upbuilding and encouragement and comfort to men .
46014004	He who is speaking in a tongue builds up himself , but he who is prophesying builds up the assembly .
46014005	Now I wish you all spoke with tongues , but rather that you might prophesy , for he who is prophesying is greater than he who is speaking with tongues , unless he interprets , so that the assembly might receive upbuilding .
46014006	But now , brothers , if I come to you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you unless I speak to you , either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by teaching ?
46014007	Nevertheless , lifeless instruments making a sound , whether flute or harp , if they do not make a distinction in the sound , how shall it be known what is played on the flute or on the harp ?
46014008	For indeed , if the trumpet makes an indistinct sound , who shall prepare himself for battle ?
46014009	So also you , if you do not give speech by the tongue that is clear , how shall it be known what is spoken ? For you shall be speaking into the air .
46014010	There are , undoubtedly , so many kinds of sounds in the world , and none of them is without distinct sound .
46014011	If then I do not know the power of the voice , I shall be a foreigner to him who speaks , and he who speaks be a foreigner to me .
46014012	So also you , since you are ardent for spiritual gifts , seek to excel in the upbuilding of the assembly .
46014013	Therefore , he who is speaking in a tongue , let him pray that he might interpret .
46014014	For if I am praying in a tongue , my spirit is praying , but my understanding is without fruit .
46014015	What then is it ? I shall pray with the spirit , and I shall also pray with the understanding . I shall sing with the spirit , and I shall also sing with the understanding .
46014016	Otherwise , if you bless with the spirit , how shall he who fills up the place of the unlearned say “ Amĕn ” at your giving of thanks , since he does not know what you say ?
46014017	For you truly give thanks well , but the other is not built up .
46014018	I thank my Elohim I speak with tongues more than you all ,
46014019	but in an assembly I wish to speak five words with my understanding that I might instruct others also , than ten thousand words in a tongue .
46014020	Brothers , do not be children in your thinking , but in evil be babes , and in your thinking be perfect .
46014021	In the Torah it has been written , “ With men of other tongues and other lips I shall speak to this people . And even so , they shall not hear Me , says יהוה . ”
46014022	So then tongues are for a sign , not to those who believe but to unbelievers , and prophesying is not for unbelievers but for those who believe .
46014023	If then all the assembly comes together in one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those who are unlearned or unbelievers , shall they not say that you are mad ?
46014024	But if all prophesy , and an unbeliever or an unlearned one comes in , he is reproved by all , he is discerned by all .
46014025	And so the secrets of his heart are revealed . And so , falling down on his face , he shall worship Elohim , declaring that Elohim is truly among you .
46014026	What then is it , brothers ? Whenever you come together , each one has a psalm , has a teaching , has a tongue , has a revelation , has an interpretation . Let all be done for upbuilding .
46014027	If anyone speaks in a tongue , let there be two or at the most three , each in turn , and let one interpret .
46014028	And if there is no interpreter , let him be silent in an assembly , and let him speak to himself and to Elohim .
46014029	And let two or three prophets speak , and let the others discern .
46014030	And if there should be a revelation to another who sits by , let the first be silent .
46014031	For you are all able to prophesy one by one , so that all learn and all be encouraged .
46014032	And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
46014033	For Elohim is not Elohim of disorder but of peace , as in all the assemblies of the set-apart ones .
46014034	Let your women be silent in the assemblies , for they are not allowed to speak , but let them subject themselves , as the Torah also says .
46014035	And if they wish to learn whatever , let them ask their own husbands at home , for it is improper for women to speak in an assembly .
46014036	Or did the word of Elohim go out from you ? Or did it reach only to you ?
46014037	If anyone thinks himself to be a prophet or spiritual , let him acknowledge what I write to you , that they are a command of the Master .
46014038	And if anyone is ignorant , let him be ignorant .
46014039	So , then , brothers , earnestly seek to prophesy , and do not forbid speaking in tongues .
46014040	Let all be done decently and in order .
46015001	But brothers , I make known to you the Good News , which I brought as Good News to you , which you also did receive , and in which you stand ,
46015002	through which also you are being saved , if you hold fast that word I brought as Good News to you . Otherwise , you have believed in vain .
46015003	For I delivered to you at the first that which I also received : that Messiah died for our sins according to the Scriptures ,
46015004	and that He was buried , and that He was raised the third day , according to the Scriptures ,
46015005	and that He was seen by Kĕpha , then by the twelve .

46015007	After that He was seen by Ya‛aqoḇ , then by all the emissaries .
46015008	And last of all He was seen by me also , as if to one born prematurely .
46015009	For I am the least of the emissaries , who am not worthy to be called an emissary , because I persecuted the assembly of Elohim .
46015010	But by the favour of Elohim I am what I am , and His favour toward me was not in vain , but I laboured much more than they all , yet not I , but the favour of Elohim with me .
46015011	Whether , then , it was I or they , so we proclaimed and so you believed .
46015012	And if Messiah is proclaimed that He has been raised from the dead , how do some among you say that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
46015013	And if there is no resurrection of the dead , then Messiah has not been raised .
46015014	And if Messiah has not been raised , then our proclaiming is empty , and your belief also empty ,
46015015	and we are also found false witnesses of Elohim , because we have witnessed of Elohim that He raised up Messiah , whom He did not raise up , if then the dead are not raised .
46015016	For if the dead are not raised , then neither Messiah has been raised .
46015017	And if Messiah has not been raised , your belief is to no purpose , you are still in your sins !
46015018	Then also those who have fallen asleep in Messiah have perished .
46015019	If in this life only we have expectation in Messiah , we are of all men the most wretched .
46015020	But now Messiah has been raised from the dead , and has become the first-fruit of those having fallen asleep .
46015021	For since death is through a man , resurrection of the dead is also through a Man .
46015022	For as all die in Aḏam , so also all shall be made alive in Messiah .
46015023	And each in his own order : Messiah the first-fruits , then those who are of Messiah at His coming ,
46015024	then the end , when He delivers up the reign to Elohim the Father , when He has brought to naught all rule and all authority and power .
46015025	For He has to reign until He has put all enemies under His feet .
46015026	The last enemy to be brought to naught is death .
46015027	For “ He has put all under His feet . ” But when He says “ all are put under Him , ” it is clear that He who put all under Him is excepted .
46015028	And when all are made subject to Him , then the Son Himself shall also be subject to Him who put all under Him , in order that Elohim be all in all .
46015029	Otherwise , what shall they do who are immersed for the dead , if the dead are not raised at all ? Why indeed are they immersed for the dead ?
46015030	And why do we stand in danger every hour ?
46015031	I affirm , by the boasting in you which I have in Messiah יהושע our Master , I die day by day .
46015032	If , as men do , I have fought with beasts at Ephesos , of what good is it to me ? If the dead are not raised , “ Let us eat and drink , for tomorrow we die . ”
46015033	Do not be led astray , “ Evil company corrupts good habits . ”
46015034	Wake up to soberness , righteously , and do not sin , for some do not have the knowledge of Elohim . I speak this to your shame .
46015035	But someone might say , “ How are the dead raised up ? And with what body do they come ? ”
46015036	Senseless one ! What you sow is not made alive unless it dies .
46015037	And as to what you sow : you do not sow the body which is to be , but a bare grain , it might be wheat or some other grain .
46015038	But Elohim gives it a body as He wishes , and to each seed a body of its own .
46015039	All flesh is not the same flesh , but there is one flesh of men , and another flesh of beasts , and another of fishes , and another of birds .
46015040	And there are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies , but the esteem of the heavenly is truly one , and the esteem of the earthly is another ,
46015041	one esteem of the sun , and another esteem of the moon , and another esteem of the stars – for star differs from star in esteem .
46015042	So also is the resurrection of the dead : it is sown in corruption , it is raised in incorruption ;
46015043	it is sown in disrespect , it is raised in esteem ; it is sown in weakness , it is raised in power ;
46015044	it is sown a natural body , it is raised a spiritual body ; there is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
46015045	And so it has been written , “ The first man Aḏam became a living being , ” the last Aḏam a life-giving Spirit .
46015046	The spiritual , however , was not first , but the natural , and afterward the spiritual .
46015047	The first man was of the earth , earthy ; the second Man is the Master from heaven .
46015048	As is the earthy , so also are those who are earthy ; and as is the heavenly , so also are those who are heavenly .
46015049	And as we have borne the likeness of the earthy , we shall also bear the likeness of the heavenly .
46015050	And this I say , brothers , that flesh and blood is unable to inherit the reign of Elohim , neither does corruption inherit incorruption .
46015051	See , I speak a secret to you : We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
46015052	in a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trumpet . For the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
46015053	For this corruptible has to put on incorruption , and this mortal to put on immortality .
46015054	And when this corruptible has put on incorruption , and this mortal has put on immortality , then shall come to be the word that has been written , “ Death is swallowed up in overcoming . ”
46015055	“ O Death , where is your sting ? O grave , where is your overcoming ? ”
46015056	And the sting of death is the sin , and the power of the sin is the Torah .
46015057	But thanks to Elohim who gives us the overcoming through our Master יהושע Messiah .
46015058	Therefore , my beloved brothers , be steadfast , immovable , always excelling in the work of the Master , knowing that your labour is not in vain in the Master .
46016001	And concerning the collections for the set-apart ones , you are to do as I gave orders to the assemblies of Galatia :
46016002	On the first day of the week let each one of you set aside , storing up whatever he is prospered , so that there are no collections when I come .
46016003	And when I come , whomever you approve by your letters , I shall send to bear your gift to Yerushalayim .
46016004	And if it is fitting for me to go , they shall go with me .
46016005	And I shall come to you when I pass through Makedonia , for I am passing through Makedonia .
46016006	And possibly I shall stay with you , or even spend the winter , so that you send me forward , wherever I go .
46016007	For I do not wish to see you now on the way , but I expect to stay a while with you , if the Master permits .
46016008	And I shall remain in Ephesos until the Festival of Weeks .
46016009	For a great and effective door has opened to me , and many are opposing .
46016010	And if Timothy comes , see that he is with you without fear , for he does the work of the Master , even as I .
46016011	Therefore let no one despise him . And send him forward in peace , so that he comes to me , for I am waiting for him with the brothers .
46016012	And concerning our brother Apollos , I strongly urged him to come to you with the brothers , but he had no desire at all to come at this time ; however , he shall come when it is convenient .
46016013	Watch , stand fast in the belief , be men , be strong .
46016014	Let all that you do be done in love .
46016015	And I urge you , brothers , you know the household of Stephanas , that it is the first-fruit of Achaia , and that they have assigned themselves for service to the set-apart ones ,
46016016	that you also be subject to such , and to everyone who works and labours with us .
46016017	And I rejoice about the coming of Stephanas , and Fortunatos , and Achaikos , for what was lacking on your part they supplied .
46016018	For they refreshed my spirit and yours , therefore give recognition to such ones .
46016019	The assemblies of Asia greet you . Aqulas and Priscilla greet you heartily in the Master , with the assembly that is in their house .
46016020	All the brothers greet you . Greet one another with a set-apart kiss .
46016021	The greeting with my own hand – Sha’ul .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Master יהושע Messiah , let him be a curse . Maranatha !
46016023	The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with you .
46016024	My love be with you all in Messiah יהושע . Amĕn .
47001001	Sha’ul , an emissary of יהושע Messiah , by the desire of Elohim , and Timothy the brother , to the assembly of Elohim that is at Corinth , with all the set-apart ones who are in all Achaia :
47001002	Favour to you and peace from Elohim our Father and the Master יהושע Messiah .
47001003	Blessed be the Elohim and Father of our Master יהושע Messiah , the Father of compassion and Elohim of all comfort ,
47001004	who is comforting us in all our pressure , enabling us to comfort those who are in every pressure , through the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by Elohim .
47001005	Because , as the sufferings of Messiah overflow in us , so our comfort also overflows through Messiah .
47001006	And if we suffer pressure , it is for your comfort and deliverance , being worked out in enduring the same sufferings which we also suffer . If we are comforted , it is for your comfort and deliverance .
47001007	And our expectation for you is steadfast , because we know that as you are sharing in the sufferings – so also in the comfort .
47001008	For we do not wish you to be ignorant , brothers , of our pressure which came to us in Asia , that we were weighed down , exceedingly , beyond ability , so that we despaired even of life .
47001009	Indeed , we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves but in Elohim who raises the dead ,
47001010	who rescued us from so great a death , and does rescue , in whom we trust that He shall still rescue us ,
47001011	you also helping together in prayer for us , that thanks shall be given by many on our behalf for the favour bestowed upon us through many .
47001012	For our boasting is this : the witness of our conscience that we behaved ourselves in the world in simplicity and sincerity of Elohim , not in fleshly wisdom but in the favour of Elohim , and much more toward you .
47001013	For we are not writing any other matters to you than what you read or understand . Now I trust you shall understand , even to the end ,
47001014	as also you have understood us in part , that we are your boast as you also are ours , in the day of the Master יהושע .
47001015	And relying on this I intended to come to you before , that you might twice receive a favour ,
47001016	and to pass your way into Makedonia , and again from Makedonia come to you , and to be sent by you on my way to Yehuḏah .
47001017	Since I intended this , did I do it lightly ? Or what I plan , do I plan according to the flesh , that with me there should be Yea , Yea , and No , No ?
47001018	But Elohim is trustworthy , that our word to you was not Yea and No .
47001019	For the Son of Elohim , יהושע Messiah , who was proclaimed among you by us – by me , Sila , and Timothy – was not Yea and No , but in Him was Yea .
47001020	For as many promises as are of Elohim , in Him they are Yea , and in Him Amĕn , to the esteem of Elohim through us .
47001021	But He who establishes us with you in Messiah and has anointed us is Elohim ,
47001022	who also sealed us , and gave the Spirit in our hearts as a pledge .
47001023	And I call Elohim as witness against my being , that to spare you I came no more to Corinth .
47001024	Not that we rule over your belief , but we are fellow workers for your joy , for you stand by belief .
47002001	And I decided this within myself , not to come to you again in sadness .
47002002	For if I make you sad , then who is he who makes me glad but the one who is made sad by me ?
47002003	And I wrote to you as I did , so that having come , I might not have sadness over those from whom I should have joy , trusting in you all that my joy is that of you all .
47002004	For out of much pressure and distress of heart I wrote to you , with many tears , not that you should be sad , but that you might know the love which I so richly have for you .
47002005	But if anyone has caused sadness , he has not made me sad , but in some degree you all – not to be too harsh .
47002006	For such a one this punishment , by the many , is sufficient ,
47002007	so that , on the contrary , you should rather forgive and comfort , lest somehow such a one be swallowed up with too much sadness .
47002008	So I appeal to you to confirm your love to him .
47002009	Besides , I wrote for this purpose also , that I might know the proof of you , if you are obedient in all matters .
47002010	And whom you forgive any matter , I do also . For indeed , if I have forgiven any matter , I have forgiven that one for your sakes in the sight of Messiah ,
47002011	lest Satan should take advantage of us , for we are not ignorant of his thoughts .
47002012	And when I came to Troas for the Good News of Messiah , and a door was opened to me by the Master ,
47002013	I had no rest in my spirit , because I did not find Titus my brother . But taking my leave of them , I went on to Makedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to Elohim who always leads us on , to overcome in Messiah , and manifests through us the fragrance of His knowledge in every place .
47002015	Because we are to Elohim the fragrance of Messiah among those who are being saved and among those who are perishing .
47002016	To the one we are the smell of death to death , and to the other the fragrance of life to life . And who is competent for these ?
47002017	For we are not , as so many , adulterating the Word of Elohim for gain – but as of sincerity , but as from Elohim , in the sight of Elohim , we speak in Messiah .
47003001	Are we to begin to recommend ourselves again ? Or do we need , as some , letters of recommendation to you , or from you ?
47003002	You are our letter , having been written in our hearts , known and read by all men ,
47003003	making it obvious that you are a letter of Messiah , served by us , written not with ink but by the Spirit of the living Elohim , not on tablets of stone but on fleshly tablets of the heart .
47003004	And such trust we have toward Elohim , through the Messiah .
47003005	Not that we are competent in ourselves to reckon any matter as from ourselves , but our competence is from Elohim ,
47003006	who also made us competent as servants of a renewed covenant , not of the letter but of the Spirit , for the letter kills but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	But if the administering of death in letters , engraved on stones , was esteemed , so that the children of Yisra’ĕl were unable to look steadily at the face of Mosheh because of the esteem of his face , which was passing away ,
47003008	how much more esteemed shall the administering of the Spirit not be ?
47003009	For if the administering of condemnation had esteem , the administering of righteousness exceeds much more in esteem .
47003010	For indeed what was made esteemed had no esteem in this respect , in view of the esteem that excels .
47003011	For if that which is passing away was esteemed , much more that which remains in esteem .
47003012	Having then such expectation , we use much boldness of speech ,
47003013	and not like Mosheh , who put a veil over his face so that the children of Yisra’ĕl should not look steadily at the end of what was passing away .
47003014	But their minds were hardened , for to this day , when the old covenant is being read , that same veil remains , not lifted , because in Messiah it is taken away .
47003015	But to this day , when Mosheh is being read , a veil lies on their heart .
47003016	And when one turns to the Master , the veil is taken away .
47003017	Now יהוה is the Spirit , and where the Spirit of יהוה is , there is freedom .
47003018	And we all , as with unveiled face we see as in a mirror the esteem of יהוה , are being transformed into the same likeness from esteem to esteem , as from יהוה , the Spirit .
47004001	Therefore , having this service , even as we received compassion , we do not lose heart ,
47004002	but have renounced the secret ways of shame , not walking in craftiness nor falsifying the Word of Elohim , but by the manifestation of the truth recommending ourselves to every human conscience , in the sight of Elohim .
47004003	And indeed , if our Good News has been veiled , it has been veiled in those who are perishing ,
47004004	in whom the mighty one of this age has blinded the minds of the unbelieving , so that the enlightening of the Good News of the esteem of Messiah , who is the likeness of Elohim , does not shine on them .
47004005	For we do not proclaim ourselves , but Messiah יהושע the Master , and ourselves your servants for the sake of יהושע .
47004006	For Elohim , who said , “ Let light shine out of darkness , ” is the One who has shone in our hearts for the enlightening of the knowledge of the esteem of Elohim in the face of יהושע Messiah .
47004007	And we have this treasure in earthen vessels , so that the excellence of the power might be of Elohim , and not of us –
47004008	being hard pressed on every side , but not crushed ; being perplexed , but not in despair ;
47004009	being persecuted , but not forsaken ; being thrown down , but not destroyed ;
47004010	always bearing about in the body the dying of the Master יהושע , that the life of יהושע might also be manifested in our body .
47004011	For we , the living , are always delivered to death for the sake of יהושע , that the life of יהושע might also be manifested in our mortal flesh ,
47004012	so that death indeed is working in us , but the life in you .
47004013	But having the same spirit of belief , according to what has been written , “ I believed , therefore I spoke , ” we also believe , therefore we also speak ,
47004014	knowing that He who raised up the Master יהושע shall also raise us up through יהושע , and shall present us with you .
47004015	For all this is for your sake , so that favour , having spread through the many , would cause thanksgiving to overflow , unto the esteem of Elohim .
47004016	Therefore we do not lose heart , but even if our outward man is perishing , the inward man is being renewed day by day .
47004017	For this slight momentary pressure , is working for us a far more exceeding and everlasting weight of esteem .
47004018	We are not looking on what is seen , but on what is not seen . For what is seen passes away , but what is not seen is everlasting .
47005001	For we know that if the tent of our earthly house , is destroyed , we have a building from Elohim , a house not made with hands , everlasting in the heavens .
47005002	For indeed in this we groan , longing to put on our dwelling which is from heaven ,
47005003	so that , having put it on , we shall not be found naked .
47005004	For indeed , we who are in this tent groan , being burdened , not because we wish to put it off , but to put on the other , so that what is to die might be swallowed up by life .
47005005	Now He who has prepared us for this same purpose is Elohim , who has given us the Spirit as a pledge of what is to come .
47005006	Therefore , being always of good courage , and knowing that while we are at home in the body we are absent from the Master –
47005007	for we walk by belief , not by sight –
47005008	we are of good courage , and are well pleased rather to be absent from the body and to be present with the Master .
47005009	So we also make it our aim to be well-pleasing to Him , whether being at home , or being away from home .
47005010	For we all have to appear before the judgment seat of Messiah , in order for each one to receive according to what he has done in the body , whether good or evil .
47005011	Knowing , therefore , the fear of יהוה , we persuade men , but we have been made manifest to Elohim , and I also trust in your consciences to have been manifested .
47005012	For we do not again commend ourselves to you , but give you an occasion to boast on our behalf , in order that you have an answer for those who take pride in appearance and not in heart .
47005013	For whether we are beside ourselves , it was for Elohim , or whether we are of sound mind , it is for you .
47005014	For the love of Messiah compels us , having judged this : that if One died for all , then all died ;
47005015	and He died for all , that those who live should no longer live for themselves , but for Him who died for them , and was raised .
47005016	So from now onwards we know no one according to the flesh . And if we have known Messiah according to the flesh , yet now we no longer know Him thus .
47005017	Therefore , if anyone is in Messiah , he is a renewed creature – the old matters have passed away , see , all matters have become renewed !
47005018	And all matters are from Elohim , who has restored us to favour with Himself through יהושע Messiah , and has given us the service of restoration to favour ,
47005019	that is , that Elohim was in Messiah restoring the world to favour unto Himself , not reckoning their trespasses to them , and has committed to us the word of restoration to favour .
47005020	Therefore we are envoys on behalf of Messiah , as though Elohim were pleading through us . We beg , on behalf of Messiah : Be restored to favour with Elohim .
47005021	For He made Him who knew no sin to be sin for us , so that in Him we might become the righteousness of Elohim .
47006001	And working together , we also call upon you not to receive the favour of Elohim in vain –
47006002	For He says , “ In an acceptable time I have heard you , and in a day of deliverance I have helped you . ” See , now is the well-accepted time , see , now is a day of deliverance –
47006003	giving no cause of stumbling in whatever , so that the service is not blamed .
47006004	Rather , we commend ourselves as servants of Elohim in every way : in much endurance , in pressures , in hardships , in distresses ,
47006005	in stripes , in imprisonments , in disturbances , in toils , in watchings , in fastings ,
47006006	in cleanness , in knowledge , in patience , in kindness , in the Set-apart Spirit , in love unfeigned ,
47006007	in the word of truth , in the power of Elohim , through the weapons of righteousness , on the right and on the left ,
47006008	through esteem and disrespect , through evil report and good report ; regarded as deceivers , and yet true ;
47006009	as unknown , and yet well-known ; as dying , and see , we live ; as disciplined , and yet not killed ;
47006010	as sad , yet always rejoicing ; as poor , yet enriching many ; as having none , and yet possessing all .
47006011	Our mouth has spoken openly to you , O Corinthians , our heart is wide open .
47006012	You are not restrained by us , but you are restrained by your own affections .
47006013	But for the same reward – I speak as to children – open wide your hearts too .
47006014	Do not become unevenly yoked with unbelievers . For what partnership have righteousness and lawlessness ? And what fellowship has light with darkness ?
47006015	And what agreement has Messiah with Beliya‛al ? Or what part does a believer have with an unbeliever ?
47006016	And what union has the Dwelling Place of Elohim with idols ? For you are a Dwelling Place of the living Elohim , as Elohim has said , “ I shall dwell in them and walk among them , and I shall be their Elohim , and they shall be My people . ”
47006017	Therefore , “ Come out from among them and be separate , says יהוה , and do not touch what is unclean , and I shall receive you .
47006018	“ And I shall be a Father to you , and you shall be sons and daughters to Me , says יהוה the Almighty . ”
47007001	Having , then , these promises , beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of the flesh and spirit , perfecting set-apartness in the fear of Elohim .
47007002	Make room for us , we wronged no one , we corrupted no one , we exploited no one .
47007003	I do not say this to condemn , for I previously said that you are in our hearts , to die together and to live together .
47007004	Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my boasting on your behalf . I have been filled with encouragement , I overflow with joy in all our pressure .
47007005	For , indeed , when we came into Makedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were hard pressed on every side – conflicts without , fears within .
47007006	But Elohim , who encourages the downcast , encouraged us by the coming of Titus ,
47007007	and not only by his coming , but also by the encouragement with which he was encouraged over you , when he reported to us your longing , your mourning , your ardour for me , so that I greatly rejoiced .
47007008	For even if I made you sad with my letter , I do not regret it , though I did regret it . For I perceive that the same letter made you sad , even if for an hour .
47007009	I now rejoice , not that you were made sad , but that you were saddened into repenting . For you were made sad according to Elohim , so that you suffered no loss from us .
47007010	For sadness according to Elohim works repentance to deliverance , not to be regretted , but the sadness of the world works death .
47007011	For see how you have been saddened according to Elohim – how much it worked out in you eagerness ; indeed , clearing of yourselves ; indeed , displeasure ; indeed , fear ; indeed , longing ; indeed , ardour ; indeed , righting of wrong ! In every way you proved yourselves to be clear in the matter .
47007012	So although I wrote to you , it was not for the sake of him who had done the wrong , nor for the sake of him who suffered wrong , but for the sake of revealing our diligence for you , before Elohim .
47007013	For this reason we have been encouraged in your encouragement . And we rejoiced exceedingly more for the joy of Titus , because his spirit has been refreshed by all of you .
47007014	Because if I have boasted somewhat about you to him , I am not ashamed . But as we spoke to you in all truth , even so our boasting to Titus was found true .
47007015	And his tender feelings are greater for you as he remembers the obedience of all of you , as you received him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I rejoice that in every way I am of good courage by reason of you .
47008001	Now brothers , we make known to you the favour of Elohim which has been given in the assemblies of Makedonia :
47008002	that in much trial of pressure the overflowing of their joy and their deep poverty overflowed into the riches of their generosity .
47008003	Because I bear witness that according to their ability , and beyond their ability , they gave voluntarily ,
47008004	begging us with much urgency for the favour of taking part in this service to the set-apart ones .
47008005	And , not as we had expected , they gave themselves first to the Master , and then to us by the desire of Elohim ,
47008006	that we should urge Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also complete this kind gift in you as well .
47008007	But as you excel in every way – in belief , and speech , and knowledge , and all diligence , and in your love for us – that you should excel in this kind gift as well .
47008008	I speak not by command , but I am proving the genuineness of your love by the eagerness of others .
47008009	For you know the favour of our Master יהושע Messiah , that being rich , He became poor for your sake , so that you might become rich through His poverty .
47008010	And in this I give an opinion : It is to your advantage not only to be doing what you began and were desiring to do a year ago ,
47008011	and now also complete the work , that as there was a readiness in desiring it , so there also should be a completion out of what you have .
47008012	For if the readiness is present , it is well received according to what one has , not according to what he does not have –
47008013	not , however , that others should be eased and you hard pressed ,
47008014	but by fair sharing , that now at this time your plenty for their need , so that their plenty might also be for your need – that there might be fair sharing .
47008015	As it has been written , “ He who gathered much did not have too much , and he who gathered little had not less . ”
47008016	But thanks be to Elohim who puts the same eagerness for you into the heart of Titus .
47008017	Because he received the appeal , indeed , but being more eager , he went to you of his own accord .
47008018	And we sent with him the brother whose praise is in the Good News through all the assemblies ,
47008019	and not only so , but who was also chosen by the assemblies to travel with us with this gift that is administered by us to the esteem of the Master Himself , and your ready mind ,
47008020	avoiding this : that anyone should blame us in this generous gift which is administered by us .
47008021	For we provide what is right , not only in the sight of יהוה , but also in the sight of men .
47008022	And we sent with them our brother whom we have often proved eager in many ways , but now much more eager , because of the great reliance which we have in you .
47008023	As for Titus , he is my partner and fellow worker for you . As for our brothers , they are messengers of the assemblies , the esteem of Messiah .
47008024	Therefore show to them the proof of your love and of our boasting on your behalf , and in the presence of the assemblies .
47009001	Indeed , concerning the service to the set-apart ones , it is unnecessary for me to write to you ;
47009002	for I know your eagerness , about which I boast of you to the Makedonians , that Achaia was ready a year ago . And your ardour has stirred up most of them .
47009003	But I sent the brothers , lest our boasting on behalf of you should be made empty in this part , in order that , as I said , you were ready ,
47009004	lest if some Makedonians come with me and find you not ready , we – not to speak of you – should be put to shame because of our belief .
47009005	So I thought it necessary to appeal to the brothers to come to you in advance , and arrange your promised blessing beforehand – this to be ready as a blessing and not as greediness .
47009006	And this : He who sows sparingly shall also reap sparingly , and he who sows on blessing shall also reap on blessing .
47009007	Let each one give as he purposes in his heart , not of grief or of necessity , for Elohim loves a joyous giver .
47009008	And Elohim is able to make all favour overflow toward you , that you , always having all you need in every way , have plenty for every good work .
47009009	As it has been written , “ He scattered abroad , He gave to the poor , His righteousness remains forever . ”
47009010	And He who supplies seed to the sower , and bread for food , shall supply and increase the seed you have sown and increase the fruit of your righteousness ,
47009011	being enriched in every way for all simplicity , which works out thanksgiving to Elohim through us .
47009012	Because the rendering of this service not only supplies the needs of the set-apart ones , but also is overflowing through many thanksgivings to Elohim .
47009013	Through the proof of this service , they esteem Elohim on the submission of your confession to the Good News of Messiah , and generosity in sharing with them and all men ,
47009014	and by their prayer for you , who long for you because of the exceeding favour of Elohim in you .
47009015	Thanks also to Elohim for His unspeakable gift !
47010001	And I , Sha’ul , myself appeal to you , through the meekness and gentleness of Messiah – I who am indeed lowly when face to face with you , but bold toward you when absent !
47010002	But I pray , that when I am present , I might not be bold with that bravery by which I think to be bold against some who reckon us as if we walked according to the flesh .
47010003	For though we walk in the flesh , we do not fight according to the flesh .
47010004	For the weapons we fight with are not fleshly but mighty in Elohim for overthrowing strongholds ,
47010005	overthrowing reasonings and every high matter that exalts itself against the knowledge of Elohim , taking captive every thought to make it obedient to the Messiah ,
47010006	and being ready to punish all disobedience , when your obedience is complete .
47010007	Take a look at what you are facing . If anyone seems to trust in himself that he is of Messiah , let him reckon again for himself , that as he is of Messiah , so also are we .
47010008	For even if I should boast somewhat more about our authority , which the Master gave us for building up , and not for overthrowing you , I shall not be put to shame ,
47010009	lest I seem to frighten you away by letters .
47010010	Because they say , “ His letters are truly weighty and strong , but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech amounts to naught . ”
47010011	Let such a one take this into account , that what we are in word by letters when absent , such we are also in deed when we are present .
47010012	For we do not presume to count ourselves or compare ourselves with those who commend themselves . But they , measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
47010013	But we shall not boast beyond measure , but within the measure of the limits Elohim assigned unto us , to reach even to you .
47010014	For we are not overextending ourselves , as if we did not reach to you , for we also came to you with the Good News of the Messiah ,
47010015	not boasting beyond measure in the labours of others , but having an expectation , that as your belief grows , we shall be greatly enlarged by you , according to our limits ,
47010016	to bring the Good News in the parts beyond you – not to boast in another’s limits in what has been accomplished .
47010017	But “ He who boasts , let him boast in יהוה . ”
47010018	For not he who commends himself is approved , but he whom the Master commends .
47011001	I wish that you would bear with me in a little folly . But indeed , you are bearing with me .
47011002	For I am jealous for you with a jealousy according to Elohim . For I gave you in marriage to one husband , to present you as an innocent maiden to Messiah .
47011003	But I am afraid , lest , as the serpent deceived Ḥawwah by his trickery , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Messiah .
47011004	For , indeed , if he who is coming proclaims another יהושע , whom we have not proclaimed , or if you receive a different spirit which you have not received , or a different Good News which you have not accepted , you put up with it well enough !
47011005	For I reckon that I am not inferior to the most eminent emissaries .
47011006	But even if I am unskilled in word , yet not in knowledge . Indeed , in every way we have been manifested among you in all matters .
47011007	Or did I commit sin in humbling myself in order to exalt you , because I brought good news , the Good News of Elohim to you without being paid ?
47011008	Other assemblies I robbed , by receiving wages from them to serve you .
47011009	And when I was present with you , and in need , I was not a burden to anyone , for what was lacking to me the brothers who came from Makedonia supplied . And in every way I kept myself – and shall keep – from being a burden to you .
47011010	It is a truth of Messiah in me , that this boasting in me shall not be stopped in the districts of Achaia .
47011011	Why ? Is it that I do not love you ? Elohim knows !
47011012	And I shall go on doing as I do , in order to cut off the occasion from those desiring an occasion , so that in that which they boast , they might be found also as we are .
47011013	For such are false emissaries , deceptive workers , masquerading as emissaries of Messiah .
47011014	And no wonder ! For Satan himself masquerades as a messenger of light !
47011015	It is not surprising , then , if his servants also masquerade as servants of righteousness , whose end shall be according to their works !
47011016	Again I say , let no one think me to be a fool . And if otherwise , at least receive me as a fool , for me to also boast a little .
47011017	What I speak , I speak not according to the Master , but as in foolishness , in this boldness of boasting .
47011018	Since many boast according to the flesh , I too shall boast .
47011019	For you , being wise , put up with fools gladly !
47011020	For you put up with it if anyone enslaves you , if anyone devours you , if anyone takes from you , if anyone exalts himself , if one hits you in the face .
47011021	To my shame , I say that we were too weak for that ! But in whatever anyone is bold – I say it in foolishness – I am bold also .
47011022	Are they Heḇrews ? So am I . Are they Yisra’ĕlites ? So am I . Are they the seed of Aḇraham ? So am I .
47011023	Are they servants of Messiah ? – I speak as beside myself – I am more , in labours much more , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequently , in deaths many times .
47011024	Five times I received from the Yehuḏim forty stripes less one .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with rods , once I was stoned , three times I was shipwrecked , a night and a day I have been in the deep ,
47011026	in many travels , in dangers of waters , in dangers of robbers , in dangers from my own race , in dangers from the gentiles , in dangers in the city , in dangers in the desert , in dangers in the sea , in dangers among false brothers ;
47011027	in toil and hardship , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness ,
47011028	besides the matters from outside , what comes upon me daily : the anxiety for all the assemblies .
47011029	Who is weak , and I am not weak ? Who is made to stumble , and I do not burn inwardly ?
47011030	If I have to boast , I shall boast of matters that show up my weakness .
47011031	The Elohim and Father of our Master יהושע Messiah , who is blessed forever , knows that I am not lying .
47011032	In Damascus the governor , under Aretas the sovereign , was guarding the city of the Damascenes , wishing to seize me ,
47011033	but through a window I was let down in a basket by the wall , and escaped from his hands .
47012001	To boast , indeed , is useless for me , for I shall go on to visions and revelations of יהוה .
47012002	I know a man in Messiah who fourteen years ago – whether in the body I do not know , or whether out of the body I do not know , Elohim knows – such a one was caught up to the third heaven .
47012003	And I know such a man – whether in the body or out of the body I do not know , Elohim knows –
47012004	that he was caught up into Paradise and heard unspeakable words , which it is not right for a man to speak .
47012005	Of such a one I shall boast , but of myself I shall not boast , except in my weaknesses .
47012006	For if I shall wish to boast , I shall not be a fool , for I shall speak the truth . But I refrain , lest anyone should think more of me than what he sees in me , or hears of me .
47012007	And to keep me from exalting myself because of the exceeding greatness of the revelations , a thorn in the flesh was given to me , a messenger of Satan to hit me , to keep me from exalting myself .
47012008	Concerning this I pleaded with the Master three times to take it away from me .
47012009	And He said to me , “ My favour is sufficient for you , for My power is perfected in weakness . ” Most gladly , then , I shall rather boast in my weaknesses , so that the power of Messiah rests on me .
47012010	Therefore I take pleasure in weaknesses , in insults , in needs , in persecutions , in distresses , for the sake of Messiah . For when I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	I have become a fool – you have compelled me . For I should have been commended by you , for in no respect was I behind the most eminent emissaries , though I am a nobody .
47012012	Indeed , the signs of an emissary were wrought among you with all endurance , in signs and wonders and powers .
47012013	For what is there in which you were inferior to other assemblies , except that I myself was not a burden to you ? Forgive me this wrong !
47012014	See , I am ready to come to you for the third time . And I shall not be a burden to you , for I do not seek yours , but you . For the children should not lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
47012015	And I shall most gladly spend and be spent for your lives . If I love you more and more , am I to be loved less ?
47012016	But be it so , I did not burden you . But being crafty , did I catch you with guile ?
47012017	Did I take advantage of you by any of those whom I sent to you ?
47012018	I urged Titus , and sent our brother with him . Did Titus take advantage of you ? Did we not walk in the same spirit – not in the same steps ?
47012019	Again , do you think that we defend ourselves to you ? We speak before Elohim in Messiah . But all this , beloved , is for your upbuilding .
47012020	For I fear lest , when I come , I do not find you such as I wish , and I be found by you such as you do not wish – lest there be strife , jealousies , outbursts of wrath , selfish ambitions , slander , gossip , puffings up , unrests ,
47012021	and lest , when I come again , my Elohim should humble me among you , and I shall mourn for many who have sinned before and have not repented of the uncleanness , and whoring , and indecency which they have practised .
47013001	This is the third time I am coming to you . “ By the mouth of two or three witnesses every word shall be established . ”
47013002	I have previously said , and I say beforehand , as being present the second time , and now being absent I write to those who have sinned before , and to all the rest , that if I come again I shall not spare ,
47013003	since you are seeking for proof of Messiah speaking in me , who is not weak toward you , but mighty in you .
47013004	For though He was impaled in weakness , yet He lives by the power of Elohim . For we also are weak in Him , but we shall live with Him by the power of Elohim toward you .
47013005	Examine yourselves whether you are in the belief – prove yourselves . Or do you not know yourselves , that יהושע Messiah is in you , unless you are disapproved .
47013006	And I trust that you shall know that we are not disapproved .
47013007	And we pray to Elohim that you do no evil at all – not that we should appear approved , but that you should do what is right , even though we should appear unapproved .
47013008	For we have no power at all against the truth , but for the truth .
47013009	For we rejoice when we are weak and you are strong . And this also we pray for : your perfection .
47013010	For this reason I write this in my absence , so that , being present I should not use sharpness , according to the authority which the Master has given me for upbuilding and not for overthrowing .
47013011	For the rest , brothers , rejoice . Be made perfect , be encouraged , be of one mind , live in peace . And the Elohim of love and peace shall be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with a set-apart kiss .
47013013	All the set-apart ones greet you .
47013014	The favour of the Master יהושע Messiah , and the love of Elohim , and the fellowship of the Set-apart Spirit be with all of you . Amĕn .
48001001	Sha’ul , an emissary – not from men , nor by a man , but by יהושע Messiah and Elohim the Father who raised Him from the dead –
48001002	and all the brothers who are with me , to the assemblies of Galatia :
48001003	Favour to you and peace from Elohim the Father and our Master יהושע Messiah ,
48001004	who gave Himself for our sins , to deliver us out of this present wicked age , according to the desire of our Elohim and Father ,
48001005	to whom be the praise forever and ever . Amĕn .
48001006	I marvel that you are so readily turning away from Him who called you in the favour of Messiah , to a different ‘ Good News , ’
48001007	which is not another , only there are some who are troubling you and wishing to pervert the Good News of Messiah .
48001008	However , even if we , or a messenger out of heaven , bring a ‘ Good News’ to you beside what we announced to you , let him be accursed .
48001009	As we have said before , and now I say again , if anyone brings a ‘ Good News’ to you beside what you have received , let him be accursed .
48001010	For do I now persuade men , or Elohim ? Or do I seek to please men ? For if I still pleased men , I should not be a servant of Messiah .
48001011	And I make known to you , brothers , that the Good News announced by me is not according to man .
48001012	For I did not receive it from man , nor was I taught it , but through a revelation of יהושע Messiah .
48001013	For you have heard of my former way of life in Yehuḏaism , how intensely I persecuted the assembly of Elohim , and ravaged it .
48001014	And I progressed in Yehuḏaism beyond many of my age in my race , being more exceedingly ardent for the traditions of my fathers .
48001015	But when it pleased Elohim , who separated me from my mother’s womb and called me by His favour ,
48001016	to reveal His Son in me , that I might bring Him , the Good News , to the gentiles , I did not immediately consult with flesh and blood ,
48001017	neither did I go up to Yerushalayim , to those who were emissaries before me . But I went to Araḇia , and returned again to Damascus .
48001018	Then after three years I went up to Yerushalayim to learn from Kĕpha , and remained with him for fifteen days .
48001019	And I saw no other of the emissaries except Ya‛aqoḇ , the brother of the Master .
48001020	And what I write to you , see , before Elohim , I do not lie .
48001021	Then I went into the districts of Syria and of Kilikia .
48001022	And I was still not known by sight to the assemblies of Yehuḏah which were in Messiah ,
48001023	but they were hearing only that , “ The one who once persecuted us now brings as Good News the belief which he once ravaged . ”
48001024	So they were esteeming Elohim in me .
48002001	Then after fourteen years I again went up to Yerushalayim , with Barnaḇah , taking Titus along too .
48002002	And I went up by revelation , and laid before them that Good News which I proclaim among the gentiles , but separately to those who were esteemed , lest somehow I run , or had run , in vain .
48002003	But not even Titus who was with me , though a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised .
48002004	But as for the false brothers , sneakingly brought in , who sneaked in to spy out our freedom which we have in Messiah יהושע in order to enslave us ,
48002005	to these we did not yield in subjection , not even for an hour , so that the truth of the Good News remains with you .
48002006	But from those who were esteemed to be whatever – what they were , it makes no difference to me , Elohim shows no partiality – for those who were esteemed contributed naught to me .
48002007	But on the contrary , when they saw that the Good News to the uncircumcised had been entrusted to me , even as Kĕpha to the circumcised –
48002008	for He who worked in Kĕpha to make him an emissary to the circumcised also worked in me for the gentiles .
48002009	So when Ya‛aqoḇ , Kĕpha , and Yoḥanan , who seemed to be supports , came to know the favour that had been given to me , they gave me and Barnaḇah the right hand of fellowship , in order that we go to the gentiles and they to the circumcised ,
48002010	only that we might remember the poor , which I myself was eager to do .
48002011	And when Kĕpha had come to Antioch , I withstood him to his face , because he was at fault .
48002012	For before some came from Ya‛aqoḇ , he was eating with the gentiles , but when they came , he began to withdraw and separate himself , in fear of those of the circumcision .
48002013	And the rest of the Yehuḏim joined him in hypocrisy , so that even Barnaḇah was led away by their hypocrisy .
48002014	But when I saw that they are not walking straight according to the truth of the Good News , I said to Kĕpha before them all , “ If you , being a Yehuḏite , live as a gentile and not as the Yehuḏim , why do you compel gentiles to live as Yehuḏim ?
48002015	“ We , Yehuḏim by nature , and not of the gentiles , sinners ,
48002016	knowing that a man is not declared right by works of Torah , but through belief in יהושע Messiah , even we have believed in Messiah יהושע , in order to be declared right by belief in Messiah and not by works of Torah , because by works of Torah no flesh shall be declared right .
48002017	“ And if , while seeking to be declared right by Messiah , we ourselves also are found sinners , is Messiah then a servant of sin ? Let it not be !
48002018	“ For if I rebuild what I once overthrew , I establish myself a transgressor .
48002019	“ For through Torah I died to Torah , in order to live to Elohim .
48002020	“ I have been impaled with Messiah , and I no longer live , but Messiah lives in me . And that which I now live in the flesh I live by belief in the Son of Elohim , who loved me and gave Himself for me .
48002021	“ I do not set aside the favour of Elohim , for if righteousness is through Torah , then Messiah died for naught . ”
48003001	O senseless Galatians ! Who has put you under a spell , not to obey the truth – before whose eyes יהושע Messiah was clearly portrayed among you as impaled ?
48003002	This only I wish to learn from you : Did you receive the Spirit by works of Torah , or by the hearing of belief ?
48003003	Are you so senseless ? Having begun in the Spirit , do you now end in the flesh ?
48003004	Have you suffered so much in vain – if indeed in vain ?
48003005	Is He , then , who is supplying the Spirit to you and working miracles among you , doing it by works of Torah , or by hearing of belief ?
48003006	Even so Aḇraham “ did believe Elohim , and it was reckoned unto him as righteousness . ”
48003007	Know , then , that those who are of belief are sons of Aḇraham .
48003008	And the Scripture , having foreseen that Elohim would declare right the nations by belief , announced the Good News to Aḇraham beforehand , saying , “ All the nations shall be blessed in you , ”
48003009	so that those who are of belief are blessed with Aḇraham , the believer .
48003010	For as many as are of works of Torah are under the curse , for it has been written , “ Cursed is everyone who does not continue in all that has been written in the book of the Torah , to do them . ”
48003011	And that no one is declared right by Torah before Elohim is clear , for “ The righteous shall live by belief . ”
48003012	And the Torah is not of belief , but “ The man who does them shall live by them . ”
48003013	Messiah redeemed us from the curse of the Torah , having become a curse for us – for it has been written , “ Cursed is everyone who hangs upon a tree . ” –
48003014	in order that the blessing of Aḇraham might come upon the nations in Messiah יהושע , to receive the promise of the Spirit through belief .
48003015	Brothers , as a man I say it : a covenant , even though it is man’s , yet if it is confirmed , no one sets it aside , or adds to it .
48003016	But the promises were spoken to Aḇraham , and to his Seed . He does not say , “ And to seeds , ” as of many , but as of one , “ And to your Seed , ” who is Messiah .
48003017	Now this I say , Torah , that came four hundred and thirty years later , does not annul a covenant previously confirmed by Elohim in Messiah , so as to do away with the promise .
48003018	For if the inheritance is by Torah , it is no longer by promise , but Elohim gave it to Aḇraham through a promise .
48003019	Why , then , the Torah ? It was added because of transgressions , until the Seed should come to whom the promise was made . And it was ordained through messengers in the hand of a mediator .
48003020	The Mediator , however , is not of one , but Elohim is one .
48003021	Is the Torah then against the promises of Elohim ? Let it not be ! For if a law had been given that was able to make alive , truly righteousness would have been by Torah .
48003022	But the Scripture has shut up all mankind under sin , that the promise by belief in יהושע Messiah might be given to those who believe .
48003023	But before belief came , we were being guarded under Torah , having been shut up for the belief being about to be revealed .
48003024	Therefore the Torah became our trainer unto Messiah , in order to be declared right by belief .
48003025	And after belief has come , we are no longer under a trainer .
48003026	For you are all sons of Elohim through belief in Messiah יהושע .
48003027	For as many of you as were immersed into Messiah have put on Messiah .
48003028	There is not Yehuḏite nor Greek , there is not slave nor free , there is not male and female , for you are all one in Messiah יהושע .
48003029	And if you are of Messiah , then you are seed of Aḇraham , and heirs according to promise .
48004001	And I say , for as long as the heir is a child , he is no different from a slave , though he is master of all ,
48004002	but is under guardians and trustees till the time prearranged by the father .
48004003	So we also , when we were children , were under the elementary matters of the world , being enslaved .
48004004	But when the completion of the time came , Elohim sent forth His Son , born of a woman , born under Torah ,
48004005	to redeem those who were under Torah , in order to receive the adoption as sons .
48004006	And because you are sons , Elohim has sent forth the Spirit of His Son into your hearts , crying , “ Abba , Father ! ”
48004007	So you are no longer a slave but a son , and if a son , also an heir of Elohim through Messiah .
48004008	But then , indeed , not knowing Elohim , you served those which by nature are not mighty ones .
48004009	But now after you have known Elohim , or rather are known by Elohim , how do you turn again to the weak and poor elementary matters , to which you wish to be enslaved again ?
48004010	You observe days and months and seasons and years .
48004011	I fear for you , lest by any means I have laboured for you in vain .
48004012	Brothers , I beg you to become as I am , because I am as you are . You did not wrong me at all .
48004013	But you know that through weakness of the flesh I brought the Good News to you before .
48004014	And my trial which was in my flesh you did not despise or reject , but you received me as a messenger of Elohim , as Messiah יהושע .
48004015	What then was your blessedness ? For I bear you witness , that if possible , you would have plucked out your own eyes and given them to me .
48004016	So then , have I become your enemy , speaking truth to you ?
48004017	They are ardent towards you , for no good , but they wish to shut you out , that you might be ardent towards them .
48004018	And it is good always to be ardent in what is good , and not only when I am present with you .
48004019	My little children , for whom I am again in birth pains until Messiah is formed in you ,
48004020	even now I wish to be present with you now and to change my voice , for I have doubts about you .
48004021	Say to me , you who wish to be under Torah , do you not hear the Torah ?
48004022	For it has been written that Aḇraham had two sons , one by a female servant , the other by a free woman .
48004023	But he who was of the female servant was born according to the flesh , and he of the free woman through promise .
48004024	This is allegorical , for these are the two covenants : one indeed from Mount Sinai which brings forth slavery , which is Hag̅ar ,
48004025	for this Hag̅ar is Mount Sinai in Araḇia , and corresponds to Yerushalayim which now is , and is in slavery with her children .
48004026	But the Yerushalayim above is free , which is the mother of us all .
48004027	For it has been written , “ Rejoice , O barren , you who do not bear ! Break forth and shout , you who do not have birth pains ! For the deserted one has many more children than she who has a husband . ”
48004028	And we , brothers , as Yitsḥaq was , are children of promise .
48004029	But , as he who was born according to the flesh then persecuted him born according to the Spirit , so also now .
48004030	But what does the Scripture say ? “ Cast out the female servant and her son , for the son of the female servant shall by no means be heir with the son of the free woman . ”
48004031	Therefore , brothers , we are not children of the female servant but of the free woman .
48005001	In the freedom with which Messiah has made us free , stand firm , then , and do not again be held with a yoke of slavery .
48005002	See , I , Sha’ul , say to you that if you become circumcised , Messiah shall be of no use to you .
48005003	And I witness again to every man being circumcised that he is a debtor to do the entire Torah .
48005004	You who are declared right by Torah have severed yourselves from Messiah , you have fallen from favour .
48005005	For we , in Spirit , by belief , eagerly wait for the expectation of righteousness .
48005006	For in Messiah יהושע neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any strength , but belief working through love .
48005007	You were running well , who held you back from obeying the truth ?
48005008	That persuasion does not come from Him who calls you .
48005009	A little leaven leavens all the lump .
48005010	I trust in you , in the Master , that you shall have no other mind . And he who is troubling you shall bear his judgment , whoever he is .
48005011	And I , brothers , if I still proclaim circumcision , why am I still persecuted ? Then the stumbling-block of the stake has been set aside .
48005012	O that those who disturb you would even cut themselves off !
48005013	For you , brothers , have been called to freedom , only do not use freedom as an occasion for the flesh , but through love serve one another .
48005014	For the entire Torah is completed in one word , in this , “ You shall love your neighbour as yourself . ”
48005015	And if you bite and devour one another , beware lest you be consumed by one another !
48005016	And I say : Walk in the Spirit , and you shall not accomplish the lust of the flesh .
48005017	For the flesh lusts against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh . And these are opposed to each other , so that you do not do what you desire to do .
48005018	But if you are led by the Spirit , you are not under Torah .
48005019	And the works of the flesh are well-known , which are these : adultery , whoring , uncleanness , indecency ,
48005020	idolatry , drug sorcery , hatred , quarrels , jealousies , fits of rage , selfish ambitions , dissensions , factions ,
48005021	envy , murders , drunkenness , wild parties , and the like – of which I forewarn you , even as I also said before , that those who practise such as these shall not inherit the reign of Elohim .
48005022	But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , trustworthiness ,
48005023	gentleness , self-control . Against such there is no Torah .
48005024	And those who are of Messiah have impaled the flesh with its passions and the desires .
48005025	If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
48005026	Let us not become conceited , provoking one another , envying one another .
48006001	Brothers , if a man is overtaken in some trespass , you the spiritual ones , set such a one straight in a spirit of meekness , looking at yourself lest you be tried too .
48006002	Bear one another’s burdens , and so complete the Torah of Messiah .
48006003	For if anyone thinks himself to be somebody , when he is not , he deceives himself .
48006004	But let each one examine his own work , and then he shall have boasting in himself alone , and not in another .
48006005	For each one shall bear his own burden .
48006006	And let him who is instructed in the Word share in all that is good , with him who is instructing .
48006007	Do not be led astray : Elohim is not mocked , for whatever a man sows , that he shall also reap .
48006008	Because he who sows to his own flesh shall reap corruption from the flesh , but he who sows to the Spirit shall reap everlasting life from the Spirit .
48006009	And let us not lose heart in doing good , for in due season we shall reap if we do not grow weary .
48006010	So then , as we have occasion , let us do good to all , especially to those who are of the household of the belief .
48006011	See with what big letters I have written to you with my own hand !
48006012	As many as wish to make a good show in the flesh , these compel you to be circumcised , only so that they should not be persecuted for the stake of Messiah .
48006013	For those who are circumcised do not even watch over the Torah , but they wish to have you circumcised so that they might boast in your flesh .
48006014	And for me , let it not be that I should boast except in the stake of our Master יהושע Messiah , through whom the world has been impaled to me , and I to the world .
48006015	For in Messiah יהושע neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any strength , but a renewed creature .
48006016	And as many as walk according to this rule , peace and compassion be upon them , and upon the Yisra’ĕl of Elohim .
48006017	From now on let no one trouble me , for I bear in my body the scars of the Master יהושע .
48006018	The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with your spirit , brothers . Amĕn .

49001023	which is His body , the completeness of Him who fills all in all .
49002001	And you were dead in trespasses and sins ,
49002002	in which you once walked according to the course of this world , according to the ruler of the authority of the air , of the spirit that is now working in the sons of disobedience ,
49002003	among whom also we all once lived in the lusts of our flesh , doing the desires of the flesh and of the mind , and were by nature children of wrath , as also the rest .
49002004	But Elohim , who is rich in compassion , because of His great love with which He loved us ,
49002005	even when we were dead in trespasses , made us alive together with Messiah – by favour you have been saved –
49002006	and raised us up together , and made us sit together in the heavenlies in Messiah יהושע ,
