49002008	For by favour you have been saved , through belief , and that not of yourselves , it is the gift of Elohim ,
49002009	it is not by works , so that no one should boast .
49002010	For we are His workmanship , created in Messiah יהושע unto good works , which Elohim prepared beforehand that we should walk in them .
49002011	Therefore remember that you , once gentiles in the flesh , who are called ‘ the uncircumcision’ by what is called ‘ the circumcision’ made in the flesh by hands ,
49002012	that at that time you were without Messiah , excluded from the citizenship of Yisra’ĕl and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no expectation and without Elohim in the world .
49002013	But now in Messiah יהושע you who once were far off have been brought near by the blood of the Messiah .
49002014	For He is our peace , who has made both one , and having broken down the partition of the barrier ,

49002016	and to completely restore to favour both of them unto Elohim in one body through the stake , having destroyed the enmity by it .
49002017	And having come , He brought as Good News peace to you who were far off , and peace to those near .
49002018	Because through Him we both have access to the Father by one Spirit .
49002019	So then you are no longer strangers and foreigners , but fellow citizens with the set-apart ones and members of the household of Elohim ,
49002020	having been built upon the foundation of the emissaries and prophets , יהושע Messiah Himself being chief corner-stone ,
49002021	in whom all the building , being joined together , grows into a set-apart Dwelling Place in יהוה ,
49002022	in whom you also are being built together into a dwelling of Elohim in the Spirit .
49003001	Because of this I , Sha’ul , am the prisoner of יהושע Messiah on behalf of you gentiles –
49003002	if indeed you have heard of the administration of the favour of Elohim that was given to me for you ,
49003003	that by revelation was made known to me the secret , as I wrote before briefly .
49003004	In reading this , then , you are able to understand my insight into the secret of Messiah ,
49003005	which was not made known to the sons of men in other generations , as it has now been revealed by the Spirit to His set-apart emissaries and prophets :
49003006	The gentiles to be co-heirs , united in the same body , and partakers together in the promise in Messiah through the Good News ,
49003007	of which I became a servant according to the gift of the favour of Elohim given to me , according to the working of His power .
49003008	To me , the very least of all the set-apart ones , this favour was given , to bring the Good News of the unsearchable riches of Messiah among the gentiles ,
49003009	and to make all see how this secret is administered , which for ages past has been hidden in Elohim who created all through יהושע Messiah ,

49003011	according to the everlasting purpose which He made in Messiah יהושע our Master ,
49003012	in whom we have boldness and access , with reliance , through belief in Him .
49003013	I pray therefore , that you do not lose heart at my pressures on your behalf , which is your esteem .
49003014	For this reason I bow my knees to the Father of our Master יהושע Messiah ,
49003015	from whom all fatherhood in the heavens and earth is named ,
49003016	in order that He might give you , according to the riches of His esteem by power , to be strengthened in the inner man , through His Spirit ,

49003020	And to Him who is able to do exceedingly above what we ask or think , according to the power that is working in us ,

49004001	I call upon you therefore , I the prisoner of the Master , to walk worthily of the calling with which you were called ,
49004002	with all humility and meekness , with patience , bearing with one another in love ,
49004003	being eager to guard the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace –
49004004	one body and one Spirit , as you also were called in one expectation of your calling ,
49004005	one Master , one belief , one immersion ,
49004006	one Elohim and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
49004007	But to each one of us favour was given according to the measure of the gift of Messiah .
49004008	That is why it says , “ When He went up on high , He led captivity captive , and gave gifts to men . ”
49004009	But what does “ He went up ” mean , except that He also first went down into the lower parts of the earth ?
49004010	He who went down is also the One who went up far above all the heavens , to fill all .
49004011	And He Himself gave some as emissaries , and some as prophets , and some as evangelists , and some as shepherds and teachers
49004012	for the perfecting of the set-apart ones , to the work of service to a building up of the body of the Messiah ,
49004013	until we all come to the unity of the belief and of the knowledge of the Son of Elohim , to a perfect man , to the measure of the stature of the completeness of Messiah ,
49004014	so that we should no longer be children , tossed and borne about by every wind of teaching , by the trickery of men , in cleverness , unto the craftiness of leading astray ,
49004015	but , maintaining the truth in love , we grow up in all respects into Him who is the head , Messiah ,
49004016	from whom the entire body , joined and knit together by what every joint supplies , according to the working by which each part does its share , causes growth of the body for the building up of itself in love .
49004017	So this I say , and witness in the Master , that you should no longer walk as the gentiles walk , in the futility of their mind ,
49004018	having been darkened in their understanding , having been estranged from the life of Elohim , because of the ignorance that is in them , because of the hardness of their heart ,
49004019	who , having become callous , have given themselves up to indecency , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
49004020	But you have not so learned Messiah ,
49004021	if indeed you have heard Him and were taught by Him , as truth is in יהושע :
49004022	that you put off – with regard to your former way of life – the old man , being corrupted according to the desires of the deceit ,
49004023	and to be renewed in the spirit of your mind ,
49004024	and that you put on the renewed man which was created according to Elohim , in righteousness and set-apartness of the truth .
49004025	Therefore , having put off the false , speak truth , each one with his neighbour , for we are members of one another .
49004026	“ Be wroth , but do not sin . ” Do not let the sun go down on your rage ,
49004027	nor give place to the devil .
49004028	Let him who stole steal no more , but rather let him labour , working with his hands what is good , so that he has somewhat to share with those in need .
49004029	Let no corrupt word come out of your mouth , but only such as is good for the use of building up , so as to impart what is pleasant to the hearers .
49004030	And do not grieve the Set-apart Spirit of Elohim , by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption .
49004031	Let all bitterness , and wrath , and displeasure , and uproar , and slander be put away from you , along with all evil .
49004032	And be kind towards one another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , as Elohim also forgave you in Messiah .
49005001	Become , then , imitators of Elohim as beloved children .
49005002	And walk in love , as Messiah also has loved us , and gave Himself for us , a gift and an offering to Elohim for a sweet-smelling fragrance .
49005003	But whoring and all uncleanness , or greed of gain , let it not even be named among you , as is proper among set-apart ones –
49005004	neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor coarse jesting , which are not fitting , but rather thanksgiving .
49005005	For this you know , that no one who whores , nor unclean one , nor one greedy of gain , who is an idolater , has any inheritance in the reign of Messiah and Elohim .
49005006	Let no one deceive you with empty words , for because of these the wrath of Elohim comes upon the sons of disobedience .
49005007	Therefore do not become partakers with them .
49005008	For you were once darkness , but now you are light in the Master . Walk as children of light –
49005009	for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness , and righteousness , and truth –
49005010	proving what is well-pleasing to the Master .
49005011	And have no fellowship with the fruitless works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
49005012	For it is a shame even to speak of what is done by them in secret .
49005013	But all matters being reproved are manifested by the light , for whatever is manifested is light .
49005014	That is why He says , “ Wake up , you who sleep , and arise from the dead , and Messiah shall shine on you . ”
49005015	See then that you walk exactly , not as unwise , but as wise ,
49005016	redeeming the time , because the days are wicked .
49005017	So then do not be foolish , but understand what the desire of יהוה is .
49005018	And do not be drunk with wine , in which is loose behaviour , but be filled with the Spirit ,
49005019	speaking to each other in psalms and songs of praise and spiritual songs , singing and striking the strings in your heart to the Master ,
49005020	giving thanks always for all to Elohim the Father , in the Name of our Master יהושע Messiah ,
49005021	subjecting yourselves to each other in the fear of Elohim .
49005022	Wives , subject yourselves to your own husbands , as to the Master .
49005023	Because the husband is head of the wife , as also the Messiah is head of the assembly , and He is Saviour of the body .
49005024	But as the assembly is subject to Messiah , so also let the wives be to their own husbands in every respect .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives , as Messiah also did love the assembly and gave Himself for it ,
49005026	in order to set it apart and cleanse it with the washing of water by the Word ,
49005027	in order to present it to Himself a splendid assembly , not having spot or wrinkle or any of this sort , but that it might be set-apart and blameless .
49005028	In this way husbands ought to love their own wives as their own bodies . He who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	For no one ever hated his own flesh , but feeds and cherishes it , as also the Master does the assembly .
49005030	Because we are members of His body , of His flesh and of His bones .
49005031	“ For this cause a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife , and the two shall become one flesh . ”
49005032	This secret is great , but I speak concerning Messiah and the assembly .
49005033	However , you too , everyone , let each one love his own wife as himself , and let the wife see that she fears her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents in the Master , for this is right .
49006002	“ Respect your father and mother , ” which is the first command with promise ,
49006003	in order that it might be well with you , and you might live long on the earth . ”
49006004	And you , fathers , do not provoke your children , but bring them up in the instruction and admonition of the Master .
49006005	Servants , obey your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in sincerity of heart , as to Messiah ;
49006006	not with eye-service as men-pleasers , but as servants of Messiah , doing the desire of Elohim from the inner self ,
49006007	rendering service with pleasure , as to the Master , and not to men ,
49006008	knowing that whatever good anyone does , he shall receive the same from the Master , whether he is slave or free .
49006009	And , masters , do the same to them , refrain from threatening , knowing that your own Master also is in the heavens , and there is no partiality with Him .
49006010	For the rest , my brothers , be strong in the Master and in the mightiness of His strength .
49006011	Put on the complete armour of Elohim , for you to have power to stand against the schemes of the devil .
49006012	Because we do not wrestle against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against authorities , against the world-rulers of the darkness of this age , against spiritual matters of wickedness in the heavenlies .
49006013	Because of this , take up the complete armour of Elohim , so that you have power to withstand in the wicked day , and having done all , to stand .
49006014	Stand , then , having girded your waist with truth , and having put on the breastplate of righteousness ,
49006015	and having fitted your feet with the preparation of the Good News of peace ;
49006016	above all , having taken up the shield of belief with which you shall have power to quench all the burning arrows of the wicked one .
49006017	Take also the helmet of deliverance , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the Word of Elohim ,

49006019	also for me , that a word might be given to me in the opening of my mouth , to be bold in making known the secret of the Good News ,
49006020	for which I am an envoy in chains , that in it I might speak boldly , as I should speak .

50001021	For to me , to live is Messiah , and to die is gain .
50001022	And if to live in the flesh is to me a fruit of work , then what shall I choose ? I do not know .
50001023	For I am pressed down by the two , having a desire to depart and be with Messiah , which is much better ,

50001025	And being persuaded of this , I know that I shall stay and continue with you all , for your progress and joy of belief ,
50001026	so that your boasting might overflow in יהושע Messiah on account of me , through my coming to you again .

50001028	without being frightened in any way by those who oppose , which to them truly is a proof of destruction , but to you of deliverance , and that from Elohim .

50001030	having the same struggle which you saw in me , and now hear to be in me .

51001017	And He is before all , and in Him all hold together .
51001018	And He is the Head of the body , the assembly , who is the beginning , the first-born from the dead , that He might become the One who is first in all .
51001019	Because in Him all the completeness was well pleased to dwell ,
51001020	and through Him to completely restore to favour all unto Himself , whether on earth or in the heavens , having made peace through the blood of His stake .
51001021	And you , who once were estranged and enemies in the mind by wicked works , but now He has completely restored to favour
51001022	in the body of His flesh through death , to present you set-apart , and blameless , and unreprovable before Him ,
51001023	if indeed you continue in the belief , founded and steadfast , and are not moved away from the expectation of the Good News which you heard , which was proclaimed to every creature under the heaven , of which I , Sha’ul , became a servant ,
51001024	who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up in my flesh what is lacking in Messiah’s afflictions , for the sake of His Body , which is the assembly ,
51001025	of which I became a servant according to the administration of Elohim which was given to me for you , to fill the word of Elohim ,
51001026	the secret which has been hidden from ages and from generations , but now has been revealed to His set-apart ones ,
51001027	to whom Elohim desired to make known what are the riches of the esteem of this secret among the gentiles : which is Messiah in you , the expectancy of esteem ,
51001028	whom we announce , warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom , in order to present every man perfect in Messiah יהושע ,
51001029	for which I also labour , striving according to the working of Him who works in me in power .
51002001	For I wish you to know what a great struggle I have for you and those in Laodikeia , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ,
51002002	in order that their hearts might be encouraged , being knit together in love , and to all riches of the entire confirmation of understanding , to a true knowledge of the secret of Elohim , and of the Father , and of the Messiah ,
51002003	in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
51002004	And this I say , so that no one deceives you with enticing words .
51002005	For though I am absent in the flesh , yet I am with you in spirit , rejoicing to see your good order and the steadfastness of your belief in Messiah .
51002006	Therefore , as you accepted Messiah יהושע the Master , walk in Him ,
51002007	having been rooted and built up in Him , and established in the belief , as you were taught , overflowing in it with thanksgiving .
51002008	See to it that no one makes a prey of you through philosophy and empty deceit , according to the tradition of men , according to the elementary matters of the world , and not according to Messiah .
51002009	Because in Him dwells all the completeness of the Mightiness bodily ,
51002010	and you have been made complete in Him , who is the Head of all principality and authority .
51002011	In Him you were also circumcised with a circumcision not made with hands , in the putting off of the body of the sins of the flesh , by the circumcision of Messiah ,
51002012	having been buried with Him in immersion , in which you also were raised with Him through the belief in the working of Elohim , who raised Him from the dead .
51002013	And you , being dead in your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh , He has made alive together with Him , having forgiven you all trespasses ,
51002014	having blotted out the certificate of debt against us – by the dogmas – which stood against us . And He has taken it out of the way , having nailed it to the stake .
51002015	Having stripped the principalities and the authorities , He made a public display of them , having prevailed over them in it .
51002016	Let no one therefore judge you in eating or in drinking , or in respect of a festival or a new moon or Sabbaths –
51002017	which are a shadow of what is to come – but the Body of the Messiah .
51002018	Let no one deprive you of the prize , one who takes delight in false humility and worship of messengers , taking his stand on what he has not seen , puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
51002019	and not holding fast to the Head , from whom all the Body – nourished and knit together by joints and ligaments – grows with the growth of Elohim .
51002020	If , then , you died with Messiah from the elementary matters of the world , why , as though living in the world , do you subject yourselves to regulations :
51002021	“ Do not touch , do not taste , do not handle ” –
51002022	which are all to perish with use – according to the commands and teachings of men ?
51002023	These indeed have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed worship , humiliation and harsh treatment of the body – of no value at all , only for satisfaction of the flesh .
51003001	If , then , you were raised with Messiah , seek the matters which are above , where Messiah is , seated at the right hand of Elohim .
51003002	Mind the matters above , not those on the earth .
51003003	For you have died , and your life has been hidden with Messiah in Elohim .
51003004	When the Messiah , who is our life , is manifested , then you also shall be manifested with Him in esteem .
51003005	Therefore put to death your members which are on the earth : whoring , uncleanness , passion , evil desire and greed of gain , which is idolatry .
51003006	Because of these the wrath of Elohim is coming upon the sons of disobedience ,
51003007	in which you also once walked when you lived in them .
51003008	But now , also put off all these : displeasure , wrath , evil , blasphemy , filthy talk from your mouth .
51003009	Do not lie to each other , since you have put off the old man with his practices ,
51003010	and have put on the new one who is renewed in knowledge according to the likeness of Him who created him ,
51003011	where there is not Greek and Yehuḏite , circumcised and uncircumcised , foreigner , Scythian , slave , free , but Messiah is all , and in all .

51003013	bearing with one another , and forgiving each other if anyone has a complaint against another , indeed , as Messiah forgave you so also should you .
51003014	But above all these put on love , which is a bond of the perfection .
51003015	And let the peace of Elohim rule in your hearts , to which indeed you were called in one Body , and be filled with thanks .
51003016	Let the Word of Messiah dwell in you richly , teaching and admonishing one another in all wisdom , singing with pleasure in your hearts to the Master in psalms and songs of praise and spiritual songs .
51003017	And whatever you do in word or deed , do all in the Name of the Master יהושע , giving thanks to Elohim the Father through Him .
51003018	Wives , subject yourselves to your own husbands , as is proper in the Master .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and do not be bitter toward them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in all , for this is well-pleasing to the Master .
51003021	Fathers , do not provoke your children , lest they become discouraged .
51003022	Servants , obey your masters according to the flesh in all respects , not with eye-service , as men-pleasers , but in sincerity of heart , fearing Elohim .
51003023	And whatever you do , do it heartily , as to the Master and not to men ,
51003024	knowing that from the Master you shall receive the reward of the inheritance . It is the Master , Messiah , you serve .
51003025	But he who does wrong shall be repaid for the wrong which he has done , and there is no partiality .
51004001	Masters , give your servants what is righteous and fair , knowing that you also have a Master in the heavens .
51004002	Continue in prayer , watching therein , with thanksgiving ,
51004003	praying at the same time also for us , that Elohim would open to us a door for the word , to speak the secret of Messiah , for which I am also in chains ,
51004004	so that I make it clear , as I should speak .
51004005	Walk in wisdom toward those who are outside , redeeming the time .
51004006	Let your word always be with favour , seasoned with salt , so that you know how you ought to answer each one .

52001001	Sha’ul , and Sila , and Timothy , to the assembly of the Thessalonians in Elohim the Father and the Master יהושע Messiah : Favour to you and peace from Elohim our Father and the Master יהושע Messiah .
52001002	We give thanks to Elohim always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ,
52001003	remembering without ceasing your work of the belief , and the labour of love , and the endurance of the expectation in our Master יהושע Messiah in the presence of our Elohim and Father ,
52001004	knowing , brothers beloved by Elohim , that you were chosen .
52001005	Because our Good News did not come to you in word only , but also in power , and in the Set-apart Spirit and in entire confirmation , as you know what kind of men we were among you for your sake .
52001006	And you became imitators of us and of the Master , having received the word in much pressure , with joy of the Set-apart Spirit ,
52001007	so that you became an example to all who believe in Makedonia and Achaia .
52001008	For from you the word of the Master has sounded forth , not only in Makedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your belief toward Elohim has gone out , so that it is unnecessary for us to say whatever .
52001009	For they themselves report what kind of reception we had with you , and how you turned to Elohim from idols , to serve the living and true Elohim ,
52001010	and to wait for His Son from the heavens , whom He raised from the dead , יהושע , who is delivering us from the wrath to come .
52002001	For you yourselves know , brothers , that our coming to you was not in vain .
52002002	But having suffered before and having been mistreated at Philippi , as you know , we were bold in our Elohim to speak to you the Good News of Elohim in much struggle .
52002003	For the appeal we make does not come from delusion , nor from uncleanness , nor from deceit .
52002004	But as we have been approved by Elohim to be entrusted with the Good News , so we speak , not as pleasing men , but Elohim who proves our hearts .
52002005	For we never came with a word of flattery , as you know , nor with a cloak for greed – Elohim is witness –
52002006	nor were we looking for praise from men , not from you nor from others , though we could have been a burden to you , as emissaries of Messiah .
52002007	But we were gentle in your midst , like a nursing mother warmly loving her own children .
52002008	So , having a tender affection for you , we were well pleased to share with you not only the Good News of Elohim , but also our own lives , because you have become beloved to us .
52002009	For you remember , brothers , our toil and hardship , for labouring night and day , in order not to burden any of you , we proclaimed to you the Good News of Elohim .
52002010	You are witnesses , Elohim also , how set-apart and righteously and blamelessly we behaved ourselves among you who believe ,
52002011	even as you know how each one of you , as a father to his children , encouraging and comforting and bearing witness to you ,
52002012	that you would walk worthily of Elohim who is calling you into His own reign and esteem .
52002013	And because of this we thank Elohim without ceasing , that when you received the Word of Elohim which you heard from us , you welcomed it not as the word of men , but as it is truly , the Word of Elohim , which also works in you who believe .
52002014	For you , brothers , became imitators of the assemblies of Elohim which are in Yehuḏah in Messiah יהושע , because you also suffered the same treatment from your own countrymen as they also from the Yehuḏim ,
52002015	who killed both the Master יהושע and their own prophets , and have persecuted us , and who displease Elohim and are hostile to all men ,
52002016	forbidding us to speak to the gentiles that they might be saved , so as to fill up their sins always . But the wrath has come upon them to the utmost .
52002017	But we , brothers , having been taken away from you for a short while – in presence , not in heart – were much more eagerly trying to see your face , with much longing .
52002018	We would therefore have come to you , I indeed , Sha’ul , more than once , but Satan hindered us .
52002019	For what is our expectation , or joy , or crown of boasting ? Is it not even you , before our Master יהושע Messiah at His coming ?
52002020	For you are our esteem and joy .
52003001	So , when we could no longer stand it , we thought it good to be left in Athens alone ,
52003002	and sent Timothy , our brother and servant of Elohim , and our fellow worker in the Good News of Messiah , to establish you and encourage you concerning your belief ,
52003003	that no one should be unsettled by these pressures , for you yourselves know that we are appointed to this .
52003004	For indeed , we did inform you beforehand , when we were with , you that we would suffer pressure , and so it came to be , as you know .
52003005	Because of this , when I could no longer stand it , I sent to find out about your belief , lest the trying one might have tried you , and our labour should be in vain .
52003006	But now that Timothy has come to us from you , and having brought us good news of your belief and love , and that you always have good remembrance of us , longing to see us , as we also to see you ,
52003007	therefore , brothers , in all our pressure and distress we were encouraged concerning you by your belief .
52003008	Because we now live , if you stand fast in the Master .
52003009	For what thanks are we able to return to Elohim for you , for all the joy with which we rejoice for your sake in the presence of our Elohim ,
52003010	night and day praying exceedingly , to see your face and make complete what is lacking in your belief ?
52003011	And our Elohim and Father Himself , and our Master יהושע Messiah , direct our way to you !
52003012	And the Master make you increase and overflow in love to each other and to all , as we also do to you ,
52003013	to establish your hearts blameless in set-apartness before our Elohim and Father at the coming of our Master יהושע Messiah with all His set-apart ones !
52004001	For the rest then , brothers , we beg you and call upon you in the Master יהושע , that as you received from us how you should walk and to please Elohim , you should excel still more ,
52004002	for you know what commands we gave you through the Master יהושע .
52004003	For this is the desire of Elohim : your set-apartness ! – that you should abstain from whoring ,
52004004	that each one of you should know how to possess his own vessel in set-apartness and respect ,
52004005	not in passion of lust , like the gentiles who do not know Elohim ,
52004006	not to overstep and take advantage of his brother in this matter , because the Master is the revenger of all such , as we indeed said to you before and earnestly warned .
52004007	For Elohim did not call us to uncleanness , but in set-apartness .
52004008	Therefore he who rejects this does not reject man , but Elohim , who also gives us His Set-apart Spirit .
52004009	And it is not necessary to write to you about brotherly love , for you yourselves are taught by Elohim to love one another ,
52004010	for , in fact , you do so toward all the brothers who are in all Makedonia . But we call upon you , brothers , that you do so more and more ,
52004011	and to make it your ambition to live peaceably , and to attend to your own , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ,
52004012	so that you behave decently toward those who are outside , and not be in any need .
52004013	Now , brothers , we do not wish you to be ignorant concerning those who have fallen asleep , lest you be sad as others who have no expectation .
52004014	For if we believe that יהושע died and rose again , so also Elohim shall bring with Him those who sleep in יהושע .
52004015	For this we say to you by the word of the Master , that we , the living who are left over at the coming of the Master shall in no way go before those who are asleep .
52004016	Because the Master Himself shall come down from heaven with a shout , with the voice of a chief messenger , and with the trumpet of Elohim , and the dead in Messiah shall rise first .
52004017	Then we , the living who are left over , shall be caught away together with them in the clouds to meet the Master in the air – and so we shall always be with the Master .
52004018	So , then , encourage one another with these words .
52005001	Now , brothers , as to the times and the seasons , you do not need to be written to .
52005002	For you yourselves know very well that the day of יהוה comes as a thief in the night .
52005003	For when they say , “ Peace and safety ! ” then suddenly destruction comes upon them , as labour pains upon a pregnant woman , and they shall not escape .
52005004	But you , brothers , are not in darkness , so that this Day should overtake you as a thief .
52005005	For you are all sons of light and sons of the day . We are not of the night nor of darkness .
52005006	So , then , we should not sleep , as others do , but we should watch and be sober .
52005007	For those who sleep , sleep at night , and those who get drunk are drunk at night .
52005008	But we who are of the day should be sober , putting on the breastplate of belief and love , and as a helmet the expectation of deliverance .
52005009	Because Elohim did not appoint us to wrath , but to obtain deliverance through our Master יהושע Messiah ,
52005010	who died for us , so that we , whether awake or asleep , should live together with Him .
52005011	Therefore encourage one another , and build up one another , as indeed you do .
52005012	But brothers , we beg you to know those who labour among you , and are over you in the Master and admonish you ,
52005013	and to hold them in the highest regard in love because of their work . Be at peace among yourselves .
52005014	And we appeal to you , brothers , warn those who are disorderly , encourage the faint-hearted , uphold the weak , be patient with all .
52005015	See that no one renders evil for evil to anyone , but always pursue what is good both for yourselves and for all .
52005016	Rejoice always ,
52005017	pray without ceasing ,
52005018	in all circumstances give thanks , for this is the desire of Elohim in Messiah יהושע for you .
52005019	Do not quench the Spirit .
52005020	Do not despise prophecies ,
52005021	prove them all . Hold fast what is good .
52005022	Keep back from every form of wickedness .
52005023	And the Elohim of peace Himself set you completely apart , and your entire spirit , and being , and body - be preserved blameless at the coming of our Master יהושע Messiah !
52005024	He who calls you is trustworthy , who also shall do it .
52005025	Brothers , pray for us .

52005028	The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with you . Amĕn .

54001004	nor to pay attention to fables and endless genealogies , which cause disputes rather than an administration of Elohim which is in belief .
54001005	Now the goal of this command is love from a clean heart , from a good conscience and a sincere belief ,
54001006	which some , having missed the goal , turned aside to senseless talk ,
54001007	wishing to be teachers of Torah , understanding neither what they say nor concerning what they strongly affirm .
54001008	And we know that the Torah is good if one uses it legitimately ,
54001009	knowing this : that Torah is not laid down for a righteous being , but for the lawless and unruly , for the wicked and for sinners , for the wrong-doers and profane , for those who kill their fathers or mothers , for murderers ,
54001010	for those who whore , for sodomites , for kidnappers , for liars , for perjurers , and for whatever else that is contrary to sound teaching ,

54001013	me , although I was formerly a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and an insulter . But compassion was shown me because being ignorant I did it in unbelief .
54001014	And the favour of our Master was exceedingly increased , with belief and love which are in Messiah יהושע .

54001017	Now to the Sovereign of the ages , incorruptible , invisible , to Elohim who alone is wise , be respect and esteem forever and ever . Amĕn .
54001018	This charge I entrust to you , son Timothy , according to the prophecies previously made concerning you , that by them you might wage the good campaign ,
54001019	having belief and a good conscience , which some have thrust aside and suffered shipwreck concerning their belief .
54001020	Among these are Humenaios and Alexander , whom I delivered to Satan , in order to be taught not to blaspheme .
54002001	First of all , then , I urge that petitions , prayers , intercessions , and thanksgiving be made for all men ,
54002002	for sovereigns and all those who are in authority , in order that we lead a calm and peaceable life in all reverence and seriousness .
54002003	For this is good and acceptable before Elohim our Saviour ,
54002004	who desires all men to be saved and to come to the knowledge of the truth .
54002005	For there is one Elohim , and one Mediator between Elohim and men , the Man Messiah יהושע ,
54002006	who gave Himself a ransom for all , to be witnessed in its own seasons ,
54002007	for which I was appointed a proclaimer and an emissary – I am speaking the truth in Messiah and not lying – a teacher of the gentiles in belief and truth .
54002008	So I resolve that the men pray everywhere , lifting up hands that are set-apart , without wrath and disputing .
54002009	Likewise , that the women dress themselves becomingly , with decency and sensibleness , not with braided hair or gold or pearls or costly garments ,
54002010	but with good works , which is becoming for women undertaking worship of Elohim .
54002011	Let a woman learn in silence , in all subjection .
54002012	But I do not permit a woman to teach or to have authority over a man , rather , to be in silence .
54002013	Because Aḏam was formed first , then Ḥawwah .
54002014	And Aḏam was not deceived , but the woman , having been deceived , fell into transgression .
54002015	But she shall be saved in childbearing if they continue in belief , and love , and set-apartness , with sensibleness .
54003001	Trustworthy is the word : If a man longs for the position of an overseer , he desires a good work .
54003002	An overseer , then , should be blameless , the husband of one wife , sober , sensible , orderly , kind to strangers , able to teach ,
54003003	not given to wine , no brawler , but gentle , not quarrelsome , no lover of money ,
54003004	one who rules his own house well , having his children in subjection with all reverence ,
54003005	for if a man does not know how to rule his own house , how shall he look after the assembly of Elohim ?
54003006	Not a new convert , lest he become puffed up with pride and fall into the judgment of the devil .
54003007	And he should even have a good witness from those who are outside , lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
54003008	Likewise attendants are to be reverent , not double-tongued , not given to much wine , not greedy for filthy gain ,
54003009	holding to the secret of the belief with a clean conscience .
54003010	And let these also be proved first , then let them serve , if they are unreprovable .
54003011	Wives in the same way : reverent , not false accusers , sober , trustworthy in every way .
54003012	Let attendants be the husbands of only one wife , ruling children and their own houses well .
54003013	For those who have served well as attendants gain good standing for themselves , and much boldness in the belief that is in Messiah יהושע .
54003014	I am writing you this , expecting to come to you shortly ,
54003015	but if I delay , that you might know how you should behave in the House of Elohim , which is the assembly of the living Elohim – a strong support and foundation of the truth .
54003016	And , beyond all question , the secret of reverence is great – who was revealed in the flesh , declared right in Spirit , was seen by messengers , was proclaimed among nations , was believed on in the world , was taken up in esteem .
54004001	But the Spirit distinctly says that in latter times some shall fall away from the belief , paying attention to misleading spirits , and teachings of demons ,
54004002	speaking lies in hypocrisy , having been branded on their own conscience ,
54004003	forbidding to marry , saying to abstain from foods which Elohim created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth .
54004004	Because every creature of Elohim is good , and none is to be rejected if it is received with thanksgiving ,
54004005	for it is set apart by the Word of Elohim and prayer .
54004006	If you present these matters to the brothers , you shall be a good servant of יהושע Messiah , being nourished in the words of belief and of the good teaching which you have followed closely .
54004007	But refuse profane and old wives’ fables , and exercise yourself rather to reverence .
54004008	For bodily exercise is profitable for a little , but reverence is profitable for all , having promise of the present life , and of that which is to come .
54004009	Trustworthy is the word , and worthy of all acceptance .
54004010	It is for this that we labour and struggle , because we trust in the living Elohim , who is the Saviour of all men , particularly of those who believe .
54004011	Command and teach these matters .
54004012	Let no one look down on your youth , but be an example to the believers in word , in behaviour , in love , in spirit , in belief , in cleanliness .
54004013	Until I come , give attention to reading of Scripture , to encouragement , to teaching .
54004014	Do not neglect the gift that is in you , which was given to you by prophecy with the laying on of the hands of the elderhood .
54004015	Practise these matters , be in them , so that your progress might be plain to all .
54004016	Pay attention to yourself and to the teaching . Continue in them , for in doing this you shall save both yourself and those who hear you .
54005001	Do not rebuke an older man , but appeal to him as a father , younger ones as brothers ,
54005002	elderly women as mothers , younger ones as sisters , in all cleanliness .
54005003	Respect widows who are truly widows .
54005004	But if any widow has children or grandchildren , let them first learn to treat their own house reverently , and to repay their parents . For this is good and acceptable before Elohim .
54005005	And she who is truly a widow , and left alone , trusts in Elohim and continues in petitions and prayers night and day .
54005006	But she who is living in luxury is dead while she lives .
54005007	And command these matters , in order for them to be blameless .
54005008	And if anyone does not provide for his own , and especially for those of his household , he has denied the belief and is worse than an unbeliever .
54005009	Do not enrol a widow unless she is over sixty years of age , having been the wife of one man ,
54005010	well reported for good works , if she has brought up children , if she has lodged strangers , if she has washed the feet of the set-apart ones , if she has assisted the afflicted , if she has closely followed every good work .
54005011	But refuse the younger widows , for when they become headstrong against the Messiah , they desire to marry ,
54005012	having guilt because they set aside their first belief .
54005013	Moreover , they learn to be idle , going about from house to house , and not only idle but also gossips and busybodies , speaking what is improper .
54005014	So I resolve that the younger widows marry , bear children , manage the house , giving no occasion to the adversary for reviling .
54005015	For already some have turned aside after Satan .
54005016	If any believing man or woman has widows , let such assist them , and do not let the assembly be burdened , in order to assist those who are truly widows .
54005017	Let the elders who rule well be counted worthy of double respect , especially those who labour in the word and teaching .
54005018	For the Scripture says , “ You shall not muzzle an ox while it treads out the grain , ” and , “ The labourer is worthy of his wages . ”
54005019	Do not receive an accusation against an elder except from two or three witnesses .
54005020	Reprove those who are sinning , in the presence of all , so that the rest also might fear .
54005021	I earnestly witness before Elohim and the Master יהושע Messiah , and the chosen messengers , that you watch over these matters without prejudice , doing none at all with partiality .
54005022	Do not lay hands on anyone hastily , nor share in sins of others . Keep yourself clean .
54005023	No longer drink only water , but use a little wine for your stomach’s sake and your frequent ailments .
54005024	The sins of some men are obvious , leading on to judgment , but those of some men follow later .
54005025	In the same way , the good works are obvious , while it is impossible to conceal those that are otherwise .
54006001	Let those who are servants under a yoke regard their own masters worthy of all respect , lest the Name of Elohim and His teaching be blasphemed .
54006002	And those who have believing masters , let them not disregard them because they are brothers , but rather serve them because they are believing and beloved ones , those receiving of the good service in return . Teach and urge these matters .
54006003	If anyone teaches differently and does not agree to the sound words , those of our Master יהושע Messiah , and to the teaching which is according to reverence ,
54006004	he is puffed up , understanding none at all , but is sick about questionings and verbal battles from which come envy , strife , slander , wicked suspicions ,
54006005	worthless disputes of men of corrupt minds and deprived of the truth , who think that reverence is a means of gain – withdraw from such .
54006006	But reverence with contentment is great gain .
54006007	For we brought naught into the world , and it is impossible to take any out .
54006008	When we have food and covering , we shall be satisfied with these .
54006009	But those wishing to be rich fall into trial and a snare , and into many foolish and injurious lusts which plunge men in ruin and destruction .
54006010	For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil , for which some , by longing for it , have strayed from the belief , and pierced themselves through with many pains .
54006011	But you , O man of Elohim , flee from all this , and pursue righteousness , reverence , belief , love , endurance , meekness .
54006012	Fight the good fight of the belief , lay hold on everlasting life , to which you were also called and have confessed the good confession before many witnesses .
54006013	In the sight of Elohim who gives life to all , and of Messiah יהושע who witnessed the good confession before Pontius Pilate , I charge you :
54006014	that you guard the command spotlessly , blamelessly , until the appearing of our Master יהושע Messiah ,
54006015	which in His own seasons He shall reveal – the blessed and only Ruler , the Sovereign of sovereigns and Master of masters ,
54006016	who alone has immortality , dwelling in unapproachable light , whom no one has seen or is able to see , to whom be respect and everlasting might . Amĕn .
54006017	Charge those who are rich in this present age not to be high-minded , nor to trust in the uncertainty of riches , but in the living Elohim , who gives us richly all for enjoyment ,
54006018	to do good , to be rich in good works , to be generous , ready to share ,
54006019	storing up for themselves a good foundation for the time to come , so that they lay hold on everlasting life .
54006020	O Timothy ! Watch over that which has been entrusted to you , turning aside from the profane and empty babblings and contradictions of the falsely called ‘ knowledge , ’
54006021	which some , having professed it , have missed the goal concerning the belief . Favour be with you . Amĕn .
55001001	Sha’ul , an emissary of יהושע Messiah by the desire of Elohim , according to the promise of life which is in Messiah יהושע ,
55001002	to Timothy , my beloved son : Favour , compassion , peace from Elohim the Father , and Messiah יהושע our Master .
55001003	I thank Elohim , whom I serve with a clear conscience , as my forefathers did , as I unceasingly remember you in my prayers night and day ,
55001004	longing to see you , as I remember your tears , so that I might be filled with joy .
55001005	For I recollect the sincere belief which is in you , which dwelt first in your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunike , and I am persuaded is in you too .
55001006	For this reason I remind you to stir up the gift of Elohim which is in you through the laying on of my hands .
55001007	For Elohim has not given us a spirit of cowardice , but of power and of love and of self-control .
55001008	So do not be ashamed of the witness of our Master , nor of me His prisoner , but suffer hardship with me for the Good News according to the power of Elohim ,
55001009	who has saved us and called us with a set-apart calling , not according to our works , but according to His own purpose and favour which was given to us in Messiah יהושע before times of old ,
55001010	but now revealed by the appearing of our Saviour יהושע Messiah , who indeed abolished death and brought life and incorruptibility to light through the Good News ,
55001011	for which I was appointed a proclaimer , and an emissary , and a teacher of the gentiles .
55001012	For this reason I also suffer these matters , but I am not ashamed , for I know whom I have believed and am persuaded that He is able to watch over that which I have entrusted to Him until that Day .
55001013	Hold the pattern of sound words which you have heard from me , in belief and love which are in Messiah יהושע .
55001014	Watch over the good deposit that was entrusted to you , by the Set-apart Spirit dwelling in us .
55001015	You know this , that all those in Asia have turned away from me , among whom are Phugellos and Hermogenes .
55001016	The Master grant compassion unto the household of Onesiphoros , for he often refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain ,
55001017	but when he was in Rome , he eagerly searched for me and found me .
55001018	The Master grant to him to find compassion from the Master in that Day . And you know very well how many ways he attended to me at Ephesos .
55002001	You then , my son , be strong in the favour that is in Messiah יהושע .
55002002	And what you have heard from me among many witnesses , entrust these to trustworthy men who shall be competent to teach others as well .
55002003	Suffer hardship with us as a good soldier of יהושע Messiah .
55002004	No one serving as a soldier gets involved in the affairs of this life , in order to please only him who enlisted him as a soldier .
55002005	And if anyone competes in a game , he is not crowned unless he competes according to the rules .
55002006	The hard-working farmer ought to be first to receive his share of the crops .
55002007	Think over what I say , for the Master shall give you understanding into all this .
55002008	Remember that יהושע Messiah , of the seed of Dawiḏ , was raised from the dead according to my Good News ,
55002009	for which I suffer hardship , as a criminal , unto chains , but the Word of Elohim is not chained .
55002010	So I endure through it all for the sake of the chosen , so that they too obtain deliverance which is in Messiah יהושע with everlasting esteem .
55002011	Trustworthy is the word : For if we died with Him , we shall also live with Him .
55002012	If we endure , we shall also reign with Him . If we deny Him , He also shall deny us .
55002013	If we are not trustworthy , He remains trustworthy , it is impossible for Him to deny Himself .
55002014	Remind them of this , earnestly witnessing before the Master , not to wage verbal battles – which is useless – to the overthrowing of the hearers .
55002015	Do your utmost to present yourself approved to Elohim , a worker who does not need to be ashamed , rightly handling the Word of Truth .
55002016	But keep away from profane , empty babblings , for they go on to more wickedness ,
55002017	and their word shall eat its way like gangrene . Humenaios and Philetos are of this sort ,
55002018	who have missed the goal concerning the truth , saying that the resurrection has already taken place , and overthrow the belief of some .
55002019	However , the solid foundation of Elohim stands firm , having this seal , “ יהוה knows those who are His , ” and , “ Let everyone who names the Name of Messiah turn away from unrighteous-ness . ”
55002020	But in a large house there are not only vessels of gold and silver , but also of wood and clay , some unto value and some unto no value .
55002021	If , then , anyone cleanses himself from these matters , he shall be a vessel unto value , having been set apart , of good use to the Master , having been prepared for every good work .
55002022	And flee from the lusts of youth , but pursue righteousness , belief , love , peace with those calling on the Master out of a clean heart .
55002023	But refuse foolish and stupid questions , knowing that they breed quarrels .
55002024	And a servant of the Master should not quarrel but be gentle towards all , able to teach , patient when wronged ,
55002025	in meekness instructing those who are in opposition , lest somehow Elohim gives them repentance unto a thorough knowledge of the truth ,
55002026	and they come to their senses , out of the snare of the devil , having been taken captive by him to do his desire .
55003001	But know this , that in the last days hard times shall come .
55003002	For men shall be lovers of self , lovers of money , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , thankless , wrong-doers ,
55003003	unloving , unforgiving , slanderers , without self-control , fierce , haters of good ,
55003004	betrayers , reckless , puffed up , lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of Elohim ,
55003005	having a form of reverence but denying its power . And turn away from these !
55003006	For among them are those who creep into households and captivate silly women loaded down with sins , led away by various lusts ,
55003007	always learning and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
55003008	And as Yoḥane and Mamrĕ opposed Mosheh , so do these also oppose the truth – men of corrupt minds , found worthless concerning the belief ;
55003009	but they shall not go on further , for their folly shall be obvious to all , as also that of those men became .
55003010	But you did closely follow my teaching , the way of life , the purpose , the belief , the patience , the love , the endurance ,
55003011	the persecutions , the sufferings , which came to me at Antioch , at Ikonion , and at Lustra – what persecutions I bore . Yet out of them all the Master delivered me .
55003012	And indeed , all those wishing to live reverently in Messiah יהושע , shall be persecuted .
55003013	But evil men and impostors shall go on to the worse , leading astray and being led astray .
55003014	But you , stay in what you have learned and trusted , having known from whom you have learned ,
55003015	and that from a babe you have known the Set-apart Scriptures , which are able to make you wise for deliverance through belief in Messiah יהושע .
55003016	All Scripture is breathed by Elohim and profitable for teaching , for reproof , for setting straight , for instruction in righteousness ,
55003017	that the man of Elohim might be fitted , equipped for every good work .
55004001	In the sight of Elohim and the Master יהושע Messiah , who shall judge the living and the dead at His appearing and His reign , I earnestly charge you :
55004002	Proclaim the Word ! Be urgent in season , out of season . Reprove , warn , appeal , with all patience and teaching .
55004003	For there shall be a time when they shall not bear sound teaching , but according to their own desires , they shall heap up for themselves teachers tickling the ear ,
55004004	and they shall indeed turn their ears away from the truth , and be turned aside to myths .
55004005	But you be sober in all matters , suffer hardships , do the work of an evangelist , accomplish your service completely .
55004006	For I am already being poured out , and the time of my departure has arrived .
55004007	I have fought the good fight , I have finished the race , I have guarded the belief .
55004008	For the rest , there is laid up for me the crown of righteousness , which the Master , the righteous Judge , shall give to me on that Day , and not to me only but also to all those loving His appearing .
55004009	Do your best to come to me soon ,
55004010	for Demas , having loved this present world , has deserted me and went to Thessalonike , Crescens to Galatia , Titus to Dalmatia .
55004011	Luke alone is with me . Take Mark and bring him with you , for he is of good use to me for service .
55004012	And Tuchikos I have sent to Ephesos .
55004013	Bring the cloak that I left with Karpos at Troas when you come , and the books , especially the parchments .
55004014	Alexander the coppersmith did many evils to me . The Master shall repay him according to his works .
55004015	You , too , beware of him , for he strongly opposed our words .
55004016	At my first defence no one stood with me , but all forsook me . Let it not be held against them .
55004017	But the Master stood with me and did strengthen me , so that through me the preaching might be completely accomplished , and that all the gentiles should hear . And I was rescued out of the lion’s mouth .
55004018	And the Master shall rescue me from every wicked work and save me for His heavenly reign . To Him be esteem forever and ever . Amĕn !
55004019	Greet Prisca and Aqulas , and the house of Onesiphoros .
55004020	Ěrastos stayed in Corinth , but I left Trophimos sick in Miletos .
55004021	Do your best to come before winter . Eubulos greets you , and Pudes , and Linos , and Klaudia , and all the brothers .
55004022	The Master יהושע Messiah be with your spirit . Favour be with you . Amĕn .
56001001	Sha’ul , a servant of Elohim and an emissary of יהושע Messiah , according to the belief of Elohim’s chosen ones and knowledge of the truth according to reverence ,
56001002	in expectation of everlasting life which Elohim , who does not lie , promised before times of old ,
56001003	but in its own times has manifested His word through preaching , with which I was entrusted according to the command of Elohim our Saviour ,
56001004	to Titus , a genuine child according to our common belief : Favour , compassion , peace from Elohim the Father and the Master יהושע Messiah our Saviour .
56001005	The reason I left you in Crete was that you should straighten out what was left undone , and appoint elders in every city as I commanded you :
56001006	if anyone is unreprovable , the husband of one wife , having believing children not accused of loose behaviour , or unruly .
56001007	For an overseer has to be unreprovable , as a managing one of Elohim , not self-pleasing , not wroth , not given to wine , no brawler , not greedy for filthy gain ,
56001008	but kind to strangers , a lover of what is good , sensible , righteous , set-apart , self-controlled ,
56001009	clinging to the trustworthy word , according to the teaching , in order to be able both to encourage by sound teaching , and to reprove those who oppose it .
56001010	For there are many unruly men , senseless talkers and deceivers , especially those of the circumcision ,
56001011	whose mouths have to be stopped , who upset entire households , teaching what they should not teach , for the sake of filthy gain .
56001012	One of them , a prophet of their own , said , “ Cretans are always liars , evil beasts , lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	This witness is true . Therefore rebuke them sharply , in order for them to be sound in the belief ,
56001014	not paying attention to Yehuḏite fables , and commands of men who turn from the truth .
56001015	Indeed , all matters are clean to the clean , but to those who are defiled and unbelieving no matter is clean , but both their mind and conscience are defiled .
56001016	They profess to know Elohim , but in works they deny Him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unfit for any good work .
56002001	But you , speak what is fitting for sound teaching :
56002002	the older men are to be sober , serious , sensible , sound in belief , in love , in endurance ,
56002003	the older women likewise are to be set-apart in behaviour , not slanderers , not given to much wine , teachers of what is good ,
56002004	in order for them to train the young women to love their husbands , to love their children ,
56002005	to be sensible , blameless , workers at home , good , subject to their own husbands , in order that the word of Elohim is not evil spoken of .
56002006	Likewise urge the young men to be sensible .
56002007	Show yourself to them an example of good works in all matters . In teaching show uncorruptness , seriousness ,
56002008	soundness of speech beyond reproach , in order that the opponent is put to shame , having no evil word to say about you .
56002009	Servants should be subject to their own masters , to be well-pleasing in every way , not back-talking ,
56002010	not stealing , but showing all good trustworthiness , so that they adorn the teaching of Elohim our Saviour in every way .
56002011	For the saving Gift of Elohim has appeared to all men ,
56002012	instructing us to renounce wickedness and worldly lusts , and to live sensibly , righteously , and reverently in the present age ,
56002013	looking for the blessed expectation and esteemed appearance of the great Elohim and our Saviour יהושע Messiah ,
56002014	who gave Himself for us , to redeem us from all lawlessness and to cleanse for Himself a people , His own possession , ardent for good works .
56002015	Speak these matters , urge , and reprove with all authority . Let no one despise you .
56003001	Remind them to be subject to rulers and authorities , to obey , to be ready for every good work ,
56003002	not to slander anyone , not to be quarrelsome , to be gentle , showing all meekness to all men .
56003003	For we ourselves were also once foolish , disobedient , led astray , serving various lusts and pleasures , living in evil and envy , being hated and hating one another .
56003004	But when the kindness and the love of Elohim our Saviour toward man appeared ,
56003005	He saved us , not by works of righteousness which we have done but according to His compassion , through the washing of rebirth , and renewal by the Set-apart Spirit ,
56003006	which He poured out on us richly through יהושע Messiah our Saviour ,
56003007	that having been declared right by His favour we should become heirs according to the expectation of everlasting life .
56003008	Trustworthy is the word , and in this regard I wish you to strongly affirm , that those who have believed in Elohim should keep their minds on maintaining good works . This is good and profitable to men .
56003009	But keep away from foolish questions , and genealogies , and strife and quarrels about the Torah , for they are unprofitable and useless .
56003010	Reject a divisive man after the first and second warning ,
56003011	knowing that such a one has been perverted , and sins , being self-condemned .
56003012	When I shall send Artemas to you , or Tuchikos , do your best to come to me at Nikopolis , for I have decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Do your best to send Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey , so that they lack none at all .
56003014	And our brothers should also learn to maintain good works , to meet urgent needs , so that they shall not be without fruit .
56003015	All those with me greet you . Greet those who love us in the belief . Favour be with you all . Amĕn .
57001001	Sha’ul , a prisoner of Messiah יהושע , and Timothy the brother , to Philemon our beloved one and fellow worker ,
57001002	and Apphia our sister , and Archippos our fellow soldier , and the assembly at your house :
57001003	Favour to you and peace from Elohim our Father and the Master יהושע Messiah .
57001004	I always thank my Elohim when I mention you in my prayers ,
57001005	hearing of your love and the belief which you have toward the Master יהושע and toward all the set-apart ones ,
57001006	so that the sharing of your belief might become working in the knowledge of all the good which is in you toward Messiah יהושע .
57001007	For we have much joy and encouragement in your love , because the tender affections of the set-apart ones have been refreshed by you , brother .
57001008	Therefore , although I have much boldness in Messiah to command you what is fitting ,
57001009	because of love , I rather appeal – being such a one as Sha’ul , the aged , and now also a prisoner of יהושע Messiah –
57001010	I appeal to you for my child Onesimos , whom I brought forth while in my chains ,
57001011	who formerly was of no use to you , but now is of good use to you and to me ,
57001012	whom I sent back to you , and receive him , that is , my own tender affections ,
57001013	whom I wished to keep with me , that on your behalf he might serve me in my chains for the Good News .
57001014	But without your opinion I wished to do none at all , so that your good deed should not be by way of necessity , but voluntary .
57001015	For he parted from you for a while , possibly because of this , so that you might have him back forever ,
57001016	no longer as a slave but more than a slave , as a beloved brother , especially to me , and how much more to you , both in the flesh and in the Master .
57001017	So , if you regard me as your partner , receive him as you would me .
57001018	But if he has wronged you or owes you whatever , put that on my account .
57001019	I , Sha’ul , wrote with my own hand . I shall repay – not to mention to you that you indeed owe yourself to me also .
57001020	Yes , brother , let me derive pleasure from you in the Master , refresh my tender affections in the Master .
57001021	Trusting in your obedience , I wrote to you , knowing that you shall do even more than I say .
57001022	And at the same time also prepare a place for me to stay , for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given to you .
57001023	Epaphras , fellow prisoner of me in Messiah יהושע , greets you ,
57001024	and Mark , Aristarchos , Demas , Luke , my fellow workers .
57001025	The favour of our Master יהושע Messiah be with your spirit . Amĕn .
58001001	Elohim , having of old spoken in many portions and many ways to the fathers by the prophets ,
58001002	has in these last days spoken to us by the Son , whom He has appointed heir of all , through whom also He made the ages ,
58001003	who being the brightness of the esteem and the exact representation of His substance , and sustaining all by the word of His power , having made a cleansing of our sins through Himself , sat down at the right hand of the Greatness on high ,
58001004	having become so much better than the messengers , as He has inherited a more excellent Name than them .
58001005	For to which of the messengers did He ever say , “ You are My Son , today I have brought You forth ” ? And again , “ I shall be to Him a Father , and He shall be to Me a Son ” ?
58001006	And when He again brings the first-born into the world , He says , “ Let all the messengers of Elohim do reverence to Him . ”
58001007	And of the messengers indeed He says , “ . . . who is making His messengers spirits and His servants a flame of fire . ”
58001008	But to the Son He says , “ Your throne , O Elohim , is forever and ever , a sceptre of straightness is the sceptre of Your reign .
58001009	“ You have loved righteousness and hated lawlessness . Because of this , Elohim , Your Elohim , has anointed You with the oil of gladness more than Your companions . ”
58001010	And , “ You , Master , did found the earth in the beginning , and the heavens are the work of Your hands .
58001011	“ They shall perish , but You remain . And they shall all grow old like a garment ,
58001012	and like a mantle You shall fold them up , and they shall be changed . But You are the same , and Your years shall not fail . ”
58001013	And to which of the messengers did He ever say , “ Sit at My right hand , until I make Your enemies a footstool for Your feet ” ?
58001014	Are they not all serving spirits sent out to attend those who are about to inherit deliverance ?
58002001	Because of this we have to pay more attention to what we have heard , lest we drift away .
58002002	For if the word spoken through messengers proved to be firm , and every transgression and disobedience received a right reward ,
58002003	how shall we escape if we neglect so great a deliverance , which first began to be spoken by the Master , and was confirmed to us by those that heard ,
58002004	Elohim also bearing witness both with signs and wonders , with various miracles , and gifts of the Set-apart Spirit , distributed according to His own desire ?
58002005	For it is not to messengers that He has subjected the world to come , concerning which we speak .
58002006	But somewhere one has witnessed , saying , “ What is man that You remember him , or the son of man that You look after him ?
58002007	“ You have made him a little lower than the messengers . You have crowned him with esteem and respect , and set him over the works of Your hands .
58002008	“ You have put all in subjection under his feet . ” For in that He put all in subjection under him , He left none that is not subjected to him . But now we do not yet see all subjected to him .
58002009	But we do see Him who was made for a little while lower than the messengers , יהושע , because of the suffering of death crowned with esteem and respect , that by the favour of Elohim He should taste death for everyone .
58002010	For it was fitting for Him , because of whom all are and through whom all are , in bringing many sons to esteem , to make the Princely Leader of their deliverance perfect through sufferings .
58002011	For both He who sets apart and those who are being set apart are all of One , for which reason He is not ashamed to call them brothers ,
58002012	saying , “ I shall announce Your Name to My brothers , in the midst of the congregation I shall sing praise to You . ”
58002013	And again , “ I shall put My trust in Him . ” And again , “ See , I and the children whom Elohim gave Me . ”
58002014	Therefore , since the children share in flesh and blood , He Himself similarly shared in the same , so that by means of His death He might destroy him having the power of death , that is , the devil ,
58002015	and deliver those who throughout life were held in slavery by fear of death .
58002016	For , doubtless , He does not take hold of messengers , but He does take hold of the seed of Aḇraham .
58002017	So in every way He had to be made like His brothers , in order to become a compassionate and trustworthy High Priest in matters related to Elohim , to make atonement for the sins of the people .
58002018	For in what He had suffered , Himself being tried , He is able to help those who are tried .
58003001	Therefore , set-apart brothers , partakers of the heavenly calling , closely consider the Emissary and High Priest of our confession , Messiah יהושע ,
58003002	who was trustworthy to Him who appointed Him , as also Mosheh in all His house .
58003003	For this One has been deemed worthy of more esteem than Mosheh , as much as He who built the house enjoys more respect than the house .
58003004	For every house is built by someone , but He who built all is Elohim .
58003005	And Mosheh indeed was trustworthy in all His house as a servant , for a witness of what would be spoken later ,
58003006	but Messiah as a Son over His own house , whose house we are if we hold fast the boldness and the boasting of the expectation firm to the end .
58003007	Therefore , as the Set-apart Spirit says , “ Today , if you hear His voice ,
58003008	do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion , in the day of trial in the wilderness ,
58003009	where your fathers tried Me , proved Me , and saw My works forty years .
58003010	“ Therefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , ‘ They always go astray in their heart , and they have not known My ways . ’
58003011	“ As I swore in My wrath , ‘ If they shall enter into My rest . . . ’ ”
58003012	Look out , brothers , lest there be in any of you a wicked heart of unbelief in falling away from the living Elohim ,
58003013	but encourage one another daily , while it is called “ Today , ” lest any of you be hardened by the deceivableness of sin .
58003014	For we have become partakers of Messiah if we hold fast the beginning of our trust firm to the end ,
58003015	while it is said , “ Today , if you hear His voice , do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion . ”
58003016	For who , having heard , rebelled ? Was it not all who came out of Mitsrayim , led by Mosheh ?
58003017	And with whom was He grieved forty years ? Was it not with those who sinned , whose corpses fell in the wilderness ?
58003018	And to whom did He swear that they would not enter into His rest , but to those who did not obey ?
58003019	So we see that they were unable to enter in because of unbelief .
58004001	Therefore , since a promise remains of entering into His rest , let us fear lest any of you seem to have come short of it .
58004002	For indeed the Good News was brought to us as well as to them , but the word which they heard did not profit them , not having been mixed with belief in those who heard it .
58004003	For we who have believed do enter into that rest , as He has said , “ As I swore in My wrath , if they shall enter into My rest . . . ” And yet His works have come into being from the foundation of the world .
58004004	For somewhere He has said thus about the seventh day , “ And Elohim rested on the seventh day from all His works , ”
58004005	and in this again , “ If they shall enter into My rest . . . ”
58004006	Since then it remains for some to enter into it , and those who formerly received the Good News did not enter in because of disobedience ,
58004007	He again defines a certain day , “ Today , ” saying through Dawiḏ so much later , as it has been said , “ Today , if you hear His voice , do not harden your hearts . ”
58004008	For if Yehoshua had given them rest , He would not have spoken of another day after that .
58004009	So there remains a Sabbath-keeping for the people of Elohim .
58004010	For the one , having entered into His rest , has himself also rested from his works , as Elohim rested from His own .
58004011	Let us therefore do our utmost to enter into that rest , lest anyone fall after the same example of disobedience .
58004012	For the Word of Elohim is living , and working , and sharper than any two-edged sword , cutting through even to the dividing of being and spirit , and of joints and marrow , and able to judge the thoughts and intentions of the heart .
58004013	And there is no creature hidden from His sight , but all are naked and laid bare before the eyes of Him with whom is our account .
58004014	Therefore , since we have a great High Priest who has passed through the heavens , יהושע the Son of Elohim , let us hold fast our confession .
58004015	For we do not have a High Priest unable to sympathize with our weaknesses , but One who was tried in all respects as we are , apart from sin .
58004016	Therefore , let us come boldly to the throne of favour , in order to receive compassion , and find favour for timely help .
58005001	For every priest taken from among men is appointed on behalf of men in matters relating to Elohim , to offer both gifts and offerings for sins ,
58005002	being able to have a measure of feeling for those not knowing and being led astray , since he himself is also surrounded by weakness .
58005003	And on account of this he has to offer for sins – as for the people , so also for himself .
58005004	And no one obtains this esteem for himself , but he who is called by Elohim , even as Aharon also was .
58005005	So also the Messiah did not extol Himself to become High Priest , but it was He who said to Him , “ You are My Son , today I have brought You forth . ”
58005006	As He also says in another place , “ You are a priest forever according to the order of Malkitseḏeq , ”
58005007	who , in the days of His flesh , when He had offered up prayers and petitions with strong crying and tears to Him who was able to save Him from death , and was heard because of His reverent fear ,
58005008	though being a Son , He learned obedience by what He suffered .
58005009	And having been perfected , He became the Causer of everlasting deliverance to all those obeying Him ,
58005010	having been designated by Elohim a High Priest “ according to the order of Malkitseḏeq , ”
58005011	concerning whom we have much to say , and hard to explain , since you have become dull of hearing .
58005012	For indeed , although by this time you ought to be teachers , you need someone to teach you again the first elements of the Words of Elohim . And you have become such as need milk and not solid food .
58005013	For everyone partaking of milk is inexperienced in the word of righteousness , for he is a babe .
58005014	But solid food is for the mature whose senses have been trained by practice to discern both good and evil .
58006001	Therefore , having left the word of the beginning of the Messiah , let us go on to perfection , not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of belief toward Elohim ,
58006002	of the teaching of immersions , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of everlasting judgment .
58006003	And this we shall do , if Elohim indeed permits .
58006004	For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted the heavenly gift , and have become partakers of the Set-apart Spirit ,
58006005	and have tasted the good Word of Elohim and the powers of the age to come ,
58006006	and fall away , to renew them again to repentance – having impaled for themselves the Son of Elohim again , and put Him to open shame .
58006007	For ground that is drinking the rain often falling on it , and is bearing plants fit for those by whom it is tilled , receives blessing from Elohim ,
58006008	but if it brings forth thorns and thistles , it is rejected and near to being cursed , and ends up by being burned .
58006009	But although we speak in this way , beloved , we are persuaded , concerning you , of better matters which possess deliverance .
58006010	For Elohim is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love which you have shown toward His Name , in that you have attended to the set-apart ones , and still attend .
58006011	And we desire that each one of you show the same eagerness , to the entire confirmation of expectation until the end ,
58006012	in order that you do not become sluggish , but imitate those who through belief and patience inherit the promises .
58006013	For Elohim , having promised Aḇraham , since He could swear by no one greater , swore by Himself ,
58006014	saying , “ Truly , blessing I shall bless you , and increasing I shall increase you . ”
58006015	And so , after being patient , he obtained the promise .
58006016	For men do indeed swear by the one greater , and an oath for confirmation is for them an end of all dispute .
58006017	In this way Elohim , resolving to show even more clearly to the heirs of promise the unchangeableness of His purpose , confirmed it by an oath ,
58006018	so that by two unchangeable matters in which it is impossible for Elohim to lie , we might have strong encouragement , we who have fled for refuge to lay hold of the expectation set before us ,
58006019	which we have as an anchor of the life , both safe and firm , and entering into that within the veil ,
58006020	where יהושע has entered as a forerunner for us , having become High Priest forever according to the order of Malkitseḏeq .
58007001	For this Malkitseḏeq , sovereign of Shalĕm , priest of the Most High Elohim , who met Aḇraham returning from the slaughter of the sovereigns and blessed him ,
58007002	to whom also Aḇraham gave a tenth part of all , his name being translated , indeed , first , ‘ sovereign of righteousness , ’ and then also sovereign of Shalĕm , that is , ‘ sovereign of peace , ’
58007003	without father , without mother , without genealogy , having neither beginning of days nor end of life , but having been made like the Son of Elohim , remains a priest for all time .
58007004	Now see how great this one was , to whom even the ancestor Aḇraham gave a tenth of the choicest booty .
58007005	And truly , those who are of the sons of Lĕwi , who receive the priesthood , have a command to receive tithes from the people according to the Torah , that is , from their brothers , though they have come from the loins of Aḇraham ,
58007006	however , the one whose genealogy is not derived from them received tithes from Aḇraham , and blessed the one who held the promises .
58007007	And it is beyond all dispute that the lesser is blessed by the better .
58007008	And here it is men who die that receive tithes , but there it is someone of whom it is witnessed that he lives .
58007009	And one might say that through Aḇraham even Lĕwi , who received tithes , gave tithes ,
58007010	for he was still in the loins of his father when Malkitseḏeq met him .
