58007011	Truly , then , if perfection were through the Lĕwitical priesthood – for under it the people were given the Torah – why was there still need for another priest to arise according to the order of Malkitseḏeq , and not be called according to the order of Aharon ?
58007012	For the priesthood being changed , of necessity there takes place a change of law also .
58007013	For He of whom this is said belongs to another tribe , from which no one had attended at the altar .
58007014	For it is perfectly clear that our Master arose from Yehuḏah , a tribe about which Mosheh never spoke of concerning priesthood ,
58007015	and this is clearer still , if another priest arises in the likeness of Malkitseḏeq ,
58007016	who has become , not according to the Torah of fleshly command , but according to the power of an endless life ,
58007017	for He does witness , “ You are a priest forever according to the order of Malkitseḏeq . ”
58007018	For there is indeed a setting aside of the former command because of its weakness and unprofitableness ,
58007019	for the Torah perfected naught , but the bringing in of a better expectation , through which we draw near to Elohim .
58007020	And it was not without an oath !
58007021	For they indeed became priests without an oath , but He became Priest with an oath by Him who said to Him , “ יהוה has sworn and shall not regret , ‘ You are a priest forever according to the order of Malkitseḏeq . ’ ”
58007022	By as much as this יהושע has become a guarantor of a better covenant .
58007023	And indeed , those that became priests were many , because they were prevented by death from continuing ,
58007024	but He , because He remains forever , has an unchangeable priesthood .
58007025	Therefore He is also able to save completely those who draw near to Elohim through Him , ever living to make intercession for them .
58007026	For it was fitting that we should have such a High Priest – kind , innocent , undefiled , having been separated from sinners , and exalted above the heavens ,
58007027	who does not need , as those high priests , to offer up slaughter offerings day by day , first for His own sins and then for those of the people , for this He did once for all when He offered up Himself .
58007028	For the Torah appoints as high priests men who have weakness , but the word of the oath which came after the Torah , appoints the Son having been perfected forever .
58008001	Now the summary of what we are saying is : We have such a High Priest , who is seated at the right hand of the throne of the Greatness in the heavens ,
58008002	and who serves in the set-apart place and of the true Tent , which יהוה set up , and not man .
58008003	For every high priest is appointed to offer both gifts and slaughters . So it was also necessary for this One to have somewhat to offer .
58008004	For if indeed He were on earth , He would not be a priest , since there are priests who offer the gifts according to the Torah ,
58008005	who serve a copy and shadow of the heavenly , as Mosheh was warned when he was about to make the Tent . For He said , “ See that you make all according to the pattern shown you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now He has obtained a more excellent service , inasmuch as He is also Mediatorof a better covenant , which was constituted on better promises .
58008007	For if that first covenant had been faultless , then no place would have been sought for a second .
58008008	For finding fault with them , He says , “ See , the days are coming , ” says יהוה , “ when I shall conclude with the house of Yisra’ĕl and with the house of Yehuḏah a renewed covenant ,
58008009	not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Mitsrayim , because they did not continue in My covenant , and I disregarded them , ” says יהוה .
58008010	“ Because this is the covenant that I shall make with the house of Yisra’ĕl after those days , says יהוה , giving My laws in their mind , and I shall write them on their hearts , and I shall be their Elohim , and they shall be My people .
58008011	“ And they shall by no means teach each one his neighbour , and each one his brother , saying , ‘ Know יהוה , ’ because they all shall know Me , from the least of them to the greatest of them .
58008012	“ Because I shall forgive their unrighteousness , and their sins and their lawlessnesses I shall no longer remember . ”
58008013	By saying , ‘ renewed , ’ He has made the first old . Now what becomes old and growing aged is near disappearing .
58009001	Now the first covenant indeed had regulations of worship and the earthly set-apart place .
58009002	For a Tent was prepared : the first part , in which was the lampstand , and the table , and the showbread , which is called the Set-apart Place .
58009003	And after the second veil , the part of the Tent which is called Most Set-apart ,
58009004	to which belonged the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid on all sides with gold , in which were the golden pot that held the manna , and the rod of Aharon that budded , and the tablets of the covenant ,
58009005	and above it the keruḇim of esteem were overshadowing the place of atonement – about which we do not now speak in detail .
58009006	And these having been prepared like this , the priests always went into the first part of the Tent , accomplishing the services .
58009007	But into the second part the high priest went alone once a year , not without blood , which he offered for himself and for sins of ignorance of the people ,
58009008	the Set-apart Spirit signifying this , that the way into the Most Set-apart Place was not yet made manifest while the first Tent has a standing ,
58009009	which was a parable for the present time in which both gifts and slaughters are offered which are unable to perfect the one serving , as to his conscience ,
58009010	only as to foods and drinks , and different washings , and fleshly regulations imposed until a time of setting matters straight .
58009011	But Messiah , having become a High Priest of the coming good matters , through the greater and more perfect Tent not made with hands , that is , not of this creation ,
58009012	entered into the Most Set-apart Place once for all , not with the blood of goats and calves , but with His own blood , having obtained everlasting redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of bulls and goats and the ashes of a heifer , sprinkling the defiled , sets apart for the cleansing of the flesh ,
58009014	how much more shall the blood of the Messiah , who through the everlasting Spirit offered Himself unblemished to Elohim , cleanse your conscience from dead works to serve the living Elohim ?
58009015	And because of this He is the Mediator of a renewed covenant , so that , death having taken place for redemption of the transgressions under the first covenant , those who are called might receive the promise of the everlasting inheritance .
58009016	For where a covenant is , it is necessary for the death of the covenanted one to be established .
58009017	For a covenant over those dead is firm , since it is never valid while the covenanted one is living .
58009018	Therefore not even the first covenant was instituted without blood .
58009019	For when , according to Torah , every command had been spoken by Mosheh to all the people , he took the blood of calves and goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people ,
58009020	saying , “ This is the blood of the covenant which Elohim commanded you . ”
58009021	And in the same way he sprinkled with blood both the Tent and all the vessels of the service .
58009022	And , according to the Torah , almost all is cleansed with blood , and without shedding of blood there is no forgiveness .
58009023	It was necessary , then , that the copies of the heavenly ones should be cleansed with these , but the heavenly ones themselves with better slaughter offerings than these .
58009024	For Messiah has not entered into a Set-apart Place made by hand – figures of the true – but into the heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of Elohim on our behalf ,
58009025	not that He should offer Himself often , as the high priest enters into the Set-apart Place year by year with blood not his own .
58009026	For if so , He would have had to suffer often , since the foundation of the world . But now He has appeared once for all at the end of the ages to put away sin by the offering of Himself .
58009027	And as it awaits men to die once , and after this the judgment ,
58009028	so also the Messiah , having been offered once to bear the sins of many , shall appear a second time , apart from sin , to those waiting for Him , unto deliverance .
58010001	For the Torah , having a shadow of the good matters to come , and not the image itself of the matters , was never able to make perfect those who draw near with the same slaughter offerings which they offer continually year by year .
58010002	Otherwise , would they not have ceased to be offered ? Because those who served , once cleansed , would have had no more consciousness of sins .
58010003	But in those offerings is a reminder of sins year by year .
58010004	For it is impossible for blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	Therefore , coming into the world , He says , “ Slaughtering and meal offering You did not desire , but a body You have prepared for Me .
58010006	“ In burnt offerings and offerings for sin You did not delight .
58010007	“ Then I said , ‘ See , I come – in the roll of the book it has been written concerning Me – to do Your desire , O Elohim . ’ ”
58010008	Saying above , “ Slaughter and meal offering , and burnt offerings , and offerings for sin You did not desire , nor delighted in , ” which are offered according to the Torah ,
58010009	then He said , “ See , I come to do Your desire , O Elohim . ” He takes away the first to establish the second .
58010010	By that desire we have been set apart through the offering of the body of יהושע Messiah once for all .
58010011	And indeed every priest stands day by day doing service , and repeatedly offering the same slaughter offerings which are never able to take away sins .
58010012	But He , having offered one slaughter offering for sins for all time , sat down at the right hand of Elohim ,
58010013	waiting from that time onward until His enemies are made a footstool for His feet .
58010014	For by one offering He has perfected for all time those who are being set apart .
58010015	And the Set-apart Spirit also witnesses to us , for after having said before ,
58010016	“ This is the covenant that I shall make with them after those days , says יהוה , giving My laws into their hearts , and in their minds I shall write them , ”
58010017	and , “ Their sins and their lawlessnesses I shall remember no more . ”
58010018	Now where there is forgiveness of these , there is no longer a slaughter offering for sin .
58010019	So , brothers , having boldness to enter into the Set-apart Place by the blood of יהושע ,
58010020	by a new and living way which He instituted for us , through the veil , that is , His flesh ,
58010021	and having a High Priest over the House of Elohim ,
58010022	let us draw near with a true heart in completeness of belief , having our hearts sprinkled from a wicked conscience and our bodies washed with clean water .
58010023	Let us hold fast the confession of our expectation without yielding , for He who promised is trustworthy .
58010024	And let us be concerned for one another in order to stir up love and good works ,
58010025	not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as is the habit of some , but encouraging , and so much more as you see the Day coming near .
58010026	For if we sin purposely after we have received the knowledge of the truth , there no longer remains a slaughter offering for sins ,
58010027	but some fearsome anticipation of judgment , and a fierce fire which is about to consume the opponents .
58010028	Anyone who has disregarded the Torah of Mosheh dies without compassion on the witness of two or three witnesses .
58010029	How much worse punishment do you think shall he deserve who has trampled the Son of Elohim underfoot , counted the blood of the covenant by which he was set apart as common , and insulted the Spirit of favour ?
58010030	For we know Him who has said , “ Vengeance is Mine , I shall repay , says יהוה . ” And again , “ יהוה shall judge His people . ”
58010031	It is fearsome to fall into the hands of the living Elohim .
58010032	But remember the former days , when , after you were enlightened , you endured a great struggle with sufferings .
58010033	On the one hand you were exposed to reproaches and pressures , and on the other hand you became sharers with those who were so treated ,
58010034	for you sympathised with me in my chains , and you accepted with joy the seizure of your possessions , knowing that you have a better and a lasting possession for yourselves in the heavens .
58010035	Do not , then , lose your boldness , which has great reward .
58010036	For you have need of endurance , so that when you have done the desire of Elohim , you receive the promise :
58010037	“ For yet a little while – He who is coming shall come and shall not delay . ”
58010038	“ But the righteous shall live by belief , but if anyone draws back , my being has no pleasure in him . ”
58010039	But we are not of those who draw back to destruction , but of belief to the preservation of life .
58011001	And belief is the substance of what is expected , the proof of what is not seen .
58011002	For by this the elders obtained witness .
58011003	By belief , we understand that the ages were prepared by the word of Elohim , so that what is seen was not made of what is visible .
58011004	By belief , Heḇel offered to Elohim a greater slaughter offering than Qayin , through which he obtained witness that he was righteous , Elohim witnessing of his gifts . And through it , having died , he still speaks .
58011005	By belief , Ḥanoḵ was translated so as not to see death , “ and was not found because Elohim had translated him . ” For before his translation he obtained witness , that he pleased Elohim .
58011006	But without belief it is impossible to please Him , for he who comes to Elohim has to believe that He is , and that He is a rewarder of those who earnestly seek Him .
58011007	By belief , Noaḥ , having been warned of what was yet unseen , having feared , prepared an ark to save his house , through which he condemned the world and became heir of the righteousness which is according to belief .
58011008	By belief , Aḇraham obeyed when he was called to go out to the place which he was about to receive as an inheritance . And he went out , not knowing where he was going .
58011009	By belief , he sojourned in the land of promise as a stranger , dwelling in tents with Yitsḥaq and Ya‛aqoḇ , the heirs with him of the same promise ,
58011010	for he was looking for the city having foundations , whose builder and maker is Elohim .
58011011	By belief also , Sarah herself was enabled to conceive seed , and she bore a child when she was past the normal age , because she deemed Him trustworthy who had promised .
58011012	And so from one , and him as good as dead , were born as numerous as the stars of the heaven , as countless as the sand which is by the seashore .
58011013	In belief all these died , not having received the promises , but seeing them from a distance , welcomed and embraced them , and confessed that they were aliens and strangers on the earth .
58011014	For those who speak this way make it clear that they seek a fatherland .
58011015	And yet , if they had indeed kept remembering that place from which they had come out , they would have had the chance to return .
58011016	But now they long for a better place , that is , a heavenly . Therefore Elohim is not ashamed to be called their Elohim , for He has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By belief , Aḇraham , when he was tried , offered up Yitsḥaq , and he who had received the promises offered up his only brought-forth son ,
58011018	of whom it was said , “ In Yitsḥaq your seed shall be called , ”
58011019	reckoning that Elohim was able to raise , even from the dead , from which he received him back , as a type .
58011020	By belief , Yitsḥaq blessed Ya‛aqoḇ and Ěsaw concerning that which was to come .
58011021	By belief , Ya‛aqoḇ , when he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Yosĕph , and did reverence on the top of his staff .
58011022	By belief , Yosĕph , when he was dying , made mention of the outgoing of the children of Yisra’ĕl , and gave orders concerning his bones .
58011023	By belief , Mosheh , having been born , was hidden three months by his parents , because they saw he was a comely child , and were not afraid of the sovereign’s command .
58011024	By belief , Mosheh , having become great , refused to be called the son of the daughter of Pharaoh ,
58011025	choosing rather to be afflicted with the people of Elohim than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a time ,
58011026	deeming the reproach of Messiah greater riches than the treasures in Mitsrayim , for he was looking to the reward .
58011027	By belief , he left Mitsrayim , not fearing the wrath of the sovereign , for he was steadfast , as seeing Him who is invisible .
58011028	By belief , he performed the Passover and the sprinkling of blood , lest he who destroyed the first-born should touch them .
58011029	By belief , they passed through the Red Sea as by dry land , and when the Mitsrites tried it , they were drowned .
58011030	By belief , the walls of Yeriḥo fell , having been surrounded for seven days .
58011031	By belief , Raḥaḇ the whore did not perish with those who did not believe , having received the spies with peace .
58011032	And what more shall I say ? For the time would fail me to relate of Gid‛on and Baraq and Shimshon and Yiphtaḥ , also of Dawiḏ and Shemu’ĕl and the prophets ,
58011033	who through belief , overcame reigns , worked righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched the power of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , became mighty in battle , put foreign armies to flight .
58011035	Women received back their dead by resurrection . And others were tortured , not accepting release , to obtain a better resurrection .
58011036	And others had trial of mockings and floggings and more , of chains and imprisonment .
58011037	They were stoned , they were tried , they were sawn in two , they were slain with the sword . They went about in sheepskins , in goatskins , being in need , afflicted , mistreated ,
58011038	of whom the world was not worthy – wandering in deserts and mountains and caves and holes of the earth .
58011039	And having obtained witness through the belief , all these did not receive the promise ,
58011040	Elohim having provided what is better for us , that they should not be made perfect apart from us .
58012001	We too , then , having so great a cloud of witnesses all around us , let us lay aside every weight and the sin which so easily entangles us , and let us run with endurance the race set before us ,
58012002	looking to the Princely Leader and Perfecter of our belief , יהושע , who for the joy that was set before Him endured the stake , having despised the shame , and sat down at the right hand of the throne of Elohim .
58012003	For consider Him who endured such opposition from sinners against Himself , lest you become weary and faint in your lives .
58012004	You have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
58012005	And you have forgotten the appeal which speaks to you as to sons , “ My son , do not despise the discipline of יהוה , nor faint when you are reproved by Him ,
58012006	for whom יהוה loves , He disciplines , and flogs every son whom He receives . ”
58012007	If you endure discipline , Elohim is treating you as sons . For what son is there whom a father does not discipline ?
58012008	But if you are without discipline , of which all have become sharers , then you are illegitimate and not sons .
58012009	Moreover , we indeed had fathers of our flesh disciplining us , and we paid them respect . Shall we not much rather be subject to the Father of spirits , and live ?
58012010	For they indeed disciplined us for a few days as seemed best to them , but He does it for our profit , so that we might share His apartness .
58012011	And indeed , no discipline seems pleasant at the time , but grievous , but afterward it yields the peaceable fruit of righteousness to those who have been trained by it .
58012012	So , strengthen the hands which hang down and the weak knees ,
58012013	and make straight paths for your feet , lest the lame be turned aside , but instead , to be healed .
58012014	Pursue peace with all , and pursue apartness without which no one shall see the Master .
58012015	See to it that no one falls short of the favour of Elohim , that no root of bitterness springing up causes trouble , by which many become defiled ,
58012016	lest there be anyone who whores , or profane one , like Ěsaw , who for a single meal sold his birthright .
58012017	For you know that afterward , when he wished to inherit the blessing , he was rejected , for he found no place for repentance , though he sought it with tears .
58012018	For you have not drawn near to a mountain touched and scorched with fire , and to blackness , and darkness and storm ,
58012019	and a sound of a trumpet , and a voice of words , so that those who heard it begged that no further Word should be spoken to them ,
58012020	for they could not bear what was commanded , “ If even a beast touches the mountain , it shall be stoned or shot through with an arrow . ”
58012021	And so fearsome was the sight that Mosheh said , “ I exceedingly fear and tremble . ”
58012022	But you have drawn near to Mount Tsiyon and to the city of the living Elohim , to the heavenly Yerushalayim , to myriads of messengers ,
58012023	to the entire gathering and assembly of the first-born having been enrolled in heaven , and to Elohim the Judge of all , and to the spirits of righteous men made perfect ,
58012024	and to יהושע the Mediator of a new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling which speaks better than the blood of Heḇel .
58012025	Take heed not to refuse the One speaking . For if those did not escape who refused the warning on earth , much less we who turn away from Him from heaven ,
58012026	whose voice shook the earth then , but now He has promised , saying , “ Yet once more I shake not only the earth , but also the heaven . ”
58012027	And this , “ Yet once more , ” makes clear the removal of what is shaken – as having been made – so that the unshaken matters might remain .
58012028	Therefore , receiving an unshakeable reign , let us hold the favour , through which we serve Elohim pleasingly with reverence and awe ,
58012029	for indeed , our Elohim is a consuming fire .
58013001	Let the brotherly love continue .
58013002	Do not forget to receive strangers , for by so doing some have unwittingly entertained messengers .
58013003	Remember the prisoners as if chained with them , and those being mistreated , since you yourselves also are in the body .
58013004	Let marriage be respected by all , and the bed be undefiled . But Elohim shall judge those who whore , and adulterers .
58013005	Let your way of life be without the love of money , and be satisfied with what you have . For He Himself has said , “ I shall never leave you nor forsake you , ”
58013006	so that we boldly say , “ יהוה is my helper , I shall not fear what man shall do to me . ”
58013007	Remember those leading you , who spoke the Word of Elohim to you . Consider the outcome of their way of life and imitate their belief .
58013008	יהושע Messiah is the same yesterday , and today , and forever .
58013009	Do not be borne about by various and strange teachings . For it is good for the heart to be established by favour , not with foods which have not profited those who have been occupied with them .
58013010	We have an altar from which those serving the Tent have no authority to eat .
58013011	For the bodies of those beasts whose blood is brought into the Set-apart Place by the high priest for sin , are burned outside the camp .
58013012	And so יהושע also suffered outside the gate , to set apart the people with His own blood .
58013013	Let us , then , go to Him outside the camp , bearing His reproach .
58013014	For we have no lasting city here , but we seek the one coming .
58013015	Through Him then , let us continually offer up a slaughter offering of praise to Elohim , that is , the fruit of our lips , giving thanks to His Name .
58013016	And do not forget to do good and to share , for with such slaughter offerings Elohim is well pleased .
58013017	Obey those leading you , and be subject to them , for they watch for your lives , as having to give account . Let them do so with joy and not groaning , for that would be of no advantage to you .
58013018	Pray for us , for we trust that we have a good conscience , desiring to behave well in every way .
58013019	But I particularly encourage you to do this , that I might be restored to you the sooner .
58013020	And the Elohim of peace who brought up our Master יהושע from the dead , that great Shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
58013021	make you perfect in every good work to do His desire , working in you what is pleasing in His sight , through יהושע Messiah , to whom be esteem forever and ever . Amĕn .
58013022	And I call upon you , brothers , bear with the word of encouragement for I have written to you in few words .
58013023	Know that brother Timothy has been released , with whom I shall see you if he comes shortly .
58013024	Greet all those leading you , and all the set-apart ones . Those from Italy greet you .
58013025	Favour be with you all . Amĕn .
59001001	Ya‛aqoḇ , a servant of Elohim and of the Master יהושע Messiah , to the twelve tribes who are in the dispersion : Greetings .
59001002	My brothers , count it all joy when you fall into various trials ,
59001003	knowing that the proving of your belief works endurance .
59001004	And let endurance have a perfect work , so that you be perfect and complete , lacking in naught .
59001005	If any of you lacks wisdom , let him ask of Elohim , who gives to all generously and without reproach , and it shall be given to him .
59001006	But he should ask in belief , not doubting , for he who doubts is like a wave of the sea driven and tossed by the wind .
59001007	For that man should not think that he shall receive whatever from the Master –
59001008	he is a double-minded man , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	And let the lowly brother boast in his exaltation ,
59001010	but the rich in his humiliation , because as a flower of the field he shall pass away .
59001011	For the sun rose with burning heat , and withered the grass , and its flower fell , and its pretty appearance perished . So also the rich man shall fade away in his ways .
59001012	Blessed is the man who does endure trial , for when he has been proved , he shall receive the crown of life which the Master has promised to those who love Him .
59001013	Let no one say when he is enticed , “ I am enticed by Elohim , ” for Elohim is not enticed by evil matters , and He entices no one .
59001014	But each one is enticed when he is drawn away by his own desires and trapped .
59001015	Then , when desire has conceived , it gives birth to sin . And sin , when it has been accomplished , brings forth death .
59001016	Do not go astray , my beloved brothers .
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , coming down from the Father of lights , with whom there is no change , nor shadow of turning .
59001018	Having purposed it , He brought us forth by the Word of truth , for us to be a kind of first-fruits of His creatures .
59001019	So then , my beloved brothers , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath ,
59001020	for the wrath of man does not work the righteousness of Elohim .
59001021	Therefore put away all filthiness and overflow of evil , and receive with meekness the implanted Word , which is able to save your lives .
59001022	And become doers of the Word , and not hearers only , deceiving yourselves .
59001023	Because if anyone is a hearer of the Word and not a doer , he is like a man who looks at his natural face in a mirror ,
59001024	for he looks at himself , and goes away , and immediately forgets what he was like .
59001025	But he that looked into the perfect Torah , that of freedom , and continues in it , not becoming a hearer that forgets , but a doer of work , this one shall be blessed in his doing of the Torah .
59001026	If anyone among you thinks he is religious , and does not bridle his tongue but deceives his own heart , this one’s religion is worthless .
59001027	Clean and undefiled religion before the Elohim and Father is this : to visit orphans and widows in their affliction , and to keep oneself unstained from the world .
59002001	My brothers , do not hold the belief of our Master יהושע Messiah , the Master of esteem , with partiality .
59002002	For if there should come into your meeting a man with gold rings , in a splendid robe , and there should also come in a poor one dressed in rags ,
59002003	and you pay attention to the one wearing the splendid robe and say to him , “ You sit here in a good place , ” and say to the poor one , “ You stand there , ” or , “ Sit here by my feet , ”
59002004	have you not discriminated among yourselves , and become judges with wicked thoughts ?
59002005	Listen , my beloved brothers : Has Elohim not chosen the poor of this world , rich in belief and heirs of the reign which He promised to those who love Him ?
59002006	But you have shown disrespect towards the poor man . Do not the rich oppress you and drag you into the courts ?
59002007	Do they not blaspheme that good Name by which you are called ?
59002008	If you truly accomplish the sovereign law according to the Scripture , “ You shall love your neighbour as yourself , ” you do well ,
59002009	but if you show partiality , you commit sin , being found guilty by the Torah as transgressors .
59002010	For whoever shall guard all the Torah , and yet stumble in one point , he is guilty of all .
59002011	For He who said , “ Do not commit adultery , ” also said , “ Do not murder . ” Now if you do not commit adultery , but you do murder , you have become a transgressor of Torah .
59002012	So speak and so do as those who are to be judged by a Torah of freedom .
59002013	For the judgment is without compassion to the one who has shown no compassion . And compassion boasts over judgment .
59002014	My brothers , what use is it for anyone to say he has belief but does not have works ? This belief is unable to save him .
59002015	And if a brother or sister is naked and in need of daily food ,
59002016	but one of you says to them , “ Go in peace , be warmed and be filled , ” but you do not give them the bodily needs , what use is it ?
59002017	So also belief , if it does not have works , is in itself dead .
59002018	But someone might say , “ You have belief , and I have works . ” Show me your belief without your works , and I shall show you my belief by my works .
59002019	You believe that Elohim is one . You do well . The demons also believe – and shudder !
59002020	But do you wish to know , O foolish man , that the belief without the works is dead ?
59002021	Was not Aḇraham our father declared right by works when he offered Yitsḥaq his son on the altar ?
59002022	Do you see that the belief was working with his works , and by the works the belief was perfected ?
59002023	And the Scripture was filled which says , “ Aḇraham believed Elohim , and it was reckoned to him for righteousness . ” And he was called , “ Elohim’s friend . ”
59002024	You see , then , that a man is declared right by works , and not by belief alone .
59002025	In the same way , was not Raḥaḇ the whore also declared right by works when she received the messengers and sent them out another way ?
59002026	For as the body without the spirit is dead , so also the belief is dead without the works .
59003001	Not many of you should become teachers , my brothers , knowing that we shall receive greater judgment .
59003002	For we all stumble in many matters . If anyone does not stumble in word , he is a perfect man , able also to bridle the entire body .
59003003	Look , we put bits in the mouths of horses , for them to obey us , and we turn their body .
59003004	Look at the ships too : although they are so big and are driven by strong winds , they are turned by a very small rudder wherever the pilot intends .
59003005	So too the tongue is a little member , yet boasts greatly . See how a little fire kindles a great forest !
59003006	And the tongue is a fire , the world of unrighteousness . Among our members the tongue is set , the one defiling the entire body , and setting on fire the wheel of life , and it is set on fire by Gehenna .
59003007	For every kind of beast and bird , of reptile and creature of the sea , is tamed and has been tamed by mankind .
59003008	But no man is able to tame the tongue . It is unruly , evil , filled with deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless our Elohim and Father , and with it we curse men , who have been made in the likeness of Elohim .
59003010	Out of the same mouth proceed blessing and cursing . My brothers , this should not be so .
59003011	Does the fountain send forth the sweet and the bitter from the same opening ?
59003012	My brothers , is a fig tree able to bear olives , or a grapevine figs ? So neither is a fountain able to make salt and sweet water .
59003013	Who is wise and understanding among you ? Let him show by his good behaviour his works in meekness of wisdom .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and self-seeking in your hearts , do not boast against and lie against the truth .
59003015	This is not the wisdom coming down from above , but it is earthly , unspiritual , demonic .
59003016	For where jealousy and self-seeking are , there is confusion and every foul deed .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is first clean , then peaceable , gentle , ready to obey , filled with compassion and good fruits , without partiality and without hypocrisy .
59003018	And the fruit of righteousnessis sown in peace by those who make peace .
59004001	Where do fightings and strivings come from among you ? Do they not come from your pleasures that battle in your members ?
59004002	You desire , and do not have . You murder , and are jealous , and are unable to obtain . You strive and fight , and you do not possess , because you do not ask .
59004003	You ask and do not receive , because you ask evilly , in order to spend it on your pleasures .
59004004	Adulterers and adulteresses ! Do you not know that friendship with the world is enmity with Elohim ? Whoever therefore intends to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of Elohim .
59004005	Or do you think that the Scripture speaks to no purpose ? Does the Spirit which dwells in us intensely crave unto envy ?
59004006	But He gives greater favour . Because of this He says , “ Elohim resists the proud , but gives favour to the humble . ”
59004007	So then subject yourselves to Elohim . Resist the devil and he shall flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to Elohim and He shall draw near to you . Cleanse hands , sinners . And cleanse the hearts , you double-minded !
59004009	Lament and mourn and weep ! Let your laughter be turned to mourning and your joy to dejection .
59004010	Humble yourselves in the sight of the Master , and He shall lift you up .
59004011	Brothers , do not speak against one another . He that speaks against a brother and judges his brother , speaks against Torah and judges Torah . And if you judge Torah , you are not a doer of Torah but a judge .
59004012	There is one Lawgiver and Judge , who is able to save and to destroy . Who are you to judge another ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow , let us go to such and such a city , spend a year there , and trade , and make a profit , ”
59004014	when you do not know of tomorrow . For what is your life ? For it is a vapour that appears for a little , and then disappears –
59004015	instead of your saying , “ If the Master desires , we shall live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you boast in your proud speeches . All such boasting is wicked .
59004017	To him , then , who knows to do good and does not do it , to him it is sin .
59005001	Come now , rich ones , weep , crying aloud over the hardships coming upon you !
59005002	Your riches have rotted , and your garments have become moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and silver have become rusty , and their rust shall be a witness against you and shall eat your flesh like fire . You have laid up treasure in the last days .
59005004	See , the wages of the workmen who mowed your fields , which you kept back , cry out . And the cries of the reapers have reached the ears of יהוה of hosts .
59005005	You have lived on the earth in pleasure and luxury , you have fattened your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned , you have murdered the righteous – he does not resist you .
59005007	So , brothers , be patient until the coming of the Master . See , the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth , waiting patiently for it until it receives the early and latter rain .
59005008	You too , be patient . Establish your hearts , for the coming of the Master has drawn near .
59005009	Do not grumble against each other , brothers , lest you be judged . See , the Judge is standing at the door !
59005010	My brothers , as an example of suffering and patience , take the prophets , who spoke in the Name of יהוה .
59005011	See , we call those blessed who endure . You have heard of the endurance of Iyoḇ and saw the purpose of יהוה , that He is very sympathetic and compassionate .
59005012	But above all , my brothers , do not swear , either by the heaven or by the earth or with any other oath . But let your Yes be Yes , and your No , No , lest you fall into judgment .
59005013	Is any of you suffering evil ? Let him pray . Is anyone in good spirits ? Let him sing psalms .
59005014	Is anyone among you sick ? Let him call for the elders of the assembly , and let them pray over him , having anointed him with oil in the Name of the Master .
59005015	And the prayer of the belief shall save the sick , and the Master shall raise him up . And if he has committed sins , he shall be forgiven .
59005016	Confess your trespasses to one another , and pray for one another , so that you are healed . The earnest prayer of a righteous one accomplishes much .
59005017	Ěliyahu was a man with feelings like us , and he prayed earnestly that it would not rain . And it did not rain on the land for three years and six months .
59005018	And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the land brought forth its fruit .
59005019	Brothers , if anyone among you goes astray from the truth , and someone turns him back ,
59005020	let him know that he who turns a sinner from the straying of his way shall save a life from death and cover a great number of sins .
60001001	Kĕpha , an emissary of יהושע Messiah , to the chosen , strangers of the dispersion in Pontos , Galatia , Kappadokia , Asia , and Bithunia ,
60001002	chosen according to the foreknowledge of Elohim the Father , set apart by the Spirit unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of יהושע Messiah : Favour and peace be increased to you .
60001003	Blessed be the Elohim and Father of our Master יהושע Messiah , who according to His great compassion has caused us to be born again to a living expectation through the resurrection of יהושע Messiah from the dead ,
60001004	to an inheritance incorruptible and undefiled and unfading , having been kept in the heavens for you ,
60001005	who are protected by the power of Elohim through belief , for a deliverance ready to be revealed in the last time ,
60001006	in which you exult , even though for a little while , if need be , you have been grieved by manifold trials ,
60001007	in order that the proving of your belief – much more precious than gold that perishes , and proven by fire – might be found to result in praise and respect and esteem at the revelation of יהושע Messiah ,
60001008	whom having not seen , you love ; in whom you exult with unspeakable and esteemed joy , yet not seeing , but believing ,
60001009	obtaining the goal of your belief : a deliverance of lives .
60001010	Concerning this deliverance the prophets have sought out and searched out , prophesying concerning the favour for you ,
60001011	searching to know what , or what sort of time , the Spirit which was in them was pointing out concerning Messiah , when it was bearing witness beforehand the sufferings of Messiah , and the esteems that would follow ,
60001012	to whom it was revealed that they were serving , not themselves , but you , in these matters which now have been announced to you through those who brought the Good News to you by the Set-apart Spirit sent from heaven – into which messengers long to look into .
60001013	Therefore , having girded up the loins of your mind , being sober , set your expectation perfectly upon the favour that is to be brought to you at the revelation of יהושע Messiah ,
60001014	as obedient children , not conforming yourselves to the former lusts in your ignorance ,
60001015	instead , as the One who called you is set-apart , so you also should become set-apart in all behaviour ,
60001016	because it has been written , “ Be set-apart , for I am set-apart . ”
60001017	And if you call on the Father , who without partiality judges according to each one’s work , pass the time of your sojourning in fear ,
60001018	knowing that you were redeemed from your futile way of life inherited from your fathers , not with what is corruptible , silver or gold ,
60001019	but with the precious blood of Messiah , as of a lamb unblemished and spotless ,
60001020	foreknown , indeed , before the foundation of the world , but manifested in these last times for your sakes ,
60001021	who through Him believe in Elohim who raised Him from the dead and gave Him esteem , so that your belief and expectation are in Elohim .
60001022	Now that you have cleansed your lives in obeying the truth through the Spirit to unfeigned brotherly love , love one another fervently with a clean heart ,
60001023	having been born again – not of corruptible seed , but incorruptible – through the living Word of Elohim , which remains forever ,
60001024	because “ All flesh is as grass , and all the esteem of man as the flower of the grass . The grass withers , and its flower falls away ,
60001025	but the Word of Elohim remains forever . ” And this is the Word , announced as Good News to you .
60002001	Having put aside , then , all evil , and all deceit , and hypocrisies , and envyings , and all evil words ,
60002002	as newborn babes , desire the unadulterated milk of the Word , in order that you grow by it ,
60002003	if indeed you have tasted that the Master is good .
60002004	Drawing near to Him , a living Stone – rejected indeed by men , but chosen by Elohim and precious –
60002005	you also , as living stones , are being built up , a spiritual house , a set-apart priesthood , to offer up spiritual slaughter offerings acceptable to Elohim through יהושע Messiah .
60002006	Because it is contained in the Scripture , “ See , I lay in Tsiyon a chief corner-stone , chosen , precious , and he who believes on Him shall by no means be put to shame . ”
60002007	This preciousness , then , is for you who believe ; but to those who are disobedient , “ The stone which the builders rejected has become the chief corner-stone , ”
60002008	and “ A stone of stumbling and a rock that makes for falling , ” who stumble because they are disobedient to the Word , to which they also were appointed .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , a royal priesthood , a set-apart nation , a people for a possession , that you should proclaim the praises of Him who called you out of darkness into His marvellous light ,
60002010	who once were not a people , but now the people of Elohim ; who had not obtained compassion , but now obtained compassion .
60002011	Beloved ones , I appeal to you as sojourners and pilgrims , to abstain from fleshly lusts which battle against the life ,
60002012	having your behaviour among the gentiles good so that when they speak against you as evil-doers , let them , by observing your good works , esteem Elohim in a day of visitation .
60002013	Be subject to every institution of man because of the Master , whether to the sovereign as supreme ,
60002014	or to governors , as to those who are sent by him for the punishment of doers of evil , and a praise for those who do good .
60002015	Because such is the desire of Elohim , that by doing good you should put to silence the ignorance of foolish men ,
60002016	as free , yet not using your freedom as a cloak for evil , but as servants of Elohim .
60002017	Respect all , love the brotherhood , fear Elohim , respect the sovereign .
60002018	Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear , not only to the good and gentle , but also to the crooked ones .
60002019	For this is favour , if because of conscience toward Elohim anyone bears up under grief , suffering unrighteously .
60002020	For what credit is there in enduring a beating when you sin ? But if you suffer for doing good and you endure , this finds favour with Elohim .
60002021	For to this you were called , because Messiah also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that you should follow His steps ,
60002022	“ who committed no sin , nor was deceit found in His mouth , ”
60002023	who , being reviled , did not revile in return ; suffering , did not threaten , but committed Himself to Him who judges righteously ;
60002024	who Himself bore our sins in His body on the timber , so that we , having died to sins , might live unto righteousness – by whose stripes you were healed .
60002025	For you were like sheep going astray , but have now returned to the Shepherd and Overseer of your lives .
60003001	In the same way , wives , be subject to your own husbands , so that if any are disobedient to the Word , they , without a word , might be won by the behaviour of their wives ,
60003002	having seen your blameless behaviour in fear .
60003003	Your adornment should not be outward – arranging the hair , wearing gold , or putting on dresses –
60003004	but the hidden Man of the heart , with the incorruptible ornament of a meek and peaceable spirit , which is of great value before Elohim .
60003005	For in this way , in former times , the set-apart women who trusted in Elohim also adorned themselves , being subject to their own husbands ,
60003006	as Sarah obeyed Aḇraham , calling him master , of whom you became children , doing good , and not frightened by any fear .
60003007	In the same way , husbands , live understandingly together , giving respect to the wife , as to the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the favour of life , so that your prayers are not hindered .
60003008	To sum up , let all of you be like-minded , sympathetic , loving as brothers , tenderhearted , humble-minded ,
60003009	not returning evil for evil or reviling for reviling , but on the contrary blessing , knowing that you were called to this , in order to inherit a blessing .
60003010	For “ He who wishes to love life and see good days , let him keep his tongue from evil , and his lips from speaking deceit ,
60003011	let him turn away from evil and do good , let him seek peace and pursue it .
60003012	“ Because the eyes of יהוה are on the righteous , and his ears are open to their prayers , but the face of יהוה is against those who do evil . ”
60003013	And who is the one doing evil to you , if you become imitators of the good ?
60003014	But even if you suffer for righteousness’ sake , you are blessed . “ And do not fear their threats , neither be troubled . ”
60003015	But set apart יהוה Elohim in your hearts , and always be ready to give an answer to everyone asking you a reason concerning the expectation that is in you , with meekness and fear ,
60003016	having a good conscience , so that when they speak against you as doers of evil , those who falsely accuse your good behaviour in Messiah , shall be ashamed .
60003017	For it is better , if it is the desire of Elohim , to suffer for doing good than for doing evil .
60003018	Because even Messiah once suffered for sins , the righteous for the unrighteous , to bring you to Elohim , having been put to death indeed in flesh but made alive in the Spirit ,
60003019	in which also He went and proclaimed unto the spirits in prison ,
60003020	who were disobedient at one time when the patience of Elohim waited in the days of Noaḥ , while the ark was being prepared , in which a few , that is , eight beings , were saved through water ,
60003021	which figure now also saves us : immersion – not a putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward Elohim – through the resurrection of יהושע Messiah ,
60003022	who , having gone into heaven , is at the right hand of Elohim , messengers and authorities and powers having been subjected to Him .
60004001	Therefore , since Messiah suffered in the flesh , arm yourselves also with the same mind , because he who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin ,
60004002	so that he no longer lives the rest of his time in the flesh for the lusts of men , but according to the desire of Elohim .
60004003	For we have spent enough of our past lifetime in doing the desire of the gentiles , having walked in indecencies , lusts , drunkenness , orgies , wild parties , and abominable idolatries ,
60004004	in which they are surprised that you do not run with them in the same flood of loose behaviour , blaspheming ,
60004005	who shall give an account to Him who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	For this reason the Good News was also brought to those who are dead , so that , whereas they are judged according to men in the flesh , they might live according to Elohim in the spirit .
60004007	But the end of all has drawn near . Therefore be sober-minded , and be attentive in the prayers .
60004008	And above all have fervent love for one another , because love covers a great number of sins .
60004009	Welcome one another without grumbling .
60004010	As each one has received a gift , serve one another , as good trustees of the manifold favour of Elohim .
60004011	If anyone speaks , let it be as the Words of Elohim . If anyone serves , let it be as with the strength which Elohim provides , so that Elohim might be praised in it all through יהושע Messiah , to whom belong the esteem and the rule forever and ever . Amĕn .
60004012	Beloved ones , do not be surprised at the fiery trial that is coming upon you , to try you , as though some unusual matter has befallen you ,
60004013	but as you share Messiah’s sufferings , rejoice , in order that you might rejoice exultingly at the revelation of His esteem .
60004014	If you are reproached for the Name of Messiah , you are blessed , because the Spirit of esteem and of Elohim rests upon you . On their part He is blasphemed , but on your part He is praised .
60004015	For do not let any of you suffer as a murderer , or thief , or doer of evil , or as a meddler .
60004016	But if one suffers being Messianic , let him not be ashamed , but let him esteem Elohim in this matter .
60004017	Because it is time for judgment to begin from the House of Elohim . And if firstly from us , what is the end of those who do not obey the Good News of Elohim ?
60004018	And if the righteous one is scarcely saved , where shall the wicked and the sinner appear ?
60004019	So then , those who suffer according to the desire of Elohim should commit their lives to a trustworthy Creator , in doing good .
60005001	Therefore , as a fellow elder and a witness of the sufferings of Messiah , and also a sharer of the esteem that is to be revealed , I appeal to the elders among you :
60005002	Shepherd the flock of Elohim which is among you , serving as overseers , not by compulsion but voluntarily , not out of greed for filthy gain , but eagerly ,
60005003	neither as being masters over those entrusted to you , but being examples to the flock .
60005004	And when the Chief Shepherd appears , you shall receive the never-fading crown of esteem .
60005005	In the same way , you younger ones , be subject to elders . And gird yourselves with humility toward one another , for “ Elohim resists the proud , but gives favour to the humble . ”
60005006	Humble yourselves , then , under the mighty hand of Elohim , so that He exalts you in due time ,
60005007	casting all your worry upon Him , for He is concerned about you .
60005008	Be sober , watch , because your adversary the devil walks about like a roaring lion , seeking someone to devour .
60005009	Resist him , firm in the belief , knowing that the same hardships are experienced by your brotherhood in the world .
60005010	And the Elohim of all favour , who called you to His everlasting esteem by Messiah יהושע , after you have suffered a while , Himself perfect , establish , strengthen , and settle you .
60005011	To Him be the esteem and the might forever and ever . Amĕn .
60005012	Through Sila the trustworthy brother , as I reckon , I have written to you briefly , encouraging and witnessing that this is the true favour of Elohim . In this stand fast .
60005013	She who is in Baḇel , chosen together with you , greets you , also my son , Mark .
60005014	Greet one another with a kiss of love . Peace to all of you who are in Messiah יהושע . Amĕn .
61001001	Shim‛on Kĕpha , a servant and emissary of יהושע Messiah , to those who have obtained a belief as precious as ours by the righteousness of our Elohim and Saviour יהושע Messiah :
61001002	Favour and peace be increased to you in the knowledge of Elohim and of יהושע our Master ,
61001003	as His Mighty-like power has given to us all we need for life and reverence , through the knowledge of Him who called us to esteem and uprightness .
61001004	Through these there have been given to us exceedingly great and precious promises , so that through these you might be partakers of the Mighty-like nature , having escaped from the corruption in the world , caused by lust .
61001005	And for this reason do your utmost to add to your belief uprightness , to uprightness knowledge ,
61001006	to knowledge self-control , to self-control endurance , to endurance reverence ,
61001007	to reverence brotherly affection , and to brotherly affection love .
61001008	For if these are in you and increase , they cause you to be neither inactive nor without fruit in the knowledge of our Master יהושע Messiah .
61001009	For he in whom these are not present is blind , being shortsighted , and has forgotten that he has been cleansed from his old sins .
61001010	For this reason , brothers , all the more do your utmost to make firm your calling and choosing , for if you are doing these matters you shall never stumble at all ,
61001011	for in this way an entrance into the everlasting reign of our Master and Saviour יהושע Messiah shall be richly supplied to you .
61001012	And so I intend to remind you of these matters again and again , though you know them and have been established in the present truth .
61001013	But I think it is right , as long as I am in this tent , to stir you up by a reminder ,
61001014	knowing that the putting off of my tent is soon , even as our Master יהושע Messiah made clear to me .
61001015	And I shall do my utmost also , to see to it that you always have a reminder of these matters after my departure .
61001016	For we did not follow cleverly devised stories when we made known to you the power and coming of our Master יהושע Messiah , but were eye-witnesses of His superbness .
61001017	For when He received respect and esteem from Elohim the Father , such a voice came to Him from the Excellent Esteem , “ This is My Son , the Beloved in whom I did delight . ”
61001018	And we heard this voice which came from heaven when we were with Him on the set-apart mountain .
61001019	And we have the prophetic word made more certain , which you do well to heed as a light that shines in a dark place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts ,
61001020	knowing this first , that no prophecy of Scripture came to be of one’s own interpretation ,
61001021	for prophecy never came by the desire of man , but men of Elohim spoke , being moved by the Set-apart Spirit .
61002001	But there also came to be false prophets among the people , as also among you there shall be false teachers , who shall secretly bring in destructive heresies , and deny the Master who bought them , bringing swift destruction on themselves .
61002002	And many shall follow their destructive ways , because of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of ,
61002003	and in greed , with fabricated words , they shall use you for gain . From of old their judgment does not linger , and their destruction does not slumber .
61002004	For if Elohim did not spare the messengers who sinned , but sent them to Tartaros , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be kept for judgment ,
61002005	and did not spare the world of old , but preserved Noaḥ , a proclaimer of righteousness , and seven others , bringing in the flood on the world of the wicked ,
61002006	and having reduced to ashes the cities of Seḏom and Amorah condemned them to destruction – having made them an example to those who afterward would live wickedly ,
61002007	and rescued righteous Lot , who was oppressed with the indecent behaviour of the lawless
61002008	( for day after day that righteous man , dwelling among them , tortured his righteous being by seeing and hearing their lawless works ) ,
61002009	then יהוה knows how to rescue the reverent ones from trial and to keep the unrighteous unto the day of judgment , to be punished ,
61002010	and most of all those walking after the flesh in filthy lust and despising authority – bold , headstrong , speaking evil of esteemed ones ,
61002011	whereas messengers who are greater in strength and power do not bring a slanderous accusation against them before the Master .
61002012	But these , like natural unreasoning beasts , having been born to be caught and destroyed , blaspheme that which they do not know , shall be destroyed in their destruction ,
61002013	being about to receive the wages of unrighteousness , deeming indulgence in the day of pleasure , spots and blemishes , revelling in their own deceptions while they feast with you ,
61002014	having eyes filled with an adulteress , and unable to cease from sin , enticing unstable beings , having a heart trained in greed , children of a curse ,
61002015	having left the right way they went astray , having followed the way of Bil‛am the son of Be‛or , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ,
61002016	but he was rebuked for his transgression : a dumb donkey speaking with the voice of a man restrained the madness of the prophet .
61002017	These are fountains without water , clouds driven by a storm , to whom the blackest darkness is kept forever .
61002018	For speaking arrogant nonsense , they entice – through the lusts of the flesh , through indecencies – the ones who have indeed escaped from those living in delusion ,
61002019	promising them freedom , though themselves being slaves of corruption – for one is a slave to whatever overcomes him .
61002020	For if , after they have escaped the defilements of the world through the knowledge of the Master and Saviour יהושע Messiah , they are again entangled in them and overcome , the latter end is worse for them than the first .
61002021	For it would have been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than having known it , to turn from the set-apart command delivered unto them .
61002022	For them the proverb has proved true , “ A dog returns to his own vomit , ” and , “ A washed sow returns to her rolling in the mud . ”
61003001	This is now , beloved ones , the second letter I write to you , in which I stir up your sincere mind , to remember
61003002	the words previously spoken by the set-apart prophets , and of the command of the Master and Saviour , spoken by your emissaries ,
61003003	knowing this first : that mockers shall come in the last days with mocking , walking according to their own lusts ,
61003004	and saying , “ Where is the promise of His coming ? For since the fathers fell asleep , all continues as from the beginning of creation . ”
61003005	For they choose to have this hidden from them : that the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of water and in the water , by the Word of Elohim ,
61003006	through which the world at that time was destroyed , being flooded with water .
61003007	And the present heavens and the earth are treasured up by the same Word , being kept for fire , to a day of judgment and destruction of wicked men .
61003008	But , beloved ones , let not this one matter be hidden from you : that with יהוה one day is as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
61003009	יהוה is not slow in regard to the promise , as some count slowness , but is patient toward us , not wishing that any should perish but that all should come to repentance .
61003010	But the day of יהוה shall come as a thief in the night , in which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with intense heat , and the earth and the works that are in it shall be burned up .
61003011	Seeing all these are to be destroyed in this way , what kind of people ought you to be in set-apart behaviour and reverence ,
61003012	looking for and hastening the coming of the day of Elohim , through which the heavens shall be destroyed , being set on fire , and the elements melt with intense heat !
61003013	But according to His promise we wait for a renewed heavens and a renewed earth in which righteousness dwells .
61003014	So then , beloved ones , looking forward to this , do your utmost to be found by Him in peace , spotless and blameless ,
61003015	and reckon the patience of our Master as deliverance , as also our beloved brother Sha’ul wrote to you , according to the wisdom given to him ,
61003016	as also in all his letters , speaking in them concerning these matters , in which some are hard to understand , which those who are untaught and unstable twist to their own destruction , as they do also the other Scriptures .
61003017	You , then , beloved ones , being forewarned , watch , lest you also fall from your own steadfastness , being led away with the delusion of the lawless ,
61003018	but grow in the favour and knowledge of our Master and Saviour יהושע Messiah . To Him be the esteem both now and to a day that abides . Amĕn .
62001001	What was from the beginning , what we have heard , what we have seen with our eyes , what we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , concerning the Word of life :
62001002	And the life was manifested , and we have seen , and bear witness , and announce to you that everlasting life which was with the Father and was manifested to us .
62001003	We announce to you what we have seen and heard , so that you too might have fellowship with us . And truly our fellowship is with the Father and with His Son יהושע Messiah .
62001004	And we write this to you in order that your joy might be complete .
62001005	And this is the message which we have heard from Him and announce to you , that Elohim is light and in Him is no darkness at all .
62001006	If we say that we have fellowship with Him , and walk in darkness , we lie and are not doing the truth .
62001007	But if we walk in the light as He is in the light , we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of יהושע Messiah His Son cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we say that we have no sin , we are misleading ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
62001009	If we confess our sins , He is trustworthy and righteous to forgive us the sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	If we say that we have not sinned , we make Him a liar , and His Word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , I write this to you , so that you do not sin . And if anyone sins , we have an Intercessor with the Father , יהושע Messiah , a righteous One .
62002002	And He Himself is an atoning offering for our sins , and not for ours only but also for all the world .
62002003	And by this we know that we know Him , if we guard His commands .
62002004	The one who says , “ I know Him , ” and does not guard His commands , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
62002005	But whoever guards His Word , truly the love of Elohim has been perfected in him . By this we know that we are in Him .
62002006	The one who says he stays in Him ought himself also to walk , even as He walked .
62002007	Beloved , I write no fresh command to you , but an old command which you have had from the beginning . The old command is the Word which you heard from the beginning .
62002008	Again I write you a fresh command , which is true in Him and in you , because the darkness is passing away , and the true light now shines .
62002009	The one who says he is in the light , and hates his brother , is in the darkness until now .
62002010	The one who loves his brother stays in the light , and there is no stumbling-block in him .
62002011	But the one who hates his brother is in the darkness and walks in the darkness , and does not know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I write to you , little children , because your sins have been forgiven on account of His Name .
62002013	I write to you , fathers , because you have known Him from the beginning . I write to you , young men , because you have overcome the wicked one . I write to you , little children , because you have known the Father .
62002014	I wrote to you , fathers , because you have known Him from the beginning . I wrote to you , young men , because you are strong , and the Word of Elohim stays in you , and you have overcome the wicked one .
62002015	Do not love the world nor that which is in the world . If anyone loves the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
62002016	Because all that is in the world – the lust of the flesh , the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life – is not of the Father but is of the world .
62002017	And the world passes away , and the lust of it , but the one doing the desire of Elohim remains forever .
62002018	Little children , it is the last hour . And as you have heard that the anti-messiah is coming , even now many anti-messiahs have come . This is how we know that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us , but they were not of us , for if they had been of us , they would have stayed with us – but in order that it might be made manifest that none of them were of us .
62002020	And you have an anointing from the Set-apart One , and you know all .
62002021	I did not write to you because you do not know the truth , but because you know it , and because no falsehood is of the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar , except the one denying that יהושע is the Messiah ? This is the anti-messiah , the one denying the Father and the Son .
62002023	No one denying the Son has the Father . The one confessing the Son has the Father as well .
62002024	As for you , let that stay in you which you heard from the beginning . If what you heard from the beginning stays in you , you also shall stay in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is the promise that He has promised us : everlasting life .
62002026	I have written this to you concerning those who lead you astray .
62002027	But the anointing which you have received from Him stays in you , and you have no need that anyone should teach you . But as the same anointing does teach you concerning all , and is true , and is no falsehood , and even as it has taught you , you stay in Him .
62002028	And now , little children , stay in Him , so that when He appears , we might have boldness and not be ashamed before Him at His coming .
62002029	If you know that He is righteous , you know that everyone doing righteousness has been born of Him .
62003001	See what love the Father has given us , that we should be called children of Elohim ! For this reason the world does not know us , because it did not know Him .
62003002	Beloved ones , now we are children of Elohim . And it has not yet been revealed what we shall be , but we know that when He is revealed , we shall be like Him , for we shall see Him as He is .
62003003	And everyone having this expectation in Him cleanses himself , as He is clean .
62003004	Everyone doing sin also does lawlessness , and sin is lawlessness .
62003005	And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins , and in Him there is no sin .
62003006	Everyone staying in Him does not sin . Everyone sinning has neither seen Him nor known Him .
62003007	Little children , let no one lead you astray . The one doing righteousness is righteous , even as He is righteous .
62003008	The one doing sin is of the devil , because the devil has sinned from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of Elohim was manifested : to destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Everyone having been born of Elohim does not sin , because His seed stays in him , and he is powerless to sin , because he has been born of Elohim .
62003010	In this the children of Elohim and the children of the devil are manifest : Everyone not doing righteousness is not of Elohim , neither the one not loving his brother .
62003011	Because this is the message that you heard from the beginning , that we should love one another ,
62003012	not as Qayin who was of the wicked one and killed his brother . And why did he kill him ? Because his works were wicked but those of his brother were righteous .
62003013	Do not marvel , my brothers , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have passed out of death into life , because we love the brothers . The one not loving his brother stays in death .
62003015	Everyone hating his brother is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has everlasting life staying in him .
62003016	By this we have known love , because He laid down His life for us . And we ought to lay down our lives for the brothers .
62003017	But whoever has this world’s goods , and sees his brother in need , and shuts up his tender affections from him , how does the love of Elohim stay in him ?
62003018	My little children , let us not love in word or in tongue , but in deed and in truth .
62003019	And by this we know that we are of the truth , and shall set our hearts at rest before Him ,
62003020	that if our heart condemns us , Elohim is greater than our heart , and knows all .
62003021	Beloved ones , if our heart does not condemn us , we have boldness toward Elohim .
62003022	And whatever we ask we receive from Him , because we guard His commands and do what is pleasing in His sight .
62003023	And this is His command , that we should believe in the Name of His Son יהושע Messiah and love one another , as He gave us command .
62003024	And the one guarding His commands stays in Him , and He in him . And by this we know that He stays in us , by the Spirit which He gave us .
62004001	Beloved ones , do not believe every spirit , but prove the spirits , whether they are of Elohim , because many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you know the Spirit of Elohim : Every spirit that confesses that יהושע Messiah has come in the flesh is of Elohim ,
62004003	and every spirit that does not confess that יהושע Messiah has come in the flesh is not of Elohim . And this is the spirit of the anti-messiah which you heard is coming , and now is already in the world .
62004004	You are of Elohim , little children , and have overcome them , because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world , therefore they speak as of the world , and the world hears them .
62004006	We are of Elohim – the one knowing Elohim hears us . He who is not of Elohim does not hear us . By this we know the Spirit of the Truth and the spirit of the delusion .
62004007	Beloved ones , let us love one another , because love is of Elohim , and everyone who loves has been born of Elohim , and knows Elohim .
62004008	The one who does not love does not know Elohim , for Elohim is love .
62004009	By this the love of Elohim was manifested in us , that Elohim has sent His only brought-forth Son into the world , in order that we might live through Him .
62004010	In this is love , not that we loved Elohim , but that He loved us and sent His Son to be an atoning offering for our sins .
62004011	Beloved ones , if Elohim so loved us , we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has seen Elohim at any time . If we love one another , Elohim does stay in us , and His love has been perfected in us .
62004013	By this we know that we stay in Him , and He in us , because He has given us of His Spirit .
62004014	And we have seen and bear witness that the Father has sent the Son , Saviour of the world .
62004015	Whoever confesses that יהושע is the Son of Elohim , Elohim stays in him , and he in Elohim .
62004016	And we have known and believed the love that Elohim has for us . Elohim is love , and he who stays in love stays in Elohim , and Elohim in him .
62004017	By this love has been perfected with us , in order that we might have boldness in the day of judgment , because as He is so are we in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love , but perfect love casts out fear , because fear holds punishment , and he who fears has not been made perfect in love .
62004019	We love Him because He first loved us .
62004020	If someone says , “ I love Elohim , ” and hates his brother , he is a liar . For the one not loving his brother whom he has seen , how is he able to love Elohim whom he has not seen ?
62004021	And we have this command from Him , that the one loving Elohim should love his brother too .
62005001	Everyone who believes that יהושע is the Messiah has been born of Elohim , and everyone who loves the One bringing forth also loves the one having been born of Him .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of Elohim , when we love Elohim and guard His commands .
62005003	For this is the love for Elohim , that we guard His commands , and His commands are not heavy ,
62005004	because everyone having been born of Elohim overcomes the world . And this is the overcoming that has overcome the world : our belief .
62005005	Who is the one who overcomes the world but he who believes that יהושע is the Son of Elohim ?
62005006	This is the One that came by water and blood : יהושע Messiah , not only by water , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit who bears witness , because the Spirit is the Truth .
62005007	Because there are three who bear witness :
62005008	the Spirit , and the water , and the blood . And the three are in agreement .
62005009	If we receive the witness of men , the witness of Elohim is greater , because this is the witness of Elohim which He has witnessed concerning His Son .
62005010	The one who believes in the Son of Elohim has the witness in himself , the one who does not believe Elohim has made Him a liar , because he has not believed the witness that Elohim has given concerning His Son .
62005011	And this is the witness : that Elohim has given us everlasting life , and this life is in His Son .
62005012	He who possesses the Son possesses life , he who does not possess the Son of Elohim does not possess life .
62005013	I have written this to you who believe in the Name of the Son of Elohim , so that you know that you possess everlasting life , and so that you believe in the Name of the Son of Elohim .
62005014	And this is the boldness that we have in Him , that if we ask whatever according to His desire , He hears us .
62005015	And if we know that He hears us , whatever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him .
62005016	If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin , not unto death , he shall ask , and He shall give him life for those not sinning unto death . There is a sin unto death . I do not say that he should pray about that .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin , and there is a sin not unto death .
62005018	We know that everyone having been born of Elohim does not sin , but the one having been born of Elohim guards himself , and the wicked one does not touch him .
62005019	We know that we are of Elohim , and all the world lies in the wicked one .
62005020	And we know that the Son of Elohim has come and has given us an understanding , so that we might know the true One . And we are in the true One , in His Son יהושע Messiah . This is the true Elohim and everlasting life .

63001002	because of the truth which stays in us and shall be with us forever :
63001003	Favour , compassion , peace be with you from Elohim the Father , and from the Master יהושע Messiah , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
63001004	I rejoiced greatly because I found some of your children walking in truth , as we received a command from the Father .
63001005	And now I ask you , Kuria , not as though I wrote a fresh command to you , but that which we have had from the beginning : that we love one another .
63001006	And this is the love , that we walk according to His commands . This is the command , that as you have heard from the beginning , you should walk in it .
63001007	Because many who are leading astray went out into the world who do not confess יהושע Messiah as coming in the flesh . This one is he who is leading astray and the anti-messiah .
63001008	See to yourselves , that we do not lose what we worked for , but that we might receive a complete reward .
63001009	Everyone who is transgressing and not staying in the teaching of Messiah does not possess Elohim . The one who stays in the teaching of Messiah possesses both the Father and the Son .

65001001	Yehuḏah , a servant of יהושע Messiah , and brother of Ya‛aqoḇ , to those who are called , set-apart by Elohim the Father , and preserved in יהושע Messiah :
65001002	Compassion , and peace , and love be increased to you .
65001003	Beloved ones , making all haste to write to you concerning our common deliverance , I felt the necessity to write to you urging you to earnestly contend for the belief which was once for all delivered to the set-apart ones .
65001004	For certain men have slipped in , whose judgment was written about long ago , wicked ones perverting the favour of our Elohim for indecency , and denying the only Master יהוה and our Master יהושע Messiah .
